tika-s0201t:5_1: taṃ pana dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthaṃ, taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya
tika-s0201t:5_2: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ. Atha vā maṅgalabhāvato, sabbakiriyāsu
tika-s0201t:5_3: pubbakiccabhāvato, paṇḍitehi samācaritabhāvato, āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato
tika-s0201t:5_4: ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā. Atha vā ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ pūjanīyapūjāpuññavisesanibbattanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:5_5: Taṃ attano yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa kammassa balānuppadānatthaṃ. Antarā ca
tika-s0201t:5_6: tassa asaṅkocanatthaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ anantarāyena aṭṭhakathāya parisamāpanatthaṃ. Idameva
tika-s0201t:5_7: ca payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “iti me pasannamatino…pe…
tika-s0201t:6: “Pūjārahe pūjayato. Buddhe yadi va sāvake”tiādi, tathā –
tika-s0201t:7: “Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā, agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”tiādi,
tika-s0201t:9: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa.
tika-s0201t:13: “Yasmiṃ mahānāma samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hotī”tiādi,
tika-s0201t:17_0: Tattha yassa vatthuttayassa vandanaṃ kattukāmo, tassa guṇātisayayogasandassanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:17_2: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetaṃ payojanaṃ sādhetīti. Tattha yassā desanāya
tika-s0201t:17_3: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo. Sā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā
tika-s0201t:17_4: viya paññāppadhānā, atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva tāva sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0201t:17_5: thomanaṃ kātuṃ tammūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0201t:17_6: kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Atha vā kiṇātīti karuṇā,
tika-s0201t:17_7: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ
tika-s0201t:17_8: hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā
tika-s0201t:17_9: hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati
tika-s0201t:17_10: vibandhatīti attho. Karuṇāya sītalaṃ karuṇāsītalaṃ, karuṇāsītalaṃ hadayaṃ assāti
tika-s0201t:18_3: avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇāva visesena bhagavato cittassa cittapassaddhi viya sītibhāvanimittanti
tika-s0201t:18_5: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā asādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca
tika-s0201t:18_6: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvaṃ upagatā karuṇāva bhagavato
tika-s0201t:18_7: atisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti āha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ
tika-s0201t:18_9: karuṇāva bhagavato “hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇa”nti vuttā. Karuṇānidānā hi sabbepi buddhaguṇā.
tika-s0201t:18_13: na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti. Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu
tika-s0201t:19_0: Pajānātīti paññā, yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato
tika-s0201t:19_1: pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto. Savāsanappahānato visesena
tika-s0201t:19_2: hataṃ samugghātitaṃ vihataṃ, paññāpajjotena vihataṃ paññāpajjotavihataṃ. Muyhanti
tika-s0201t:19_3: tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, mohanamattameva vā tanti moho, avijjā, sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanato
tika-s0201t:19_4: andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti tamo, paññāpajjotavihato mohatamo etassāti paññāpajjotavihatamohatamo,
tika-s0201t:19_5: taṃ paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ. Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena
tika-s0201t:19_6: avijjandhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhāvimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi
tika-s0201t:19_7: ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti sātisayena
tika-s0201t:20_0: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
tika-s0201t:20_1: tathā sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā, parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena
tika-s0201t:20_2: sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena thometabboti āha
tika-s0201t:20_4: paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:21_2: vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato mohatamavināsoti katvā vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
tika-s0201t:21_3: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sasantāne
tika-s0201t:21_4: mohatamavidhamananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhinīhārasampattiyā savāsanappahānameva hi kilesānaṃ
tika-s0201t:21_5: ñeyyāvaraṇappahānanti, parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:22_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ
tika-s0201t:22_1: gayhati, na pana sātisayaṃ niravasesakilesappahānanti? Tappahānavacaneneva tadekaṭṭhatāya
tika-s0201t:22_2: sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghātassa jotitabhāvato. Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi, yo
tika-s0201t:23_0: Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā
tika-s0201t:23_1: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto
tika-s0201t:24_0: Narā ca amarā ca narāmarā, saha narāmarehīti sanarāmaro, sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti
tika-s0201t:24_1: sanarāmaraloko. Tassa garūti sanarāmaralokagaru, taṃ sanarāmaralokagaruṃ. Etena devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0201t:24_2: viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakāritaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:24_3: Na cettha padhānāppadhānabhāvo codetabbo. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamo. Edisesu
tika-s0201t:24_4: hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:24_5: Kāmañcettha sattasaṅkhārokāsavasena tividho loko, garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā
tika-s0201t:24_6: garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo. So hi lokīyanti
tika-s0201t:24_7: ettha puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati. Amaraggahaṇena cettha upapattidevā adhippetā.
tika-s0201t:25_0: Atha vā samūhattho lokasaddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti. Saha narehīti
tika-s0201t:25_1: sanarā, sanarā ca te amarā cāti sanarāmarā, tesaṃ lokoti sanarāmaralokoti purimanayeneva
tika-s0201t:25_2: yojetabbaṃ. Amarasaddena cettha visuddhidevāpi saṅgayhanti. Te hi maraṇābhāvato paramatthato
tika-s0201t:25_3: amarā. Narāmarānaṃyeva ca gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:25_6: ca sabbasattuttamo bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamagāravaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:26_0: Sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato. Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena
tika-s0201t:26_4: yāva mahābodhiṃ anavajjatāya sobhanamevāti. Atha vā sayambhuñāṇena sakalamapi lokaṃ
tika-s0201t:26_5: pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena sammā gato avagatoti sugato. Tathā lokasamudayaṃ
tika-s0201t:26_6: pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato,
tika-s0201t:26_7: lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato, lokanirodhagāminiṃ
tika-s0201t:26_8: paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato. “Sotāpattimaggena
tika-s0201t:26_9: ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:26_10: nayena ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. Atha vā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ, nibbānameva
tika-s0201t:26_11: vā gato adhigatoti sugato. Yasmā vā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ
tika-s0201t:26_12: kālayuttameva ca dhammaṃ bhāsati, tasmā sammā gadati vadatīti sugato da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ
tika-s0201t:26_13: katvā. Iti sobhanagamanatādīhi sugato, taṃ sugataṃ.
tika-s0201t:27_0: Puññapāpakammehi upapajjanavasena gantabbato gatiyo, upapattibhavavisesā. Tā pana
tika-s0201t:27_1: nirayādivasena pañcavidhā. Tāhi sakalassapi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena
tika-s0201t:27_2: avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena nivattitattā bhagavā pañcahipi gatīhi suṭṭhu mutto visaṃyuttoti
tika-s0201t:27_3: āha “gativimutta”nti. Etena bhagavato katthacipi gatiyā apariyāpannataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:30: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0201t:31_2: parimutto, taṃ gativimuttaṃ. Vandeti namāmi, thomemīti vā attho.
tika-s0201t:32_0: Atha vā gativimuttanti anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā bhagavantaṃ thometi. Ettha
tika-s0201t:32_1: hi dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā attahitasampattito parahitapaṭipattito
tika-s0201t:32_2: ca. Tesu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamato savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantappahānato
tika-s0201t:32_5: ca. Sā panettha āsayato payogato ca duvidhā parahitapaṭipatti, tividhā ca attahitasampatti
tika-s0201t:32_6: pakāsitā hoti. Kathaṃ? “Karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti etena āsayato parahitapaṭipatti, sammāgadanatthena
tika-s0201t:32_8: etehi catusaccapaṭivedhatthena ca sugatasaddena tividhāpi attahitasampatti, avasiṭṭhaṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:32_9: tena “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etena cāpi sabbāpi attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipatti pakāsitā hotīti.
tika-s0201t:33_0: Atha vā tīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā – hetuto phalato upakārato ca. Tattha
tika-s0201t:33_1: hetu mahākaruṇā, sā paṭhamapadena dassitā. Phalaṃ catubbidhaṃ ñāṇasampadā pahānasampadā
tika-s0201t:33_2: ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tāsu ñāṇapahānasampadā dutiyapadena saccapaṭivedhatthena
tika-s0201t:33_3: ca sugatasaddena pakāsitā honti, ānubhāvasampadā pana tatiyapadena, rūpakāyasampadā
tika-s0201t:33_5: tadabhāvato. Upakāro anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ karitvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā.
tika-s0201t:33_6: So sammāgadanatthena sugatasaddena pakāsito hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:34_0: Tattha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti etena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti. Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso
tika-s0201t:34_1: hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena pāramiyo
tika-s0201t:34_2: pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ. “Paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti
tika-s0201t:34_3: etena sammāsambodhiṃ dasseti. Anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi maggañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca
tika-s0201t:34_6: antadvayarahitāya karuṇāpaññāpariggahitāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā pakāsanato sugatasaddassa.
tika-s0201t:34_7: Itarehi sammāsambodhiyā padhānāppadhānabhedaṃ payojanaṃ dasseti. Saṃsāramahoghato
tika-s0201t:34_8: sattasantāraṇañhettha padhānaṃ payojanaṃ, tadaññamappadhānaṃ. Tesu padhānena parahitapaṭipattiṃ
tika-s0201t:34_9: dasseti, itarena attahitasampattiṃ, tadubhayena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu
tika-s0201t:34_10: bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tena ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ uttamavandanīyabhāvaṃ
tika-s0201t:35_0: Ettha ca karuṇāgahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato
tika-s0201t:35_3: vipañcīyatīti. Karuṇāgahaṇena ca upagamanaṃ nirupakkilesaṃ dasseti, paññāgahaṇena
tika-s0201t:35_4: apagamanaṃ. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā
tika-s0201t:35_5: karuṇāya, paññāgahaṇena samaññāya anatidhāvanaṃ sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ samaññaṃ
tika-s0201t:35_6: atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṃ hotīti. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena mahākaruṇāsamāpattivihāraṃ
tika-s0201t:35_7: dasseti, paññāgahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ catusaccañāṇaṃ catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:36_0: Karuṇāgahaṇena mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇassa gahitattā sesāsādhāraṇañāṇāni, cha abhiññā,
tika-s0201t:36_1: aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni, dasa balāni, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, soḷasa ñāṇacariyā,
tika-s0201t:36_2: aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni, sattasattatiñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:36_3: anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena caraṇasampattiṃ,
tika-s0201t:36_4: paññāgahaṇena vijjāsampattiṃ. Karuṇāgahaṇena attādhipatitā, paññāgahaṇena dhammādhipatitā.
tika-s0201t:36_5: Karuṇāgahaṇena lokanāthabhāvo, paññāgahaṇena attanāthabhāvo. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena
tika-s0201t:36_6: pubbakāribhāvo, paññāgahaṇena kataññutā. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena aparantapatā, paññāgahaṇena
tika-s0201t:36_7: anattantapatā. Karuṇāgahaṇena vā buddhakaradhammasiddhi, paññāgahaṇena buddhabhāvasiddhi.
tika-s0201t:36_8: Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ, paññāgahaṇena sayaṃ taraṇaṃ. Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena
tika-s0201t:36_9: sabbasattesu anuggahacittatā, paññāgahaṇena sabbadhammesu virattacittatā dassitā hoti.
tika-s0201t:37_0: Sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi tannidānabhāvato, paññā pariyosānaṃ tato uttari
tika-s0201t:37_1: karaṇīyābhāvato. Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti. Tathā
tika-s0201t:37_2: karuṇāgahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti. Karuṇānidānañhi
tika-s0201t:37_3: sīlaṃ tato pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito, sā ca jhānattayasampayoginīti. Paññāvacanena
tika-s0201t:37_4: paññākkhandho. Sīlañca sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhe, paññā pariyosānanti
tika-s0201t:37_5: evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato
tika-s0201t:37_6: dassitattā. Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo, yadidaṃ nayaggāhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:37_7: Aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ. Tenevāha –
tika-s0201t:42: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenapi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ, bhante”ti paṭikkhipitvā “apica me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:43_0: 2. Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ
tika-s0201t:43_1: thometuṃ “buddhopī”tiādimāha. Tattha buddhoti kattuniddeso. Buddhabhāvanti kammaniddeso.
tika-s0201t:43_2: Bhāvetvā sacchikatvāti ca pubbakālakiriyāniddeso. Yanti aniyamato kammaniddeso. Upagatoti
tika-s0201t:43_3: aparakālakiriyāniddeso. Vandeti kiriyāniddeso. Tanti niyamanaṃ. Dhammanti vandanakiriyāya
tika-s0201t:44_0: Tattha buddhasaddassa tāva “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:44_1: niddesanayena attho veditabbo. Atha vā savāsanāya aññāṇaniddāya accantavigamato,
tika-s0201t:44_2: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena. Atha vā
tika-s0201t:44_3: kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato
tika-s0201t:44_4: kammavacanicchāya abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti
tika-s0201t:44_5: buddho yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti. Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhuñāṇena
tika-s0201t:45: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū. Anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
tika-s0201t:46_0: Api-saddo sambhāvane. Tena “evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā”ti vakkhamānaguṇe
tika-s0201t:46_1: dhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti. Buddhabhāvanti sammāsambodhiṃ. Bhāvetvāti uppādetvā vaḍḍhetvā
tika-s0201t:46_2: ca. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Upagatoti patto, adhigatoti attho. Etassa “buddhabhāva”nti
tika-s0201t:46_3: etena sambandho. Gatamalanti vigatamalaṃ, niddosanti attho. Vandeti paṇamāmi, thomemi
tika-s0201t:46_4: vā. Anuttaranti uttararahitaṃ, lokuttaranti attho. Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne
tika-s0201t:46_5: apāyato ca saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho
tika-s0201t:46_6: – evaṃ vividhaguṇagaṇasamannāgato buddhopi bhagavā yaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-s0201t:46_7: bhāvetvā, phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ pana sacchikatvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigato,
tika-s0201t:46_8: tametaṃ buddhānampi buddhabhāvahetubhūtaṃ sabbadosamalarahitaṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena
tika-s0201t:46_9: anuttaraṃ paṭivedhasaddhammaṃ namāmīti. Pariyattisaddhammassāpi tappakāsanattā idha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:47_0: Atha vā “abhidhammanayasamuddaṃ adhigacchi, tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:47_1: vuttattā pariyattidhammassapi sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyo labbhatīti sopi idha
tika-s0201t:47_2: vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā saccikatvā”ti ca vuttattā buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi
tika-s0201t:47_3: pāramitāhi saha pubbabhāge adhisīlasikkhādayopi idha dhammasaddena saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:47_4: Tāpi hi malapaṭipakkhatāya gatamalā anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttarā cāti. Tathā hi sattānaṃ
tika-s0201t:47_7: kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesānaṃ bhāvanāpaccakkhakaraṇehi
tika-s0201t:47_9: bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pesetvā anuttaraṃ
tika-s0201t:48_0: Ettha ca “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya dhammaṃ thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena
tika-s0201t:48_1: vimuttisampadāya. Tathā paṭhamena jhānasampadāya, dutiyena vimokkhasampadāya. Paṭhamena
tika-s0201t:48_2: vā samādhisampadāya, dutiyena samāpattisampadāya. Atha vā paṭhamena khayeñāṇabhāvena,
tika-s0201t:48_3: dutiyena anuppādeñāṇabhāvena. Purimena vā vijjūpamatāya, dutiyena vajirūpamatāya.
tika-s0201t:48_4: Purimena vā virāgasampattiyā, dutiyena nirodhasampattiyā. Tathā paṭhamena niyyānabhāvena,
tika-s0201t:48_5: dutiyena nisssaraṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā hetubhāvena, dutiyena asaṅkhatabhāvena.
tika-s0201t:48_6: Paṭhamena vā dassanabhāvena, dutiyena vivekabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā adhipatibhāvena,
tika-s0201t:48_7: dutiyena amatabhāvena dhammaṃ thometi. Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0201t:48_8: upagato”ti etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi. “Sacchikatvā”ti etena sandiṭṭhikatāya.
tika-s0201t:48_9: Tathā purimena akālikatāya, pacchimena ehipassikatāya. Purimena vā opaneyyikatāya,
tika-s0201t:48_10: pacchimena paccattaṃ veditabbatāya dhammaṃ thometi. “Gatamala”nti iminā saṃkilesābhāvadīpanena
tika-s0201t:48_11: dhammassa parisuddhataṃ dasseti, “anuttara”nti etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena
tika-s0201t:48_12: vipulaparipuṇṇataṃ. Paṭhamena vā pahānasampadaṃ dhammassa dasseti, dutiyena sabhāvasampadaṃ.
tika-s0201t:48_13: Bhāvetabbatāya vā dhammassa gatamalabhāvo yojetabbo. Bhāvanāguṇena hi so dosānaṃ
tika-s0201t:48_14: samugghātako hotīti. Sacchikātabbabhāvena anuttarabhāvo yojetabbo. Sacchikiriyānibbattito
tika-s0201t:48_15: hi taduttarikaraṇīyābhāvato anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttaroti. Tathā “bhāvetvā”ti etena
tika-s0201t:48_16: saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā honti, “sacchikatvā”ti
tika-s0201t:48_17: etena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0201t:49_0: 3. Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ
tika-s0201t:49_2: etena sambandho. Orasānanti puttavisesanaṃ. Mārasenamathanānanti orasaputtabhāve
tika-s0201t:49_3: kāraṇaniddeso. Tena kilesappahānameva bhagavato orasaputtabhāve kāraṇaṃ anujānātīti
tika-s0201t:49_4: dasseti. Aṭṭhannanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Tena satipi tesaṃ sattavisesabhāvena
tika-s0201t:49_5: anekasahassasaṅkhābhāve imaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ nātivattantīti dasseti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvānātivattanato.
tika-s0201t:49_7: asabhipi ariyapuggalānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyaṃ ariyasaṅghabhāvaṃ dasseti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:50_0: Tattha urasi bhavā jātā saṃvaddhā ca orasā. Yathā hi sattānaṃ orasaputtā attajātatāya
tika-s0201t:50_1: pitu santakassa dāyajjassa visesena bhāgino honti, evameva tepi ariyapuggalā sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0201t:50_2: dhammassavanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa ariyadhammaratanassa
tika-s0201t:50_3: ca ekantabhāginoti orasā viya orasā. Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṃ
tika-s0201t:50_4: okkamamānā okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato urena vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya nippariyāyena
tika-s0201t:50_5: “orasaputtā”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti. Sāvakehi pavattiyamānāpi hi dhammadesanā “bhagavato
tika-s0201t:51_0: Yadipi ariyasāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāya karaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:51_1: devaputtamāro, māravāhinī vā na ekantena apasādeti, tehi pana apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe
tika-s0201t:51_2: vimathite tepi vimathitā eva nāma hontīti āha – “mārasenamathanāna”nti. Imasmiṃ panatthe
tika-s0201t:51_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassapi guṇamāraṇe
tika-s0201t:51_5: sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo “senā”ti vuccati. Yathāha “kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:51_6: Sā ca tehi diyaḍḍhasahassabhedā anantabhedā vā kilesavāhinī satidhammavicayavīriyasamathādiguṇapaharaṇehi
tika-s0201t:51_7: odhiso vimathitā vihatā viddhastā cāti mārasenamathanā, ariyasāvakā. Etena tesaṃ
tika-s0201t:52_0: Ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato ariyā niruttinayena. Atha
tika-s0201t:52_1: vā sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato upagantabbato upagatānañca tadatthasiddhito
tika-s0201t:52_2: ariyā, ariyānaṃ saṅghoti ariyasaṅgho, ariyo ca so saṅgho cāti vā ariyasaṅgho, taṃ
tika-s0201t:52_3: ariyasaṅghaṃ. Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti
tika-s0201t:52_4: ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ idheva “sirasā vande”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:53_0: Ettha ca “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:53_3: pabhāvasampadaṃ dasseti sabbasaṅghānaṃ aggabhāvadīpanato. Atha vā “sugatassa orasānaṃ
tika-s0201t:53_6: Tathā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabbhāvaṃ
tika-s0201t:53_7: dīpeti. Lokuttarasaraṇagamanena hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā. “Mārasenamathanāna”nti
tika-s0201t:53_8: etena abhinīhārasampadāsiddhaṃ pubbabhāge sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti. Katābhinīhārā
tika-s0201t:53_9: hi sammāpaṭipannā māraṃ māraparisaṃ vā abhivijinanti. “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena
tika-s0201t:53_12: sabbaguṇānaṃ ādi, sapubbabhāgapaṭipadā sekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo majjhe, asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo
tika-s0201t:53_13: pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā saṅkhepato sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0201t:54_0: 4. Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ
tika-s0201t:54_1: katvā idāni taṃnipaccakāraṃ yathādhippete payojane pariṇāmento “iti me”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:54_2: Tattha ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, buddhadhammasaṅghā. Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:54_3: yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjentassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0201t:55_0: “Yasmiṃ mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0201t:55_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti…pe… ujugatacitto
tika-s0201t:55_2: kho mahānāma, ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ
tika-s0201t:59: Cittikatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhantīti.
tika-s0201t:60_0: Vandanāva vandanāmayaṃ yathā “dānamayaṃ sīlamaya”nti. Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi
tika-s0201t:60_1: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā, thomanā vā. Pujjabhavaphalanibbattanato puññaṃ, attano
tika-s0201t:60_2: santānaṃ punātīti vā. Suvihatantarāyoti suṭṭhu vihatantarāyo. Etena attano pasādasampattiyā
tika-s0201t:60_3: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā taṃ puññaṃ atthappakāsanassa upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ
tika-s0201t:60_4: vihanane samatthanti dasseti. Hutvāti pubbakālakiriyā. Tassa “atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti
tika-s0201t:60_5: etena sambandho. Tassāti yaṃ ratanattayavandanāmayaṃ puññaṃ, tassa. Ānubhāvenāti balena.
tika-s0201t:61_0: 5. Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakāre payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā dhammadesanāya
tika-s0201t:61_1: atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo, tassā tāva guṇābhitthavanavasena upaññāpanatthaṃ “majjhimapamāṇasuttaṅkitassā”tiādi
tika-s0201t:61_3: lakkhitassa. Yathā hi dīghāgame dīghapamāṇāni suttāni, yathā ca saṃyuttaṅguttarāgamesu
tika-s0201t:61_4: dvīsu khuddakapamāṇāni, na evaṃ idha. Idha pana pamāṇato majjhimāni suttāni. Tena
tika-s0201t:61_6: attho”ti. Etena “majjhimo”ti ayaṃ imassa atthānugatasamaññāti dasseti. Nanu ca suttāni
tika-s0201t:61_7: eva āgamo, kassa pana suttehi aṅkananti? Saccametaṃ paramatthato, suttāni pana upādāya
tika-s0201t:61_8: paññatto āgamo. Yatheva hi atthabyañjanasamudāye “sutta”nti vohāro, evaṃ suttasamudāye
tika-s0201t:61_9: ayaṃ “āgamo”ti vohāro. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Āgamissanti ettha, etena etasmā vā
tika-s0201t:61_11: paṇḍitehi varitabbato varo, āgamo ca so varo cāti āgamavaro. Āgamasammatehi vā varoti
tika-s0201t:61_12: āgamavaro, majjhimo ca so āgamavaro cāti majjhimāgamavaro, tassa.
tika-s0201t:62_0: Buddhānaṃ anubuddhānaṃ buddhānubuddhā, buddhānaṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ anugamma paṭividdhasaccā
tika-s0201t:62_1: aggasāvakādayo ariyā. Tehi atthasaṃvaṇṇanāguṇasaṃvaṇṇanānaṃ vasena saṃvaṇṇitassa.
tika-s0201t:62_2: Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca buddhānubuddhāti yojetabbaṃ. Sammāsambuddheneva hi
tika-s0201t:62_3: vinayasuttābhidhammānaṃ pakiṇṇakadesanādivasena yo paṭhamaṃ attho vibhatto, so eva
tika-s0201t:62_4: pacchā tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇanāvasena saṅgītikārehi saṅgahaṃ āropitoti. Paravādamathanassāti
tika-s0201t:62_5: aññatitthiyānaṃ vādanimmathanassa, tesaṃ diṭṭhigatabhañjanassāti attho. Ayañhi āgamo
tika-s0201t:62_8: thomitoti. Saṃvaṇṇanāsu cāyaṃ ācariyassa pakati, yā taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ādito tassa
tika-s0201t:62_9: tassa saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa visesaguṇakittanena thomanā. Tathā hi sumaṅgalavilāsinīsāratthapakāsinīmanorathapūraṇīsu
tika-s0201t:62_11: vicittapaṭibhānajananassa, tassa gambhīrañāṇehi ogāḷhassa abhiṇhaso nānānayavicittassa
tika-s0201t:63_0: 6. Attho kathīyati etāyāti atthakathā, sā eva aṭṭhakathā ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ
tika-s0201t:63_1: katvā yathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho”ti āditotiādimhi paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ. Chaḷabhiññatāya
tika-s0201t:63_3: ca vasino, therā mahākassapādayo. Tesaṃ satehi pañcahi. Yāti yā aṭṭhakathā. Saṅgītāti
tika-s0201t:63_4: atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayaṃ etassa attho, ayaṃ etassa attho”ti saṅgahetvā
tika-s0201t:63_5: vuttā. Anusaṅgītā ca yasattherādīhi pacchāpi dutiyatatiyasaṅgītīsu. Iminā attano
tika-s0201t:64_0: 7. Sīhassa lānato gahaṇato sīhaḷo, sīhakumāro. Taṃvaṃsajātatāya tambapaṇṇidīpe khattiyānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:64_1: tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassa ca sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo. Ābhatāti jambudīpato
tika-s0201t:64_2: ānītā. Athāti pacchā. Aparabhāge hi nikāyantaraladdhīhi asaṅkaratthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya
tika-s0201t:64_3: aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitāti. Tena mūlaṭṭhakathā sabbasādhāraṇā na hotīti idaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ
tika-s0201t:64_4: ekantena karaṇīyanti dasseti. Tenevāha “dīpavāsīnamatthāyā”ti. Tattha dīpavāsīnanti
tika-s0201t:64_5: jambudīpavāsīnaṃ, sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ vā atthāya sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:65_0: 8. Apanetvānāti kañcukasadisaṃ sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā. Tatoti aṭṭhakathāto. Ahanti
tika-s0201t:65_1: attānaṃ niddisati, manoramaṃ bhāsanti māgadhabhāsaṃ. Sā hi sabhāvaniruttibhūtā paṇḍitānaṃ
tika-s0201t:65_2: manaṃ ramayatīti. Tenevāha “tantinayānucchavika”nti, pāḷigatiyā anulomikaṃ pāḷibhāsāyānuvidhāyininti
tika-s0201t:66_0: 9. Samayaṃ avilomentoti siddhantaṃ avirodhento. Etena atthadosābhāvamāha. Aviruddhattā
tika-s0201t:66_1: eva hi theravādāpi idha pakāsīyissanti. Theravaṃsadīpānanti thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi
tika-s0201t:66_2: samannāgatattā therā, mahākassapādayo. Tehi āgatā ācariyaparamparā theravaṃso, tappariyāpannā
tika-s0201t:66_3: hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato theravaṃsadīpā,
tika-s0201t:66_4: mahāvihāravāsino, tesaṃ. Vividhehi ākārehi nicchīyatīti vinicchayo, gaṇṭhiṭṭhānesu
tika-s0201t:66_5: khīlamaddanākārena pavattā vimaticchedanī kathā. Suṭṭhu nipuṇo saṇho vinicchayo etesanti
tika-s0201t:66_6: sunipuṇavinicchayā. Atha vā vinicchinotīti vinicchayo, yathāvuttatthavisayaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:66_7: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti yojetabbaṃ. Etena mahākassapāditheraparamparābhato,
tika-s0201t:66_8: tato eva ca aviparīto saṇho sukhumo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayoti tassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:67_0: 10. Sujanassa cāti ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena “na kevalaṃ jambudīpavāsīnameva
tika-s0201t:67_1: atthāya, atha kho sādhujanatosanatthañcā”ti dasseti. Tena ca “tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi
tika-s0201t:67_2: atthāyā”ti ayamattho siddho hoti uggahaṇādisukaratāya tesampi bahukārattā. Ciraṭṭhitatthanti
tika-s0201t:67_3: ciraṭṭhitiatthaṃ, cirakālaṭṭhitiyāti attho. Idañhi atthappakāsanaṃ aviparītapadabyañjanasunikkhepassa
tika-s0201t:67_4: atthasunayassa ca upāyabhāvato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā saṃvattati. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0201t:67_5: bhagavatā “dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya
tika-s0201t:67_6: saṃvattanti. Katame dve? Sunnikkhittañca padabyañjanaṃ attho ca sunīto”ti.
tika-s0201t:68_0: 11. Yaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, tassā mahattaṃ pariharituṃ “sīlakathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:68_1: Tenevāha “na taṃ idha vicārayissāmī”ti. Atha vā yaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ kattukāmo, tadekadesabhāvena
tika-s0201t:68_2: visuddhimaggo gahetabboti kathikānaṃ upadesaṃ karonto tattha vicāritadhamme uddesavasena
tika-s0201t:68_3: dasseti “sīlakathā”tiādinā. Tattha sīlakathāti cārittavārittādivasena sīlassa vitthārakathā.
tika-s0201t:68_4: Dhutadhammāti piṇḍapātikaṅgādayo terasa kilesadhunanakadhammā. Kammaṭṭhānāni sabbānīti
tika-s0201t:68_5: pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni aṭṭhatiṃsa, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti niravasesāni yogakammassa bhāvanāya
tika-s0201t:68_7: Jhānāni cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni, samāpattiyo catasso arūpasamāpattiyo. Aṭṭhapi
tika-s0201t:68_8: vā paṭiladdhamattāni jhānāni, samāpajjanavasībhāvappattiyā samāpattiyo. Jhānāni vā
tika-s0201t:69: 12. Lokiyalokuttarabhedā cha abhiññāyo sabbā abhiññāyo. Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā paññāya saṃkaletvā sampiṇḍetvā nicchayo paññāsaṅkalananicchayo.
tika-s0201t:70_1: tassa desanā paccayākāradesanā, paṭiccasamuppādakathāti attho. Sā pana nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkararahitatāya
tika-s0201t:70_2: suṭṭhu parisuddhā, ghanavinibbhogassa sudukkaratāya nipuṇā saṇhasukhumā, ekattanayādisahitā
tika-s0201t:70_3: ca tattha vicāritāti āha “suparisuddhanipuṇanayā”ti. Paṭisambhidādīsu āgatanayaṃ
tika-s0201t:71: 14. Iti pana sabbanti iti-saddo parisamāpane, pana-saddo vacanālaṅkāre, etaṃ sabbanti attho. Idhāti imissā aṭṭhakathāya. Na taṃ vicārayissāmi punaruttibhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:72_0: 15. Idāni tasseva avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhārento “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:72_1: Tattha “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhaṭṭhabhāvadīpanena visesato catunnaṃ āgamānaṃ
tika-s0201t:72_2: sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggo, na sumaṅgalavilāsinīādayo viya asādhāraṇaṭṭhakathāti
tika-s0201t:72_3: dasseti. “Visesato”ti ca idaṃ vinayābhidhammānampi visuddhimaggo yathārahaṃ atthavaṇṇanā
tika-s0201t:73_0: 16. Iccevāti iti eva. Tampīti visuddhimaggampi. Etāyāti papañcasūdaniyā. Ettha ca
tika-s0201t:73_2: sujanassa ca tuṭṭhatthaṃ, ciraṭṭhitatthañca dhammassā”ti etena payojanaṃ, “majjhimāgamavarassa
tika-s0201t:73_3: atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti etena piṇḍatthaṃ, “apanetvāna tatohaṃ sīhaḷabhāsa”ntiādinā,
tika-s0201t:73_4: “sīlakathā”tiādinā ca karaṇappakāraṃ. Sīlakathādīnaṃ avicāraṇampi hi idha karaṇappakāro evāti.
tika-s0201t:76_0: 1. Vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva
tika-s0201t:76_2: nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti yaṃ vuttaṃ “majjhimāgamavarassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti,
tika-s0201t:76_3: tasmiṃ vacane. Yā majjhimāgamapariyāyena majjhimasaṅgīti vuttā, sā paṇṇāsādito edisāti
tika-s0201t:76_4: dasseti “majjhimasaṅgīti nāmā”tiādinā. Tatthāti vā “etāya aṭṭhakathāya vijānātha
tika-s0201t:76_5: majjhimasaṅgītiyā attha”nti ettha yassā majjhimasaṅgītiyā atthaṃ vijānāthāti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:76_6: sā majjhimasaṅgīti nāma paṇṇāsādito edisāti dasseti. Pañca dasakā paṇṇāsā, mūle ādimhi
tika-s0201t:76_7: paṇṇāsā, mūlabhūtā vā paṇṇāsā mūlapaṇṇāsā. Majjhe bhavā majjhimā, majjhimā ca sā
tika-s0201t:76_8: paṇṇāsā cāti majjhimapaṇṇāsā. Upari uddhaṃ paṇṇāsā uparipaṇṇāsā. Paṇṇāsattayasaṅgahāti
tika-s0201t:77_0: Ayaṃ saṅgaho nāma jātisañjātikiriyāgaṇanavasena catubbidho. Tattha “yā cāvuso visākha,
tika-s0201t:77_1: sammāvācā, yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo, ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti
tika-s0201t:77_2: ayaṃ jātisaṅgaho. “Yo cāvuso visākha, sammāvāyāmo. Yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi,
tika-s0201t:77_3: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ sañjātisaṅgaho. “Yā cāvuso visākha,
tika-s0201t:77_4: sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ kiriyāsaṅgaho.
tika-s0201t:77_5: “Hañci cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe cakkhāyatanaṃ
tika-s0201t:77_6: rūpakkhandhena saṅgahita”nti ayaṃ gaṇanasaṅgaho. Ayameva ca idhādhippeto. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:78_0: Vaggatoti samūhato, so panettha dasakavasena veditabbo. Yebhuyyena hi sāsane dasake
tika-s0201t:78_1: vaggavohāro. Tenevāha “ekekāya paṇṇāsāya pañca pañca vagge katvā”ti. Pannarasavaggasamāyogāti
tika-s0201t:78_2: pannarasavaggasaṃyogāti attho. Keci pana samāyogasaddaṃ samudāyatthaṃ vadanti. Padatoti
tika-s0201t:78_3: ettha aṭṭhakkharo gāthāpādo “pada”nti adhippeto, tasmā “akkharato cha akkharasatasahassāni
tika-s0201t:78_4: caturāsītuttarasatādhikāni catucattālīsa sahassāni ca akkharānī”ti pāṭhena bhavitabbanti
tika-s0201t:78_5: vadanti. Yasmā pana navakkharo yāva dvādasakkharo ca gāthāpādo saṃvijjati, tasmā
tika-s0201t:78_6: tādisānampi gāthānaṃ vasena aḍḍhateyyagāthāsataṃ bhāṇavāro hotīti katvā “akkharato
tika-s0201t:78_7: satta akkharasatasahassāni cattālīsañca sahassāni tepaññāsañca akkharānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:78_8: Evañhi padabhāṇavāragaṇanāhi akkharagaṇanā saṃsandati, netarathā. Bhāṇavāroti ca
tika-s0201t:78_9: dvattiṃsakkharānaṃ gāthānaṃ vasena aḍḍhateyyagāthāsataṃ, ayañca akkharagaṇanā bhāṇavāragaṇanā
tika-s0201t:78_10: ca padagaṇanānusārena laddhāti veditabbā. Imameva hi atthaṃ ñāpetuṃ suttagaṇanānantaraṃ
tika-s0201t:78_11: bhāṇavāre agaṇetvā padāni gaṇitāni. Tatridaṃ vuccati –
tika-s0201t:83_0: Anusandhitoti desanānusandhito. Ekasmiṃ eva hi sutte purimapacchimānaṃ desanābhāgānaṃ
tika-s0201t:83_1: sambandho anusandhānato anusandhi. Ettha ca attajjhāsayānusandhi parajjhāsayānusandhīti
tika-s0201t:83_2: duvidho ajjhāsayānusandhi. So pana katthaci desanāya vippakatāya dhammaṃ suṇantānaṃ
tika-s0201t:83_3: pucchāvasena, katthaci desentassa satthu sāvakassa dhammapaṭiggāhakānañca ajjhāsayavasena,
tika-s0201t:83_4: katthaci desetabbassa dhammassa vasena hotīti samāsato tippakāro. Tena vuttaṃ “pucchānusandhiajjhāsayānusandhiyathānusandhivasena
tika-s0201t:83_5: saṅkhepato tividho anusandhī”ti. Saṅkhepeneva ca catubbidho anusandhi veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:83_6: Tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘kiṃ nu kho, bhante, orimaṃ
tika-s0201t:83_7: tīraṃ, kiṃ pārimaṃ tīraṃ, ko majjhe saṃsīdo, ko thale ussādo, ko manussaggāho, ko
tika-s0201t:83_8: amanussaggāho, ko āvattaggāho, ko antopūtibhāvo’ti” ? Evaṃ pucchantānaṃ vissajjentena
tika-s0201t:83_9: bhagavatā pavattitadesanāvasena pucchānusandhī veditabbo. “Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno
tika-s0201t:83_10: evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi ‘iti kira bho rūpaṃ anattā… vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā…
tika-s0201t:83_11: viññāṇaṃ anattā, anattakatāni kammāni kamattānaṃ phusissantī’ti. Atha kho bhagavā
tika-s0201t:83_12: tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ,
tika-s0201t:83_13: bhikkhave, vijjati, yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena
tika-s0201t:83_14: cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya ‘iti kira bho rūpaṃ anattā…pe… phusissantī’ti.
tika-s0201t:83_15: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ
tika-s0201t:84_0: “Tassa mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa etadahosi ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ yā tā rattiyo abhiññātā abhilakkhitā
tika-s0201t:84_1: cātuddasī pañcadasī aṭṭhamī ca pakkhassa, tathārūpāsu rattīsu yāni tāni ārāmacetiyāni
tika-s0201t:84_2: vanacetiyāni rukkhacetiyāni bhiṃsanakāni salomahaṃsāni, tathārūpesu senāsanesu vihareyyaṃ
tika-s0201t:84_3: appeva nāmāhaṃ bhayabheravaṃ passeyya’nti” evaṃ bhagavatā, “tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako
tika-s0201t:84_4: doso ca pāpako lobhassa ca pahānāya dosassa ca pahānāya atthi majjhimā paṭipadā,
tika-s0201t:84_5: cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ
tika-s0201t:84_6: dhammasenāpatinā ca attano ajjhāsayeneva pavattitadesanāvasena attajjhāsayānusandhi
tika-s0201t:84_7: veditabbo. Yena pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā, tassa anurūpadhammavasena vā
tika-s0201t:84_8: paṭipakkhadhammavasena vā yesu suttesu upari desanā āgacchati, tesaṃ vasena yathānusandhi
tika-s0201t:84_9: veditabbo. Seyyathidaṃ ākaṅkheyyasutte heṭṭhā sīlena desanā uṭṭhitā, upari abhiññā
tika-s0201t:84_10: āgatā. Vatthusutte heṭṭhā kilesena desanā uṭṭhitā, upari brahmavihārā āgatā. Kosambakasutte
tika-s0201t:84_11: heṭṭhā bhaṇḍanena desanā uṭṭhitā, upari sāraṇīyadhammā āgatā. Kakacūpame heṭṭhā akkhantiyā
tika-s0201t:84_12: vasena desanā uṭṭhitā, upari kakacūpamā āgatāti.
tika-s0201t:85_0: Vitthārato panetthāti evaṃ saṅkhepato tividho catubbidho ca anusandhi ettha etasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:85_1: majjhimanikāye tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte yathārahaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā viññāyamānā navasatādhikāni
tika-s0201t:85_2: tīṇi anusandhisahassāni honti. Yathā cetaṃ paṇṇāsādivibhāgavacanaṃ majjhimasaṅgītiyā
tika-s0201t:85_3: sarūpadassanatthaṃ hoti, evaṃ pakkhepadosapariharaṇatthañca hoti. Evañhi paṇṇāsādīsu
tika-s0201t:85_4: vavatthitesu tabbinimuttaṃ kiñci suttaṃ yāva ekaṃ padampi ānetvā imaṃ majjhimasaṅgītiyāti
tika-s0201t:86_1: idāni naṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇetukāmo attano saṃvaṇṇanāya tassā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:86_2: nikkhittānukkameneva pavattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha paṇṇāsāsu mūlapaṇṇāsā ādī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:86_3: Tattha yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ
tika-s0201t:86_4: saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti, mahāvisayattā pūjanīyattā ca mahatī saṅgītīti
tika-s0201t:86_5: mahāsaṅgīti, paṭhamā mahāsaṅgīti paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti, tassā pavattitakālo paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikālo,
tika-s0201t:86_6: tasmiṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle. Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ
tika-s0201t:86_7: katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ, yo lokiyehi “upogghāto”ti vuccati, svāyamettha “evaṃ me
tika-s0201t:86_8: suta”ntiādiko gantho veditabbo, na pana “sanidānāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desemī”tiādīsu
tika-s0201t:86_9: viya ajjhāsayādidesanuppattihetu. Tenevāha “evaṃ me sutantiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena
tika-s0201t:86_10: paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādī”ti. Kāmañcettha yassaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:86_11: nikkhittānukkamena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, sā vitthārato vattabbā. Sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ
tika-s0201t:86_12: pana attanā vitthāritattā tattheva gahetabbāti imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya mahantataṃ pariharanto
tika-s0201t:91_0: 1. Evaṃ bāhiranidāne vattabbaṃ atidisitvā idāni abhantaranidānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇetuṃ
tika-s0201t:91_1: “yaṃ paneta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena saṃvaṇṇetabbe dhamme
tika-s0201t:91_2: padavibhāgaṃ padatthañca dassetvā tato paraṃ piṇḍattādidassanavasena saṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā,
tika-s0201t:91_3: tasmā padāni tāva dassento “evanti nipātapada”ntiādimāha. Tattha padavibhāgoti padānaṃ
tika-s0201t:91_4: viseso, na padaviggaho. Atha vā padāni ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgo, padaviggaho
tika-s0201t:91_5: ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgoti vā ekasesavasena padapadaviggahā padavibhāgasaddena
tika-s0201t:91_6: vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Tattha padaviggaho “subhagañca taṃ vanañcāti subhagavanaṃ, sālānaṃ
tika-s0201t:91_7: rājā, sālo ca so rājā ca itipi sālarājā”tiādivasena samāsapadesu daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:92_0: Atthatoti padatthato. Taṃ pana padatthaṃ atthuddhārakkamena paṭhamaṃ evaṃsaddassa
tika-s0201t:92_1: dassento “evaṃ-saddo tāvā”tiādimāha. Avadhāraṇādīti ettha ādi-saddena idamatthapucchāparimāṇādiatthānaṃ
tika-s0201t:92_2: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi “evaṃgatāni puthusippāyatanāni, evavidho evamākāro”ti
tika-s0201t:92_3: ca ādīsu idaṃ-saddassa atthe evaṃ-saddo. Gata-saddo hi pakārapariyāyo, tathā vidhākāra-saddā
tika-s0201t:92_4: ca. Tathā hi vidhayuttagata-sadde lokiyā pakāratthe vadanti. “Evaṃ su te sunhātā
tika-s0201t:92_5: suvilittā kappitakesamassū āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalābharaṇā odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
tika-s0201t:92_6: samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti, seyyathāpi tvaṃ etarahi sācariyakoti. No hidaṃ,
tika-s0201t:92_7: bho gotamā”tiādīsu pucchāyaṃ. “Evaṃlahuparivattaṃ evamāyupariyanto”ti ca ādīsu parimāṇe.
tika-s0201t:93_0: Nanu ca “evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā, evamāyupariyanto”ti ettha evaṃ-saddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ
tika-s0201t:93_1: vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃ-saddoti? Na, visesasabbhāvato. Ākāramattavācako hi evaṃ-saddo
tika-s0201t:93_2: ākāratthoti adhippeto yathā “evaṃ byā kho”tiādīsu, na pana ākāravisesavācako. Evañca
tika-s0201t:93_3: katvā “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni upamādiudāharaṇāni upapannāni honti. Tathā hi
tika-s0201t:93_6: pahūtā puññakiriyā maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena sattena kattabbāti jotitattā puppharāsimālāguṇāva
tika-s0201t:93_7: upamā, tesaṃ upamākāro yathā-saddena aniyamato vuttoti “evaṃ-saddo upamākāranigamanattho”ti
tika-s0201t:93_8: vattuṃ yuttaṃ. So pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamāva hotīti āha “upamāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:93_9: āgato”ti. Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya
tika-s0201t:93_10: ākappasampattiyā yo tattha upadisanākāro, so atthato upadeso evāti vuttaṃ “evaṃ te…pe…
tika-s0201t:93_11: upadese”ti. Tathā “evametaṃ bhagavā, evametaṃ sugatā”ti ettha ca bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:93_12: aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ pakārehi haṃsanaṃ udaggatākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:94_0: Evamevaṃ panāyanti ettha garahaṇākāroti yojetabbaṃ, so ca garahaṇākāro “vasalī”tiādikhuṃsanasaddasannidhānato
tika-s0201t:94_1: idha evaṃ-saddena pakāsitoti viññāyati. Yathā cettha, evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena
tika-s0201t:94_2: vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānato daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ, bhanteti pana dhammassa
tika-s0201t:94_3: sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāre sanniyojitehi bhikkhūhi attano tattha ṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanavasena
tika-s0201t:94_4: vuttattā ettha evaṃ-saddo vacanasampaṭicchanattho vutto. Tena evaṃ, bhante sādhu,
tika-s0201t:94_5: bhante, suṭṭhu, bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti. Evañca vadehīti “yathāhaṃ vadāmi, evaṃ samaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:94_6: ānandaṃ vadehī”ti yo evaṃ vadanākāro idāni vattabbo. So evaṃsaddena nidassīyatīti
tika-s0201t:94_7: “nidassane”ti vuttoti. Evaṃ noti etthāpi tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve
tika-s0201t:94_8: sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatigahaṇavasena “saṃvattanti vā no vā, kathaṃ vo ettha
tika-s0201t:94_9: hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-saddena
tika-s0201t:94_10: vibhāvitanti viññāyati. So pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno
tika-s0201t:94_11: avadhāraṇattho hotīti āha “evaṃ no ettha hotītiādīsu avadhāraṇe”ti.
tika-s0201t:95_1: vā ādhārādibhedavasena nānāvidhā nayā nānānayā, nayā vā pāḷigatiyo, tā ca paññattianupaññattiādivasena
tika-s0201t:95_4: ca nānappakārāti nānānayā. Tehi nipuṇaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumanti nānānayanipuṇaṃ. Āsayova
tika-s0201t:95_5: ajjhāsayo, te ca sassatādibhedena, tattha ca apparajakkhatādibhedena aneke, attajjhāsayādayo
tika-s0201t:95_6: eva vā samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu etassāti anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Atthabyañjanasampannanti
tika-s0201t:96_1: ca pāṭihāriya”nti vadanti, bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi, ye haritabbā.
tika-s0201t:96_2: Puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ
tika-s0201t:96_3: pavattati, tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ.
tika-s0201t:96_4: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā, tesaṃ haraṇato
tika-s0201t:96_5: “pāṭihāriya”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati yuttametaṃ. Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā
tika-s0201t:96_6: titthiyā, tesaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyaṃ. Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhipakāsane asamatthabhāvena
tika-s0201t:96_7: ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti. “Paṭī”ti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti
tika-s0201t:96_8: etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0201t:96_9: tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese ca katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
tika-s0201t:96_10: pāṭihāriyaṃ, attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:96_11: pāṭihāriyaṃ, iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:96_12: puna pavattetabbā, haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakilesaharaṇāni
tika-s0201t:96_13: hontīti pāṭihāriyāni bhavanti. Pāṭihāriyameva pāṭihāriyaṃ, pāṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye
tika-s0201t:96_14: bhavaṃ ekamekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati. Pāṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0201t:96_15: tattha jātaṃ, tasmiṃ vā nimittabhūte, tato vā āgatanti pāṭihāriyaṃ. Tassa pana iddhiādibhedena
tika-s0201t:96_16: visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāyaṃ labbhamānattā āha “vividhapāṭihāriya”nti.
tika-s0201t:97_0: Na aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathāti attho, na pana bhagavato
tika-s0201t:97_1: desitākārato. Acinteyyānubhāvā hi bhagavato desanā. Evañca katvā “sabbappakārena
tika-s0201t:97_2: ko samattho viññātu”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati, dhāraṇabaladassanañca na
tika-s0201t:97_3: virujjhati sutākārāvirajjhanassa adhippetattā. Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnampi
tika-s0201t:97_4: atthānaṃ ekavisayattā. Itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho
tika-s0201t:98_0: “Yo paro na hoti, so attā”ti evaṃ vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya sasantatiyā vattanato
tika-s0201t:98_1: tividhopi me-saddo kiñcāpi ekasmiṃyeva atthe dissati, karaṇasampadānasāminiddesavasena
tika-s0201t:98_2: pana vijjamānaṃ bhedaṃ sandhāyāha “me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:99_0: Kiñcāpi upasaggo kiriyaṃ viseseti, jotakabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ sutasaddo eva
tika-s0201t:99_1: taṃ tamatthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa sutasaddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:99_2: na virujjhatīti dassento “saupasaggo ca anupasaggo cā”tiādimāha. Assāti sutasaddassa.
tika-s0201t:99_3: Kammabhāvasādhanāni idha sutasadde sambhavantīti vuttaṃ “upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti
tika-s0201t:99_4: vā attho”ti. Mayāti atthe satīti yadā me-saddassa kattuvasena karaṇaniddeso, tadāti
tika-s0201t:99_5: attho. Mamāti atthe satīti yadā sambandhavasena sāminiddeso, tadā.
tika-s0201t:100_0: Suta-saddasannidhāne payuttena evaṃ-saddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:100_2: tadabhinīhaṭānañca manodvārikaviññāṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sabbesampi vākyānaṃ
tika-s0201t:100_3: eva-kāratthasahitattā “suta”nti etassa sutamevāti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti.
tika-s0201t:100_4: Etena avadhāraṇena nirāsaṅkataṃ dasseti. Yathā ca sutaṃ sutamevāti niyametabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:100_5: taṃ sammā sutaṃ hotīti āha “anūnānadhikāviparītaggahaṇanidassana”nti. Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena
tika-s0201t:100_6: saddo atthaṃ vadatīti sutanti asutaṃ na hotīti ayametassa atthoti vuttaṃ “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti.
tika-s0201t:100_7: Iminā diṭṭhādivinivattanaṃ karoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “na idaṃ mayā diṭṭhaṃ, na sayambhuñāṇena
tika-s0201t:100_8: sacchikataṃ, atha kho sutaṃ, tañca kho sammadevā”ti. Tenevāha – “anūnānadhikāviparītaggahaṇanidassana”nti.
tika-s0201t:100_9: Avadhāraṇatthe vā evaṃ-sadde ayamatthayojanā karīyatīti tadapekkhassa suta-saddassa
tika-s0201t:101_1: dassetvā idāni pakārantarehipi taṃ dassetuṃ “tathā eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tassāti
tika-s0201t:101_2: yā sā bhagavato sammukhā dhammassavanākārena pavattā manodvāraviññāṇavīthi, tassā.
tika-s0201t:101_3: Sā hi nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattituṃ samatthā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “sotadvārānusārenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:101_4: Nānappakārenāti vakkhamānānaṃ anekavihitānaṃ byañjanatthaggahaṇānaṃ nānākārena. Etena
tika-s0201t:101_5: imissā yojanāya ākārattho evaṃ-saddo gahitoti dīpeti. Pavattibhāvappakāsananti pavattiyā
tika-s0201t:101_6: atthibhāvappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti dhammappakāsananti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi
tika-s0201t:101_7: nānappakārena pavattā, tassa dhammattā vuttaṃ, na sutasaddassa dhammatthattā. Vuttassevatthassa
tika-s0201t:101_8: pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ “ayañhetthā”tiādi. Tattha viññāṇavīthiyāti karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Mayāti kattuatthe.
tika-s0201t:102_0: Evanti niddisitabbappakāsananti nidassanatthaṃ evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ nidassetabbassa
tika-s0201t:102_1: niddisitabbattābhāvābhāvato. Tena evaṃ-saddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:102_3: tattha ca puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ “sutanti puggalakiccappakāsana”nti. Na hi puggalavohārarahite
tika-s0201t:103_0: Yassa cittasantānassātiādipi ākāratthameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathā
tika-s0201t:103_1: atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha ākārapaññattīti upādāpaññatti eva dhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:103_2: pavattiākārūpādānavasena tathā vuttā. Sutanti visayaniddesoti sotabbabhūto dhammo
tika-s0201t:103_3: savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānanti katvā vuttaṃ. Cittasantānavinimuttassa
tika-s0201t:103_4: paramatthato kassaci kattu abhāvepi saddavohārena buddhiparikappitabhedavacanicchāya
tika-s0201t:103_5: cittasantānato aññaṃ viya taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā vuttaṃ “cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino”ti.
tika-s0201t:103_7: paramatthato kattubhāvato, savanavasena cittappavattiyā eva vā savanakiriyābhāvato
tika-s0201t:103_8: taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti vuttaṃ “taṃsamaṅgino kattuvisaye”ti. Sutākārassa
tika-s0201t:103_9: ca therassa sammānicchitabhāvato āha “gahaṇasanniṭṭhāna”nti. Etena vā avadhāraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:104_0: Pubbe sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa
tika-s0201t:104_1: nidassanassa, avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanasabhāvo evaṃ-saddoti tadākārādiupadhāraṇassa
tika-s0201t:104_3: Savanakiriyā pana puggalavādinopi viññāṇanirapekkhā natthīti visesato viññāṇabyāpāroti
tika-s0201t:104_8: āha – “evanti puggalakiccaniddeso, sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti. Ettha ca karaṇakiriyākattukammavisesappakāsanavasena
tika-s0201t:104_10: kattukaraṇabyāpārakattuniddesavasena ca dutiyādayo catasso atthayojanā dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:105_0: Sabbassapi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca
tika-s0201t:105_1: vijjamānādivasena chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tesu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:105_2: sarūpaṃ niddhārento āha – “evanti ca meti cā”tiādi. Tattha “eva”nti ca “me”ti ca
tika-s0201t:105_5: bhūtatthauttamatthavasena. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtattho,
tika-s0201t:105_6: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti, so rūpasaddādisabhāvo, ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvo
tika-s0201t:105_7: vā attho saccikaṭṭho paramattho cāti vuccati, na tathā “evaṃ me”ti padānaṃ atthoti.
tika-s0201t:105_8: Etamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “kiñhettha ta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sutanti pana saddāyatanaṃ
tika-s0201t:105_9: sandhāyāha “vijjamānapaññattī”ti. Teneva hi “yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdha”nti
tika-s0201t:105_10: vuttaṃ, “sotadvārānusārena upaladdha”nti pana vutte atthabyañjanādisabbaṃ labbhati.
tika-s0201t:106_0: Taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbatoti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādino
tika-s0201t:106_2: attho. Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko
tika-s0201t:106_3: viya paṭhamādīni diṭṭhamutaviññāte apekkhitvāva pavattoti āha “diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya
tika-s0201t:106_4: vattabbato”ti asutaṃ na hotīti hi sutanti pakāsitoyamatthoti. Attanā paṭividdhā suttassa
tika-s0201t:106_5: pakāravisesā “eva”nti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti āha “asammohaṃ dīpetī”ti. Nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho
tika-s0201t:106_6: hotīti etena vakkhamānassa suttassa nānappakārataṃ duppaṭivijjhatañca dasseti. Sutassa
tika-s0201t:106_7: asammosaṃ dīpetīti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā vuttaṃ. Asammohenāti sammohābhāvena,
tika-s0201t:106_8: paññāya eva vā savanakālasambhūtāya taduttarakālapaññāsiddhi. Evaṃ asammosenāti etthāpi
tika-s0201t:106_9: vattabbaṃ. Byañjanānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro nātigambhīro, yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha
tika-s0201t:106_10: karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko, paññā tattha guṇībhūtāti vuttaṃ “paññāpubbaṅgamāyā”tiādi
tika-s0201t:106_12: viya. Pubbaṅgamatāya vā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādīnaṃ viya appadhānatte paññā pubbaṅgamā
tika-s0201t:106_13: etissāti ayampi attho yujjati. Evaṃ satipubbaṅgamāyāti etthāpi vuttanayānusārena
tika-s0201t:106_16: chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatassāti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:107_2: bhāsita”ntiādipucchāvasena pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa savanaṃ samādhānamantarena
tika-s0201t:107_3: na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ. Vikkhittacittassātiādi tassevatthassa samatthanavasena
tika-s0201t:107_5: viya ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthehi yonisomanasikārassa, saddhammassavanena viya ca
tika-s0201t:107_7: siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato, evaṃ avikkhepena phalabhūtena kāraṇabhūtānaṃ saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ
tika-s0201t:107_8: siddhi dassetabbā siyā assutavato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa ca tadabhāvato. Na
tika-s0201t:107_9: hi vikkhittacittotiādinā samatthanavacanena pana avikkhepena kāraṇabhūtena sappurisūpanissayena
tika-s0201t:107_10: ca phalabhūtassa saddhammassavanassa siddhi dassitā. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo yutto
tika-s0201t:107_11: siyā – saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ bāhiraṅgattā,
tika-s0201t:107_12: avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa ekantakāraṇanti. Evampi
tika-s0201t:107_13: avikkhepena sappurisūpanissayasiddhijotanā na samatthitāva, no na samatthitā vikkhittacittānaṃ
tika-s0201t:107_14: sappurisapayirupāsanābhāvassa atthasiddhattā. Ettha ca purimaṃ phalena kāraṇassa
tika-s0201t:107_15: siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa, dutiyaṃ kāraṇena phalassa
tika-s0201t:107_16: siddhidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ekantavassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
tika-s0201t:108_1: niravasesaparahitapāripūrikāraṇanti vuttaṃ “evaṃ bhaddako ākāro”ti. Yasmā na hotīti
tika-s0201t:108_3: guṇadvayaṃ. Aparāparavuttiyā cettha cakkabhāvo, caranti etehi sattā sampattibhavesūti
tika-s0201t:108_4: vā. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0201t:108_5: catucakkaṃ vattatī”tiādi. Purimapacchimabhāvo cettha desanākkamavasena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:108_7: ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti tadasuddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvatoti āha – “āsayasuddhi
tika-s0201t:108_8: siddhā hotī”ti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare”ti,
tika-s0201t:108_9: “katapuññosi tvaṃ ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja, khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo”ti ca. Tenevāha
tika-s0201t:108_12: vā kāyavacīpayogassa niddosabhāvena. Parisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato
tika-s0201t:109_1: asammohāsammosadīpanato catupaṭisambhidāvasena atthayojanaṃ dasseti. Tattha sotabbabhedapaṭivedhadīpakenāti
tika-s0201t:109_2: etena ayaṃ suta-saddo evaṃ-saddasannidhānato, vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva sotabbadhammavisesaṃ
tika-s0201t:109_3: āmasatīti dasseti. Manodiṭṭhikaraṇā pariyattidhammānaṃ anupekkhanasuppaṭivedhā visesato
tika-s0201t:109_4: manasikārapaṭibaddhāti te vuttanayena yonisomanasikāradīpakena evaṃsaddena yojetvā,
tika-s0201t:109_6: avikkhepadīpakena suta-saddena yojetvā dassento sāsanasampattiyā dhammassavane ussāhaṃ
tika-s0201t:109_7: janeti. Tattha dhammāti pariyattidhammā. Manasānupekkhitāti “idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:109_8: idha samādhi, idha paññā, ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā nayena manasā anu anu
tika-s0201t:109_10: vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā suṭṭhu
tika-s0201t:110_0: Sakalena vacanenāti pubbe tīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ yojitattā vuttaṃ. Attano adahantoti
tika-s0201t:110_2: tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ anariyavohārāvatthaṃ,
tika-s0201t:110_3: sā eva anariyavohārāvatthā asaddhammo. Nanu ca ānandattherassa “mamedaṃ vacana”nti
tika-s0201t:110_5: niratthakanti? Nayidamevaṃ “evaṃ me suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho vibhāvitoti dassanato.
tika-s0201t:110_6: Keci pana “devatānaṃ parivitakkāpekkhaṃ tathāvacananti edisī codanā anavakāsāvā”ti
tika-s0201t:110_7: vadanti. Tasmiṃ kira khaṇe ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bhagavā
tika-s0201t:110_8: ca parinibbuto, ayañca āyasmā desanākusalo, idāni dhammaṃ deseti sakyakulappasuto
tika-s0201t:110_9: tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapituputto, kiṃ nu kho sayaṃ sacchikataṃ dhammaṃ deseti, udāhu
tika-s0201t:110_10: bhagavatoyeva vacanaṃ yathāsuta”nti. Evaṃ tadāsaṅkitappakārato asappurisabhūmisamokkamādito
tika-s0201t:110_12: yathārahaṃ satte netīti netti, dhammoyeva netti dhammanetti.
tika-s0201t:111_0: Daḷhataraniviṭṭhā vicikicchā kaṅkhā. Nātisaṃsappanā matibhedamattā vimati. Assaddhiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:111_1: vināseti bhagavatā desitattā, sammukhāvassa paṭiggahitattā, khalitaduruttādigahaṇadosābhāvato
tika-s0201t:111_2: ca. Ettha ca paṭhamādayo tisso atthayojanā ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-saddaṃ
tika-s0201t:111_3: gahetvā dassitā, tato parā catasso ākāratthameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā vibhāvitā, pacchimā
tika-s0201t:111_4: pana tisso yathākkamaṃ ākāratthaṃ nidassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇatthañca evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0201t:112_0: Eka-saddo aññaseṭṭhāsahāyasaṅkhyādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0201t:112_1: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati, “cetaso
tika-s0201t:112_2: ekodibhāva”ntiādīsu seṭṭhatthe, “eko vūpakaṭṭho”tiādīsu asahāye, “ekova kho, bhikkhave,
tika-s0201t:112_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhyāyaṃ. Idhāpi saṅkhyāyanti dassento
tika-s0201t:112_4: āha “ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso”ti. Kālañca samayañcāti yuttakālañca paccayasāmaggiñca
tika-s0201t:112_5: khaṇoti okāso. Tathāgatuppādādiko hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso tappaccayapaṭilābhahetuttā.
tika-s0201t:112_6: Khaṇo eva ca samayo. Yo “khaṇo”ti ca “samayo”ti ca vuccati, so ekovāti hi attho mahāsamayoti
tika-s0201t:112_7: mahāsamūho. Samayopi khoti sikkhāpadapūraṇassa hetupi. Samayappavādaketi diṭṭhippavādake.
tika-s0201t:112_8: Tattha hi nisinnā titthiyā attano attano samayaṃ pavadantīti. Atthābhisamayāti hitapaṭilābhā.
tika-s0201t:112_9: Abhisametabboti abhisamayo, abhisamayo attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti pīḷanādīni abhisametabbabhāvena
tika-s0201t:112_10: ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttāni. Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti.
tika-s0201t:112_11: Tāneva tathā ekattena vuttāni. Tattha pīḷanaṃ dukkhasaccassa taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ
tika-s0201t:113_0: Tattha sahakārīkāraṇaṃ sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo. Sameti samāgacchati
tika-s0201t:113_1: maggabrahmacariyaṃ ettha tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo. Sameti ettha, etena
tika-s0201t:113_2: vā saṃgacchati satto, sabhāvadhammo vā sahajātādīhi uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo.
tika-s0201t:113_3: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:113_4: viya ca kappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ, saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ
tika-s0201t:113_5: pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho yathā “samudāyo”ti. Avayavasahāvaṭṭhānameva hi
tika-s0201t:113_6: samūhoti. Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo,
tika-s0201t:113_7: hetu yathā “samudayo”ti. Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati,
tika-s0201t:113_8: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo,
tika-s0201t:113_9: diṭṭhi; diṭṭhisaññojanena hi sattā ativiya bajjhantīti. Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti
tika-s0201t:113_10: samayo, paṭilābho. Samayanaṃ, sammā vā ayanaṃ apagamoti samayo, pahānaṃ. Abhimukhaṃ
tika-s0201t:113_11: ñāṇena sammā etabbo abhisametabboti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo. Abhimukhabhāvena
tika-s0201t:113_12: sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvāvabodho. Evaṃ
tika-s0201t:113_13: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samaya-saddassa pavatti veditabbā. Samayasaddassa atthuddhāre
tika-s0201t:113_14: abhisamayasaddassa udāharaṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Assāti samayasaddassa. Kālo
tika-s0201t:113_15: attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato, desadesakaparisānaṃ viya suttassa
tika-s0201t:114_0: Kasmā panettha aniyamitavaseneva kālo niddiṭṭho, na utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyametvāti?
tika-s0201t:114_1: Āha – “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi. Utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamaṃ akatvā samayasaddassa
tika-s0201t:114_2: vacanena ayampi guṇo laddho hotīti dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha. Sāmaññajotanā hi
tika-s0201t:114_3: visese avatiṭṭhatīti. Tattha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasamayo devasikaṃ jhānaphalasamāpattīhi
tika-s0201t:114_5: pākaṭā. Yathāvuttabhedesu eva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0201t:114_6: “yo cāya”ntiādimāha. Tathā hi ñāṇakiccasamayo attahitapaṭipattisamayo ca abhisambodhisamayo,
tika-s0201t:115_0: Karaṇavacanena niddeso katoti sambandho. Tatthāti abhidhammatadaññasuttapadavinayesu.
tika-s0201t:115_1: Tathāti bhummakaraṇehi. Adhikaraṇattho ādhārattho. Bhāvo nāma kiriyā, tāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:115_2: bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ. Tattha yathā kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato
tika-s0201t:115_3: avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññāto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato
tika-s0201t:115_4: “pubbaṇhe jāto, sāyanhe gacchatī”ti ca ādīsu, samūho ca avayavavinimutto avijjamānopi
tika-s0201t:115_5: kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati “rukkhe sākhā, yavarāsiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:115_6: sambhūto”tiādīsu, evaṃ idhāpīti dassento āha “adhikaraṇañhi…pe… dhammāna”nti. Yasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:115_7: kāle dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ eva kāle dhammapuñje
tika-s0201t:115_8: ca phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho. Yathā ca “gāvīsu duyhamānāsu gato, duddhāsu
tika-s0201t:115_9: āgato”ti dohanakiriyāya gamanakiriyā lakkhīyati, evaṃ idhāpi “yasmiṃ samaye, tasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:115_10: samaye”ti ca vutte “satī”ti ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvatoti
tika-s0201t:115_11: samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā phassādīnaṃ bhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyati.
tika-s0201t:115_12: Yasmiṃ samayeti yasmiṃ navame khaṇe, yasmiṃ yonisomanasikārādihetumhi, paccayasamavāye
tika-s0201t:115_13: vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe, hetumhi, paccayasamavāye
tika-s0201t:115_14: vā phassādayopi hontīti ubhayattha samayasadde bhummaniddeso kato lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti
tika-s0201t:116_0: Hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati “annena vasati, ajjhenena vasati, pharasunā chindati,
tika-s0201t:116_1: kudālena khaṇatī”tiādīsu viya. Vītikkamañhi sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ
tika-s0201t:116_2: puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva
tika-s0201t:116_3: kālena sikkhāpadāni paññapento bhagavā viharati sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno
tika-s0201t:117_0: Accantameva ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ parahitapaṭipattisaṅkhātena karuṇāvihārena.
tika-s0201t:117_1: Tadatthajotanatthanti accantasaṃyogatthajotanatthaṃ. Upayogavacananiddeso kato yathā “māsaṃ ajjhetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:118: Porāṇāti aṭṭhakathācariyā. Abhilāpamattabhedoti vacanamattena viseso. Tena suttavinayesu vibhattibyattayo katoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:119_0: Seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ “seṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato. Tathā
tika-s0201t:119_1: uttamanti etthāpi. Gāravayuttoti garubhāvayutto garuguṇayogato, garukaraṇārahatāya
tika-s0201t:119_2: vā gāravayutto. Vuttoyeva, na pana idha vattabbo visuddhimaggassa imissā aṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0201t:120: Aparo nayo – bhāgavāti bhagavā, bhatavāti bhagavā, bhāge vanīti bhagavā, bhage vanīti bhagavā, bhattavāti bhagavā, bhage vamīti bhagavā, bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
tika-s0201t:121: Bhagavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-s0201t:122: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
tika-s0201t:123_0: Tattha kathaṃ bhāgavāti bhagavā? Ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā,
tika-s0201t:123_1: te anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti. Tathā hissa sīlaṃ,
tika-s0201t:123_2: samādhi, paññā, vimutti, vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ, hirī, ottappaṃ, saddhā, vīriyaṃ, sati
tika-s0201t:123_3: sampajaññaṃ, sīlavisuddhi, diṭṭhivisuddhi, samatho, vipassanā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni,
tika-s0201t:123_4: tīṇi sucaritāni, tayo sammāvitakkā, tisso anavajjasaññā, tisso dhātuyo, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā,
tika-s0201t:123_5: cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri ariyaphalāni,
tika-s0201t:123_6: catasso paṭisambhidā, catuyonipaṭicchedakañāṇaṃ, cattāro ariyavaṃsā, cattāri vesārajjañāṇāni,
tika-s0201t:123_7: pañca padhāniyaṅgāni, pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi, pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi, pañcindriyāni,
tika-s0201t:123_8: pañca balāni, pañca nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni, pañca vimuttiparipācanīyā
tika-s0201t:123_9: saññā, cha anussatiṭṭhānāni, cha gāravā, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, cha satatavihārā,
tika-s0201t:123_10: cha anuttariyāni, cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā, cha abhiññā, cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni, satta
tika-s0201t:123_11: aparihāniyā dhammā, satta ariyadhammā, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, satta
tika-s0201t:123_12: sappurisadhammā, satta nijjaravatthūni, satta saññā, satta dakkhiṇeyyapuggaladesanā,
tika-s0201t:123_13: satta khīṇāsavabaladesanā, aṭṭha paññāpaṭilābhahetudesanā, aṭṭha sammattāni, aṭṭha
tika-s0201t:123_14: lokadhammātikkamā, aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni, aṭṭha akkhaṇadesanā, aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā,
tika-s0201t:123_15: aṭṭha abhibhāyatanadesanā, aṭṭha vimokkhā, nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā, nava
tika-s0201t:123_16: pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni, nava sattāvāsadesanā, nava āghātapaṭivinayā, nava saññā,
tika-s0201t:123_17: nava nānattā, nava anupubbavihārā, dasa nāthakaraṇā dhammā, dasa kasiṇāyatanāni,
tika-s0201t:123_18: dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa sammattāni, dasa ariyavāsā, dasa asekkhadhammā, dasa
tika-s0201t:123_19: tathāgatabalāni, ekādasa mettānisaṃsā, dvādasa dhammacakkākārā, terasa dhutaguṇā,
tika-s0201t:123_20: cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, pañcadasa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, soḷasavidhā ānāpānassati,
tika-s0201t:123_21: soḷasa aparantapanīyā dhammā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni,
tika-s0201t:123_22: catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni, paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni, paropaṇṇāsa kusaladhammā, sattasattati
tika-s0201t:123_24: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo
tika-s0201t:123_25: anantāparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti
tika-s0201t:123_26: upalabbhanti, tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti “bhāgavā”ti vattabbe
tika-s0201t:123_27: ā-kārassa rassattaṃ katvā “bhagavā”ti vutto. Evaṃ tāva bhāgavāti bhagavā.
tika-s0201t:126_0: Kathaṃ bhatavāti bhagavā? Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha
tika-s0201t:126_1: dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūritabbā
tika-s0201t:126_2: dānapāramī, sīla, nekkhamma, paññā, vīriya, khanti, sacca, adhiṭṭhāna, mettā, upekkhāpāramīti
tika-s0201t:126_3: dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo, dānādīni
tika-s0201t:126_4: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, saccādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, aṅgapariccāgo nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāgoti
tika-s0201t:126_5: pañca mahāparicāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṃ, ñātatthacariyā, lokatthacariyā,
tika-s0201t:126_6: buddhicariyāti evamādayo, saṅkhepato vā sabbe puññañāṇasambhārā buddhakaradhammā,
tika-s0201t:126_7: te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni yathā
tika-s0201t:126_8: hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na honti, atha kho uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva
tika-s0201t:126_9: honti, evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti “bhatavā”ti
tika-s0201t:126_10: vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vutto niruttinayena ta-kārassa ga-kāraṃ katvā. Atha vā bhatavāti
tika-s0201t:126_11: teyeva yathāvutte buddhakaradhamme vuttanayeneva bhari sambhari, paripūresīti attho.
tika-s0201t:128: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tenāpi bhagavā matoti.
tika-s0201t:129_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vanīti bhagavā? Ye te catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakasamāpattibhāgā,
tika-s0201t:129_1: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ vani
tika-s0201t:129_2: bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu kusalādīsu
tika-s0201t:129_3: khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
tika-s0201t:129_4: vitthārato pana “cakkhu pariññeyyaṃ sotaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ pariññeyya”ntiādinā aneke
tika-s0201t:129_5: pariññeyyabhāgā, “cakkhussa samudayo pahātabbo…pe… jarāmaraṇassa samudayo pahātabbo”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:129_8: ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā, te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṃ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ
tika-s0201t:129_9: vasena sevi. Evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā. Atha vā “ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā
tika-s0201t:129_10: sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā, kinti nu kho te vineyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya”nti
tika-s0201t:129_11: mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi, sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā ahosi.
tika-s0201t:131: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tatoti.
tika-s0201t:132_0: Kathaṃ bhage vanīti bhagavā? Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ
tika-s0201t:132_1: bhajīyantīti bhagā, lokiyalokuttarā sampattiyo. Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito
tika-s0201t:132_2: pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate vani bhaji sevi, yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato
tika-s0201t:132_3: buddhakaradhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi, buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṃhite
tika-s0201t:132_4: anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi, vitthārato pana padesarajjaissariyacakkavattisampatti-devarajjasampattiādivasena-
tika-s0201t:132_6: ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi. Evampi bhage vanīti bhagavā.
tika-s0201t:133: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthu;
tika-s0201t:134: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā matoti.
tika-s0201t:135_0: Kathaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā? Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā. Tathāgato
tika-s0201t:135_5: lokattayabyāpinā suvipulena suvisuddhena ca thutighosena samannāgatattā ukkaṃsapāramippattāsu
tika-s0201t:135_7: ca rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno, ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno, lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno,
tika-s0201t:135_8: dhammappamāṇo dhammappasannoti evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena
tika-s0201t:135_10: paramapemasambhattiṭṭhānaṃ. Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā
tika-s0201t:135_11: honti, kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ pasādabhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena
tika-s0201t:135_12: vā brahmunā vā. Tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti,
tika-s0201t:138_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattati, evameva kho, bhikkhave,
tika-s0201t:138_1: yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca.
tika-s0201t:139: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:141: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccatīti.
tika-s0201t:142_0: Kathaṃ bhage vamīti bhagavā? Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo
tika-s0201t:142_1: pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami, uggiri, kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho
tika-s0201t:142_4: amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, tasmā
tika-s0201t:142_5: ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ gacchanti
tika-s0201t:142_7: sobhā kappaṭṭhiyabhāvato, tepi bhage vami tannivāsisattāvāsasamatikkamanato, tappaṭibaddhachandarāgapahānena
tika-s0201t:145_0: Kathaṃ bhāge vamīti bhagavā? Bhāgā nāma sabhāgadhammakoṭṭhāsā, te khandhāyatanadhātādivasena,
tika-s0201t:145_1: tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena, pathaviyādiatītādivasena ca anekavidhā. Te bhagavā sabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:145_2: papañcaṃ sabbaṃ yogaṃ sabbaṃ ganthaṃ sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amataṃ dhātuṃ
tika-s0201t:145_3: samadhigacchanto vami uggiri, anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāgami. Tathā hesa “sabbatthameva
tika-s0201t:145_4: pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ, cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ manaṃ, rūpe sadde gandhe
tika-s0201t:145_5: rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇaṃ, cakkhusamphassaṃ…pe… manosamphassaṃ,
tika-s0201t:145_6: cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ saññaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:145_7: manosamphassajaṃ saññaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:145_8: rūpataṇhaṃ…pe… dhammataṇhaṃ, rūpavitakkaṃ…pe… dhammavitakkaṃ, rūpavicāraṃ…pe… dhammavicāra”ntiādinā
tika-s0201t:145_9: anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri, anapekkhapariccāgena
tika-s0201t:145_10: chaḍḍayi. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “yaṃ taṃ, ānanda, cattaṃ vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:145_11: taṃ tathāgato puna paccāgamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti. Evampi bhāge vamīti
tika-s0201t:145_12: bhagavā. Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge
tika-s0201t:145_13: dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho pariccaji pajahi, paresañca tathattāya
tika-s0201t:145_14: dhammaṃ desesi. Vuttampi cetaṃ “dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā,
tika-s0201t:145_15: kullūpamaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nittharaṇatthāya, no gahaṇatthāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:147: Kaṇhasukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā matoti.
tika-s0201t:149: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-s0201t:150: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
tika-s0201t:151_0: Dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karotīti “yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito
tika-s0201t:151_1: paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo vijjatīti
tika-s0201t:151_2: katvā vuttaṃ. Vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyo parehi abhejjasarīrattā. Na hi bhagavato rūpakāye
tika-s0201t:152_0: Desanāsampattiṃ niddisati vakkhamānassa sakalassa suttassa “eva”nti nidassanato.
tika-s0201t:152_1: Sāvakasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāppattena pañcasu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge
tika-s0201t:152_2: ṭhapitena mayā mahāsāvakena sutaṃ, tañca kho mayāva sutaṃ, na anussutikaṃ, na paramparābhatanti
tika-s0201t:152_3: imassa atthassa dīpanato. Kālasampattiṃ niddisati bhagavā-saddasannidhāne payuttassa
tika-s0201t:156_0: Maṅgaladivaso sukhaṇo sunakkhattanti ajja maṅgaladivaso, tasmā sunakkhattaṃ, tatthāpi
tika-s0201t:156_1: ayaṃ sukhaṇo. Mā atikkamīti mā rattivibhāyanaṃ anudikkhantānaṃ ratti atikkamīti evaṃ
tika-s0201t:156_2: sambandho veditabbo. Ukkāsu ṭhitāsu ṭhitāti ukkaṭṭhā. Ukkāsu vijjotalantīsu ṭhitā
tika-s0201t:156_4: vā ukkāsu ṭhitāsu ṭhitā āsīti ukkaṭṭhā. Apare pana bhaṇanti “bhūmibhāgasampattiyā
tika-s0201t:156_5: manussasampattiyā upakaraṇasampattiyā ca sā nagarī ukkaṭṭhaguṇayogato ‘ukkaṭṭhā’ti nāmaṃ labhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:157_0: Avisesenāti na visesena, vihārabhāvasāmaññenāti attho. Iriyāpatha…pe… vihāresūti
tika-s0201t:157_1: iriyāpathavihāro dibbavihāro brahmavihāro ariyavihāroti etesu catūsu vihāresu. Samaṅgiparidīpananti
tika-s0201t:157_2: samaṅgībhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Etanti “viharatī”ti etaṃ padaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ “idhekacco
tika-s0201t:157_3: gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati sahanandī sahasokī”tiādīsu iriyāpathavihāre āgataṃ; “yasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:157_4: samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu
tika-s0201t:157_5: dibbavihāre; “so mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādīsu brahmavihāre;
tika-s0201t:157_6: “so kho ahaṃ aggivessana tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃ eva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte
tika-s0201t:157_7: ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmi, yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ
tika-s0201t:158_0: Tattha iriyanaṃ vattanaṃ iriyā, kāyappayogo. Tassā pavattanupāyabhāvato ṭhānādi iriyāpatho.
tika-s0201t:158_1: Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vā. Atha vā iriyati
tika-s0201t:158_2: pavattati etena attabhāvo, kāyakiccaṃ vāti iriyā, tassā pavattiyā upāyabhāvato pathoti
tika-s0201t:158_3: iriyāpatho, ṭhānādi eva. So ca atthato gatinivattiādiākārena pavatto catusantatirūpapabandho
tika-s0201t:158_4: eva. Viharaṇaṃ, viharati etenāti vā vihāro, iriyāpatho eva vihāro iriyāpathavihāro.
tika-s0201t:158_5: Divi bhavoti dibbo. Tattha bahulappavattiyā brahmapārisajjādidevaloke bhavoti attho.
tika-s0201t:158_6: Tattha yo dibbānubhāvo, tadatthāya saṃvattatīti vā dibbo, abhiññābhinīhāravasena
tika-s0201t:158_7: mahāgatikattā vā dibbo, dibbo ca so vihāro cāti dibbavihāro, catasso rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo.
tika-s0201t:158_8: Āruppasamāpattiyopi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Brahmūnaṃ, brahmāno vā vihārā brahmavihārā,
tika-s0201t:158_9: catasso appamaññāyo. Ariyānaṃ, ariyā vā vihārā ariyavihārā, cattāri sāmaññaphalāni.
tika-s0201t:158_10: So hi bhagavā ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanantiādi yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ
tika-s0201t:158_11: kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti, tathāpi “upādinnakasarīrassa nāma ayaṃ sabhāvo”ti
tika-s0201t:158_12: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto veneyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento,
tika-s0201t:158_13: nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento vasatīti veneyyasattānaṃ attano ca vividhaṃ
tika-s0201t:158_14: hitasukhaṃ harati upaneti uppādeti, tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:159_1: cā”ti. Chaṇasamajjaussaveti ettha chaṇaṃ nāma phaggunamāsādīsu uttaraphaggunādi-abhilakkhitadivasesu
tika-s0201t:159_2: saparijanānaṃ manussānaṃ maṅgalakaraṇaṃ. Samajjaṃ nāma naṭasamajjādi. Ussavo nakkhattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:159_3: Yattha gāmanigamavāsino tayo satta vā divase nakkhattaghosanaṃ katvā yathāvibhavaṃ
tika-s0201t:159_4: alaṅkatapaṭiyattā bhoge paribhuñjantā nakkhattakīḷanaṃ kīḷanti. Tesaṃ taṃ tatheva
tika-s0201t:159_5: hotīti tesaṃ manussānaṃ taṃ patthanaṃ tannivāsidevatānubhāvena yebhuyyena tatheva
tika-s0201t:159_6: hoti, patthanā samijjhatīti attho. Bahujanakantatāyāti iminā “sundarakāmattā”ti etasseva
tika-s0201t:159_7: padassa pakārantarena atthaṃ vibhāveti. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – kamanīyaṭṭhena suṭṭhu
tika-s0201t:159_8: bhajīyatīti subhagaṃ, subhā agā rukkhā etthāti vā subhagaṃ, sundarakittiyogato vā
tika-s0201t:159_9: “subhaga”nti evampettha atthaṃ vaṇṇenti. Keci pana “subhāgavane”ti paṭhanti, “sundarabhūmibhāge
tika-s0201t:159_10: vane”ti cassa atthaṃ vadanti. Subhagassa nāma yakkhassa vanaṃ tena pariggahitattāti
tika-s0201t:159_11: “subhagavana”nti aññe. Vananaṃ bhattītiatthe taṃ vananaṃ kāretīti etasmiṃ atthe vanayatīti
tika-s0201t:159_12: padasiddhi veditabbā. Tenevāha “attani sinehaṃ uppādetī”ti. Yācanatthe vanute iti
tika-s0201t:160_0: Ujuvaṃsāti ujubhūtaviṭapā. Mahāsālāti mahārukkhā. Aññatarasmiṃ sālamūleti aññatarassa
tika-s0201t:160_1: rukkhassa mūle. Vanappatijeṭṭhakarukkhoti vanappatibhūto jeṭṭhakarukkho. Tameva jeṭṭhakabhāvanti
tika-s0201t:160_2: vanappatibhāvenāgataṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ padhānabhāvaṃ. Tena hi so “sālarājā”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:160_3: Upagatānaṃ rañjanaṭṭhena rājā, aññasmimpi tādise rukkhe rājavohāraṃ dassetuṃ “supatiṭṭhitassā”tiādi
tika-s0201t:160_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha brāhmaṇa dhammikāti ālapanaṃ. Nippariyāyena sākhādimato saṅghātassa
tika-s0201t:160_5: suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhane avayavavisese pavattamāno mūla-saddo. Yasmā taṃsadisesu
tika-s0201t:160_6: tannissaye padese ca ruḷhīvasena pariyāyato pavattati, tasmā “mūlāni uddhareyyā”ti
tika-s0201t:160_7: ettha nippariyāyamūlaṃ adhippetanti ekena mūla-saddena visesetvā āha “mūlamūle dissatī”ti
tika-s0201t:160_8: yathā “dukkhadukkhaṃ, rūparūpa”nti ca. Asādhāraṇahetumhīti asādhāraṇakāraṇe. Lobhasahagatacittuppādānaṃ
tika-s0201t:160_9: eva āveṇike nesaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanato mūlaṭṭhena upakārake paccayadhamme dissatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:161_0: Tatthāti “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle”ti yaṃ
tika-s0201t:161_1: vuttaṃ vākyaṃ, tatta. Siyāti kassaci evaṃ parivitakko siyā, vakkhamānākārena kadāci
tika-s0201t:161_2: codeyya vāti attho. Atha tattha viharatīti yadi subhagavane sālarājamūle viharati.
tika-s0201t:161_3: Na vattabbanti nānāṭhānabhūtattā ukkaṭṭhāsubhagavanānaṃ, ekaṃ samayanti ca vuttattāti
tika-s0201t:161_4: adhippāyo. Idāni codako tameva attano adhippāyaṃ “na hi sakkā”tiādinā vivarati. Itaro
tika-s0201t:161_5: sabbametaṃ aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānantena vuttanti dassento “na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti
tika-s0201t:161_6: āha. Tattha etanti “ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:161_7: Evanti “yadi tāva bhagavā”tiādinā yaṃ taṃ bhavatā coditaṃ, taṃ atthato evaṃ na kho
