tika-s0201t:263_3: na tato paranti āha “katipayakappasahassāyukā”ti. Kāmarūpabhavesu pavattamānāpi ākāsānañcāyatanādidhammā
tika-s0201t:263_5: vuttaṃ. Abhibhūvāre vuttanayena veditabbā yathārahanti adhippāyo. Na hettha vaṇṇavantatādi
tika-s0201t:263_6: sambhavatīti. Pajāpativāre vuttanayenāti ettha “ahamasmi arūpo pahīnarūpapaṭighasañño”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:266_0: 5. Rūpamukhena maññanāvatthudassanaṃ saṅkhepoti katvā vuttaṃ “vitthāratopī”ti. Tampi
tika-s0201t:266_1: hi “yattha neva pathavī, na āpo, na tejo, na vāyo, na ākāsānañcāyatana”ntiādiggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:267_0: Diṭṭhanti yaṃ cakkhudvārena katadassanakiriyāsamāpanaṃ, yañca cakkhu dvayaṃ passati
tika-s0201t:267_1: passissati sati sambhave passeyya, taṃ sabbakālanti visesavacanicchāya abhāvato diṭṭhanteva
tika-s0201t:267_2: vuttaṃ yathā “duddha”nti. Tenāha “rūpāyatanassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Ayañca nayo sutādīsupi
tika-s0201t:267_3: yojetabbo. Sattāti rūpādīsu sattā visattāti sattā. Sañjanaṭṭhena sāmaññasaddopi cesa
tika-s0201t:267_4: satta-saddo “itthirūpe”ti visayavisesitattā idha purisavācako daṭṭhabbo. Rattāti
tika-s0201t:267_5: vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmakārakena chandarāgena rattā sārattā.
tika-s0201t:267_6: Giddhāti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhigijjhanena giddhā gedhaṃ āpannā. Gadhitāti ganthitā
tika-s0201t:267_7: viya lobhena dummocanīyabhāvena ārammaṇe paṭibaddhā. Mucchitāti kilesavasena visaññībhūtā
tika-s0201t:267_8: viya anaññakiccā mucchaṃ mohaṃ āpannā. Ajjhosannāti visaye aññasādhāraṇe viya katvā
tika-s0201t:267_9: gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā viya ṭhitā. Imināti suvaṇṇavaṇṇādiākārena. Maṅgalaṃ amaṅgalanti
tika-s0201t:267_10: īdisaṃ diṭṭhaṃ maṅgalaṃ, īdisaṃ amaṅgalanti. Rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassananayenāti
tika-s0201t:267_11: idaṃ vedanādiarūpadhamme, rūpāyatanavinimuttasabbadhamme vā attato gahetvā tato ajjhattikaṃ,
tika-s0201t:267_12: bāhiraṃ vā rūpāyatanaṃ tassokāsabhāvena parikappetvā “so kho pana me ayaṃ attā imasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:267_13: rūpāyatane”ti maññanto diṭṭhasmiṃ maññatīti imaṃ nayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Pathavito
tika-s0201t:267_14: maññatī”tiādīsu yathā “saupakaraṇassa attano vā parassa vā”tiādimaññanāpavatti dassitā,
tika-s0201t:267_15: evaṃ “diṭṭhato maññatī”tiādīsu sakkā taṃ dassetunti āha “tesaṃ pathavīvāre vuttanayeneva veditabba”nti.
tika-s0201t:268: Āhaccāti visayaṃ anvāya, patvāti attho. Tenāha “upagantvā”ti. Aññamaññasaṃsileseti cakkhurūpasotasaddā viya dure ahutvā aññamaññaṃ alliyane.
tika-s0201t:269_0: Manasā viññātaṃ kevalanti attho. Itarānipi hi manasā viññāyantīti. Sesehi sattahi
tika-s0201t:269_1: āyatanehi paññattiyā asaṅgahitattā tampi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “dhammārammaṇassa vā”ti
tika-s0201t:269_2: vuttaṃ. Dvīsupi vikappesu lokuttarānampi saṅgaho āpannoti āha “idha pana sakkāyapariyāpannameva
tika-s0201t:269_3: labbhatī”ti. Vitthāroti maññanānaṃ pavattanākāravitthāro. Etthāti etesu sutavārādīsu.
tika-s0201t:272_1: attho. Sā hi ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe ekākārena pavattatīti katvā “ekatta”nti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:272_2: evañca katvā vipākajjhānappavattipi idha samāpannakavāraggahaṇeneva gahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:272_3: Asamāpannakavārenāti kāmāvacaradhammappavattiyā. Upacārajjhānenapi hi cittaṃ na sammā
tika-s0201t:273_0: Yojanāti maññanāyojanā. Bhinditvāti vibhajitvā. Sāsananayenāti pāḷinayena. Tattha
tika-s0201t:273_2: maññatī”tiādīsu pana “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā nayena vuttavidhiṃ anugantvā maññanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:274_0: Pathavīvārādīsu vuttena ca aṭṭhakathānayenāti “ahaṃ vedanāti maññati, mama vedanāti
tika-s0201t:274_1: maññatī”tiādinā, “ahaṃ rūpanti maññati, mama rūpanti maññatī”tiādinā cāti attho.
tika-s0201t:274_2: Tenāha “yathānurūpaṃ vīmaṃsitvā”ti, ekattanānattabhāvesu yo yojanānayo sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:274_3: tadanurūpaṃ vicāretvāti attho. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Apareti sārasamāsācariyā.
tika-s0201t:274_4: Diṭṭhābhinivesaṃ vadantīti sambandho. Puthujjanassa maññanā nāma sakkāyaṃ bhinditvāva
tika-s0201t:274_5: yathāupaṭṭhitavisayavaseneva pavattatīti na tattha ayamekattanayo ayaṃ nānattanayoti
tika-s0201t:274_6: vibhāgavaseneva, ekattasaññī attā hotītiādīsu ca attano ekattanānattasaññitā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:274_7: na pana ekattaṃ nānattanti evaṃ pavattassa diṭṭhābhinivesassa ekattanānattabhāvoti
tika-s0201t:275_0: Yaṃ yathāvuttaputhujjano anavasesato gaṇhanto gahetuṃ sakkoti, taṃ tassa anavasesato
tika-s0201t:275_1: gahetabbataṃ upādāya “sabba”nti vuccatīti dassento “tamevā”ti āha, sakkāyasabbanti
tika-s0201t:275_2: attho. Sabbasmimpi tebhūmakadhamme ādīnavadassane asati nibbidābhāvato assādānupassanāya
tika-s0201t:275_3: taṇhā vaḍḍhatevāti āha “sabbaṃ assādento sabbaṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññatī”ti. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0201t:275_4: bhagavatā – “saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:275_5: “Sabbamidaṃ mayā nimmita”nti tena nimmitamaññanāya attānaṃ seyyādito dahanto tena
tika-s0201t:275_6: mānena nimmitaṃ maññatiyeva nāma nimmitamaññanāya vinā tathāmānuppattiyā abhāvatoti
tika-s0201t:275_7: āha “attanā nimmitaṃ maññanto sabbaṃ mānamaññanāya maññatī”ti. Sabbaṃ natthītiādinā
tika-s0201t:275_8: nayenāti ādi-saddena niyativādādike saṅgaṇhāti. Mahā me attāti iminā sabbato attano
tika-s0201t:275_10: mayhaṃ kiñcanaṃ palibodho sabbasmiṃ, paro sabbasmiṃ parassa kiñcanaṃ palibodho sabbasmi”ntiādinā
tika-s0201t:275_11: nayenapettha maññanā sambhavatīti dassento āha “sesaṃ pathavīvāre vuttanayena veditabba”nti.
tika-s0201t:275_12: Apica “sabboyaṃ loko purisamayo”ti evaṃdiṭṭhiko purisasaṅkhātato sabbato, attano
tika-s0201t:275_13: uppattiṃ vā niggamanaṃ vā maññanto diṭṭhimaññanāya sabbato maññati, tasmiṃyeva pana
tika-s0201t:275_14: diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmaññanā mānamaññanā
tika-s0201t:275_15: ca veditabbā. Taṃyeva pana sabbaṃ mayhaṃ attā kattā sāmīti vā maññanto “sabbaṃ me”ti
tika-s0201t:275_16: maññati, tathāyaṃ diṭṭhitaṇhābhinandanāhi abhinandanto sabbaṃ abhinandatīti evampettha
tika-s0201t:276_1: nibbānanti maññati, taṃ panatthato sakkāyoyevāti. Ekadhāti pañcavidhampi nibbānabhāvena
tika-s0201t:276_2: ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Yatoti yasmā. Pañcahi kāmaguṇehīti manāpiyarūpādīhi pañcahi
tika-s0201t:276_3: kāmakoṭṭhāsehi, bandhanehi vā. Samappito suṭṭhu appito allīno hutvā ṭhito. Samaṅgibhūtoti
tika-s0201t:276_4: samannāgato. Paricāretīti tesu kāmaguṇesu kāmakoṭṭhāsesu yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cāreti
tika-s0201t:276_5: sañcāreti ito cito ca upaneti. Atha vā laḷati ramati kīḷati. Ettha dvidhā kāmaguṇā
tika-s0201t:276_6: mānusakā ceva dibbā ca. Mānusakā ca mandhātukāmaguṇasadisā, dibbā paranimmitavasavattidevarājassa
tika-s0201t:276_7: kāmaguṇasadisā. Evarūpe kāme upagatānañhi te diṭṭhadhammanibbānasampattiṃ paññapenti.
tika-s0201t:276_8: Tenāha “ettāvatā kho…pe… hotī”ti. Diṭṭhadhammoti paccakkhadhammo vuccati, tattha
tika-s0201t:276_9: tattha paṭiladdhattabhāvassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, diṭṭhadhamme nibbānaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve
tika-s0201t:276_10: dukkhavūpasamanaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ. Paramaṃ uttamaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānanti paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:276_11: taṃ patto hotīti attho. Pañcadhā āgatanti yathāvuttakāmaguṇasukhassa ceva catubbidharūpāvacarajjhānasukhassa
tika-s0201t:276_12: ca vasena pāḷiyaṃ pañcappakārena āgataṃ. Nibbānaṃ assādentoti paramaṃ sukhaṃ nissaraṇanti
tika-s0201t:277_0: “Imasmiṃ nibbāne patte na jāyati, na jīrati, na mīyatī”ti evampi nibbānasmiṃ maññati.
tika-s0201t:277_1: “Ito paraṃ paramassāsabhūtaṃ natthī”ti gaṇhanto nibbānato maññati. Tayidaṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-s0201t:277_2: mayā adhigataṃ, tasmā “nibbānaṃ me”ti maññati. Tatoyeva taṃ nibbānaṃ diṭṭhābhinandanāya
tika-s0201t:277_3: abhinandati. Ayaṃ tāvettha diṭṭhimaññanā. Tasmiṃyeva pana diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite
tika-s0201t:277_4: vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi niddhāretabbā.
tika-s0201t:278_0: Yādisoti yathārūpo, yehi jegucchādisabhāvehi passitabboti attho. Esāti ayaṃ. Tenassa
tika-s0201t:278_1: attano suṇantānañca paccakkhasiddhatamāha. Asubhādisabhāvena saha vijjamānānaṃ rūpādidhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:278_2: kāyo samūhoti sakkāyo, upādānakkhandhā. Tathāti tassa bhāvabhūtena paṭikūlatādippakārena.
tika-s0201t:278_3: Sabbamaññanāti pathavīādike sarūpāvadhāraṇādivibhāgabhinne visaye pavattiyā anekavihitā sabbā taṇhāmaññanā.
tika-s0201t:279_0: Jegucchoti jigucchanīyo. Tenassa asubhājaññaduggandhapaṭikūlabhāvaṃ dasseti. Siduroti
tika-s0201t:279_1: khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvo. Tenassa aniccaaddhuvakhayavayapabhaṅgurasabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:279_2: Ayanti sakkāyo. Dukkhoti na sukho. Tenassa kicchakasirābādhadukkhavuttitaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:279_3: Apariṇāyakoti pariṇāyakarahito. Tenassa attasuññaasāravuttitaṃ dasseti. Tanti sakkāyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:279_4: Paccanīkatoti sabhāvapaṭipakkhato, subhaniccasukhaattāditoti attho. Gaṇhanti gaṇhanto,
tika-s0201t:280_0: Idāni tissopi maññanā upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ “subhato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā mahāpariḷāhe
tika-s0201t:280_1: vipulānatthāvahe ca aggimhi salabhassa patanaṃ subhasukhasaññāya, evaṃ tādise sakkāye
tika-s0201t:280_2: salabhassa taṇhāmaññanāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “subhato…pe… taṇhāya maññanā”ti iminā.
tika-s0201t:281_0: Gūthādī kīṭako gūtharāsiṃ laddhā asampannepi tasmiṃ sampannākāraṃ pavattayamāno attānaṃ
tika-s0201t:281_1: ukkaṃseti, evamanekādīnave ekantabhedini sakkāye niccasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampattimadena
tika-s0201t:281_2: tattha bālo mānaṃ jappetīti imamatthamāha “niccasaññaṃ…pe… mānena maññanā”ti.
tika-s0201t:282_0: Yathā bālo muddhadhātuko sammūḷho koci ādāse attano paṭibimbaṃ disvā “ayaṃ maññe
tika-s0201t:282_1: ādāsasāmiko, yadi ahamimaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭheyyaṃ, anatthampi me kareyyā”ti chaḍḍetvā
tika-s0201t:282_2: palāyanto tattha avijjamānameva kiñci vijjamānaṃ katvā gaṇhi, tathūpamo ayaṃ bālo
tika-s0201t:282_3: sakkāye attattaniyagāhaṃ gaṇhantoti imamatthaṃ dīpeti “attā…pe… diṭṭhiyā hoti maññanā”ti iminā.
tika-s0201t:283: Sukhumaṃ mārabandhanaṃ vepacittibandhanatopi sukhumatarattā. Tenāha bhagavā “aho sukhumataraṃ kho, bhikkhave, mārabandhana”nti.
tika-s0201t:284_0: Bahunti ativiya, anekakkhattuṃ vā. Vipphandamānopi sakkāyaṃ nātivattati saṃsāraṃ
tika-s0201t:284_1: nātivattanato. Yathāha “ye te, bhikkhave, samaṇā sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ
tika-s0201t:284_2: paññapenti, te, sakkāyaṃyeva anuparidhāvanti seyyathāpi sā gaddulabandhano”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:284_3: Yathā hi sattasupi ucchedavikappesu saṃsāranāyikānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:284_4: evaṃ sassatavikappesupīti kathañci pana diṭṭhigatikassa bhavavippamokkho. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:285: Sasoti so eso puthujjano. Niccanti sabbakālaṃ.
tika-s0201t:286: Tanti tasmā sakkāyamalīnassa jātiyādīnamanativattanato. Asātatoti dukkhato.
tika-s0201t:287_0: Passaṃ evamimanti asubhāniccadukkhānattasabhāvaṃ taṃ sakkāyaṃ vuttappakārena yathābhūtavipassanāpaññāsahitāya
tika-s0201t:287_1: maggapaññāya passanto. Pahāyāti samucchedavasena sabbā maññanāyo pajahitvā. Sabbadukkhā
tika-s0201t:291_0: 7. Adhippetassa atthassa aniyametvā vacanaṃ uddeso, niyametvā vacanaṃ niddesoti āha
tika-s0201t:291_1: “yoti uddesavacanaṃ, soti niddesavacana”nti. Sampiṇḍanatthoti samuccayattho. Sampiṇḍanañca
tika-s0201t:291_2: sabhāgatāvasena hotīti āha – “ārammaṇasabhāgenā”ti, ārammaṇassa sabhāgatāya sadisatāyāti
tika-s0201t:291_3: attho. Sekkhaṃ dasseti sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato, sekkhavisayattā ca tassa vacanassa.
tika-s0201t:292_0: Kenaṭṭhenāti yasmā ñāṇena araṇīyato attho sabhāvo, tasmā kenaṭṭhena kena sabhāvena
tika-s0201t:292_1: kena lakkhaṇena sekkho nāma hotīti attho. Yasmā pana sekkhadhammādhigamena puggale
tika-s0201t:292_3: nāma catūsu maggesu, heṭṭhimesu ca tīsu phalesu sammādiṭṭhiādayo. Tenāha “sekkhāya
tika-s0201t:292_4: sammādiṭṭhiyā…pe… ettāvatā kho bhikkhu sekkho hotī”ti. Evaṃ abhidhammapariyāyena
tika-s0201t:292_5: sekkhalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā idāni suttantikapariyāyenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:292_6: Tattha sikkhatīti iminā sikkhāttayasamaṅgī apariniṭṭhitasikkho sekkhoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:292_8: āmeḍitavacanaṃ. Atha vā sikkhanaṃ sikkhā, sā etassa sīlanti sekkho. So hi apariyositasikkhattā
tika-s0201t:292_9: tadadhimuttattā ca ekantena sikkhanasīlo, na asekkho viya pariniṭṭhitasikkho tattha
tika-s0201t:292_10: paṭippassaddhussukko, nāpi vissaṭṭhasikkho pacurajano viya tattha anadhimutto. Atha
tika-s0201t:292_11: vā ariyāya jātiyā tīsu sikkhāsu jāto, tattha vā bhavoti sekkho. Atha vā ikkhati etāyāti
tika-s0201t:293_0: Anulomapaṭipadāya paripūrakārīti yā sā sīlādikā vipassanantā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā
tika-s0201t:293_1: lokuttarāya paṭipadāya anulomanato anulomapaṭipadā, tassā sampādanena paripūrakārīti.
tika-s0201t:293_2: Idāni taṃ paṭipadaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena dassetuṃ “sīlasampanno”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0201t:293_3: sīlasampannoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena samannāgato, paripuṇṇapātimokkhasīlo vā. Pātimokkhasīlañhi
tika-s0201t:293_4: idha “sīla”nti adhippetaṃ padhānabhāvato. Rūpādiārammaṇesu abhijjhādīnaṃ pavattinivāraṇasaṅkhātena
tika-s0201t:293_5: manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ pidhānena indriyesu guttadvāro. Pariyesanādivasena bhojane
tika-s0201t:293_6: pamāṇajānanena bhojane mattaññū. Vigatathinamiddho hutvā rattindivaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanasikāre
tika-s0201t:293_7: yuttatāya jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto. Kathaṃ pana jāgariyānuyogo hotīti taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0201t:293_9: hoti? Idha bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi cittaṃ parisodheti, rattiyā
tika-s0201t:293_10: paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ caṅkamena…pe… sodheti, evaṃ kho bhikkhu pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto
tika-s0201t:293_11: hotī”ti. Imasmiṃ panattheti “maññati, na maññatī”ti ca vattabbabhāvasaṅkhāte atthe.
tika-s0201t:293_12: No puthujjano adhippeto “appattamānaso, anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno”ti ca vuttattā.
tika-s0201t:294_0: Sampayuttattā manasi bhavoti rāgo mānaso, mano eva mānasanti katvā cittaṃ mānasaṃ,
tika-s0201t:294_1: anavasesato mānaṃ sīyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasaṃ, tannibbattattā pana arahattassa
tika-s0201t:294_2: mānasatā daṭṭhabbā. Janesutāti jane sakalasattaloke vissutā, patthaṭayasāti attho.
tika-s0201t:295_0: Natthi ito uttaranti anuttaraṃ. Taṃ pana sabbaseṭṭhaṃ hontaṃ ekantato sadisarahitameva
tika-s0201t:295_1: hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “anuttaranti seṭṭhaṃ, asadisanti attho”ti. Patthayamānassāti taṇhāyantassa.
tika-s0201t:295_2: Pajappitānīti mānajappanāni. Yasmiñhi vatthusmiṃ taṇhāyanā patthayamānamaññanā sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:295_4: parivāsitaṃ. Pakappitesūti taṇhādiṭṭhikappehi parikappitesu ārammaṇesu. Sotanti kilesasotaṃ.
tika-s0201t:295_5: Tasmiñhi chinne itarasotaṃ chinnamevāti. Viddhastanti vināsitaṃ. Tañca kho lomahaṃsamattampi
tika-s0201t:295_6: asesetvāti dassento āha “vinaḷīkata”nti, vigatāvasesaṃ katanti attho. Adhimuttiyā
tika-s0201t:295_7: idhādhippetapatthanā pākaṭā hotīti “tanninno”tiādi vuttaṃ, na pana kusalacchandassa
tika-s0201t:296_0: Sabbākāraviparītāyāti “subhaṃ sukhaṃ nicca”ntiādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ attanā gahetabbākārānaṃ
tika-s0201t:296_1: vasena tabbiparītatāya, anavasesato dhammasabhāvaviparītākāragāhiniyāti attho. Abhivisiṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:296_2: ñāṇenāti asampajānanamicchājānanāni viya na dhammasabhāvaṃ appatvā nāpi atikkamitvā,
tika-s0201t:296_3: atha kho avirajjhitvā dhammasabhāvassa abhimukhabhāvappattiyā abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena,
tika-s0201t:296_4: ñātapariññādhiṭṭhānāya tīraṇapariññāya pahānapariññekadesena cāti attho. Tenāha “pathavīti…pe…
tika-s0201t:296_5: vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Pathavībhāvanti pathaviyaṃ abhiññeyyabhāvaṃ. Lakkhaṇapathavī hi idhādhippetā,
tika-s0201t:296_7: heṭṭhimamaggañāṇehi ca abhijānitvā. Māmaññīti appahīnānaṃ maññanānaṃ vasena māti
tika-s0201t:296_8: maññatīti mā, pahīnānaṃ pana vasena na maññatīti amaññī, mā ca so amaññī ca māmaññīti
tika-s0201t:296_9: evamettha padavibhāgato attho veditabbo. Tattha yena bhāgena amaññī, tena maññīti
tika-s0201t:296_10: na vattabbo. Yena pana bhāgena maññī, tena amaññīti na vattabboti. Evaṃ paṭikkhepappadhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:296_11: atthaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “maññī ca na maññī ca na vattabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭikkhepappadhānatā
tika-s0201t:296_12: cettha labbhamānānampi maññanānaṃ dubbalabhāvato veditabbā. Tenevāha – “itarā pana
tika-s0201t:296_13: tanubhāvaṃ gatā”ti. Māti ca nipātapadametaṃ, anekatthā ca nipātāti adhippāyena “etasmiñhi
tika-s0201t:296_14: atthe imaṃ padaṃ nipātetvā vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Nipātetvāti ca pakatiādivibhāganiddhāraṇe
tika-s0201t:296_15: anumānanayaṃ muñcitvā yathāvutte atthe paccakkhatova dassetvāti attho. Puthujjano
tika-s0201t:296_16: viyāti etenassa uparimaggavajjhataṇhāmānavasena maññanā na paṭikkhittāti dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:297_0: Atha vā mā maññīti parikappakiriyāpaṭikkhepavacanametaṃ “mā randhayuṃ, mā jīrī”tiādīsu
tika-s0201t:297_1: viya, na maññeyyāti vuttañhoti. Yathā hi puthujjano sabbaso appahīnamaññanattā “maññati”cceva
tika-s0201t:297_2: vattabbo, yathā ca khīṇāsavo sabbaso pahīnamaññanattā na maññati eva, na evaṃ sekkho.
tika-s0201t:297_3: Tassa hi ekaccā maññanā pahīnā, ekaccā appahīnā, tasmā ubhayabhāvato ubhayathāpi
tika-s0201t:297_4: na vattabbo. Nanu ca ubhayabhāvato ubhayathāpi vattabboti? Na. Yā hi appahīnā, tāpissa
tika-s0201t:297_5: tanubhāvaṃ gatāti tāhipi so na maññeyya vibhūtatarāya maññanāya abhāvato, pageva
tika-s0201t:297_6: itarāhi. Tenāha bhagavā “mā maññī”ti. Tena vuttaṃ “mā maññīti parikappakiriyāpaṭikkhepavacanametaṃ
tika-s0201t:297_7: ‘mā randhayuṃ, mā jīrī’tiādīsu viya, na maññeyyāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Ayañcassa amaññanā
tika-s0201t:297_8: vatthuno pariññeyyattā, na asekkhassa viya pariññātattā. Yañhi ekantato parijānitabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:297_9: parijānituṃ sakkā, na tattha tabbidhure viya puthujjanassa maññanā sambhavanti. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:298_2: Ubhayenapi tassa avassaṃbhāvinī sesapariññāti dasseti. Pariññeyyanti parijānitabbabhāvena
tika-s0201t:298_3: ṭhitaṃ, pariññātuṃ vā sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Tappaṭipakkhato apariññeyyaṃ. Puthujjanassa viyāti
tika-s0201t:298_4: etena idhādhippetaputhujjanassa pariññeyyabhāvāsaṅkā eva natthi anadhikāratoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:301_0: 8. Sabhāgo diṭṭhasaccatādisāmaññena. Ārakā kilesehi arahanti padassa niruttinayena
tika-s0201t:301_1: atthaṃ vatvā taṃ pāḷiyā samānento “vuttañceta”ntiādimāha. Tattha pāpakāti lāmakaṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:301_2: duggatisampāpanaṭṭhena ca pāpakā. Sāvajjaṭṭhena akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena ca akusalā.
tika-s0201t:301_3: Saṃkilesaṃ arahanti, tattha vā niyuttāti saṃkilesikā. Punabbhavassa karaṇasīlā, punabbhavaphalaṃ
tika-s0201t:301_4: arahantīti vā ponobhavikā. Saha darathena pariḷāhena pavattantīti sadarā. Dukkho
tika-s0201t:301_5: kaṭuko, dukkhamo vā vipāko etesanti dukkhavipākā. Anāgate jātiyā ceva jarāmaraṇānañca
tika-s0201t:301_6: vaḍḍhanena jātijarāmaraṇiyāti. Evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo. Kāmañcāyaṃ suttantavaṇṇanā,
tika-s0201t:301_7: abhidhammanayo pana nippariyāyoti tena dassento “cattāro āsavā”tiādimāha. Samucchinnā
tika-s0201t:301_8: paṭippassaddhāti na kevalaṃ samucchinnā eva, atha kho paṭippassaddhāpīti maggakiccena
tika-s0201t:302: Sīlavisodhanādinā garūnaṃ paṭipattiyā anukaraṇaṃ garusaṃvāso. Ariyamaggapaṭipatti eva ariyamaggasaṃvāso. Dasa ariyāvāsā nāma pañcaṅgavippahīnatādayo. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-s0201t:303_0: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, ariyāvāsā, ye ariyā āvasiṃsu vā āvasanti vā āvasissanti vā.
tika-s0201t:303_1: Katame dasa? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato,
tika-s0201t:303_3: passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro, suvimuttacitto, suvimuttapañño. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa ariyāvāsā”ti.
tika-s0201t:304_0: Vussatīti vā vusitaṃ, ariyamaggo, ariyaphalañca, taṃ etassa atthīti atisayavacanicchāvasena
tika-s0201t:304_1: arahā “vusitavā”ti vutto. Karaṇīyanti pariññāpahānabhāvanāsacchikiriyamāha. Taṃ pana
tika-s0201t:304_2: yasmā catūhi maggehi catūsu saccesu kattabbattā soḷasavidhanti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:304_4: vasena suṭṭhu vimuttassa. Santacittassāti tato eva sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:304_5: vūpasantacittassa. Bhinnakilesassa khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno. Katassa pariññādikiccassa
tika-s0201t:304_6: paṭicayo puna karaṇaṃ natthi, tato eva karaṇīyaṃ na vijjati na upalabbhati.
tika-s0201t:305_0: Bhārāti osīdāpanaṭṭhena bhārā viyāti bhārā. Vuttañhi “bhārā have pañcakkhandhā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:305_2: avijahanaṃ. Tayidaṃ yadipi sabbasmiṃ anavajjadhamme sambhavati, akuppasabhāvāparihānadhammesu
tika-s0201t:305_3: pana aggabhūte arahatte sātisayaṃ, netaresūti dassento āha “attano paramatthaṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:306_0: Suttantanayo nāma pariyāyanayoti nippariyāyanayena saṃyojanāni dassento “bhavarāgaissāmacchariyasaṃyojana”nti
tika-s0201t:306_1: āha, na pana “rūparāgo”tiādinā. Bhavesu saṃyojantīti kilesakammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ paccayo
tika-s0201t:306_2: hutvā nissarituṃ appadānavasena bandhanti. Satipi hi aññesaṃ tappaccayabhāve na vinā
tika-s0201t:306_3: saṃyojanāni tesaṃ tappaccayabhāvo atthi, orambhāgiyauddhambhāgiyasaṅgahitehi ca tehi
tika-s0201t:306_4: taṃtaṃbhavanibbattakakammaniyamo bhavaniyamo ca hoti, na ca upacchinnasaṃyojanassa
tika-s0201t:306_5: katānipi kammāni bhavaṃ nibbattentīti tesaṃyeva saṃyojanaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:307_0: Sammā aññāyāti ājānanabhūtāya aggamaggapaññāya sammā yathābhūtaṃ dukkhādīsu yo yathā
tika-s0201t:307_1: jānitabbo, taṃ tathā jānitvā. Cittavimutti sabbassa cittasaṃkilesassa vissaggo. Nibbānādhimutti
tika-s0201t:307_2: nibbāne adhimuccanaṃ tattha ninnapoṇapabbhāratā. Tanti pathavīādikaṃ. Pariññātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:307_3: na puthujjanassa viya apariññātaṃ, sekkhassa viya pariññeyyaṃ vā. Tasmāti pariññātattā.
tika-s0201t:308_0: Catutthapañcamachaṭṭhavārā tattha tattha kilesanibbānakittanavasena pavattattā nibbānavārā
tika-s0201t:308_1: nāma. Tattha pathavīādīnaṃ pariññātattā amaññanā, sā pana pariññā rāgādīnaṃ khayena
tika-s0201t:308_2: siddhāti imassa atthassa dīpanavasena pāḷi pavattāti dassento “pariññātaṃ tassāti
tika-s0201t:308_3: sabbapadehi yojetvā puna khayā rāgassa vītarāgattāti yojetabbaṃ. Esa nayo itaresū”ti
tika-s0201t:308_4: āha. Tattha itaresūti pañcamachaṭṭhavāresu. Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāḷi evaṃ na dissatīti
tika-s0201t:308_5: āha “desanā pana ekattha vuttaṃ sabbattha vuttameva hotīti saṃkhittā”ti.
tika-s0201t:309_0: Na khayā rāgassa vītarāgo sabbaso appahīnarāgattā. Vikkhambhitarāgo hi soti. Bāhirakaggahaṇañcettha
tika-s0201t:309_1: tathābhāvasseva tesu labbhanato, na tesu eva tathābhāvassa labbhanato. Idāni yā sā
tika-s0201t:309_2: “pariññātaṃ tassā”ti sabbapadehi yojanā vuttā, taṃ vināpi nibbānavāraatthayojanaṃ
tika-s0201t:309_3: dassetuṃ “yathā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha maññanaṃ na maññatīti maññanā nappavattatīti
tika-s0201t:309_4: attho. Maññanāya maññitabbattepi tassā vatthuantogadhattāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:310_0: Yadipi pariññātapadaṃ aggahetvā nibbānavāradesanā pavattā, evampi “khayā”tiādipadehi
tika-s0201t:310_1: pariññāsiddhi eva pakāsīyatīti ko tesaṃ visesoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “ettha cā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:310_2: Maggabhāvanāpāripūridassanatthaṃ vutto, maggakiccantā hi pariññāyoti adhippāyo. Itare…pe…
tika-s0201t:310_3: veditabbā vītarāgādikittanatoti. Dvīhi vā kāraṇehīti yathāvuttakāraṇadvayena. Assāti
tika-s0201t:310_4: khīṇāsavassa. Ayaṃ visesoti idāni vuccamāno viseso. Yadipi khīṇāsavo ekantena vītarāgo
tika-s0201t:310_5: vītadoso vītamoho eva ca hoti, yāya pana pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vītarāgatādayo savisesāti
tika-s0201t:310_6: vattabbataṃ labhanti, taṃ dassento “tīsu hī”tiādimāha. “Ratto atthaṃ na jānātī”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:310_7: rāge ādīnavaṃ passato “rāgo ca nāma sukhābhisaṅgena uppajjati, sukhañca vipariṇāmato
tika-s0201t:310_8: dukkhaṃ. Pageva itara”nti sahetuke rāge ādīnavadassanaṃ dukkhānupassanāya nimittaṃ,
tika-s0201t:310_9: dukkhānupassanā ca paṇidhiyā paṭipakkhabhāvato appaṇihitavimokkhaṃ paripuretīti āha
tika-s0201t:310_10: “rāge…pe… vītarāgo hotī”ti. Tathā “duṭṭho atthaṃ na jānātī”tiādinā dose ādīnavaṃ
tika-s0201t:310_11: passato “doso ca nāma dukkhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati, tañca ubhayaṃ anavaṭṭhitaṃ ittaraṃ
tika-s0201t:310_12: pabhaṅgū”ti sahetuke dose ādīnavadassanaṃ aniccānupassanāya nimittaṃ, aniccānupassanā
tika-s0201t:310_13: ca niccanimittādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato animittavimokkhaṃ paripūretīti āha “dose…pe…
tika-s0201t:310_14: hotī”ti. Tathā “mūḷho atthaṃ na jānātī”tiādinā mohe ādīnavaṃ passato “moho nāma yathāsabhāvaggahaṇassa
tika-s0201t:310_15: paribbhamanto”ti mohassa vikkhambhanaṃ anattānupassanāya nimittaṃ, anattānupassanāya
tika-s0201t:310_16: ca attābhinivesassa paṭipakkhabhāvato suññataṃ vimokkhaṃ paripūretīti āha “mohe…pe… vītamoho hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:311_0: Evaṃ santeti yadi vītarāgatādayo vimokkhavibhāgena vuttā, evaṃ sante. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-s0201t:311_1: vimokkhamukhavimokkhānaṃ vasena niyametvā na vuttaṃ, tasmā. Yaṃ kiñci arahato sambhavantaṃ
tika-s0201t:311_2: vibhajitvā vuccatīti vārattayadesanā katāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “yaṃ arahato”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:312_0: Evaṃ vimuttivibhāgena khīṇāsavassa vibhāgaṃ vārattayadesanānibandhanaṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-s0201t:312_1: avibhāgenapi tattha pariññāvisayassa anusayavisayassa ca vibhāgaṃ tassa nibandhanaṃ
tika-s0201t:312_2: dassento “avisesenā”tiādimāha. Tattha upekkhāvedanā visesato saṅkhāradukkhaṃ sammohādhiṭṭhānanti
tika-s0201t:315_0: 12. Yehi guṇavisesehi nimittabhūtehi bhagavati “tathāgato”ti ayaṃ samaññā pavattā,
tika-s0201t:315_1: taṃ dassanatthaṃ “aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Guṇanemittakāneva
tika-s0201t:318_0: Tathā āgatoti ettha ākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā-saddo. Sāmaññajotanā
tika-s0201t:318_1: hi visese avatiṭṭhatīti paṭipādagamanattho āgata-saddo, na ñāṇagamanattho “tathalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:318_2: āgato”tiādīsu viya, nāpi kāyagamanādiattho “āgato kho mahāsamaṇo, māgadhānaṃ giribbaja”ntiādīsu
tika-s0201t:318_3: viya. Tattha yadākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā-saddo, taṃ karuṇāppadhānattā
tika-s0201t:318_4: mahākaruṇāmukhena purimabuddhānaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ udāharaṇavasena sāmaññato dassento
tika-s0201t:318_5: yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ ekantasambandhabhāvato “yathā sabbaloka…pe… āgatā”ti sādhāraṇato vatvā
tika-s0201t:318_6: puna taṃ paṭipadaṃ mahāpadānasuttādīsu sambahulaniddesena supākaṭānaṃ āsannānañca
tika-s0201t:318_7: vipassīādīnaṃ channaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ vasena dassento “yathā vipassī bhagavā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:319_0: Evaṃ mahābhinīhāravasena “tathāgato”ti padassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni pāramīpūraṇavasena
tika-s0201t:319_1: dassetuṃ “atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā dānapāramiṃ pūretvā”tiādi
tika-s0201t:319_2: vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne suttantikānaṃ mahābodhiyānapaṭipadāya kosallajananatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:319_3: pāramīkathā vattabbā, sā pana sabbākārasampannā cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāya vitthārato
tika-s0201t:319_4: niddiṭṭhā, tasmā atthikehi tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Yathā pana pubbe vipassīādayo
tika-s0201t:319_5: sammāsambuddhā abhinīhārasampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhāya suvisuddhāya paṭipadāya anavasesato
tika-s0201t:319_6: sammadeva sabbā pāramiyo paripūresuṃ, evaṃ amhākampi bhagavā paripūresīti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:319_7: sandhāyāha “samattiṃ sapāramiyo pūretvā”ti. Satipi aṅgapariccāgādīnaṃ dānapāramibhāve
tika-s0201t:319_9: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ, tatoyeva ca aṅgapariccāgato visuṃ nayanapariccāgaggahaṇampi kataṃ,
tika-s0201t:320_1: pubbayogo, dānādīsuyeva sātisayapaṭipattinipphādanaṃ pubbacariyā, sā cariyāpiṭakasaṅgahitā.
tika-s0201t:320_2: Abhinīhāro pubbayogo, dānādipaṭipatti, kāyavivekavasena ekacariyā vā pubbacariyāti
tika-s0201t:320_3: keci. Dānādīnañceva appicchatādīnañca saṃsāranibbānesu ādīnavānisaṃsānañca vibhāvanavasena
tika-s0201t:320_4: sattānaṃ bodhittaye patiṭṭhāpanaparipācanavasena ca pavattā kathā dhammakkhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:320_5: ñātīnaṃ atthacariyā ñātatthacariyā, sāpi karuṇāya vaseneva. Ādi-saddena lokatthacariyādayo
tika-s0201t:320_8: sā pana atthato paññāpāramīyeva, ñāṇasambhāradassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Koṭīti pariyanto, ukkaṃsoti attho.
tika-s0201t:321_0: Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetvā brūhetvāti sambandho. Tattha bhāvetvāti uppādetvā.
tika-s0201t:321_1: Brūhetvāti vaḍḍhetvā. Satipaṭṭhānādiggahaṇena āgamanapaṭipadaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
tika-s0201t:321_2: dasseti. Vipassanāsahagatā eva vā satipaṭṭhānādayo daṭṭhabbā. Ettha ca “yena abhinīhārenā”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:322_0: Sampatijātoti muhuttajāto manussānaṃ hatthato muttamatto, na mātukucchito nikkhantamatto.
tika-s0201t:322_1: Nikkhantamattañhi mahāsattaṃ paṭhamaṃ brahmāno suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, tesaṃ
tika-s0201t:322_2: hatthato cattāro mahārājāno ajinappaveṇiyā, tesaṃ hatthato manussā dukūlacumbaṭakena
tika-s0201t:322_3: paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitoti. Yathāha bhagavā
tika-s0201t:322_4: mahāpadānadesanāyaṃ. Setamhi chatteti dibbasetacchatte. Anudhārīyamāneti dhārīyamāne.
tika-s0201t:322_5: Ettha ca chattaggahaṇeneva khaggādīni pañca kakudhabhaṇṭānipi vuttānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:322_7: ahesuṃ, chattādīniyeva ca tadā paññāyiṃsu, na chattādiggāhakā. Sabbā ca disāti dasapi
tika-s0201t:322_8: disā. Nayidaṃ sabbadisāvilokanaṃ sattapadavītihāruttarakālaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahāsatto
tika-s0201t:322_9: hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimadisaṃ olokesi. Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi
tika-s0201t:322_10: pūjayamānā “mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro”ti āhaṃsu. Evaṃ
tika-s0201t:322_11: catasso disā, catasso anudisā; heṭṭhā, uparīti sabbā disā anuviloketvā sabbattha
tika-s0201t:322_12: attanā sadisaṃ adisvā “ayaṃ uttarā disā”ti tattha sattapadavītihārena agamāsi. Āsabhinti
tika-s0201t:322_13: uttamaṃ. Aggoti sabbapaṭhamo. Jeṭṭho seṭṭhoti ca tasseva vevacanaṃ. Ayamantimā jāti,
tika-s0201t:322_14: natthi dāni punabbhavoti imasmiṃ attabhāve pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ byākāsi.
tika-s0201t:323: Anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvenāti saṃkhittena vuttamatthaṃ “yañhī”tiādinā vitthārato dasseti. Tattha etthāti –
tika-s0201t:328_0: Imissā gāthāya. Sabbaññutaññāṇameva sabbattha appaṭihatacāratāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti
tika-s0201t:328_1: āha “sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇapaṭilābhassā”ti. Tathā ayaṃ bhagavāpi gato…pe… pubbanimittabhāvenāti
tika-s0201t:328_2: etena abhijātiyaṃ dhammatāvasena uppajjanakavisesā sabbabodhisattānaṃ sādhāraṇāti
tika-s0201t:329_0: Vikkamīti agamāsi. Marūti devā. Samāti vilokanasamatāya samā sadisiyo. Mahāpuriso
tika-s0201t:329_1: hi yathā ekaṃ disaṃ vilokesi, evaṃ sesadisāpi, na katthaci vilokane vibandho tassa
tika-s0201t:329_2: ahosīti. Samāti vā viloketuṃ yuttā, visamarahitāti attho. Na hi tadā bodhisattassa
tika-s0201t:330_0: Evaṃ “tathā gato”ti kāyagamanaṭṭhena gata-saddena tathāgata-saddaṃ niddisitvā idāni
tika-s0201t:330_1: ñāṇagamanaṭṭhena taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādimāha. Tattha nekkhammenāti alobhappadhānena
tika-s0201t:330_2: kusalacittuppādena. Kusalā hi dhammā idha nekkhammaṃ, na pabbajjādayo, “paṭhamajjhāna”nti
tika-s0201t:330_3: ca vadanti. Pahāyāti pajahitvā. Gato adhigato, paṭipanno uttarivisesanti attho. Pahāyāti
tika-s0201t:330_4: vā pahānahetu, pahānalakkhaṇaṃ vā. Hetulakkhaṇattho hi ayaṃ pahāya-saddo. Kāmacchandādippahānahetukaṃ
tika-s0201t:330_5: “gato”ti hettha vuttaṃ gamanaṃ avabodho, paṭipatti eva vā kāmacchandādippahānena
tika-s0201t:330_6: ca lakkhīyatīti. Esa nayo padāletvātiādīsupi. Abyāpādenāti mettāya. Ālokasaññāyāti
tika-s0201t:330_7: vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitaālokasañcānanena. Avikkhepenāti samādhinā.
tika-s0201t:331_0: Evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttāya paṭhamajjhānassa
tika-s0201t:331_1: pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya bhagavato tathāgatabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni saha upāyena aṭṭhahi
tika-s0201t:331_2: samāpattīhi aṭṭhārasahi ca mahāvipassanāhi taṃ dassetuṃ “ñāṇenā”tiādimāha. Nāmarūpapariggahakaṅkhāvitaraṇānañhi
tika-s0201t:331_3: vinibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāyaṃ ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti,
tika-s0201t:331_4: tathā jhānasamāpattīsu abhiratinimittena pāmojjena. Tattha “anabhiratiyā vinoditāya
tika-s0201t:331_6: uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya avijjāya heṭṭhā nivaraṇesupi saṅgahadassanatthanti
tika-s0201t:331_8: ugghāṭetvā”ti. “Rattiṃ anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojetī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne
tika-s0201t:331_9: vitakkavicārā dhūmāyanāti adhippetāti āha “vitakkavicāradhūma”nti. Kiñcāpi paṭhamajjhānupacāreyeva
tika-s0201t:331_10: dukkhaṃ, catutthajjhānupacāre ca sukhaṃ pahīyati, atisayappahānaṃ pana sandhāyāha
tika-s0201t:332_0: Aniccassa, aniccanti ca anupassanā aniccānupassanā, tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
tika-s0201t:332_1: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Niccasaññanti saṅkhatadhammesu “niccā sassatā”ti
tika-s0201t:332_2: evaṃpavattamicchāsaññaṃ. Saññāsīsena diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-s0201t:332_3: ito paresupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbijjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
tika-s0201t:332_4: Nandinti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Virāgānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu virajjanākārena pavattāya
tika-s0201t:332_5: anupassanāya. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya. Yathā vā
tika-s0201t:332_6: saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena na uppajjanti, evaṃ anupassanā
tika-s0201t:332_7: nirodhānupassanā. Tenevāha “nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti, no samudetī”ti. Muccitukamyatā
tika-s0201t:332_8: hi ayaṃ balappattāti. Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā,
tika-s0201t:332_9: paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā hi ayaṃ. Ādānanti niccādivasena gahaṇaṃ. Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ
tika-s0201t:332_10: vasena ekattaggahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā. Āyūhanaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Avatthāvisesāpatti vipariṇāmo.
tika-s0201t:332_12: ca saṅkhārānaṃ saviggahaggahaṇaṃ. Paṇidhinti rāgādipaṇidhiṃ. Sā panatthato taṇhāvasena
tika-s0201t:333_1: asāresu sāraggahaṇavipallāsaṃ. Issarakuttādivasena loko samuppannoti abhiniveso sammohābhiniveso.
tika-s0201t:333_2: Keci pana “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānantiādinā pavattasaṃsayāpatti sammohābhiniveso”ti
tika-s0201t:333_4: vacanato ālayo taṇhā, sāyeva cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu ca abhinivisanavasena pavattiyā
tika-s0201t:333_5: ālayābhinivesoti keci. “Evaṃvidhā saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantī”ti pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanā.
tika-s0201t:333_6: Vaṭṭato vigatattā vivaṭṭaṃ, nibbānaṃ, tattha ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena anupassanena
tika-s0201t:333_7: pavattiyā vivaṭṭānupassanā, gotrabhū. Saṃyogābhinivesanti saṃyujjanavasena saṅkhāresu
tika-s0201t:333_8: nivisanaṃ. Diṭṭhekaṭṭheti diṭṭhiyā sahajātekaṭṭhe pahānekaṭṭhe ca. Oḷāriketi uparimaggavajjhakilese
tika-s0201t:333_9: apekkhitvā vuttaṃ, aññathā dassanena pahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehi oḷārikāti. Aṇusahagateti
tika-s0201t:333_10: aṇubhūte. Idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe apekkhitvā vuttaṃ. Sabbakileseti avasiṭṭhasabbakilese.
tika-s0201t:333_11: Na hi paṭhamādimaggehi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyantīti.
tika-s0201t:334_0: Kakkhaḷattaṃ kathinabhāvo. Paggharaṇaṃ dravabhāvo. Lokiyavāyunā bhastassa viya yena
tika-s0201t:334_1: vāyunā taṃtaṃkalāpassa uddhumāyanaṃ, thaddhabhāvo vā, taṃ vitthambhanaṃ. Vijjamānepi
tika-s0201t:334_3: ākāsoti yesaṃ yo paricchedo, tehi so asamphuṭṭhova, aññathā bhūtānaṃ paricchedasabhāvo
tika-s0201t:334_4: na siyā byāpībhāvāpattito, abyāpitāva asamphuṭṭhatāti yasmiṃ kalāpe bhūtānaṃ paricchedo,
tika-s0201t:334_5: tehi asamphuṭṭhabhāvo asamphuṭṭhalakkhaṇaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā ākāsadhātuniddese “asamphuṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0201t:335_1: cetanāvasenetaṃ vuttaṃ “saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇa”nti. Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye
tika-s0201t:335_3: ca cetanā. Yathāha “tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhāro? Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:335_4: Pharaṇaṃ savipphārikatā. Assaddhiyeti asaddhiyahetu. Nimittatthe bhummaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-s0201t:335_6: adhicitte pavattamāne paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāvaṭatāya ajjhupekkhanaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:336_0: Musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato pariggāhakasabhāvā
tika-s0201t:336_2: puggalaṃ pariggaṇhātīti tassā pariggāhalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Kāyikakiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:336_3: samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hotīti sammākammanta saṅkhātāya viratiyā
tika-s0201t:336_4: samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhāpanaṃ kāyikakiriyāya
tika-s0201t:336_5: bhārukkhipanaṃ viya. Jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā jīvitindriyappavattiyā,
tika-s0201t:336_6: ājīvasseva vā suddhi vodānaṃ. Sasampayuttadhammassa cittassa saṃkilesapakkhe patituṃ
tika-s0201t:337_0: “Saṅkhārā”ti idha cetanā adhippetāti vuttaṃ “saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇa”nti. Namanaṃ
tika-s0201t:337_1: ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvo. Āyatanaṃ pavattanaṃ. Āyatanānaṃ vasena hi āyasaṅkhātānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ
tika-s0201t:337_2: pavatti. Taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇanti vaṭṭassa janakahetubhāvo, maggassa pana nibbānasampāpakattanti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0201t:338: Tathalakkhaṇaṃ aviparītasabhāvo. Ekaraso aññamaññānativattanaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvo. Yuganaddhā samathavipassanāva. Saddhāpaññā paggahāvikkhepātipi vadanti.
tika-s0201t:339_0: Khīṇoti kilese khepatīti khayo, maggo. Anuppādapariyosānatāya anuppādo, phalaṃ. Passaddhi
tika-s0201t:339_1: kilesavūpasamo. Chandassāti kattukāmatāchandassa. Mūlalakkhaṇaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvo. Samuṭṭhānabhāvo
tika-s0201t:339_3: visayādisannipātena gahetabbākāro, yā saṅgatīti vuccati. Samaṃ saha odahanti anena
tika-s0201t:339_4: sampayuttadhammāti vā samodhānaṃ, phasso. Samosaranti sannipatanti etthāti samosaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:339_5: Vedanāya vinā appavattamānā sampayuttadhammā vedanānubhavananimittaṃ samosaṭā viya
tika-s0201t:339_6: hontīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Gopānasīnaṃ kūṭaṃ viya sampayuttānaṃ pāmokkhabhāvo pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:339_7: Tato, tesaṃ vā sampayuttadhammānaṃ uttari padhānanti tatuttari, paññuttarā hi kusalā
tika-s0201t:339_8: dhammā. Vimuttiyāti phalassa. Tañhi sīlādiguṇasārassa paramukkaṃsabhāvena sāraṃ.
tika-s0201t:339_10: āgatanayena ca katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi pubbe vuttopi koci dhammo pariyāyantarapakāsanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:339_11: puna dassito. Tato eva ca “chandamūlakā kusalā dhammā manasikārasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā
tika-s0201t:339_13: “nibbānogadhañhi āvuso brahmacariyaṃ nibbānapariyosāna”nti ca suttapadānaṃ vasena
tika-s0201t:340_0: Tathadhammā nāma cattāri ariyasaccāni aviparītasabhāvattā. Tathāni taṃsabhāvattā.
tika-s0201t:340_2: jātipaccayā sambhūtaṃ hutvā sahitassa attano paccayānurūpassa uddhaṃ āgatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:340_3: anupavattanaṭṭhoti attho. Atha vā sambhūtaṭṭho ca samudāgataṭṭho ca sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho,
tika-s0201t:340_4: na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotīti jātipaccayasambhūtaṭṭho.
tika-s0201t:340_5: Itthañca jātito samudāgacchatīti jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭho, yā yā jāti yathā yathā
tika-s0201t:340_6: paccayo hoti, tadanurūpaṃ pātubhāvoti attho. Avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭhoti etthāpi
tika-s0201t:340_7: na avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo na hoti, na ca avijjaṃ vinā saṅkhārā uppajjanti, yā
tika-s0201t:340_8: yā avijjā yesaṃ yesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ yathā yathā paccayo hoti, ayaṃ avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0201t:341_0: Bhagavā taṃ sabbākārato jānāti passatīti sambandho. Tenāti bhagavatā. Taṃ vibhajjamānanti
tika-s0201t:341_1: yojetabbaṃ. Tanti rupāyatanaṃ. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīti ādi-saddena majjhattaṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
tika-s0201t:341_3: “rūpāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ sutaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
tika-s0201t:341_4: mutaṃ, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ manasā viññāta”nti vacanato diṭṭhapadañca viññātapadañca rūpārammaṇe
tika-s0201t:341_5: labbhati, rūpārammaṇaṃ iṭṭhaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ majjhattaṃ parittaṃ atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ
tika-s0201t:341_6: ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā diṭṭhaṃ viññātaṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ rūpadhātu vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ
tika-s0201t:341_7: sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītakanti evamādīhi anekehi nāmehi.
tika-s0201t:342_0: Terasahi vārehīti rūpakaṇḍe āgate terasa niddesavāre sandhāyāha. Ekekasmiñca vāre
tika-s0201t:342_1: catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vavatthāpananayānaṃ vasena “dvepaññāsāya nayehī”ti āha. Tathameva
tika-s0201t:342_3: ñāṇappavattidassanena anāgatepi ñāṇappavatti vuttāyevāti daṭṭhabbā. Vidita-saddo
tika-s0201t:342_4: anāmaṭṭhakālaviseso veditabbo “diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta”ntiādīsu viya. Na upaṭṭhāsīti attattaniyavasena
tika-s0201t:342_5: na upagacchi. Yathā rūpārammaṇādayo dhammā yaṃsabhāvā yaṃpakārā ca, tathā ne passati
tika-s0201t:342_6: jānāti gacchatīti tathāgatoti evaṃ padasambhavo veditabbo. Keci pana “niruttinayena
tika-s0201t:342_7: pisodarādipakkhepena (pāṇini 6.3.109) vā dassi-saddassa lopaṃ, āgata-saddassa cāgamaṃ
tika-s0201t:343_0: Niddosatāya anupavajjaṃ. Pakkhipitabbābhāvena anūnaṃ. Apanetabbābhāvena anadhikaṃ.
tika-s0201t:343_2: byatirekena sampādeti. Tena yadatthaṃ bhāsitaṃ, ekantena tadatthanipphādanato yathā
tika-s0201t:343_3: bhāsitaṃ bhagavatā, tathevāti aviparītadesanataṃ dasseti. Gadaatthoti etena tathaṃ
tika-s0201t:343_4: gadatīti tathāgatoti da-kārassa ta-kāro kato niruttinayenāti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:344_0: Tathā gatamassāti tathāgato. Gatanti ca kāyavācāpavattīti attho. Tathāti ca vutte
tika-s0201t:344_1: yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ abyabhicārisambandhitāya yathāti ayamattho upaṭṭhitoyeva hoti, kāyavacīkiriyānañca
tika-s0201t:344_2: aññamaññānulomena vacanicchāyaṃ kāyassa vācā, vācāya ca kāyo sambandhībhāvena upatiṭṭhatīti
tika-s0201t:344_3: imamatthaṃ dassento āha “bhagavato hī”tiādi. Imasmiṃ pana atthe tathāvādītāya tathāgatoti
tika-s0201t:344_4: ayampi attho siddho hoti. So pana pubbe pakārantarena dassitoti āha “evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato”ti.
tika-s0201t:345_0: Tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsūti etena yadeke “tiriyaṃ viya upari adho ca santi
tika-s0201t:345_1: lokadhātuyo”ti vadanti, taṃ paṭisedheti. Desanāvilāsoyeva desanāvilāsamayo yathā
tika-s0201t:346: Nipātānaṃ vācakasaddasannidhāne tadatthajotanabhāvena pavattanato gata-saddoyeva avagatatthaṃ atītatthañca vadatīti āha “gatoti avagato atīto”ti.
tika-s0201t:347_0: Atha vā abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva sammāsambodhi, etthantare mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0201t:347_1: hānaṭṭhānasaṃkilesanivattīnaṃ abhāvato yathā paṇidhānaṃ, tathā gato abhinīhārānurūpaṃ
tika-s0201t:347_2: paṭipannoti tathāgato. Atha vā mahiddhikatāya paṭisambhidānaṃ ukkaṃsādhigamena anāvaraṇañāṇatāya
tika-s0201t:347_3: ca katthacipi paṭighātābhāvato yathā ruci, tathā kāyavacīcittānaṃ gatāni gamanāni
tika-s0201t:347_4: pavattiyo etassāti tathāgato. Yasmā ca loke vidha-yutta-gata-ppakāra-saddā samānatthā
tika-s0201t:347_5: dissanti. Tasmā yathāvidhā vipassīādayo bhagavanto, ayampi bhagavā tathāvidhoti tathāgato,
tika-s0201t:347_6: yathāyuttā ca te bhagavanto, ayampi bhagavā tathāyuttoti tathāgato. Atha vā yasmā
tika-s0201t:347_7: saccaṃ tacchaṃ tathanti ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā tathena ñāṇena āgatoti tathāgato.
tika-s0201t:372_0: Ārakattātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho visuddhimagge buddhānussatisaṃvaṇṇanāya vuttanayeneva
tika-s0201t:372_1: veditabbo. Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattāti imināssa paropadesarahitassa
tika-s0201t:373_0: Nanu ca sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ, aññathā cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni buddhañāṇānīti
tika-s0201t:373_1: vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti? Na virujjhati visayappavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇañāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:373_2: ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā. Ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammavisayatāya
tika-s0201t:373_3: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgacāramupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti
tika-s0201t:373_4: vuttaṃ. Yathāha paṭisambhidāyaṃ “sabbaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatamanavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:373_5: tatthāvaraṇaṃ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntiādi, tasmā natthi nesaṃ atthato bhedo, ekantena
tika-s0201t:373_6: cetaṃ evamicchitabbaṃ, aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ sāvaraṇatā asabbadhammārammaṇatā
tika-s0201t:373_7: ca āpajjeyya. Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumatampi āvaraṇaṃ atthi, anāvaraṇañāṇassa
tika-s0201t:373_8: ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṃ nappavattati, tatthāvaraṇasabbhāvato anāvaraṇabhāvoyeva
tika-s0201t:373_9: na siyā. Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇato, idha pana sabbattha
tika-s0201t:373_10: appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṃ, tassa cādhigamena
tika-s0201t:373_11: bhagavā sabbaññū sabbavidū sammāsambuddhoti ca vuccati, na sakimeva sabbadhammāvabodhato.
tika-s0201t:373_12: Tathā ca vuttaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā
tika-s0201t:373_13: mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti. Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena
tika-s0201t:373_14: hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṃ samatthatā ahosīti.
tika-s0201t:374_0: Etthāha – kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, udāhu
tika-s0201t:374_1: kamenāti. Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, atītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhādibhedena
tika-s0201t:374_2: bhinnānaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato
tika-s0201t:374_3: cittapaṭaṃ avekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā, tathā ca sati “sabbe
tika-s0201t:374_4: dhammā anattā”ti vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbe dhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato
tika-s0201t:374_5: ñāṇassa visayā hontīti āpajjati. Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ
tika-s0201t:374_6: sabbakālaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tena te sabbavidūti vuccanti. Evañca katvā
tika-s0201t:374_7: ‘caraṃ samāhito nāgo, tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṃ suvuttaṃ hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0201t:374_9: tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā, tasmā sakiṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.
tika-s0201t:375_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattati, evampi na yujjati. Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena
tika-s0201t:375_1: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne neyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho
tika-s0201t:375_2: sambhavati apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa. Ye pana “atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa
tika-s0201t:375_3: ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
tika-s0201t:375_4: tañca ñāṇaṃ ananumānikaṃ saṃsayābhāvato. Saṃsayānubandhañhi loke anumānañāṇa”nti
tika-s0201t:375_5: vadanti, tesampi taṃ na yuttaṃ. Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthassa avisaṃvādanena
tika-s0201t:375_6: ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
tika-s0201t:375_7: Yañhi taṃ sesaṃ, taṃ appaccakkhanti. Atha tampi paccakkhaṃ, tassa sesabhāvo eva na
tika-s0201t:375_8: siyāti? Sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā? Avisayavicāraṇabhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
tika-s0201t:375_9: “buddhavisayo bhikkhave, acinteyyo na cintetabbo, yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa
tika-s0201t:375_10: bhāgī assā”ti. Idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ – yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ sakalamekadeso
tika-s0201t:375_11: vā, tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya paccakkhato ñāṇaṃ pavattati, niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato,
tika-s0201t:375_12: ñātuṃ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā,
tika-s0201t:375_13: ekanteneva ca sā icchitabbā “sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanapaṭibaddhā
tika-s0201t:376_0: Nanu ca etasmimpi pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ, tadā sakiṃyeva sakalavisayatāya
tika-s0201t:376_1: anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānativattiyevāti? Na, tassa
tika-s0201t:376_2: visodhitattā. Visodhito hi so buddhavisayo acinteyyoti. Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya
tika-s0201t:376_3: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā, tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi
tika-s0201t:376_4: taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha
tika-s0201t:376_5: acinteyyaṃ, anantañca ñāṇaṃ ñeyyaṃ viya. Vuttañhetaṃ “yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ
tika-s0201t:376_6: ñāṇaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ. Ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ
tika-s0201t:376_7: ñeyya”nti. Evamekajjhaṃ, visuṃ sakiṃ, kamena vā icchānurūpaṃ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:377_0: Tanti yathāvuttaṃ pathavīādibhedaṃ. Pariññātanti parito samantato sabbākārato ñātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:377_1: taṃ parijānitabbabhāvaṃ kiñci asesetvā ñātanti attho. Ayameva hi attho “pariññātanta”nti
tika-s0201t:377_2: imināpi padena pakāsitoti dassento “pariññātantaṃ nāmā”tiādimāha. Tena tena maggena
tika-s0201t:377_3: kilesappahānena viseso natthīti idaṃ taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesānaṃ buddhānaṃ sāvakānañca
tika-s0201t:377_4: tena tena maggeneva pahātabbabhāvasāmaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na sāvakehi buddhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:377_5: kilesappahānavisesābhāvato. Tathā hi sammāsambuddhā eva savāsanakilese jahanti, na
tika-s0201t:377_7: hi catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanā samijjhati. Tenevāha – “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare
tika-s0201t:377_8: sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca paññapemī”tiādi. Aṇuppamāṇampi
tika-s0201t:377_9: …pe… natthi, yato chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena buddhānaṃ mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pavattatīti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:380_0: 13. Purimataṇhāti purimataresu bhavesu nibbattā paccuppannattabhāvahetubhūtā taṇhā.
tika-s0201t:380_1: Taggahaṇeneva ca atītaddhasaṅgahā avijjāsaṅkhārā saddhiṃ upādānena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:380_2: Etthāti “bhavā jātī”ti etasmiṃ pade. Tena upapattibhavenāti “bhavā jātī”ti jātisīsena
tika-s0201t:380_3: vuttaupapattibhavena. Bhūtassāti nibbattassa. So pana yasmā satto nāma hoti, tasmā
tika-s0201t:380_4: vuttaṃ “sattassā”ti. Evañca jānitvāti iminā “bhūtassa jarāmaraṇa”nti etthāpi “iti
tika-s0201t:380_5: viditvā”ti idaṃ padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:381_0: Yadipi tebhūmakā upādānakkhandhā “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitabbā
tika-s0201t:381_1: sammasitabbā ca, te pana yasmā bhagavatā “kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā
tika-s0201t:381_2: jarāmaraṇa”ntiādinā paṭiccasamuppādamukhena sammasitā, paṭiccasamuppādo ca pavattipavattihetubhāvato
tika-s0201t:381_4: vibhāvento “yaṃ bodhirukkhamūle…pe… dassento”ti āha. Saṃkhippanti ettha avijjādayo
tika-s0201t:381_5: viññāṇādayo cāti saṅkhepā, atīte hetuādayo “hetu, phala”nti evaṃ saṃkhippantīti vā
tika-s0201t:381_6: saṅkhepā, avijjādayo viññāṇādayo ca. Saṅkhepa-saddo bhāgādhivacananti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:381_7: Tenāha “koṭṭhāsāti attho”ti. Te pana atīte hetusaṅkhepo, etarahi phalasaṅkhepo, etarahi
tika-s0201t:381_8: hetusaṅkhepo, āyatiṃ phalasaṅkhepoti cattāro saṅkhepā etassāti catusaṅkhepo, taṃ
tika-s0201t:381_9: catusaṅkhepaṃ. Hetuphalasandhi, phalahetusandhi, puna hetuphalasandhīti evaṃ tayo
tika-s0201t:381_10: sandhī etassāti tisandhi, taṃ tisandhiṃ. Atītapaccuppannānāgatabhedā tayo addhā etassāti
tika-s0201t:381_11: tiyaddho, taṃ tiyaddhaṃ. Sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅkhepe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi
tika-s0201t:381_12: pakāsīyantīti ākārā, atītahetuādīnaṃ vā pakārā ākārā, te ekekasaṅkhepe pañca pañca
tika-s0201t:381_13: katvā vīsati ākārā etassāti vīsatākāro, taṃ vīsatākāraṃ.
tika-s0201t:382_0: Esa sabboti esa catusaṅkhepādipabhedo anavaseso paccayo. Paccayalakkhaṇenāti paccayabhāvena
tika-s0201t:382_1: attano phalassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayabhāvena, avinābhāvalakkhaṇenāti attho.
tika-s0201t:382_2: Yathā hi taṇhaṃ vinā avijjādayo viññāṇassa paccayā na honti, evaṃ taṇhāpi avijjādike
tika-s0201t:382_4: ca taṇhāsaṅkhārupādānānaṃ gahitatā vuttanayā evāti na uddhaṭā.
tika-s0201t:383_0: Idāni te vīsati ākāre paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiyā vibhāvetuṃ “evamete”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0201t:383_1: purimakammabhavasminti purime kammabhave, atītajātiyaṃ kammabhave kayiramāneti attho.
tika-s0201t:383_2: Moho avijjāti yo tadā dukkhādīsu moho, yena mūḷho kammaṃ karoti, sā avijjā. Āyūhanā
tika-s0201t:383_3: saṅkhārāti taṃ taṃ kammaṃ karonto dānupakaraṇādi sajjanādivasena yā purimacetanāyo,
tika-s0201t:383_4: te saṅkhārā. Paṭiggāhakānaṃ pana hatthe deyyadhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpayato cetanā bhavo.
tika-s0201t:383_5: Ekāvajjanajavanesu vā purimā cetanā āyūhanā saṅkhārā, sattamā bhavo. Yā kāci vā pana
tika-s0201t:383_6: cetanā bhavo, sampayuttā āyūhanā saṅkhārā. Nikanti taṇhāti yaṃ kammaṃ karontassa
tika-s0201t:383_7: upapattibhave tassa phalassa nikāmanā patthanā, sā taṇhā nāma. Upagamanaṃ upādānanti
tika-s0201t:383_8: yaṃ kammabhavassa paccayabhūtaṃ “idaṃ kammaṃ katvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kāme sevissāmi
tika-s0201t:383_9: ucchijjissāmī”tiādinā nayena pavattaṃ upagamanaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ, idaṃ upādānaṃ
tika-s0201t:383_10: nāma. Cetanā bhavoti dvīsu atthavikappesu vuttassa āyūhanassa avasāne vuttacetanā,
tika-s0201t:383_11: tatiye pana āyūhanasampayuttacetanā bhavo. Iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:383_12: idha paṭisandhiyā paccayāti ime yathāvuttā mohādayo pañca dhammā atītakammabhavasiddhā
tika-s0201t:384_0: Idha paṭisandhiviññāṇanti yaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena uppannattā paṭisandhīti
tika-s0201t:384_1: vuccati, taṃ viññāṇaṃ. Okkanti nāmarūpanti yā gabbhe rūpārūpadhammānaṃ okkanti āgantvā
tika-s0201t:384_2: pavisantī viya, idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ. Pasādo āyatananti idaṃ cakkhādipañcāyatanavasena
tika-s0201t:384_3: vuttaṃ. Phuṭṭho phassoti yo ārammaṇaṃ phuṭṭho phusanto uppanno, ayaṃ phasso. Vedayitaṃ
tika-s0201t:384_4: vedanāti yaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇena vā saḷāyatanapaccayena vā phassena sahuppannaṃ vipākavedayitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:384_5: sā vedanā. Iti ime…pe… paccayāti ime viññāṇādayo pañca koṭṭhāsikā dhammā purimabhave
tika-s0201t:384_6: katassa kammassa kammavaṭṭassa paccayā, paccayabhāvato taṃ paṭicca idha etarahi upapattibhavasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:385_0: Idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ mohoti paripakkāyatanassa kammakaraṇakāle asammohaṃ
tika-s0201t:385_1: dasseti. Daharassa hi cittappavatti bhavaṅgabahulā yebhuyyena bhavantarajanakakammāyūhanasamatthā
tika-s0201t:385_2: na hotīti. Kammakaraṇakāleti ca iminā sabbo kammassa paccayabhūto sammoho gahito,
tika-s0201t:386_0: Padayojanāyāti “tasmā”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ sambandhena saha. Atthanigamananti imasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:386_1: aṭṭhamavāre desanatthanigamanaṃ. Nandīti evaṃ vuttānaṃ sabbataṇhānanti “nandī dukkhassa
tika-s0201t:386_2: mūla”nti evaṃ nandanatthasāmaññato ekavacanena vuttānaṃ sabbataṇhānaṃ santānārammaṇasampayuttadhammappavattiākārādibhedena
tika-s0201t:386_5: pahānakiccassa sādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññato gahaṇaṃ etaṃ khayādivacananti attho. Tesaṃ pana
tika-s0201t:386_6: maggānaṃ kamena pavattanaṃ kiccakameneva dassetuṃ “virāgā”tiādi vuttanti dassento
tika-s0201t:386_7: “tato…pe… yojetabba”nti āha. Tathā satipi khayādisaddānaṃ pahānapariyāyabhāve pahātabbāya
tika-s0201t:386_8: pana visayabhedabhinnāya taṇhāya anavasesato pahīnabhāvadīpanatthaṃ khayādipariyāyantaraggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:386_10: tappahānadīpanaṃ katvā vuccamānaṃ khayādivacanaṃ na kathañci dhammataṃ vilometīti
tika-s0201t:387_0: Uttaravirahitanti attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthattā uttarena adhikena virahitaṃ. Ayañcassa
tika-s0201t:387_1: uttaravirahatā attano seṭṭhabhāvenāti āha “sabbaseṭṭha”nti. Yathā sammā-saṃ-saddā
tika-s0201t:387_2: “aviparītaṃ, sāma”nti imesaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ vadanti, evaṃ pāsaṃsasobhanatthepīti
tika-s0201t:387_3: āha “sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhi”nti. Bujjhi ettha paṭivijjhi
tika-s0201t:387_4: cattāri ariyasaccāni, sabbampi vā neyyanti rukkho bodhi, bujjhati etenāti pana maggo
tika-s0201t:387_5: bodhi, tathā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, nibbānaṃ pana bujjhitabbato bodhīti ayamettha sādhanavibhāgo
tika-s0201t:387_6: daṭṭhabbo. Paṇṇattiyampi attheva bodhi-saddo “bodhirājakumāro”tiādīsu. Apareti sārasamāsācariyā.
tika-s0201t:387_7: Ettha ca saupasaggassa bodhi-saddassa atthuddhāre anupasaggānaṃ udāharaṇe kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0201t:388_0: Lokuttarabhāvato vā tatthāpi heṭṭhimamaggānaṃ viya tatuttarimaggābhāvato ca “siyā
tika-s0201t:388_1: nu kho anuttarā bodhī”ti āsaṅkaṃ sandhāya taṃ vidhamituṃ “sāvakāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:388_2: Abhinīhārasampattiyā phalavisesabhūtehi ñāṇavisesehi ekaccehi sakalehi saddhiṃ samijjhamāno
tika-s0201t:388_3: maggo ariyānaṃ taṃ taṃ ñāṇavisesādiṃ dento viya hotīti tassa asabbaguṇadāyakattaṃ
tika-s0201t:388_5: vasena arahattamaggo anuttarā bodhi nāma hotīti dasseti. Sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ aññehi
tika-s0201t:388_6: sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ mahāsāvakānaṃyeva āveṇikaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Paccekaṃ saccāni buddhavantoti
tika-s0201t:388_7: paccekabuddhā. Nanu ca sabbepi ariyā paccekameva saccāni paṭivijjhanti dhammassa
tika-s0201t:388_8: paccattaṃ vedanīyabhāvatoti? Saccaṃ, nayidamīdisaṃ paṭivedhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, yathā
tika-s0201t:388_9: pana sāvakā aññasannissayena saccāni paṭivijjhanti paratoghosena vinā tesaṃ dassanamaggassa
tika-s0201t:388_10: anuppajjanato, yathā ca sammāsambuddho aññesaṃ nissayabhāvena saccāni abhisambujjhanti,
tika-s0201t:388_11: na evamete, ete pana aparaneyyā hutvā apariṇāyakabhāvena saccāni paṭivijjhanti. Tena
tika-s0201t:389_0: Itīti karīyati uccārīyatīti itikāro, iti-saddo. Kāraṇattho aniyamarūpenāti adhippāyo,
tika-s0201t:389_1: tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “yasmā cā”ti. Pubbe pana iti-saddaṃ pakāratthaṃ katvā
tika-s0201t:389_2: “evaṃ jānitvā”ti vuttaṃ, idhāpi taṃ pakāratthameva katvā atho yujjati. Kathaṃ? Viditvāti
tika-s0201t:389_3: hi padaṃ hetuatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ “paññāya cassa disvā”ti, “ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hotī”ti
tika-s0201t:389_4: ca evamādīsu viya, tasmā pakāratthepi iti-sadde paṭiccasamuppādassa viditattāti ayaṃ
tika-s0201t:389_5: attho labbhateva. Paṭiccasamuppādaṃ viditvāti etthāpi hetuatthe viditvā-sadde yathāvuttā
tika-s0201t:389_6: atthayojanā yujjateva. Ettha ca paṭhamavikappe paṭiccasamupādassa viditatthaṃ maññanābhāvassa
tika-s0201t:389_7: kāraṇaṃ vatvā taṇhāmūlakassa paṭiccasamuppādassa dassitattā ettha taṇhāppahānaṃ sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0201t:389_8: adhigamanakāraṇaṃ uddhatanti dassitaṃ, tasmā “pathaviṃ na maññatī”tiādi nigamanaṃ
tika-s0201t:389_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dutiyavikappe pana paṭiccasamuppādavedanaṃ taṇhāppahānassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:389_10: taṃ abhisambodhiyā abhisambodhimaññanābhāvassāti ayamattho dassitoti ayametesaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-s0201t:389_11: atthavikappānaṃ viseso, tasmā “nandī dukkhassa mūla”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:390: Taṃ kuto labbhatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yattha yattha hī”tiādi. Sāsanayutti ayaṃ sāsanepi evaṃ sambandho dissatīti katvā. Lokepi hi yaṃ-taṃ-saddānaṃ abyabhicārisambandhatā siddhā.
tika-s0201t:391: Evaṃ abhisambuddhoti vadāmīti abhisambuddhabhāvassa gahitattā, asabbaññunā evaṃ desetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca “sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dassento”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:392_2: desanāvilāsena ca yuttaṃ. Yathā te na jānanti, tathā desesīti imināpi bhagavato desanāvilāsaṃyeva
tika-s0201t:392_3: vibhāveti. Taṃyeva kira pathavinti ettha pathavīgahaṇaṃ upalakkhaṇamattaṃ āpādivasenapi,
tika-s0201t:392_4: tathā “kīdisā nu kho idha pathavī adhippetā, kasmā ca bhūtarūpāniyeva gahitāni, na
tika-s0201t:392_5: sesarūpānī”tiādināpi tesaṃ saṃsayuppatti niddhāretabbā. Atha vā kathaṃ nāmidanti
tika-s0201t:392_6: ettha iti-saddo pakārattho. Tena imasmiṃ sutte sabbāyapi tesaṃ saṃsayuppattiyā pariggahitattā
tika-s0201t:392_7: daṭṭhabbā. Antanti mariyādaṃ, desanāya antaṃ paricchedanti attho, yo anusandhīti
tika-s0201t:392_8: vuccati. Koṭinti pariyantaṃ, desanāya pariyosānanti attho. Ubhayena sutte ajjhāsayānusandhi
tika-s0201t:393_0: Antarākathāti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārauddesaparipucchādīnaṃ antarā aññā ekā tathā. Vippakathāti
tika-s0201t:393_1: aniṭṭhitā sikhaṃ appattā. Kaṅkhaṇānurūpenāti tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitānaṃ
tika-s0201t:393_2: bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpena. Idanti idāni vuccamānaṃ mūlapariyāyajātakaṃ.
tika-s0201t:394_0: Disāpāmokkhoti paṇḍitabhāvena sabbadisāsu pamukhabhūto. Brāhmaṇoti brahmaṃ aṇatīti
tika-s0201t:394_1: brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho. Tiṇṇaṃ vedānanti iruveda-yajuveda-sāmavedānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:394_2: Pāragūti atthaso byañjanaso ca pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gato. Saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena
tika-s0201t:394_3: cāti sanighaṇḍukeṭubhā, tesaṃ. Nighaṇḍūti rukkhādīnaṃ vevacanappakāsakaṃ satthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:394_4: Keṭubhanti kiriyākappavikappo, kavīnaṃ upakārāvahaṃ satthaṃ. Saha akkharappabhedenāti
tika-s0201t:394_5: sākkharappabhedā, tesaṃ, sikkhāniruttisahitānanti attho. Itihāsapañcamānanti āthabbaṇavedaṃ
tika-s0201t:394_6: catutthaṃ katvā “itiha asa, itiha asā”ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto
tika-s0201t:394_7: itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā, tesaṃ. Padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ kāyati
tika-s0201t:394_8: ajjheti vedeti cāti padako, veyyākaraṇo. Lokāyataṃ vuccati vitaṇḍasatthaṃ. Mahāpurisānaṃ
tika-s0201t:394_9: buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpanagantho mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ. Tesu anūno paripūrakārīti anavayo.
tika-s0201t:395_0: Manteti vede. Yadipi vedo “manto, brahmaṃ, kappo”ti tividho, manto eva pana mūlavedo,
tika-s0201t:395_1: tadatthavivaraṇaṃ brahmaṃ, tattha vuttanayena yaññakiriyāvidhānaṃ kappo. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:395_2: “manteti vede”ti. Paṇḍitāti paññāvanto. Tathā hi te puthupaññātāya bahuṃ sahassadvisahassādiparimāṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:395_3: ganthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā gaṇhanti uggaṇhanti, javanapaññatāya lahuṃ sīghaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-s0201t:395_4: tikkhapaññatāya suṭṭhu avirajjhantā upadhārenti, satinepakkasampattiyā gahitañca
tika-s0201t:395_5: nesaṃ na vinassati na sammussatīti. Sabbampi sippanti aṭṭhārasavijjāṭṭhānādibhedaṃ
tika-s0201t:395_6: sikkhitabbaṭṭhena sippanti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ sabbaṃ bāhirakasatthaṃ mokkhāvahasammatampi
tika-s0201t:395_7: na mokkhaṃ āvahatīti āha “diṭṭhadhammasamparāyahita”nti. Sampiṇḍitā hutvāti yathā
tika-s0201t:395_8: mittā, tathā piṇḍitavasena sannipatitā hutvā. “Evaṃ gayhamāne ādinā virujjheyya,
tika-s0201t:395_9: evaṃ antenā”ti cintentā ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa pubbenāparaṃ aviruddhaṃ nicchayaṃ
tika-s0201t:395_10: gahetuṃ asakkontā na ādiṃ, na antaṃ addasaṃsu.
tika-s0201t:396_0: Lomasānīti lomavantāni, ghanakesamassuvānīti attho. Kesāpi hi lomaggahaṇena gayhanti
tika-s0201t:396_1: yathā “lomanakhaṃ phusitvā suddhi kātabbā”ti. Kaṇṇaṃ viyāti kaṇṇaṃ, paññā, tāya sutvā
tika-s0201t:397: Yasmā sattānaṃ gacchante gacchante kāle āyuvaṇṇādiparikkhayo hoti, tasmā taṃ kālena kataṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ “nesaṃ āyu…pe… khādatīti vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:398_0: Abhiññāyāti kusalādibhedaṃ khandhādibhedañca desetabbaṃ dhammaṃ, veneyyānañca āsayānusayacariyāvimuttiādibhedaṃ,
tika-s0201t:398_1: tassa ca nesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ yāthāvato abhijānitvā. Dhammaṃ desemīti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikanibbānahitāvahaṃ
tika-s0201t:398_2: saddhammaṃ kathayāmi. No anabhiññāyāti yathā bāhirakā asammāsambuddhattā vuttavidhiṃ
tika-s0201t:398_3: ajānantāyaṃ kiñci takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ kathenti, evaṃ
tika-s0201t:398_4: na desemīti attho. Sanidānanti sakāraṇaṃ, veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vā pucchāya
tika-s0201t:398_5: vā aṭṭhuppattiyā vā sanimittaṃ hetuudāharaṇasahitañcāti attho. Sappāṭihāriyanti sanissaraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:398_6: sappaṭiharaṇaṃ, paccanīkapaṭiharaṇena sappāṭihāriyameva katvā desemīti attho. Apare
tika-s0201t:398_8: pana desanā natthīti. Hitūpadesanā ovādo, sā eva anusāsanī. Anotiṇṇavatthuvisayo
tika-s0201t:398_9: vā ovādo, otiṇṇavatthuvisayā anusāsanī. Paṭhamūpadeso vā ovādo, itarā anusāsanī.
tika-s0201t:398_10: Alañca panāti yuttameva. Niṭṭhamagamāsīti atthasiddhiṃ gatā.
tika-s0201t:402_0: Idāni pakaraṇanayena pāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Sā panāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yasmā
tika-s0201t:402_1: desanāya samuṭṭhānapayojanabhājanesu piṇḍatthesu ca niddhāritesu sutarā hoti suviññeyyā
tika-s0201t:402_2: ca, tasmā suttadesanāya samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamaṃ niddhārayissāma. Tattha samuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:402_3: tāva pariyattiṃ nissāya mānuppādo, payojanaṃmānamaddanaṃ. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:402_5: puthujjanassa sekkhādiariyassa ca saddhiṃ hetunā maññanāmaññanavasena pavattivibhāgānavabodho
tika-s0201t:402_6: samuṭṭhānaṃ, yathāvuttavibhāgāvabodho payojanaṃ, veneyyānañhi vuttappakāre visaye
tika-s0201t:402_7: yathāvuttānaṃ puggalānaṃ saddhiṃ hetunā maññanāmaññanavasena pavattivibhāgāvabodho payojanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:403_0: Apica samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma desanānidānaṃ. Taṃ sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0201t:403_1: sādhāraṇampi ajjhattikabāhirabhedato duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ ajjhattikasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:403_2: nāma lokanāthassa mahākaruṇā. Tāya hi samussāhitassa bhagavato veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya
tika-s0201t:403_3: cittaṃ udapādi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sattesu ca kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā
tika-s0201t:403_4: lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi. Ettha ca hetāvatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva
tika-s0201t:403_6: ca mahākaruṇā, evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dasabalañāṇādīni ca desanāya abbhantarasamuṭṭhānabhāve
tika-s0201t:403_7: vattabbāni. Sabbampi hi ñeyyadhammaṃ, tesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ, sattānañca āsayānusayādiṃ
tika-s0201t:403_8: yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vicittanayadesanaṃ
tika-s0201t:403_9: pavattesīti. Bāhiraṃ pana sādhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ dasasahassabrahmaparivāritassa sahampatimahābrahmuno
tika-s0201t:403_11: paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi. Asādhāraṇampi ambhantarabāhirabhedato
tika-s0201t:403_12: duvidhameva. Tattha abbhantaraṃ yāya mahākaruṇāya yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0201t:403_13: pavattitaṃ, tadubhayaṃ veditabbaṃ. Bāhiraṃ pana pañcasatānaṃ brāhmaṇajātikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0201t:403_14: pariyattiṃ nissāya mānuppādanaṃ, vuttameva taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:404_0: Payojanampi sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ anukkamena yāva
tika-s0201t:404_1: anupādāparinibbānaṃ vimuttirasattā bhagavato desanāya. Tenevāha “etadatthā tathā,
tika-s0201t:404_2: etadatthā mantanā”tiādi. Eteneva ca saṃsāracakkanivatti saddhammacakkappavatti sassatādimicchāvādanirākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:404_6: buddhadhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīnampi payojanānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Asādhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:404_7: pana tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mānamaddanaṃ. Vuttañcetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “desanākusalo bhagavā
tika-s0201t:404_9: Sace pana veneyyasantānagatampi desanābalasiddhisaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanabhāvato
tika-s0201t:404_10: yathādhippetatthasiddhiyā yathākāruṇikassa bhagavatopi payojanamevāti gaṇheyya, iminā
tika-s0201t:405_0: Apica veneyyānaṃ pathavīādibhūtādivibhāgabhinne sakkāye puthujjanassa sekkhādiariyassa
tika-s0201t:405_1: ca saddhiṃ hetunā maññanāmaññanavasena pavattivibhāgānavabodho samuṭṭhānaṃ, imassa
tika-s0201t:405_2: suttassa yathāvuttavibhāgāvabodho payojananti vuttovāyamattho. Veneyyānañhi vuttappakāre
tika-s0201t:405_3: visaye yathāvuttānaṃ puggalānaṃ saddhiṃ hetunā maññanāmaññanānaṃ vasena pavattivibhāgāvabodho
tika-s0201t:405_4: imaṃ desanaṃ payojeti “tannipphādanaparāyaṃ desanā”ti katvā. Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:405_5: phalaṃ, taṃ ākaṅkhitabbattā desakaṃ desanāya payojetīti payojananti vuccati. Tathā
tika-s0201t:405_6: veneyyānaṃ sabbaso ekadesato ca maññanānaṃ appahānaṃ, tattha ca ādīnavādassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:405_7: niraṅkusānaṃ maññanānaṃ anekākāravohārassa sakkāye pavattivisesassa ajānanaṃ, tattha
tika-s0201t:405_8: ca pahīnamaññanānaṃ paṭipattiyā ajānanaṃ, taṇhāmukhena paccayākārassa ca anavabodhoti
tika-s0201t:406_2: ca veneyyā imissā desanāya bhājanaṃ. Piṇḍatthā pana “assutavā”tiādinā ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro
tika-s0201t:406_7: evamādayo dīpitā honti. “Pathaviṃ pathavito sañjānātī”tiādinā taṇhāvicaritaniddeso
tika-s0201t:406_8: mānajappanā vipariyesābhiniveso saṃkileso sakkāyapariggaho bālalakkhaṇāpadeso vaṅkattayavibhāvanānuyogo
tika-s0201t:406_9: bahukārapaṭipakkhadīpanā tividhanissayasaṃsūcanā āsavakkhayakathananti evamādayo dīpitā honti.
tika-s0201t:409_0: Tattha ye upādānakkhandhadhamme upādāya pathavīādibhūtādibhedā paññatti, te paññattipaṭipādanabhāvena
tika-s0201t:409_1: jātijarāmaraṇavisesanadukkhapariyāyena ca vuttā taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-s0201t:409_2: Maññanābhinandananandīpariyāyehi vuttā taṇhā samudayasaccaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva suttantanayo.
tika-s0201t:409_3: Abhidhammanaye pana yathāvuttataṇhāya saddhiṃ “assutavā”tiādinā dīpitā avijjādayo,
tika-s0201t:409_4: maññanāpariyāyena gahitā mānadiṭṭhiyo, bhavapadena gahito kammabhavo cāti sabbepi
tika-s0201t:409_5: kilesābhisaṅkhārā samudayasaccaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ. Ariyadhammaggahaṇena,
tika-s0201t:409_7: maggasaccaṃ. Keci pana taṇhākkhayādivacanehi nirodhasaccaṃ uddharanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0201t:410_0: Tattha samudayena assādo, dukkhena ādīnavo, magganirodhehi nissaraṇaṃ, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0201t:410_2: Tassa nipphattikāraṇattā desanāya vicittatā catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ yāthāvato sabhāvūpadhāraṇañca
tika-s0201t:410_3: upāyo, pathavīādīsu puthujjanādīnaṃ pavattidassanāpadesena pathavīādayo ekantato
tika-s0201t:410_4: parijānitabbā, maññanā ca pahātabbāti ayamettha bhagavato āṇattīti. Ayaṃ desanāhāro.
tika-s0201t:412_0: Maññanānaṃ sakkāyassa avisesahetubhāvato, kassacipi tattha asesitabbato ca sabbagahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:412_1: sabhāvadhāraṇato nissattanijjīvato ca dhammaggahaṇaṃ, patiṭṭhābhāvato āveṇikahetubhāvato
tika-s0201t:412_2: ca mūlaggahaṇaṃ, kāraṇabhāvato desanatthasambhavato ca pariyāyaggahaṇaṃ, sammukhabhāvato
tika-s0201t:412_4: ca “bhikkhave”ti ālapanaṃ. Desetuṃ samatthabhāvato tesaṃ satuppādanatthañca “desessāmī”ti
tika-s0201t:412_5: paṭijānanaṃ, desetabbatāya paṭiññātabhāvato, yathāpaṭiññañca desanato “ta”nti paccāmasanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:412_6: sotabbabhāvato, savanatthassa ca ekantena nipphādanato “suṇāthā”ti vuttaṃ. Sakkātabbato,
tika-s0201t:412_7: sakkaccakiriyāya eva ca tadatthasiddhito “sādhuka”nti vuttaṃ. Dhammassa manasikaraṇīyato
tika-s0201t:412_8: tadadhīnattā ca sabbasampattīnaṃ “manasi karothā”ti vuttaṃ yathāpariññātāya desanāya
tika-s0201t:412_9: paribyattabhāvato vitthāratthasambhavato ca “bhāsissāmī”ti vuttaṃ. Bhagavato sadevakena
tika-s0201t:412_10: lokena sirasā sampaṭicchitabbavacanattā, tassa ca yathādhippetatthasādhanato “eva”nti
tika-s0201t:412_11: vuttaṃ. Satthu uttamagāravaṭṭhānabhāvato, tattha ca gāravassa uḷārapuññabhāvato “bhante”ti
tika-s0201t:412_12: vuttaṃ. Bhikkhūnaṃ tathākiriyāya nicchitabhāvato vacanālaṅkārato ca “kho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:412_13: Savanassa paṭijānitabbato, tathā tehi paṭipannattā ca “paccassosu”nti vuttaṃ paccakkhabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:413_0: Vuccamānassa puggalassa lokapariyāpannattā lokādhārattā ca lokaṃ upādāya “idhā”ti
tika-s0201t:413_2: Puthūsu, puthu vā janabhāvato “puthujjano”ti vuttaṃ. Anariyadhammavirahato ariyadhammasamannāgamato
tika-s0201t:413_3: ca “ariyāna”nti vuttaṃ. Ariyabhāvakarāya paṭipattiyā abhāvato, tattha kosalladamathābhāvato
tika-s0201t:413_5: pāsaṃsiyato ca “sappurisāna”nti vuttaṃ. Sappurisabhāvakarāya paṭipattiyā abhāvato,
tika-s0201t:413_6: tattha ca kosalladamathābhāvato “sappurisānaṃ adassāvī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pathavīvatthukānaṃ
tika-s0201t:413_7: maññanānaṃ, upari vuccamānānañcamaññanānaṃ mūlakattā papañcasaṅkhānaṃ “pathaviṃ pathavito
tika-s0201t:413_8: sañjānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Andhaputhujjanassa ahaṃkāra-mamaṃkārānaṃ katthacipi appahīnattā
tika-s0201t:414_0: Pubbe aggahitattā, sāmaññato ca gayhamānattā, puggalassa pathavīādiārammaṇasabhāgatāya
tika-s0201t:414_1: labbhamānattā ca “yopī”ti vuttaṃ. “Yo”ti aniyamena gahitassa niyametabbato paṭiniddisitabbato
tika-s0201t:414_2: ca; “so”ti vuttaṃ sātisayaṃ saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanato kilesabhedanasambhavato ca
tika-s0201t:414_4: vuttaṃ. Manasā laddhabbassa arahattassa anadhigatattā adhigamanīyato ca “appattamānaso”ti
tika-s0201t:414_5: vuttaṃ. Aparena anuttaraṇīyato, paraṃ anucchavikabhāvena uttaritvā ṭhitattā ca “anuttara”nti
tika-s0201t:414_6: vuttaṃ. Yogena bhāvanāya kāmayogādito ca khemaṃ sivaṃ anupaddavanti “yogakkhema”nti
tika-s0201t:414_7: vuttaṃ. Chandappavattiyā ussukkāpattiyā ca “patthayamāno”ti vuttaṃ. Tadatthassa sabbaso
tika-s0201t:414_9: vuttaṃ. Sekkhassa sabbaso abhiññeyyabhāvañceva pariññeyyabhāvañca ñāṇena abhibhavitvā
tika-s0201t:414_10: jānanato “abhijānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Sekkhassa sabbaso appahīnamaññanatāya abhāvato “mā
tika-s0201t:414_11: maññī”ti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. Iminā nayena ito paraṃ sabbapadesu
tika-s0201t:414_12: vinicchayo kātabbo. Sakkā hi aṭṭhakathaṃ tassā līnatthavaṇṇanañca anugantvā ayamattho
tika-s0201t:414_13: viññūhi vibhāvetunti ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha. Iti anupadavicayato vicayo hāro.
tika-s0201t:416_0: Sakkāyassa sabbamaññanānaṃ mūlabhāvo yujjati parikappamattakattā lokavicittassa.
tika-s0201t:416_2: Yathāvuttaputhujjanassa vā vuttappakārabāhusaccābhāvo yujjati tasmiṃ sati sabbhāvato.
tika-s0201t:416_3: Tattha assutavato puthujjanassa ariyānaṃ sappurisānañca adassāvitādi yujjati ariyakaradhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:416_4: ariyabhāvassa ca tena adiṭṭhattā appaṭipannattā ca tathā tassa pathaviyā “ahaṃ pathavī,
tika-s0201t:416_5: mama pathavī, paro pathavī”ti sañjānanaṃ yujjati ahaṃkāramamaṃkārānaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:416_6: appahīnattā. Tathā sañjānato cassa pathaviṃ kammādikaraṇādivasena gahetvā nānappakārato
tika-s0201t:416_7: maññanāpavatti yujjati saññānidānattā papañcasaṅkhānaṃ. Yo maññati, tassa apariññātavatthukatā
tika-s0201t:416_8: yujjati pariññāya vinā maññanāpahānābhāvato. “Āpaṃ āpato sañjānātī”tiādīsupi eseva
tika-s0201t:416_9: nayo. Apariyositasikkhassa appattamānasatā yujjati katakiccatābhāvato. Sekkhassa
tika-s0201t:416_10: sato yogakkhemapatthanā yujjati tadadhimuttabhāvato. Tathā tassa pathaviyā abhijānanā
tika-s0201t:416_11: yujjati pariññāpahānesu mattaso kāribhāvato. Tato eva cassa “mā maññī”ti vattabbatā
tika-s0201t:416_12: yujjati vatthupariññāya viya maññanāpahānassapi vippakatabhāvato. Sekkhassa pathaviyā
tika-s0201t:416_13: pariññeyyatā yujjati pariññātuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā sabbaso apariññātattā ca. “Āpaṃ āpato”tiādīsupi
tika-s0201t:416_14: eseva nayo. Arahattādiyuttassa pathaviyādīnaṃ abhijānanā maññanābhāvo ca yujjati
tika-s0201t:416_15: saṅkhātadhammattā, sabbaso kilesānaṃ pahīnattā, tato eva cassa vītarāgādibhāvo tato
tika-s0201t:416_16: sammadeva ca paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭividdhatāti. Ayaṃ yuttihāro.
tika-s0201t:418_0: Kissopi maññanā sakkāyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, maññanānaṃ ayonisomanasikāro padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:418_1: sutadvayaviraho andhaputhujjanabhāvassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, so ariyānaṃ adassāvitāya padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:418_2: sā ariyadhammassa akovidatāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, sā ariyadhamme avinītatāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:418_3: “Sappurisānaṃ adassāvī”ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Saññāvipallāso maññanānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:418_4: Saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhāti. Maññanāsu ca taṇhāmaññanā itaramaññanānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:418_6: taṇhāgatasseva ca “seyyohamasmi”ntiādinā mānajappanāsabbhāvatā. Sabbāpi vā maññanā
tika-s0201t:418_7: sabbāsaṃ maññanānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Upādānapaccayā taṇhā”ti hi vacanato diṭṭhipi taṇhāya
tika-s0201t:418_8: padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Ahamasmi brahmā mahābrahmā”ti ādivacanato mānopi diṭṭhiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:418_9: Tathā “asmīti sati itthaṃsmīti hoti, evaṃsmīti hoti, aññathāsmīti hotī”tiādivacanato
tika-s0201t:418_10: mānassapi taṇhāya padaṭṭhānatā labbhateva. Sekkhā dhammā sappadesato maññanāpahānassa
tika-s0201t:418_11: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Asekkhā nippadesato maññanāpahānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Kammabhavo ca jātiyā
tika-s0201t:418_12: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Jāti jarāmaraṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Paccayākārassa yathābhūtāvabodho sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0201t:420_0: “Sabbadhammamūlapariyāya”nti ettha mūlaggahaṇena mūlapariyāyaggahaṇena vā yathā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo
tika-s0201t:420_1: gayhanti, evaṃ dosamohādīnampi sakkāyamūladhammānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo sakkāyassa
tika-s0201t:420_2: mūlabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā. “Assutavā”ti iminā yathā tassa puggalassa pariyattipaṭivedhasaddhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:420_3: abhāvo gayhati, evaṃ paṭipattisaddhammassapi abhāvo gayhati saddhammabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0201t:420_5: vibandhabhūtaṃ aññāṇaṃ. “Ariyadhamme avinīto”ti iminā ariyavinayābhāvo. So panatthato
tika-s0201t:420_6: ariyavinaye appaṭipatti eva vāti tīhipi padehi yathāvuttavisayā micchādiṭṭhi vicikicchā
tika-s0201t:420_7: ca gahitāva honti. Taggahaṇena ca sabbepi akusalā dhammā saṅgahitāva honti saṃkilesalakkhaṇena
tika-s0201t:421_0: “Pathaviṃ pathavito sañjānātī”ti idaṃ diṭṭhimaññanādīnaṃ saññāya kāraṇabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:421_1: Tattha yathā saññā, evaṃ vitakkaphassāvijjāayonisomanasikārādayopi tāsaṃ kāraṇanti
tika-s0201t:421_2: atthato tesampettha saṅgaho vutto hoti maññanānaṃ kāraṇabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā. “Maññatī”ti
tika-s0201t:421_3: iminā maññanākiccena taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo gahitā tāsaṃ kilesasabhāvattā. Taggahaṇeneva
tika-s0201t:421_4: vicikicchādinampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo kilesalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā taṇhāya
tika-s0201t:421_5: hetusabhāvattā taggahaṇeneva avasiṭṭhākusalahetūnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo hetulakkhaṇena
tika-s0201t:421_6: ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ āsavādisabhāvattā taggahaṇeneva avasiṭṭhāsavoghayogaganthanīvaraṇādīnampi
tika-s0201t:421_7: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo āsavādisabhāvattā ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā “pathaviṃ maññatī”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:421_8: pathavīādīnaṃ rūpasabhāvattā tabbisayānañca maññanānaṃ rūpavisayattā taggahaṇeneva
tika-s0201t:421_9: sakalarūpakkhandhavisayāpi maññanā dassitā honti rūpavisayalakkhaṇena āsaṃ ekalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0201t:421_12: ekalakkhaṇattā. Iminā nayena sesesupi yathārahaṃ ekalakkhaṇā niddhāretabbāti. Ayaṃ lakkhaṇo hāro.
tika-s0201t:423_0: Pathavīādīsu vatthūsu byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ gahetvā dhammagambhīrataṃ asallakkhetvā
tika-s0201t:423_3: ca veneyyā imissā desanāya nidānaṃ. Te “kathaṃ nu kho yathāvuttadosavinimuttā yathāvuttañca
tika-s0201t:423_4: visesaṃ jānantā sammāpaṭipattiyā ubhayahitaparāyaṇā saveyyu”nti ayamettha bhagavato
tika-s0201t:423_6: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, tassā līnatthavaṇṇanāyañceva vuttanayena suviññeyyattā ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha.
tika-s0201t:424_1: sambandho padasandhi, tathā padatthassa padatthantarena sambandho padatthasandhi,
tika-s0201t:424_3: sambandho, ekānusandhikassa pana pubbāparasambandho desanāsandhi. Yā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:424_4: “pucchānusandhi ajjhāsayānusandhi yathānusandhī”ti tidhā vibhattā. Ajjhāsayo cettha
tika-s0201t:424_5: attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayoti dvidhā veditabbo. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā
tika-s0201t:424_6: nidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva. Nikkhepasandhi catunnaṃ suttanikkhepānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:424_7: Suttasandhi idha paṭhamanikkhepavaseneva veditabbo. Kasmā panettha mūlapariyāyasuttameva
tika-s0201t:424_8: paṭhamaṃ nikkhittanti? Nāyamanuyogo katthaci nappavattati, apica yasmā maññanāmūlakaṃ
tika-s0201t:424_9: sakkāyaṃ, sabbamaññanā ca tattha eva anekabhedabhinnā pavattati, na tassā savisayāya
tika-s0201t:424_10: lesamattampi sāraṃ atthīti pathavīādivibhāgabhinnesu maññanāsu ca sātisayaṃ nibbedhavirāgasañjananī
tika-s0201t:424_11: upari sekkhāsekkhatathāgataguṇavibhāvanī ca ayaṃ desanā. Suttantadesanā ca visesato
tika-s0201t:424_12: diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathā, tasmā sanissayassa diṭṭhiggāhassa ādito asārabhāvadīpanaṃ
tika-s0201t:424_13: upari ca sabbesaṃ ariyānaṃ guṇavisesavibhāvanamidaṃ suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhittaṃ. Kiñca
tika-s0201t:424_15: puggalānaṃ paṭipattivibhāgato ca idameva suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:425_0: Yaṃ pana ekissā desanāya desanantarena saddhiṃ saṃsandanaṃ, ayampi desanāsandhi,
tika-s0201t:425_1: sā evaṃ veditabbā. “Assutavā puthujjano…pe… nibbānaṃ abhinandatī”ti ayaṃ desanā.
tika-s0201t:425_2: “Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano…pe… sappurisadhamme avinīto manasikaraṇīye
tika-s0201t:425_3: dhamme nappajānāti, amanasikaraṇīye ca dhamme nappajānāti, so manasikaraṇīye dhamme
tika-s0201t:425_4: appajānanto amanasikaraṇīye ca dhamme appajānanto ye dhammā na manasikaraṇīyā, te
tika-s0201t:425_5: dhamme manasi karoti…pe… anuppanno vā kāmāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhati.
tika-s0201t:425_6: Anuppanno vā bhavāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā bhavāsavo pavaḍḍhati, anuppanno vā avijjāsavo
tika-s0201t:425_7: uppajjati, uppanno vā avijjāsavo pavaḍḍhatī”ti imāya desanāya saṃsandati. Tathā “tassetaṃ
tika-s0201t:425_8: pāṭikaṅkhaṃ subhanimittaṃ manasi karissati, tassa subhanimittassa manasikārā rāgo
tika-s0201t:425_9: cittaṃ anuddhaṃsessati, so sarāgo sadoso samoho sāṅgaṇo saṃkiliṭṭhacitto kālaṃ karissatī”ti
tika-s0201t:425_10: imāya desanāya saṃsandati. Tathā “cakkhuñcāvuso paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:425_11: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā. Yaṃ vedeti taṃ sañjānāti, yaṃ sañjānāti
tika-s0201t:425_12: taṃ vitakketi, yaṃ vitakketi taṃ papañceti, yaṃ papañceti tatonidānaṃ purisaṃ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā
tika-s0201t:425_13: samudācarantī”ti imāya desanāya saṃsandati. Tathā “idha, bhikkhave, asutavā puthujjano…pe…
tika-s0201t:425_14: sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
tika-s0201t:425_15: Vedanaṃ…pe…, saññaṃ…pe…, saṅkhāre…pe…, viññāṇaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti
tika-s0201t:425_16: samanupassati. Yampi taṃ diṭṭhaṃ…pe… yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, so loko so attā so
tika-s0201t:425_17: pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva ṭhassāmīti,
tika-s0201t:425_18: tampi ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassatī”ti imāya desanāya saṃsandati.
tika-s0201t:426_0: “Yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu…pe… nibbānaṃ mābhinandī”ti ayaṃ desanā. “Idha, devānaminda,
tika-s0201t:426_1: bhikkhuno sutaṃ hoti ‘sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyā’ti, evañcetaṃ, devānaminda,
tika-s0201t:426_2: bhikkhuno sutaṃ hoti ‘sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyā’ti, so sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhijānāti,
