tika-s0201t:426_3: sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhiññāya sabbaṃ dhammaṃ parijānāti, sabbaṃ dhammaṃ pariññāya yaṃ
tika-s0201t:426_4: kiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, so tāsu vedanāsu aniccānupassī
tika-s0201t:426_5: viharati, virāgānupassī viharati, nirodhānupassī viharati, paṭinissaggānupassī viharatī”ti
tika-s0201t:426_6: imāya desanāya saṃsandati. “Yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṃ…pe… abhisambuddhoti
tika-s0201t:426_7: vadāmī”ti ayaṃ desanā “sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako…pe… sappurisadhamme
tika-s0201t:426_8: suvinīto rūpaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati, vedanaṃ…pe…,
tika-s0201t:426_9: saññaṃ…pe…, saṅkhāre…pe…, viññāṇaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
tika-s0201t:426_10: Yampi taṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tampi ‘netaṃ
tika-s0201t:426_11: mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati. Yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, so loko
tika-s0201t:426_12: so attā so pecca bhavissāmi ‘nicco dhuvo sassato api pariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ
tika-s0201t:426_13: tatheva ṭhassāmī’ti, tampi ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
tika-s0201t:426_14: So evaṃ samanupassanto na paritassatī”ti evamādidesanāhi saṃsandatīti, ayaṃ catubyūho hāro.
tika-s0201t:428_2: dīpito. Tesu purimanayena āsayavipatti kittitā, dutiyena payogavipatti. Purimena
tika-s0201t:428_3: cassa kilesavaṭṭaṃ, tañca yato vipākavaṭṭanti sakalaṃ saṃsāracakkamāvattati. “Pathaviṃ
tika-s0201t:428_4: maññatī”tiādinā tattha tisso maññanā vuttā. Tāsu taṇhāmaññanā “etaṃ mamā”ti taṇhāggāho,
tika-s0201t:428_5: mānamaññanā “esohamasmī”ti mānaggāho, diṭṭhimaññanā “eso me attā”ti diṭṭhiggāho.
tika-s0201t:428_6: Tattha taṇhāggāhena “taṇhaṃ paṭiccapariyesanā”tiādikā nava taṇhāmūlakā dhammā āvattanti.
tika-s0201t:428_8: attato samanupassatī”tiādikā vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi āvattati. Tīsu ca gāhesu
tika-s0201t:428_9: yāya saññāya taṇhāggāhassa vikkhambhanā, sā dukkhasaññā dukkhānupassanā. Yāya saññāya
tika-s0201t:428_10: mānaggāhassa vikkhambhanā, sā aniccasaññā aniccānupassanā. Yāya pana saññāya diṭṭhiggāhassa
tika-s0201t:428_11: vikkhambhanā, sā anattasaññā anattānupassanā. Tattha paṭhamaggāhavisabhāgato appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ
tika-s0201t:429_0: Sekkhaggahaṇena ariyāya sammādiṭṭhiyā saṅgaho, tato ca paratoghosayonisomanasikārā
tika-s0201t:429_1: dīpitā honti. Paratoghosena ca sutavā ariyasāvakoti āvattati, yonisomanasikārena
tika-s0201t:429_2: nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā āvattanti, catubbidhañca sampatticakkaṃ. “Mā maññī”ti
tika-s0201t:429_3: maññanānaṃ vippakatappahānatāgahaṇena ekaccāsavaparikkhayo dīpito hoti, tena ca saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattakāyasakkhibhāvā
tika-s0201t:429_4: āvattanti. “Arahaṃ khīṇāsavo”tiādinā asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo dassitā honti, sīlakkhandhādipāripūriyā
tika-s0201t:429_5: ca dasa nāthakaraṇā dhammā āvattanti. “Na maññatī”ti maññanāpaṭikkhepena pañcasu
tika-s0201t:429_6: upādānakkhandhesu “netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti sammāpaṭipatti dassitā,
tika-s0201t:430_1: āvattanti. “Nandī dukkhassa mūla”ntiādinā saddhiṃ hetunā vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti
tika-s0201t:430_4: pahānaṃ āvattati. “Sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho”ti ca vuttattā
tika-s0201t:430_6: paccayākāravedanassa sāvakehi asādhāraṇañāṇacārabhāvo dassito, tena catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattisañcāri
tika-s0201t:430_7: bhagavato mahāvajirañāṇaṃ āvattatīti. Ayaṃ āvatto hāro.
tika-s0201t:432_0: “Sabbadhammamūlapariyāya”nti ettha sabbadhammā nāma tebhūmakā dhammā sakkāyassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0201t:432_1: Tesaṃ maññanā padaṭṭhānaṃ papañcasaṅkhānimittattā lokavicittassa. Tayime kusalā akusalā
tika-s0201t:432_2: abyākatāti tividhā. Tesu kusalānaṃ yonisomanasikārādi padaṭṭhānaṃ, akusalānaṃ ayonisomanasikārādi,
tika-s0201t:432_3: abyākatānaṃ kammabhavaāvajjanabhūtarūpādi padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha kusalā kāmāvacarādivasena
tika-s0201t:432_4: bhūmito tividhā, tathā abyākatā cittuppādasabhāvā, acittuppādasabhāvā pana kāmāvacarāva
tika-s0201t:432_6: duvidho puthujjano. Sammāsambuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakabhedena tividhā ariyā. Maṃsacakkhudibbacakkhupaññācakkhūhi
tika-s0201t:432_7: dassanābhāvena tividho adassāvī. Maggaphalanibbānabhedena tividho, navavidho vā ariyadhammo.
tika-s0201t:432_9: Tadabhāvato akovido. Saṃvarapahānabhedena duvidho, dasavidho vā ariyadhammavinayo,
tika-s0201t:432_10: tadabhāvato ariyadhamme avinīto. Ettha padaṭṭhānavibhāgo heṭṭhā dassitoyeva. “Sappurisānaṃ
tika-s0201t:432_11: adassāvī”tiādīsupi eseva nayo. “Pathaviṃ maññatī”tiādīsu maññanāvatthuvibhāgo pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:433_0: Maññanā pana taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena saṅkhepato tividhā, vitthārato pana taṇhāmaññanā
tika-s0201t:433_1: tāva kāmataṇhādivasena aṭṭhasatavidhā, tathā “asmīti sati itthaṃsmīti hotī”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:433_2: Evaṃ mānamaññanāpi. “Asmīti sati itthaṃsmīti hotī”tiādinā papañcattayaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0201t:433_3: niddiṭṭhañcāti. Etena diṭṭhimaññanāyapi aṭṭhasatavidhatā vuttāti veditabbā. Apica
tika-s0201t:433_5: ca veditabbā. Ayañca attho hīnattikatthavaṇṇanāya vibhāvetabbo. Diṭṭhimaññanāya pana
tika-s0201t:433_6: brahmajāle āgatanayena dvāsaṭṭhividhatā tadantarabhedena anekavidhatā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:433_8: ca pariññānaṃ anekavidhatā veditabbā. Tathā aṭṭhamakādivasena sekkhavibhāgo paññāvimuttādivasena
tika-s0201t:433_9: asekkhavibhāgo ca. Ayamettha dhammavibhāgo. Padaṭṭhānavibhāgo ca bhūmivibhāgo ca
tika-s0201t:435_1: mūlakāraṇanti ca taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo. Tathā assutavā puthujjano…pe… sappurisadhamme
tika-s0201t:435_2: avinītoti. Yāvakīvañca pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu subhato sukhato niccato attato samanupassanavasena
tika-s0201t:435_3: “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhā na samucchijjanti, tāva
tika-s0201t:435_4: nesaṃ pabandhūparamo supinantepi na kenaci laddhapubbo. Yadā pana nesaṃ asubhato
tika-s0201t:435_5: dukkhato aniccato anattato samanupassanavasena “netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso
tika-s0201t:435_7: saṃvattanti, atha nesaṃ pabandhūparamo hoti accantaappaññattikabhāvūpagamanato. Tena
tika-s0201t:435_8: vuttaṃ “sabbadhammāti pañcupādānakkhandhā gahitā, tesaṃ mūlakāraṇanti ca taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo”ti.
tika-s0201t:435_9: Tathā assutavā puthujjano…pe… sappurisadhamme avinīto tīhipi maññanāhi pathaviṃ maññati
tika-s0201t:435_10: yāva nibbānaṃ abhinandati, tīhipi pariññāhi tassa taṃ vatthu apariññātanti katvā.
tika-s0201t:435_11: Yassa pana taṃ vatthu tīhi pariññāhi pariññātaṃ, na so itaro viya taṃ maññati. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:435_12: bhagavā “sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako…pe… sappurisadhamme suvinīto rūpaṃ
tika-s0201t:435_13: ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati, vedanaṃ…pe… asati na paritassatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:435_14: Sekkho pathaviṃ mā maññi, yāva nibbānaṃ mābhinandi, arahā sammāsambuddho ca pathaviṃ
tika-s0201t:435_15: na maññati, yāva nibbānaṃ nābhinandati, maññanāmaññitesu vatthūsu mattaso sabbaso
tika-s0201t:435_16: ca pariññābhisamayasaṃsiddhiyā pahānābhisamayanibbattito. Yassa pana tesu vatthūsu
tika-s0201t:435_17: sabbaso mattaso vā pariññā eva natthi, kuto pahānaṃ, so yathāparikappaṃ niraṅkusāhi
tika-s0201t:435_18: maññanāhi “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā maññateva. Tenāha bhagavā “idha, bhikkhave, assutavā
tika-s0201t:435_19: puthujjano…pe… sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti
tika-s0201t:435_20: samanupassati, vedanaṃ…pe…, sañña…pe…”ntiādi. Ayaṃ parivatto hāro.
tika-s0201t:437_2: pariyāyavacanaṃ, “vo tumhākaṃ tumha”nti pariyāyavacanaṃ, “bhikkhave, samaṇā tapassino”ti
tika-s0201t:437_4: sotaṃ odahatha sotadvārānusārena upadhārethā”ti pariyāyavacanaṃ, “sādhukaṃ sammā
tika-s0201t:437_5: sakkacca”nti pariyāyavacanaṃ, “manasi karotha citte ṭhapetha samannāharathā”ti pariyāyavacanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:437_6: “bhāsissāmi byattaṃ kathessāmi vibhajissāmī”ti pariyāyavacanaṃ, “evaṃ, bhante, sādhu
tika-s0201t:437_8: pariyāyavacanaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbapadesu vevacanaṃ vattabbanti. Ayaṃ vevacano hāro.
tika-s0201t:439_0: “Sabbadhammamūlapariyāya”nti ettha sabbadhammā nāma sakkāyadhammā, te khandhavasena
tika-s0201t:439_1: pañcadhā paññattā, āyatanavasena dvādasadhā, dhātuvasena aṭṭhārasadhā paññattā. “Mūla”nti
tika-s0201t:439_2: vā “mūlapariyāya”nti vā maññanā vuttā, tā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena tidhā antarabhedena
tika-s0201t:439_3: anekadhā ca paññattā. Atha vā “sabbadhammā”ti tebhūmakadhammānaṃ saṅgahapaññatti,
tika-s0201t:439_5: paṭiññāpaññatti, “suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”ti ca āṇāpanapaññatti, “assutavā”ti
tika-s0201t:439_8: asamapaññatti ceva samapaññatti ca. Tattha asamapaññatti tathāgatapaññatti, samapaññatti
tika-s0201t:439_11: upādānakkhandhānaṃ dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ sammasanupagānaṃ
tika-s0201t:439_12: indriyānaṃ nikkhepapaññatti ceva pabhavapaññatti ca, tathā vipallāsānaṃ kiccapaññatti
tika-s0201t:439_13: pariyuṭṭhānaṃ dassanapaññatti kilesānaṃ phalapaññatti abhisaṅkhārānaṃ virūhanapaññatti
tika-s0201t:439_15: dassanapaññatti ceva bhāvanāpaññatti ca “appattamānaso”ti sekkhadhammānaṃ ṭhitipaññatti,
tika-s0201t:439_17: abhiññeyyadhammānaṃ abhiññāpaññatti, dukkhassa pariññāpaññatti, samudayassa pahānapaññatti,
tika-s0201t:439_18: nirodhassa sacchikiriyāpaññatti, maggassa bhāvanāpaññatti, “mā maññī”ti maññanānaṃ
tika-s0201t:439_19: paṭikkhepapaññatti, samudayassa pahānapaññatti. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi vitthāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ paññatti hāro.
tika-s0201t:441_0: “Sabbadhammamūlapariyāya”nti ettha sabbadhammā nāma lokiyā pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni
tika-s0201t:441_1: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo dve saccāni ekūnavisati indriyāni dvādasapadiko paccayākāroti,
tika-s0201t:441_2: ayaṃ sabbadhammaggahaṇena khandhādimukhena desanāya otaraṇaṃ. “Mūla”nti vā “mūlapariyāya”nti
tika-s0201t:441_3: vā maññanā vuttā, tā atthato taṇhā māno diṭṭhi cāti tesaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahoti
tika-s0201t:441_4: ayaṃ khandhamukhena otaraṇaṃ. Tathā “dhammāyatanadhammadhātūhi saṅgaho”ti ayaṃ āyatanamukhena
tika-s0201t:441_5: dhātumukhena ca otaraṇaṃ. “Assutavā”ti iminā sutassa vibandhabhūtā avijjādayo gahitā,
tika-s0201t:441_6: “puthujjano”ti iminā yesaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ jananādinā puthujjanoti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:441_7: te kilesābhisaṅkhārādayo gahitā, “ariyānaṃ adassāvī”tiādinā yesaṃ kilesadhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:441_8: vasena ariyānaṃ adassāviādibhāvo hoti, te diṭṭhimānāvijjādayo gahitāti sabbehi tehi
tika-s0201t:441_9: saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahoti pubbe vuttanayeneva otaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Sañjānāti maññati
tika-s0201t:441_10: abhijānāti na maññatī”ti etthāpi sañjānanamaññanāabhijānanānupassanānaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannattā
tika-s0201t:441_11: vuttanayeneva otaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā sekkhaggahaṇena sekkhā, “araha”ntiādinā
tika-s0201t:441_12: asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo gahitāti evampi khandhamukhena otaraṇaṃ, āyatanadhātādimukhena
tika-s0201t:441_13: ca otaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā “na maññatī”ti taṇhāgāhādipaṭikkhepena dukkhānupassanādayo
tika-s0201t:441_14: gahitā, tesaṃ vasena appaṇihitavimokkhamukhādīhi otaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Pariññāta”nti
tika-s0201t:441_15: iminā parijānanakiccena pavattamānā bodhipakkhiyadhammā gayhantīti satipaṭṭhānādimukhena
tika-s0201t:441_16: otaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Nandiggahaṇena bhavaggahaṇena taṇhāgahaṇena ca samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0201t:441_18: nirodhasaccaṃ, abhisambodhiyā gahaṇena maggasaccaṃ gahitanti ariyasaccehi otaraṇanti. Ayaṃ otaraṇo hāro.
tika-s0201t:443_0: “Sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave…pe… idha, bhikkhave, assutavā…pe… pathaviṃ
tika-s0201t:443_1: pathavito sañjānātī”ti ārambho. “Pathaviṃ pathaviyā saññatvā pathaviṃ maññatī”ti
tika-s0201t:443_2: padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi. Tathā “pathaviyā maññati pathavito maññati pathaviṃ
tika-s0201t:443_3: meti maññati pathaviṃ abhinandatī”ti padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi. “Taṃ kissa hetu
tika-s0201t:443_4: apariññātaṃ tassāti vadāmī”ti padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi ca. Sesavāresupi eseva
tika-s0201t:445_1: āpa”ntiādi pana taṃ avikappetvā visesavacanaṃ. Tathā “mūlapariyāya”nti sāmaññato
tika-s0201t:445_2: adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā visesavacanaṃ “pathaviṃ maññati…pe… abhinandatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:445_3: “Pathaviṃ maññatī”ti ca sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ taṇhādiggāhānaṃ sādhāraṇattā maññanāya,
tika-s0201t:445_4: taṃ avikappetvā visesavacanaṃ “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti, evaṃ suttantarapadānipi
tika-s0201t:445_5: ānetvā visesavacanaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo. “Sekkho”ti sāmaññato
tika-s0201t:445_6: adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā visesavacanaṃ “kāyasakkhī diṭṭhippatto saddhāvimutto
tika-s0201t:445_7: saddhānusārī dhammānusārī”ti. Tathā “sekkho”ti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā
tika-s0201t:445_8: visesavacanaṃ “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekkhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti…pe…
tika-s0201t:445_9: sekkhena sammāsamādhinā samannāgato hotī”ti. “Araha”nti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0201t:445_11: ca. “Khīṇāsavo”ti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā visesavacanaṃ “kāmāsavāpi
tika-s0201t:445_12: cittaṃ vimuccittha, bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccitthā”tiādi. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:445_14: Maññanābhāvo hissa pahānapaṭivedhasiddho, pahānapaṭivedho ca pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanāpaṭivedhehi
tika-s0201t:445_15: na vināti sabbepi abhiññāvisesā maññanāpaṭikkhepena atthato gahitāva hontīti. Tathā
tika-s0201t:445_16: “araha”nti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā visesavacanaṃ “vītarāgattā vītadosattā
tika-s0201t:445_17: vītamohattā”ti. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇā veditabbā. Ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-s0201t:447_0: “Sabbadhammamūlapariyāya”nti ettha sabbadhammā nāma pariyāpannadhammā, te kusalākusalābyākatabhedena
tika-s0201t:447_1: tividhā. Tesu kusalānaṃ yonisomanasikāro alobhādayo ca hetū, akusalānaṃ ayonisomanasikāro
tika-s0201t:447_2: lobhādayo ca hetū, abyākatesu vipākānaṃ yathāsakaṃ kammaṃ, itaresaṃ bhavaṅgamāvajjanasamannāhārādi
tika-s0201t:447_3: ca hetū. Ettha ca sappurisūpanissayādiko paccayo hetumhi eva samavaruḷho, so tattha
tika-s0201t:447_4: ādi-saddena saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo. “Mūla”nti vuttānaṃ maññanānaṃ hetubhāvo pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:447_5: vutto eva. Maññanāsu pana taṇhāmaññanāya assādānupassanā hetu. “Saññojaniyesu dhammesu
tika-s0201t:447_6: assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Mānamaññanāya diṭṭhivippayuttalobho
tika-s0201t:447_7: hetu kevalaṃ saṃsaggavasena “ahamasmī”ti pavattanato. Diṭṭhimaññanāya ekattanayādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:447_8: ayāthāvaggāho hetu, assutabhāvo puthujjanabhāvassa hetu, so ariyānaṃ adassanasīlatāya,
tika-s0201t:447_9: sā ariyadhammassa akovidatāya, sā ariyadhamme avinītatāya hetu, sabbā cāyaṃ hetuparamparā
tika-s0201t:447_10: pathavīādīsu “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti tissannaṃ maññanānaṃ hetu, sekkhārahādibhāvā
tika-s0201t:447_11: pana mattaso sabbaso ca maññanābhāvassa hetūti. Ayaṃ parikkhāro hāro.
tika-s0201t:449_1: ca saṃkilesadhammā dassitā, te ca saṅkhepato tividhā taṇhāsaṃkileso diṭṭhisaṃkileso
tika-s0201t:449_3: duccaritasaṃkilesassa ca padaṭṭhānaṃ, tathā diṭṭhisaṃkileso diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa, taṇhāsaṃkilesassa,
tika-s0201t:449_5: taṇhāsaṃkilesassa, diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa ca padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tesu taṇhāsaṃkileso atthato
tika-s0201t:449_6: lobhova, yo “lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṃ sārāgo sārajjanā sārajjitatta”ntiādinā anekehi
tika-s0201t:449_7: pariyāyehi vibhatto. Tathā diṭṭhiyeva diṭṭhisaṃkileso, yo “diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ
tika-s0201t:449_9: bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādinā dvāsaṭṭhiyā pabhedehi ca vibhatto. Duccaritasaṃkileso
tika-s0201t:449_10: pana atthato dussīlyacetanā ceva cetanāsampayuttadhammā ca, yā “kāyaduccaritaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ
tika-s0201t:449_11: kāyavisamaṃ vacīvisama”nti, “pāṇātipāto adinnādāna”nti ca ādinā anekehi pariyāyehi,
tika-s0201t:450_0: Tesu taṇhāsaṃkilesassa samatho paṭipakkho, diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa vipassanā, duccaritasaṃkilesassa
tika-s0201t:450_1: sīlaṃ paṭipakkho. Te pana sīlādayo dhammā idha pariññāgahaṇena sekkhaggahaṇena “araha”ntiādinā
tika-s0201t:450_2: ariyatādiggahaṇena ca gahitā. Tattha sīlena duccaritasaṃkilesappahānaṃ sijjhati,
tika-s0201t:450_3: tathā tadaṅgappahānaṃ vītikkamappahānañca, samathena taṇhāsaṃkilesappahānaṃ sijjhati,
tika-s0201t:450_5: sijjhati, tathā samucchedappahānaṃ anusayappahānañca. Tattha pubbabhāge sīle patiṭṭhitassa
tika-s0201t:450_6: samatho, samathe patiṭṭhitassa vipassanā, maggakkhaṇe pana samakālameva bhavanti.
tika-s0201t:450_7: Pubbeyeva hi suparisuddhakāyavacīkammassa suparisuddhājīvassa ca samathavipassanā
tika-s0201t:450_8: āraddhā gabbhaṃ gaṇhantiyo paripākaṃ gacchantiyo vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanaṃ paribrūhenti,
tika-s0201t:450_9: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī maggena ghaṭenti maggakkhaṇe samathavipassanā
tika-s0201t:450_11: samucchindantiyo nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarontīti. Ayaṃ samāropano hāro.
tika-s0201t:454_1: gahitā. Maññanānampi hi maññanā kāraṇanti dassitoyamattho. “Assutavā”tiādinā avijjāmānadiṭṭhiyo
tika-s0201t:454_2: gahitā, sabbepi vā saṃkilesadhammā, tathā saññāapariññātaggahaṇena. “Khīṇāsavo parikkhīṇabhavasaññojano”ti
tika-s0201t:454_3: ettha pana āsavā saññojanāni ca sarūpato gahitāni, tathā nandiggahaṇena taṇhāgahaṇena
tika-s0201t:454_4: ca taṇhā, evampettha sarūpato pariyāyato ca taṇhā avijjā tappakkhiyadhammā ca gahitā.
tika-s0201t:454_5: Tattha taṇhāya visesato rūpadhammā adhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāya arūpadhammā, te pana sabbadhammaggahaṇena
tika-s0201t:454_6: pathavīādiggahaṇena ca dassitā eva. Tāsaṃ samatho vipassanā ca paṭipakkho, tesamettha
tika-s0201t:454_7: gahetabbākāro heṭṭhā dassito eva. Samathassa cetovimutti phalaṃ, vipassanāya paññāvimutti.
tika-s0201t:454_8: Tathā hi tā “rāgavirāgā”tiādinā visesetvā vuccanti, imāsamettha gahaṇaṃ sammadaññāvimuttavītarāgādivacanehi
tika-s0201t:454_9: veditabbaṃ. Tattha taṇhāvijjā samudayasaccaṃ, tappakkhiyadhammā pana taggahaṇeneva
tika-s0201t:454_10: gahitāti veditabbā. Tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtā vuttappabhedā rūpārūpadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0201t:454_11: tesaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccaṃ. Taṇhāgahaṇena
tika-s0201t:454_16: vipassanāpakkhiyānaṃ aniccasaññādīnañca vasena vodānapakkho netabboti. Ayaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭassa na yassa bhūmi.
tika-s0201t:456_0: Tathā vuttanayena sarūpato pariyāyato ca gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu taṇhā
tika-s0201t:456_1: lobho, avijjā moho, avijjāya sampayutto lohite sati pubbo viya taṇhāya sati sijjhamāno
tika-s0201t:456_2: āghāto doso, iti tīhi akusalamūlehi gahitehi, tappaṭipakkhato maññanāpaṭikkhepapariññāgahaṇādīhi
tika-s0201t:456_3: ca kusalamūlāni siddhāniyeva honti. Idhāpi “lobho sabbāni vā sāsavakusalākusalamūlāni
tika-s0201t:456_4: samudayasaccaṃ, tehi nibbattā, tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānagocarabhūtā ca upādānakkhandhā dukkhasacca”ntiādinā
tika-s0201t:456_5: saccayojanā veditabbā. Phalaṃ panettha tayo vimokkhā, tīhi pana akusalamūlehi tividhaduccarita-saṃkilesamala-visamaakusala-saññā-vitakkādivasena
tika-s0201t:456_7: kusalapakkho netabboti. Ayaṃ tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0201t:458_0: Tathā vuttanayena sarūpato pariyāyato ca gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu visesato
tika-s0201t:458_1: taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena asubhe “subha”nti, dukkhe “sukha”nti ca vipallāsā, avijjādiṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:458_2: vasena anicce “nicca”nti, anattani “attā”ti ca vipallāsā veditabbā. Tesaṃ paṭipakkhato
tika-s0201t:458_4: siddhāneva honti. Tattha catūhi indriyehi cattāro puggalā niddisitabbā. Kathaṃ? Duvidho
tika-s0201t:458_5: hi taṇhācarito mudindriyo tikkhindriyoti, tathā diṭṭhicarito. Tesaṃ paṭhamo asubhe
tika-s0201t:458_6: “subha”nti vipariyāsaggāhī satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ sallakkhento taṃ vipallāsaṃ
tika-s0201t:458_7: samugghāṭetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Dutiyo asukhe “sukha”nti vipariyāsaggāhī
tika-s0201t:458_9: taṃ vipallāsaṃ vidhamento sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Tatiyo anicce “nicca”nti ayāthāvaggāhī
tika-s0201t:458_10: samādhibalena samāhitacitto saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikabhāvasallakkhaṇena taṃ vipallāsaṃ
tika-s0201t:459_0: Idhāpi subhasaññāsukhasaññāhi catūhipi vā vipallāsehi samudayasaccaṃ, tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānārammaṇabhūtā
tika-s0201t:459_1: pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccantiādinā saccayojanā veditabbā. Phalaṃ panettha cattāri
tika-s0201t:459_4: divasena vodānapakkho netabboti. Ayaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0201t:461_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohārena nayadvayaṃ siddhameva hoti. Tathā
tika-s0201t:461_1: hi atthanayānaṃ disābhūtadhammānaṃ samālocanaṃ disālocanaṃ, tesaṃ samānayanaṃ aṅkusoti
tika-s0201t:464_0: Idañca suttaṃ soḷasavidhe suttantapaṭṭhāne saṃkilesanibbedhāsekkhabhāgiyaṃ, sabbabhāgiyameva
tika-s0201t:464_3: dassanabhāvanaṃ sakavacanaṃ vissajjanīyaṃ kusalākusalaṃ anuññātaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ cāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:468_0: 14. Apubbapadavaṇṇanāti atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena heṭṭhā aggahitatāya apubbassa abhinavassa
tika-s0201t:468_1: padassa vaṇṇanā atthavibhajanā. “Hitvā punappunāgatamattha”nti hi vuttaṃ. Nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtā
tika-s0201t:468_2: bhūtapubbanivāsaṭṭhānabhūtā, nivāsaṭṭhāne vā bhūtā nibbattā nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtā, tattha
tika-s0201t:468_3: māpitāti attho. Yathā kākandī mākandī kosambīti yathā kākandassa isino nivāsaṭṭhāne
tika-s0201t:468_4: māpitā nagarī kākandī, mākandassa nivāsaṭṭhāne māpitā mākandī, kusambassanivāsaṭṭhāne
tika-s0201t:468_5: māpitā kosambīti vuccati, evaṃ sāvatthīti dasseti. Upanetvā samīpe katvā bhuñjitabbato
tika-s0201t:468_6: upabhogo, saviññāṇakavatthu. Parito sabbadā bhuñjitabbato paribhogo, nivāsanapārupanādi
tika-s0201t:468_7: aviññāṇakavatthu. Sabbamettha atthīti niruttinayena sāvatthī-saddasiddhimāha. Satthasamāyogeti
tika-s0201t:468_8: satthassa nagariyā samāgame, satthe taṃ nagaraṃ upagateti attho. Pucchite satthikajanehi.
tika-s0201t:469_0: Samohitanti sannicitaṃ. Rammanti anto bahi ca bhūmibhāgasampattiyā ceva ārāmuyyānasampattiyā
tika-s0201t:469_1: ca ramaṇīyaṃ. Dassaneyyanti visikhāsannivesasampattiyā ceva pāsādakūṭāgārādisampattiyā
tika-s0201t:469_2: ca dassanīyaṃ passitabbayuttaṃ. Upabhogaparibhogavatthusampattiyā ceva nivāsasukhatāya
tika-s0201t:469_3: ca nibaddhavāsaṃ vasantānaṃ itaresañca sattānaṃ manaṃ rametīti manoramaṃ. Dasahi
tika-s0201t:469_5: asnātha-pivatha-khādathāti-saddoti imehi dasahi saddehi. Avivittanti na vivittaṃ,
tika-s0201t:470_0: Vuddhiṃ vepullataṃ pattanti tannivāsī sattavuddhiyā vuddhiṃ, tāya parivuddhitāyeva
tika-s0201t:470_1: vipulabhāvaṃ pattaṃ, bahujanaṃ ākiṇṇamanussanti attho. Vittūpakaraṇasamiddhiyā iddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:470_2: Sabbakālaṃ subhikkhabhāvena phītaṃ. Antamaso vighāsāde upādāya sabbesaṃ kapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānampi
tika-s0201t:470_3: icchi tatthanipphattiyā manuññaṃ jātaṃ, pageva issariye ṭhitānanti dassanatthaṃ puna
tika-s0201t:470_4: “manorama”nti vuttaṃ. Aḷakamandāvāti āṭānāṭādīsu dasasu vessavaṇamahārājassa nagarīsu
tika-s0201t:470_5: aḷakamandā nāma ekā nagarī, yā loke aḷākā eva vuccati. Sā yathā puññakammīnaṃ āvāsabhūtā
tika-s0201t:470_6: ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādinā sobhaggappattā, evaṃ sāvatthīpīti vuttaṃ “aḷakamandāvā”ti. Devānanti
tika-s0201t:471_0: Jinātīti iminā sota-saddo viya kattusādhano jeta-saddoti dasseti. Raññāti pasenadikosalarājena.
tika-s0201t:471_1: Rājagataṃ jayaṃ āropetvā kumāro jitavāti jetoti vutto. Maṅgalakabyatāyātiādinā “jeyyo”ti
tika-s0201t:471_2: etasmiṃ atthe “jeto”ti vuttanti dasseti. Sabbakāmasamiddhitāyāti sabbehi upabhogaparibhogavatthūhi
tika-s0201t:471_3: phītabhāvena vibhavasampannatāyāti attho. Samiddhāpi maccharino kiñci na dentīti
tika-s0201t:471_5: attho. Samiddhā amaccharinopi ca karuṇāsaddhādiguṇavirahitā attano santakaṃ paresaṃ
tika-s0201t:471_6: na dadeyyunti āha “karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya cā”ti. Tenāti anāthānaṃ piṇḍadānena. Saddatthato
tika-s0201t:471_7: pana dātabbabhāvena sabbakālaṃ upaṭṭhapito anāthānaṃ piṇḍo etassa atthīti anāthapiṇḍiko.
tika-s0201t:471_9: ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, “divā appākiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosa”nti ekaṃ, “appaḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassa”nti
tika-s0201t:471_10: ekaṃ, “tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasirena uppajjanti cīvara…pe… parikkhārā”ti
tika-s0201t:471_11: ekaṃ, “tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā”ti ekaṃ, evametehi
tika-s0201t:471_12: pañcavidhasenāsanaṅgehi sampannatāya. Yadi jetavanaṃ tathaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmoti āha “so hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:472_0: Kītakālato paṭṭhāya anāthapiṇḍikasseva taṃ vanaṃ, atha kasmā ubhinnaṃ parikittananti
tika-s0201t:472_1: āha “jetavane”tiādi. “Yadipi so bhūmibhāgo koṭisantharena mahāseṭṭhinā kīto, rukkhā
tika-s0201t:472_2: pana jetena na vikkītāti jetavananti vattabbataṃ labhī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:473_0: Kasmā idaṃ suttamabhāsīti kathetukamyatāya suttanikkhepaṃ pucchati. Sāmaññato hi
tika-s0201t:473_1: bhagavato desanākāraṇaṃ pākaṭamevāti. Ko panāyaṃ suttanikkhepoti? Attajjhāsayo. Parehi
tika-s0201t:473_2: anajjhiṭṭho eva hi bhagavā attano ajjhāsayena imaṃ suttaṃ desetīti ācariyā. Yasmā
tika-s0201t:473_3: panesa bhikkhūnaṃ upakkiliṭṭhacittataṃ viditvā “ime bhikkhū imāya desanāya upakkilesavisodhanaṃ
tika-s0201t:473_4: katvā āsavakkhayāya paṭipajjissantī”ti ayaṃ desanā āraddhā, tasmā parajjhāsayoti
tika-s0201t:473_5: apare. Ubhayampi pana yuttaṃ. Attajjhāsayādīnañhi saṃsaggabhedassa sambhavo heṭṭhā
tika-s0201t:473_6: dassitovāti. Tesaṃ bhikkhūnanti tadā dhammapaṭiggāhatabhikkhūnaṃ. Upakkilesavisodhananti
tika-s0201t:473_7: samathavipassanupakkilesato cittassa visodhanaṃ. Paṭhamañhi bhagavā anupubbikathādinā
tika-s0201t:473_8: paṭipattiyā saṃkilesaṃ nīharitvā pacchā sāmukkaṃsikaṃ desanaṃ deseti khette khāṇukaṇṭakagumbādike
tika-s0201t:473_9: avaharitvā kasanaṃ viya, tasmā kammaṭṭhānameva avatvā imāya anupubbiyā desanā pavattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:474_0: Saṃvarabhūtanti sīlasaṃvarādisaṃvarabhūtaṃ saṃvaraṇasabhāvaṃ kāraṇaṃ, taṃ pana atthato
tika-s0201t:474_1: dassanādi evāti veditabbaṃ. Saṃvaritāti pavattituṃ appadānavasena sammā, sabbathā
tika-s0201t:474_2: vā vāritā. Evaṃbhūtā ca yasmā pavattidvārapidhānena pihitā nāma honti, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:474_3: “vidahitā hutvā”ti. Evaṃ accantikassa saṃvarassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ anaccantikaṃ saṃvaraṃ
tika-s0201t:474_4: dassetvā idāni accantikameva saṃvaraṃ dassento yasmiṃ dassanādimhi sati uppajjanārahā
tika-s0201t:474_5: āsavā na uppajjanti, so tesaṃ anuppādo nirodho khayo pahānanti ca vuccamāno atthato
tika-s0201t:474_6: appavattimattanti tassa ca dassanādi kāraṇanti āha “yena kāraṇena anuppādanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0201t:474_7: khayaṃ gacchanti pahīyanti nappavattanti, taṃ kāraṇanti attho”ti.
tika-s0201t:475_1: kiñcāpi kusalādīnampi pavatti atthi, kāmāsavādayo eva pana vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharaṇakaasucibhāvena
tika-s0201t:475_2: sandanti, tasmā te eva “āsavā”ti vuccanti. Tattha hi paggharaṇaasucimhi niruḷho āsava-saddoti.
tika-s0201t:475_3: Dhammato yāva gotrabhunti tato paraṃ maggaphalesu appavattanato vuttaṃ. Ete hi ārammaṇavasena
tika-s0201t:475_4: dhamme gacchantā tato paraṃ na gacchanti. Nanu tato paraṃ bhavaṅgādīnipi gacchantīti
tika-s0201t:475_5: ce? Na, tesampi pubbe ālambitesu lokiyadhammesu sāsavabhāvena antogadhattā tato paratābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:475_7: veditabbāni. Paṭhamamaggapurecārikameva vā gotrabhu avadhinidassanabhāvena gahitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:475_8: tato paraṃ pana maggaphalasamānatāya aññesu maggesu maggavīthiyaṃ samāpattivīthiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:475_9: nirodhānantarañca pavattamānesu phalesu nibbāne ca āsavānaṃ pavatti nivāritāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:475_10: Savantīti gacchanti, ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattantīti attho. Avadhiattho ā-kāro,
tika-s0201t:475_11: avadhi ca mariyādābhividhibhedato duvidho. Tattha mariyādaṃ kiriyaṃ bahi katvā pavattati
tika-s0201t:475_12: yathā “āpāṭaliputtā vuṭṭho devo”ti. Abhividhi pana kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavattati yathā
tika-s0201t:475_13: “ābhavaggā bhagavato yaso pavattatī”ti. Abhividhiattho cāyaṃ ā-kāro idha gahitoti
tika-s0201t:476_0: Madirādayoti ādi-saddena sindhavakādambarikāpotikādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭho
tika-s0201t:476_1: viraparivutthatā purāṇabhāvo. Avijjā nāhosītiādīti ettha ādi-saddena “purimā, bhikkhave,
tika-s0201t:476_2: koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāyā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Avijjāsavabhavāsavānaṃ
tika-s0201t:476_3: ciraparivutthatāya dassitāya tabbhāvabhāvino kāmāsavassa ciraparivutthatā dassitāva
tika-s0201t:476_4: hoti. Aññesu ca yathāvutte dhamme okāsañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānesu mānādīsu
tika-s0201t:476_6: ca etesaṃyeva, na aññesanti etesveva āsava-saddo niruḷhoti daṭṭhabbo. Na cettha diṭṭhāsavo
tika-s0201t:476_7: nāgatoti gahetabbaṃ bhavataṇhāya viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi bhavāsavaggahaṇeneva gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:476_8: Āyataṃ anādikālikattā. Pasavantīti phalanti. Na hi taṃ kiñci saṃsāradukkhaṃ atthi,
tika-s0201t:476_9: yaṃ āsavehi vinā uppajjeyya. Purimāni cetthāti ettha etesu catūsu atthavitappesu
tika-s0201t:476_10: purimāni tīṇi. Yatthāti yesu suttābhidhammapadesesu. Tattha yujjanti kilesesuyeva
tika-s0201t:476_11: yathāvuttassa atthattayassa sambhavato. Pacchimaṃ “āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savantī”ti
tika-s0201t:477_0: Diṭṭhadhammā vuccanti paccakkhabhūtā khandhā, diṭṭhadhamme bhavā diṭṭhadhammikā.
tika-s0201t:478_0: Yena devūpapatyassāti yena kammakilesappakārena āsavena devesu upapatti nibbatti
tika-s0201t:478_1: assa mayhanti sambandho. Gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo ākāsacārī assanti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā
tika-s0201t:478_2: yojetabbaṃ. Ettha ca yakkhagandhabbatāya vinimuttā sabbā devagati devaggahaṇena gahitā.
tika-s0201t:478_3: Avasesā ca akusalā dhammāti akusalakammato avasesā akusalā dhammā āsavāti āgatāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:479_0: Paṭighātāyāti paṭisedhanāya. Parūpavā…pe… upaddavāti idaṃ yadi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-s0201t:479_2: parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā, ye ca tannimittā eva nirayādīsu
tika-s0201t:479_4: te sandhāya vuttaṃ. Te paneteti ete kāmarāgādikilesa-tebhūmakakammaparūpavādādiupaddavappakārā
tika-s0201t:479_5: āsavā. Yatthāti yasmiṃ vinayādipāḷipadese. Yathāti yena duvidhādippakārena aññesu
tika-s0201t:480_0: Nirayaṃ gamentīti nirayagāminiyā. Chakkanipāte āhuneyyasutte. Tattha hi āsavā chadhā
tika-s0201t:480_1: āgatā āsava-saddābhidheyyassa atthassa pabhedopacārena āsava-pade pabhedoti vutto,
tika-s0201t:480_2: koṭṭhāsattho vā pada-saddoti āsavapadeti āsavappakāre saddakoṭṭhāse atthakoṭṭhāse vāti attho.
tika-s0201t:481_0: Tathā hīti tasmā saṃvaraṇaṃ pidahanaṃ pavattituṃ appadānaṃ, teneva kāraṇenāti attho.
tika-s0201t:481_1: Sīlādisaṃvare adhippete pavattituṃ appadānavasena thakanabhāvasāmaññato dvāraṃ saṃvaritvāti
tika-s0201t:481_2: gehadvārasaṃvaraṇampi udāhaṭaṃ. Sīlasaṃvarotiādi heṭṭhā mūlapariyāyavaṇṇanāya vuttampi
tika-s0201t:481_3: imassa suttassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vattukāmo puna vadati. Yuttaṃ tāva
tika-s0201t:481_4: sīlasatiñāṇānaṃ saṃvarattho pāḷiyaṃ tathā āgatattā, khantivīriyānaṃ pana kathanti
tika-s0201t:481_5: āha “tesañcā”tiādi. Tassattho – yadipi “khamo hoti…pe… sītassa uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ
tika-s0201t:481_6: nādhivāsetī”tiādiniddese khantivīriyānaṃ saṃvarapariyāyo nāgato, uddese pana sabbāsavasaṃvarapariyāyanti
tika-s0201t:482_0: Pubbe sīlasatiñāṇānaṃ pāṭhantarena saṃvarabhāvo dassitoti idāni taṃ imināpi suttena
tika-s0201t:482_1: gahitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Khantivīriyasaṃvarā vuttāyeva “khamo hoti
tika-s0201t:482_2: sītassā”tiādinā pāḷiyā dassanavasena. “Tañca anāsanaṃ, tañca agocara”nti ayaṃ panettha
tika-s0201t:482_3: sīlasaṃvaroti tañca “yathārūpe”tiādinā vuttaṃ ayuttaṃ aniyatavatthukaṃ raho paṭicchannāsanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:482_4: tañca yathāvuttaṃ ayuttaṃ vesiyādigocaraṃ, “paṭisaṅkhāyoniso parivajjetī”ti āgataṃ
tika-s0201t:482_5: yaṃ parivajjanaṃ, ayaṃ pana ettha etasmiṃ sutte āgato sīlasaṃvaroti attho. Anāsanaparivajjanena
tika-s0201t:482_7: Tathā hi bhagavatā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”ti sīlasaṃvaravibhajane ācāragocarasampattiṃ
tika-s0201t:482_8: dassentena “atthi anācāro, atthi agocaro”tiādinā anācārāgocarā vibhajitvā dassitā.
tika-s0201t:482_9: Idañca ekadesena samudāyanidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ samuddapabbatanidassanaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:483_0: Sabbattha paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaroti ettha “yonisomanasikāro, paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaro”ti
tika-s0201t:483_1: vattabbaṃ. Na hi dassanapahātabbaniddese paṭisaṅkhāgahaṇaṃ atthi, “yoniso manasi
tika-s0201t:483_2: karotī”ti pana vuttaṃ. Yonisomanasikaraṇampi atthato paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaramevāti
tika-s0201t:483_3: evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne yuttametaṃ siyā. Keci pana “yattha yattha ‘idha paṭisaṅkhā
tika-s0201t:483_4: yoniso’ti āgataṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sandhāya ‘sabbattha paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaro’ti vutta”nti
tika-s0201t:483_5: vadanti. Tesaṃ matena “idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādikassa ñāṇasaṃvarena
tika-s0201t:483_6: ca asaṅgaho siyā, “dassanaṃ paṭisevanā bhāvanā ca ñāṇasaṃvaro”ti ca vacanaṃ virujjheyya,
tika-s0201t:483_7: tasmā vuttanayenevettha attho veditabbo. “Sabbattha paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaro”ti iminā
tika-s0201t:483_8: sattasupi ṭhānesu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, so ñāṇasaṃvaroti parivajjanādivasena vuttā sīlādayo
tika-s0201t:483_9: sīlasaṃvarādayoti ayamattho dassito. Evaṃ sati saṃvarānaṃ saṅkaro viya hotīti te
tika-s0201t:483_11: sīlasaṃvarādibhāvena gahitattā, tathā aggahitānaṃ gahaṇenāti attho. Te pana aggahite
tika-s0201t:484_0: Etena sīlasaṃvarādinā karaṇabhūtena, kāraṇabhūtena vā. Dhammāti kusalākusaladhammā.
tika-s0201t:484_1: Sīlasaṃvarādinā hi sahajātakoṭiyā, upanissayakoṭiyā vā paccayabhūtena anuppannā kusalā
tika-s0201t:484_2: dhammā uppattiṃ gacchanti uppajjanti, tathā aniruddhā akusalā dhammā nirodhaṃ gacchanti
tika-s0201t:484_3: nirujjhantīti attho. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anuppannā ceva āsavā na uppajjanti, uppannā ca
tika-s0201t:484_4: āsavā pahīyantī”ti akusaladhammānaṃ anuppādapahānāni eva vuttāni, na kusaladhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:484_5: uppādādayoti? Nayidamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, “yoniso ca kho, bhikkhave, manasikaroto”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:484_6: kusaladhammānampi uppatti pakāsitāva āsavasaṃvaraṇassa padhānabhāvena gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:484_7: Tathā hi pariyosānepi “ye āsavā dassanā pahātabbā, te dassanā pahīnā hontī”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:485_0: 15. Jānato passatoti ettha dassanampi paññācakkhunāva dassanaṃ adhippetaṃ, na maṃsacakkhunā
tika-s0201t:485_1: dibbacakkhunā vāti āha “dvepi padāni ekatthānī”ti. Evaṃ santepīti padadvayassa ekatthatthepi.
tika-s0201t:485_2: Ñāṇalakkhaṇanti ñāṇassa sabhāvaṃ, visayassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhananti attho. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:485_4: attho. Tenevāha “ñāṇena vivaṭe dhamme”ti. “Jānato passato”ti ca jānanadassanamukhena
tika-s0201t:485_5: puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā pavattāti āha “ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇappabhāvaṃ upādāya puggalaṃ
tika-s0201t:485_6: niddisatī”ti. Jānato passatoti “yoniso ca manasikāraṃ ayoniso ca manasikāra”nti vakkhamānattā
tika-s0201t:485_7: yonisomanasikāravisayajānanaṃ, ayonisomanasikāravisayadassanaṃ. Tañca kho pana nesaṃ
tika-s0201t:485_8: āsavānaṃ khayūpāyasabhāvassa adhippetattā uppādanānuppādanavasena na ārammaṇamattenāti
tika-s0201t:486_0: “Jānato”ti vatvā jānanañca anussavākārapaṭivitakkamattavasena na idhādhippetaṃ, atha
tika-s0201t:486_1: kho rūpādi viya cakkhuviññāṇena yonisomanasikārāyonisomanasikāre paccakkhe katvā
tika-s0201t:486_2: tesaṃ uppādavasena dassananti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “passato”ti vuttanti evaṃ vā
tika-s0201t:486_3: ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Aññatthāpi hi “evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato, jānaṃ jānāti passaṃ
tika-s0201t:486_4: passati, evaṃ jānantā evaṃ passantā, ajānataṃ apassata”nti ca ādīsu ñāṇakiccassa
tika-s0201t:486_6: Te hi “samādhinā jānato vipassanāya passato jānaṃ jānāti passaṃ passati, evaṃ jānanā
tika-s0201t:486_7: samatho, passanā vipassanā”ti ca ādinā papañcenti. Teti papañcā. Imasmiṃ attheti
tika-s0201t:486_8: “jānato”tiādinayappavatte imasmiṃ suttapadaatthe niddhāriyamāne. Na yujjanti jānanadassanānaṃ
tika-s0201t:487_0: Āsavappahānaṃ āsavānaṃ accantappahānaṃ. So pana nesaṃ anuppādo sabbena sabbaṃ khīṇatā
tika-s0201t:487_1: abhāvo evāti āha “āsavānaṃ accantakhayamasamuppādaṃ khīṇākāraṃ natthibhāva”nti. Ujumaggānusārinoti
tika-s0201t:487_2: kilesavaṅkassa kāyavaṅkādīnañca pahānena ujubhūte savipassane heṭṭhimamagge anussarantassa.
tika-s0201t:487_3: Tadeva hissa sikkhanaṃ. Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Tato aññā anantarāti khayasaṅkhāte
tika-s0201t:487_4: aggamagge tappariyāpannameva ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, tadanantaraṃ pana aññaṃ arahattanti.
tika-s0201t:487_5: Yadipi gāthāyaṃ “khayasmiṃ”icceva vuttaṃ, samucchedavasena pana āsavehi khīṇotīti
tika-s0201t:487_6: maggo khayoti vuccatīti āha “maggo āsavakkhayoti vutto”ti. Samaṇoti samitapāpo adhippeto.
tika-s0201t:487_7: So pana khīṇāsavo hotīti “āsavānaṃ khayā”ti imassa phalapariyāyatā vuttā, nippariyāyena
tika-s0201t:487_8: pana āsavakkhayo maggo, tena pattabbato phalaṃ. Eteneva nibbānassapi āsavakkhayabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:488_0: “Jānato passato”ti jānato eva passato evāti evamettha niyamo icchito, na aññathā
tika-s0201t:488_1: visesābhāvato aniṭṭhasādhanato cāti tassa niyamassa phalaṃ dassetuṃ “no ajānato no
tika-s0201t:488_2: apassato”ti vuttanti āha “yo pana na jānāti na passati, tassa neva vadāmīti attho”ti.
tika-s0201t:488_3: Iminā dūrīkatāyonisomanasikāro idhādhippeto, yonisomanasikāro ca āsavakkhayassa ekantikakāraṇanti
tika-s0201t:488_4: dasseti. Etenāti “no ajānato no apassato”ti vacanena. Te paṭikkhittāti ke pana teti?
tika-s0201t:488_5: “Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti, ahetū apaccayā
tika-s0201t:488_6: sattā visujjhantī”ti evamādivādā. Tesu hi keci abhijātisaṅkantimattena bhavasaṅkantimattena
tika-s0201t:488_7: ca saṃsārasuddhiṃ paṭijānanti, aññe issarapajāpatikālādivasena, tayidaṃ sabbaṃ “saṃsārādīhī”ti
tika-s0201t:489_0: Purimena vā padadvayenāti “jānato, passato”ti iminā padadvayena. Upāyo vutto “āsavakkhayassā”ti
tika-s0201t:489_1: adhikārato viññāyati. Imināti “no ajānato, no apassato”ti iminā padadvayena. Anupāyo
tika-s0201t:489_2: eva hi āsavānaṃ khayassa yadidaṃ yoniso ca ayoniso ca manasikārassa ajānanaṃ adassanañca,
tika-s0201t:489_3: tena tathattāya appaṭipattito micchāpaṭipattito ca. Nanu “passato”ti iminā ayonisomanasikāro
tika-s0201t:489_4: yathā na uppajjati, evaṃ dassane adhippete purimeneva anupāyapaṭisedho vutto hotīti?
tika-s0201t:489_5: Na hoti, ayonisomanasikārānuppādanassapi upāyabhāvato satibalena saṃvutacakkhundriyāditā
tika-s0201t:489_6: viya sampajaññabaleneva niccādivasena abhūtajānanābhāvo hotīti. Tenāha “saṅkhepena…pe…
tika-s0201t:489_7: hotī”ti. Tattha saṅkhepenāti samāsena, anvayato byatirekato ca vitthāraṃ akatvāti
tika-s0201t:489_8: attho. Ñāṇaṃ…pe… dassitaṃ hoti “jānato”tiādinā ñāṇasseva gahitattā. Yadi evaṃ “svāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:489_9: saṃvaro”tiādi kathaṃ nīyatīti? Ñāṇassa padhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ evamayaṃ desanā katāti
tika-s0201t:489_10: nāyaṃ doso, tathā aññatthāpi “ariyaṃ vo bhikkhave sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi saupanisaṃ
tika-s0201t:490_0: Dabbajātikoti dabbarūpo. So hi drabyoti vuccati “drabyaṃ vinassati nādrabya”ntiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:490_1: Dabbajātiko vā sārasabhāvo, sāruppasīlācāroti attho. Yathāha “na kho dabba dabbā
tika-s0201t:490_2: evaṃ nibbeṭhentī”ti. Vattasīse ṭhatvāti vattaṃ uttamaṅgaṃ, dhuraṃ vā katvā. Yo hi
tika-s0201t:490_3: parisuddhājīvo kātuṃ ajānantānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ, attano vā vātātapādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:490_4: chattādīni karoti, so vattasīse ṭhatvā karoti nāma. Padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbā
tika-s0201t:490_5: nāthakaraṇadhammabhāvena upanissayabhāvato. Vuttañhi “yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni
tika-s0201t:491_1: tassā eva maggabhūto manasikāro. Aniccādīsu aniccantiādināti aniccadukkhaasubhaanattasabhāvesu
tika-s0201t:491_2: dhammesu “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ asubhaṃ anattā”tiādinā eva nayena, aviparītasabhāvenāti
tika-s0201t:491_3: attho. Saccānulomikena vāti saccābhisamayassa anulomavasena. Cittassa āvaṭṭanātiādinā
tika-s0201t:491_4: āvaṭṭanāya paccayabhūtā tato purimuppannā manodvārikā kusalajavanappavatti phalavohārena
tika-s0201t:491_5: tathā vuttā. Tassā hi vasena sā kusaluppattiyā upanissayo hoti. Āvajjanā hi bhavaṅgacittaṃ
tika-s0201t:491_6: āvaṭṭayatīti āvaṭṭanā. Anu anu āvaṭṭetīti anvāvaṭṭanā. Bhavaṅgārammaṇato aññaṃ ābhujatīti
tika-s0201t:491_7: ābhogo. Samannāharatīti samannāhāro. Tadevārammaṇaṃ attānaṃ anubandhitvā uppajjamānaṃ
tika-s0201t:491_8: manasi karoti ṭhapetīti manasikāro. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ upāyapathamanasikāralakkhaṇo
tika-s0201t:491_9: yonisomanasikāro nāma vuccati, yassa vasena puggalo dukkhādīni saccāni āvajjituṃ
tika-s0201t:491_10: sakkoti. Ayonisomanasikāre saccapaṭikūlenāti saccābhisamayassa ananulomavasena. Sesaṃ
tika-s0201t:492_0: Yuttinti upapattisādhanayuttiṃ, hetunti attho. Tenevāha “yasmā”tiādi. Etthāti “ayoniso
tika-s0201t:492_1: bhikkhave…pe… pahīyantī”ti etasmiṃ pāṭhe. Tatthāti vākyopaññāsanaṃ. Kasmā panettha
tika-s0201t:492_2: ayamuddesaniddeso parivattoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yoniso”tiādi. Tattha manasikārapadaṃ
tika-s0201t:492_3: dvinnaṃ sādhāraṇanti adhippāyena “yoniso ayonisoti imehi tāva dvīhi padehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:492_4: Yonisoti hi yonisomanasikāro, ayonisoti ca ayonisomanasikāro tattha anuvattanato
tika-s0201t:492_5: vakkhamānattā ca. Satipi anatthuppattisāmaññe bhavādīsu puggalassa bahulisāmaññaṃ
tika-s0201t:492_6: dassetvā taṃ parivattitvā visesadassanattaṃ nāvādi upamāttayaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:493_0: Anuppannāti anibbattā. Ārammaṇavisesavasena tassa anuppatti veditabbā, na rūpārammaṇādiārammaṇasāmaññena,
tika-s0201t:493_1: nāpi āsavavasena. Tenāha “ananubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ…pe… aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre
tika-s0201t:493_2: anuppannā nāma āsavā na santī”ti. Vatthunti saviññāṇakāviññāṇakappabhedaṃ āsavuppattikāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:493_3: Ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhūtarūpādīni. Idāni āsavavasenapi anuppannapariyāyo labbhatīti
tika-s0201t:493_5: suddhipakatitāya. Pāḷiyā uddisanaṃ uddeso, atthakathanaṃ paripucchā. Ajjhayanaṃ pariyatti,
tika-s0201t:493_6: cīvarasibbādi navakammaṃ, samathavipassanānuyogo yonisomanasikāro. Tādisenāti yādisena
tika-s0201t:493_8: nāma pariyuṭṭhānatibbatāya veditabbā, sā ca abhiṇhuppattiyā bahulīkāratoti te laddhāsevanā
tika-s0201t:493_9: bahulabhāvaṃ pattā maddantā pharantā chādentā andhākāraṃ karontā aparāparaṃ uppajjamānā
tika-s0201t:493_10: ekasantānanayena “uppannā pavaḍḍhantī”ti vuccanti. Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ uppajjamānā
tika-s0201t:493_11: uppannā pavaḍḍhantīti vuccantī”ti. Ito aññathāti ito aparāparuppannānaṃ ekattaggahaṇato
tika-s0201t:494_0: So ca jānātīti dhammuddhaccaviggahābhāvamāha. Kārakassevāti yuttayogasseva. Yassa
tika-s0201t:494_1: panātiādinā anuddesikaṃ katvā vuttamatthaṃ purātanassa purisātisayassa paṭipattidassanena
tika-s0201t:494_3: sabrahmacārīnaṃ āyatiṃ tathāpaṭipattikāraṇaṃ hoti, yato edisaṃ vatthu vuccati. Tasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:494_4: yevāti maṇḍalārāmeyeva. Ācariyaṃ āpucchitvāti attano uddesācariyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:494_5: gantuṃ āpucchitvā. Ācariyaṃ vanditvāti kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ mahārakkhitattheraṃ vanditvā.
tika-s0201t:494_6: Uddesamagganti yathāāraddhaṃ uddesapabandhaṃ. Tadā kira mukhapāṭheneva bahū ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0201t:494_7: uddisāpetvā manosajjhāyavasena dhammaṃ sajjhāyanti. Tatthāyaṃ thero paññavantatāya
tika-s0201t:494_8: uddesaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhorayho, so “idānāhaṃ anāgāmī, kiṃ mayhaṃ uddesenā”ti
tika-s0201t:494_9: saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā dutiyadivase uddesakāle ācariyaṃ upasaṅkami. “Uppannā pahīyantī”ti
tika-s0201t:494_10: ettha uppannasadisā “uppannā”ti vuttā, na paccuppannā. Na hi paccuppannesu āsavesu
tika-s0201t:494_11: maggena pahānaṃ sambhavatīti āha “ye pana…pe… natthī”ti. Vattamānuppannā khaṇattayasamaṅgino.
tika-s0201t:494_12: Tesaṃ paṭipattiyā pahānaṃ natthi uppajjanārahānaṃ paccayaghātena anuppādanameva tāya pahānanti.
tika-s0201t:495_0: 16. Yadi evaṃ dutiyapadaṃ kimatthiyanti? Padadvayaggahaṇaṃ āsavānaṃ uppannānuppannabhāvasambhavadassanatthañceva
tika-s0201t:495_2: Aññampīti ñāṇato aññampi satisaṃvarādiṃ. Dassanāti idaṃ hetumhi nissakkavacananti
tika-s0201t:495_3: dassanenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanena tadatthaṃ vivarati. Esa nayoti tamevatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0201t:495_4: Dassanenāti sotāpattimaggena. So hi paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato “dassana”nti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:495_5: Yadipi taṃ gotrabhu paṭhamataraṃ passati, disvā pana kattabbakiccassa kilesappahānassa
tika-s0201t:495_6: akaraṇato na taṃ dassananti vuccati. Āvajjanaṭṭhāniyañhi taṃ ñāṇaṃ maggassa, nibbānārammaṇattasāmaññena
tika-s0201t:495_7: cetaṃ vuttaṃ, na nibbānapaṭivijjhanena, tasmā dhammacakkhu punappunaṃ nibbattanena
tika-s0201t:495_8: bhāvanaṃ appattaṃ dassanaṃ nāma, dhammacakkhuñca pariññādikiccakaraṇavasena catusaccadhammadassanaṃ
tika-s0201t:495_9: tadabhisamayoti nutthettha gotrabhussa dassanabhāvappatti. Ayañca vicāro parato aṭṭhakathāyameva
tika-s0201t:495_11: cettha satisaṃvaro veditabbo. Paṭisevati etenāti paṭisevanaṃ, paccayesu idamatthikatāñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:495_12: Adhivāseti khamati etāyāti adhivāsanā, sītādīnaṃ khamanākārena pavatto adoso, tappadhānā
tika-s0201t:495_13: vā cattāro kusalakkhandhā. Parivajjeti etenāti parivajjanaṃ, vāḷamigādīnaṃ pariharaṇavasena
tika-s0201t:495_14: pavattā cetanā, tathāpavattā vā cattāro kusalakkhandhā. Kāmavitakkādike vinodeti
tika-s0201t:495_15: vitudati etenāti vinodanaṃ, kusalavīriyaṃ. Paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhe catusaccadhamme
tika-s0201t:495_16: bhāvanāvasena uppajjanato bhāvanā, sesamaggattayaṃ. Na hi taṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ kiñci
tika-s0201t:497_2: manasikaraṇaṃ arahantīti manasikaraṇīyā, tappaṭipakkhato amanasikaraṇīyāti āha “amanasikaraṇīyeti
tika-s0201t:497_3: tabbiparīte”ti. Sesapadesūti “manasikaraṇīye dhamme appajānanto”tiādīsu. Yasmā kusaladhammesupi
tika-s0201t:497_4: subhasukhaniccādivasena manasikāro assādanādihetutāya sāvajjo ahitadukkhāvaho akusaladhammesupi
tika-s0201t:497_5: aniccādivasena manasikāro nibbidādihetutāya anavajjo hitasukhāvaho, tasmā “dhammato
tika-s0201t:497_6: niyamo natthī”ti vatvā “ākārato pana atthī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:498_0: Vā-saddo yebhuyyena “mamaṃ vā hi bhikkhave, devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”tiādīsu
tika-s0201t:498_1: vikappattho diṭṭho, na samuccayatthoti tattha samuccayatthe payogaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi
tika-s0201t:498_2: vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā samuccayatthadīpakaṃ panetaṃ suttapadaṃ samudāhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0201t:499_0: Kāmāsavoti pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhāte kāme āsavo kāmāsavo. Tenāha “pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo”ti.
tika-s0201t:499_1: Bhavāsavaṃ pana ṭhapetvā sabbo lobho kāmāsavoti yuttaṃ siyā. Rūpārūpabhaveti kammupapattibhedato
tika-s0201t:499_2: duvidhepi rūpārūpabhave chandarāgo. Jhānanikantīti jhānassādo. “Sundaramidaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:499_3: niccaṃ dhuva”ntiādinā assādentassa uppajjamāno sassatucchedadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo bhave
tika-s0201t:499_4: āsavoti bhavāsavo. Evanti sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhisaṅgahato bhavāsaveneva
tika-s0201t:499_5: diṭṭhāsavo gahito taṃsahagatarāgatāyāti adhippāyo. Apare pana “diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavena
tika-s0201t:499_6: ca saṅgahito”ti vadanti. Ettha ca “bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu
tika-s0201t:499_7: uppajjatī”ti vacanato diṭṭhisampayuttarāgassa bhavāsavabhāvo vicāretabbo, atha “kāmasahagatā
tika-s0201t:499_8: saññāmanasikārā”tiādīsu viya ārammaṇakaraṇattho sahagatattho, evaṃ sati bhavāsave
tika-s0201t:499_9: diṭṭhāsavassa samodhānagamanaṃ kataṃ na siyā. Na hi tampayogatabbhāvādike asati taṃsaṅgaho
tika-s0201t:499_10: yutto, tasmā yathāvuttapāḷiṃ anusārena diṭṭhigatasampayuttalobhopi kāmāsavoti yuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:499_11: siyā. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikadukkhānañhi kāraṇabhūtā kāmāsavādayopi dvidhā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:500_0: Abhidhamme ca kāmāsavaniddese “kāmesūti kāmarāgadiṭṭhirāgādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūtesu tebhūmakesu
tika-s0201t:500_1: vatthukāmesū”ti attho sambhavati. Tattha hi uppajjamānā sā taṇhā sabbāpi na kāmacchandādināmaṃ
tika-s0201t:500_2: na labhatīti. Yadi pana lobho kāmāsavabhavāsavavinimuttopi siyā, so yadā diṭṭhigatavippayuttesu
tika-s0201t:500_3: cittesu uppajjati, tadā tena sampayutto avijjāsavo āsavavippayuttoti domanassavicikicchuddhaccasampayuttassa
tika-s0201t:500_5: uppanno moho siyā āsavasampayutto, siyā āsavavippayutto”ti. “Kāmāsavo aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittuppādesu
tika-s0201t:500_6: uppajjatī’ti, “kāmāsavaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo”ti ca vacanato diṭṭhisahagatarāgo
tika-s0201t:500_7: kāmāsavo na hotīti na sakkā vattuṃ. Kiñca abhijjhākāmarāgānaṃ viseso āsavadvayaekāsavabhāvo
tika-s0201t:500_8: siyā, na abhijjhāya ca noāsavabhāvoti noāsavalobhassa sabbhāvo vicāretabbo. Na hi
tika-s0201t:500_9: atthi abhidhamme “āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā āsavassa dhammassa āsavassa ca noāsavassa
tika-s0201t:500_10: ca dhammassa hetupaccayo”ti sattamo navamo ca pañho. Gaṇanāyañca “hetuyā sattā”ti
tika-s0201t:500_11: vuttaṃ, no “navā”ti. Diṭṭhisampayutte pana lobhe noāsave vijjamāne sattamanavamāpi
tika-s0201t:500_12: pañhā vissajjanaṃ labheyyuṃ, gaṇanāya ca “hetuyā navā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, na pana
tika-s0201t:500_13: vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhivippayutte ca lobhe noāsave vijjamāne vattabbaṃ vuttameva. Yasmā pana
tika-s0201t:500_14: suttantadesanā nāma pariyāyakathā, na abhidhammadesanā viya nippariyāyakathā, tasmā
tika-s0201t:500_15: balavakāmarāgasseva kāmāsavaṃ dassetuṃ “kāmāsavoti pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:501_0: Sāmaññena bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā idha tayo eva āsavā vuttāti tassa
tika-s0201t:501_1: tadantogadhataṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ diṭṭhāsavo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati bhavāsavassa
tika-s0201t:501_2: animittavimokkhapaṭipakkhataṃ. Catūsu saccesu aññāṇanti idaṃ suttantanayaṃ nissāya
tika-s0201t:501_3: vuttaṃ. Suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā hesāti, tadantogadhattā vā pubbantādīnaṃ. Yathā atthato
tika-s0201t:501_4: kāmāsavādayo vavatthāpitā, tathā nesaṃ uppādavaḍḍhiyo dassento “kāmaguṇe”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:501_5: Assādato manasikarototi “subhasukhā”tiādinā assādanavasena manasi karontassa. Catuvipallāsapadaṭṭhānabhāvenāti
tika-s0201t:501_6: subhasaññādīnaṃ vatthubhāvena. Vuttanayapaccanīkatoti “kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā
tika-s0201t:501_8: vikkhambhayato samucchindantassa ca anuppanno ca kāmāsavo na uppajjati, uppanno ca
tika-s0201t:501_9: pahīyati. Tathā mahaggatadhammesu ceva sakalatebhūmakadhammesu ca ādīnavadassanapubbakaaniccādimanasikāravasena
tika-s0201t:501_10: nissaraṇapaṭipattiyā anuppannā ca bhavāsavaavijjāsavā na uppajjanti, uppannā ca pahīyantīti
tika-s0201t:501_11: evaṃ taṇhāpakkhe vuttassa nayassa paṭipakkhato sukkapakkhe vitthāro veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:502_0: Tayo evāti abhidhamme viya “cattāro”ti avatvā kasmā tayo eva āsavā idha imissaṃ dassanāpahātabbakathāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:502_1: vuttā? Tattha kāmāsavassa taṇhāpaṇidhibhāvato appaṇihitavimokkhapaṭipakkhatā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:502_2: Bhavesu niccaggāhānusārato yebhuyyato bhavarāgasampattito bhavāsavassa animittavimokkhapaṭipakkhatā,
tika-s0201t:502_3: bhavadiṭṭhiyā pana bhavāsavabhāve vattabbameva natthi, anattasaññāya ñāṇānubhāvasiddhito
tika-s0201t:502_4: avijjāsavassa suññatavimokkhapaṭipakkhatā. Etthāti etissaṃ āsavakathāyaṃ. Vaṇṇitanti
tika-s0201t:503_1: pana kāmāsavādayo “dassanā pahātabbe āsave”ti ettheva samāruḷhā. Atha vā yadaggena
tika-s0201t:503_2: so puggalodassanāpahātabbānaṃ āsavānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, tadaggena kāmāsavādīnampi adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:503_3: Na hi samaññābhedena vatthubhedo atthīti dassetuṃ “ettāvatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenevāha
tika-s0201t:503_4: “sāmaññato vuttāna”nti. Kasmā panettha dassanāpahātabbesu āsavesu dassetabbesu “ahosiṃ
tika-s0201t:503_5: nu kho aha”ntiādinā vicikicchā dassitāti āha “vicikicchāsīsena cetthā”tiādi. Evanti
tika-s0201t:503_6: yathā soḷasavatthukā vicikicchā uppajjati, evaṃ ayonisomanasikāroti.
tika-s0201t:504_0: Vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti
tika-s0201t:504_1: atīte attano vijjamānataṃ, adhiccasamuppattiāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “yato pabhuti ahaṃ, tato
tika-s0201t:504_2: pubbe na nu kho ahosi”nti atīte attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Kasmā? Vicikicchāya
tika-s0201t:504_3: ākāradvayāvalambanato. Tassā pana atītavatthutāya gahitattā sassatādhiccasamuppattiākāranissayatā
tika-s0201t:504_4: dassitā. Evaṃ āsappanaparisappanāpavattikaṃ katthacipi appaṭivattihetubhūtaṃ vicikicchaṃ
tika-s0201t:504_5: kasmā uppādetīti na codetabbametanti dassento āha “kiṃ kāraṇanti na vattabba”nti.
tika-s0201t:504_6: Sveva puthujjanabhāvo eva. Yadi evaṃ tassa ayonisomanasikāreneva bhavitabbanti āpannanti
tika-s0201t:504_7: āha “nanu ca puthujjanopi yoniso manasi karotī”ti. Tatthāti yonisomanasikaraṇe.
tika-s0201t:505: Jātiliṅgūpapattiyoti khattiyabrāhmaṇādijātiṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitādiliṅgaṃ devamanussādiupapattiñca. Nissāyāti upādāya.
tika-s0201t:506_0: Tasmiṃ kāle sattānaṃ majjhimappamāṇaṃ, tena yutto pamāṇiko, tadabhāvato, tato atītabhāvato
tika-s0201t:506_1: vā appamāṇiko veditabbo. Kecīti sārasamāsācariyā. Te hi “kathaṃ nu khoti issarena
tika-s0201t:506_2: vā brahmunā vā pubbakatena vā ahetuto vā nibbattoti cintetī”ti āhu. Tena vuttaṃ “hetuto
tika-s0201t:506_3: kaṅkhatīti vadantī”ti. Ahetuto nibbattikaṅkhāpi hi hetuparāmasanamevāti.
tika-s0201t:507: Paramparanti pubbāparappavattiṃ. Addhānanti kālādhivacanaṃ, tañca bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:508_0: Vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhāna”nti
tika-s0201t:508_1: anāgate attano vijjamānataṃ, ucchedāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “yasmiñca attabhāve ahaṃ, tato
tika-s0201t:508_2: paraṃ na nu kho bhavissāmī”ti anāgate attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:509_1: vuttaṃ. “Idaṃ kathaṃ idaṃ katha”nti pavattanato kathaṃkathā, vicikicchā, sā assa
tika-s0201t:509_2: atthīti kathaṃkathīti āha “vicikiccho hotī”ti. Kā ettha cintā, ummattako viya hi
tika-s0201t:509_3: bālaputhujjanoti paṭikacceva vuttanti adhippāyo. Taṃ mahāmātāya puttaṃ. Muṇḍesunti
tika-s0201t:509_4: muṇḍena anicchantaṃ jāgaraṇakāle na sakkāti suttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ kuladhammatāya yathā
tika-s0201t:509_5: taṃ ekacce kulatāpasā, rājabhayenāti ca vadanti.
tika-s0201t:510: Sītibhūtanti idaṃ madhurakabhāvappattiyā kāraṇavacanaṃ. “Setibhūta”ntipi pāṭho, udake ciraṭṭhānena setabhāvaṃ pattanti attho.
tika-s0201t:511_0: Attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati kaṇṇo viya sūtaputtasaññī. Jātiyā vibhāviyamānāya
tika-s0201t:511_1: “aha”nti tassa attano parāmasanaṃ sandhāyāha “evañhi siyā kaṅkhā”ti. Manussāpi ca
tika-s0201t:511_2: rājāno viyāti manussāpi keci ekacce rājāno viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:512_0: Vuttanayameva “saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāyā”tiādinā. Etthāti “kathaṃ nu khosmī”ti pade.
tika-s0201t:512_1: Abbhantare jīvoti paraparikappitaṃ antarattānaṃ vadati. Soḷasaṃsādīnanti ādi-saddena
tika-s0201t:513_0: “Sattapaññatti jīvavisayā”ti diṭṭhigatikānaṃ matimattaṃ, paramatthato pana sā attabhāvavisayāvāti
tika-s0201t:513_1: āha “attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhāna”nti, yatāyaṃ āgato, yattha ca gamissati, taṃ ṭhānanti attho.
tika-s0201t:514_0: 19. Yathā ayaṃ vicikicchā uppajjatīti ayaṃ vuttappabhedā vicikicchā yathā uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:514_1: evaṃ ayoniso manasikaroto. Etena vicikicchāya attābhinivesasannissayatamāha. Yathā
tika-s0201t:514_2: hi vicikicchā attābhinivesaṃ nissāya pavattati, yato sā sassatādhiccasamuppattisassatucchedākārāvalambinī
tika-s0201t:514_3: vuttā, evaṃ attābhinivesopi taṃ nissāya pavattati “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā antogadhāhaṃkārassa
tika-s0201t:514_5: thāmagatattā”ti. Vikappatthoti aniyamattho. “Aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:514_6: Suṭṭhu daḷhabhāvenāti abhinivesassa ativiya thāmagatabhāvena. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:514_7: bhave. Paccuppannamevāti avadhāraṇena anāgate atthibhāvaṃ nivatteti, na atīte tatthapi
tika-s0201t:514_8: sati atthitāya ucchedaggāhassa sabbhāvato. Atīte eva natthi, na anāgatepīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:515_0: Saññākkhandhasīsenāti saññākkhandhapamukhena, saññākkhandhaṃ pamukhaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:515_1: Khandheti pañcapi khandhe. Attāti gahetvāti “sañjānanasabhāvo me attā”ti abhinivissa.
tika-s0201t:515_2: Pakāsetabbaṃ vatthuṃ viya, attānampi pakāsento padīpo viya, sañjānitabbaṃ nīlādiārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:515_3: viya attānampi sañjānātīti evaṃdiṭṭhitopi diṭṭhigatito hotīti vuttaṃ “attanāva attānaṃ
tika-s0201t:515_4: sañjānāmī”ti. Svāyamattho saññaṃ tadaññataradhamme ca “attā anattā”ti ca gahaṇavasena
tika-s0201t:515_5: hotīti vuttaṃ “saññākkhandhasīsenā”tiādi. Ettha ca khandhavinimutto attāti gaṇhato
tika-s0201t:515_6: sassatadiṭṭhi, khandhaṃ pana “attā”ti gaṇhato ucchedadiṭṭhīti āha “sabbāpi sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyovā”ti.
tika-s0201t:516_0: Abhinivesākārāti vipariyesākārā. Vadatīti iminā kārakavedakasattānaṃ hitasukhāvabodhanasamatthataṃ
tika-s0201t:516_1: attano dīpeti. Tenāha “vacīkammassa kārako”ti. Vedetīti vediyo, vediyova vedeyyo.
tika-s0201t:516_2: Īdisānañhi padānaṃ bahulā kattusādhanataṃ saddasatthavidū maññanti. Uppādavato ekanteneva
tika-s0201t:516_3: vayo icchitabbo, sati ca udayabbayatte neva niccatāti “nicco”ti vadantassa adhippāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:516_4: vivaranto āha “uppādavayarahito”ti. Sārabhūtoti niccatāya eva sārabhāvo. Sabbakālikoti
tika-s0201t:516_5: sabbasmiṃ kāle vijjamāno. Pakatibhāvanti sabhāvabhūtaṃ pakatiṃ, “vado”tiādinā vā
tika-s0201t:516_6: vuttaṃ pakatisaṅkhātaṃ sabhāvaṃ. Sassatisamanti sassatiyā samaṃ sassatisamaṃ, thāvaraṃ
tika-s0201t:516_7: niccakālanti attho. Tatheva ṭhassatīti yenākārena pubbe aṭṭhāsi, etarahi tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0201t:517_0: Paccakkhanidassanaṃ idaṃ-saddassa āsannapaccakkhabhāvaṃ katvā. Diṭṭhiyeva diṭṭhigatanti
tika-s0201t:517_1: gata-saddassa padavaḍḍhanamattataṃ āha. Diṭṭhīsugatanti micchādiṭṭhīsu pariyāpannanti
tika-s0201t:517_3: gahaṇamattaṃ. Yathā pana pabbatajalaviduggāni dunniggamanāni, evaṃ diṭṭhiggāhopīti
tika-s0201t:517_4: āha “dunniggamanaṭṭhena gahana”nti. Taṃ nāma udakaṃ, taṃ gahetvā taṃ atikkamitabbato
tika-s0201t:517_5: kantāro, nirudakavanaṃ, taṃ pavanantipi vuccati. Añño pana araññapadeso duratikkamanaṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:517_6: kantāro viyāti, evaṃ diṭṭhipīti āha “duratikkamanaṭṭhenā”tiādi. Vinivijjhanaṃ vitudanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:517_7: Vilomanaṃ vipariṇāmabhāvo. Anavaṭṭhitasabhāvatāya vicalitaṃ vipphanditanti āha “kadācī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:517_8: Andubandhanādi viya nissarituṃ appadānavasena aseribhāvakaraṇaṃ bandhanaṭṭho, kilesakammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ
tika-s0201t:517_9: paccayabhāvena dūragatampi ākaḍḍhitvā saṃyojanaṃ saṃyojanaṭṭho, diṭṭhipi tathārūpāti
tika-s0201t:517_10: vuttaṃ “diṭṭhisaṃyojana”nti. Bandhanatthaṃ dassento kiccasiddhiyāti adhippāyo. Tenevāha
tika-s0201t:517_11: “diṭṭhisaṃyojanena…pe… muccatī”ti. Tattha etehīti iminā jātiādidukkhassa paccayabhāvamāha.
tika-s0201t:517_12: Jātiādike dukkhadhamme sarūpato dassetvāpi “na parimuccati dukkhasmā”ti vadantena
tika-s0201t:517_13: bhagavatā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ nāma sabbānatthakaraṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ sabbassapi dukkhassa
tika-s0201t:517_14: mūlabhūtanti ayamattho vibhāvitoti dassetuṃ “kiṃ vā bahunā, sakalavaṭṭadukkhatopi
tika-s0201t:518_0: 20. Nanu cettha diṭṭhisaṃyojanadassanena sīlabbataparāmāsopi dassetabbo, evañhi dassanena
tika-s0201t:518_1: pahātabbā āsavā anavasesato dassitā hontīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yasmā”tiādi. Sīlabbataparāmāso
tika-s0201t:518_2: kāmāsavādiggahaṇeneva gahito hoti kāmāsavādihetukattā tassa. Appahīnakāmarāgādiko
tika-s0201t:518_3: hi kāmasukhatthaṃ vā bhavasuddhatthaṃ vā evaṃ bhavavisuddhi hotīti sīlabbatāni parāmasanti,
tika-s0201t:518_4: “imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro
tika-s0201t:518_5: vā”ti, “tattha nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva ṭhassāmī”ti,
tika-s0201t:518_6: “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhi sīlabbatena suddhī”ti ca suttevuttaṃ sīlabbataṃ parāmasanti.
tika-s0201t:518_8: gahitattāti sīlabbataparāmāsassa diṭṭhiggahaṇena gahitattā yathā “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:518_9: Tesanti dassanapahātabbānaṃ. Dassetuṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya. Tabbiparītassāti
tika-s0201t:519_0: Tassāti “sutavā”tiādipāṭhassa. Tāvāti “sutavā”ti ito paṭṭhāya yāva “so idaṃ dukkha”nti
tika-s0201t:519_1: padaṃ, tāva imaṃ padaṃ avadhiṃ katvāti attho. Heṭṭhā vuttanayenāti ariyasappurisa-ariyadhamma-sappurisadhamma-manasikaraṇīya-amanasikaraṇīyapadānaṃ
tika-s0201t:519_2: yathākkamaṃ mūlapariyāye idha gahetvā vuttanayena attho veditabboti sambandho. Vuttapaccanīkatoti
tika-s0201t:519_3: “sutavā ariyasāvako, ariyānaṃ dassāvī, sappurisānaṃ dassāvī”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ sabbākārena
tika-s0201t:519_4: vuttaviparītato attho veditabbo, kovidavinītapadānaṃ pana na sabbappakārena vuttaviparītato.
tika-s0201t:519_5: Arahā hi nippariyāyena ariyadhamme kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto ca nāma. Tenāha “paccanīkato
tika-s0201t:519_6: ca sabbākārena…pe… ariyasāvakoti veditabbo”ti. Saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ sikhāppattavipassanā.
tika-s0201t:519_7: Keci pana “bhaṅgañāṇato paṭṭhāya sikhāpattavipassanā”ti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ. Tadanurūpena
tika-s0201t:519_8: atthenāti tassa puggalassa anurūpena ariyaṭṭhena, na paṭivedhavasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:519_9: Kalyāṇaputhujjano hi ayaṃ. Yathā cassa “yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano”ti ārabhitvā “sopi
tika-s0201t:519_10: vuccati sikkhatīti sekkho”ti pariyāyena sekkhasutte sekkhabhāvo vutto, evaṃ idha
tika-s0201t:519_12: bodhipakkhiyadhammā tisso sikkhā eva vā sambhavanti, tesaṃ vasena imassa ariyasāvakādibhāvo
tika-s0201t:519_13: vutto. Tenāha “tadanurūpena atthenā”ti. Ariyassa sāvakoti vā ariyasāvakatthena eva
tika-s0201t:519_14: vutto yathā “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”ti. Sikhāppattavipassanāggahaṇañcettha vipassanaṃ
tika-s0201t:519_15: ussukkāpetvā anivattipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhitassa gahaṇatthanti yathāvuttā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā
tika-s0201t:520_0: 21. Yathā dhātumukhena vipassanaṃ abhiniviṭṭho dhātukammaṭṭhāniko āyatanādimukhena
tika-s0201t:520_1: abhiniviṭṭho āyatanādikammaṭṭhāniko, evaṃ saccamukhena abhiniviṭṭhoti vuttaṃ “catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko”ti.
tika-s0201t:520_2: Caturoghanittharaṇatthikehi kātabbato kammaṃ, bhāvanā. Kammameva visesādhigamassa
tika-s0201t:520_3: ṭhānaṃ kāraṇanti, kamme vā yathāvuttanaṭṭhena ṭhānaṃ avaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvanārambhokammaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:520_4: tadeva catusaccamukhena pavattaṃ etassa atthīti catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko. Ubhayaṃ nappavattati
tika-s0201t:520_5: etthāti appavatti. Uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhānoti ca catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ pāḷito
tika-s0201t:520_6: atthato ca uggahetvā manasikārayoggaṃ katvā ṭhito. Vipassanāmaggaṃ samāruḷhoti sappaccayanāmarūpadassane
tika-s0201t:520_7: patiṭṭhāya tadeva nāmarūpaṃ aniccādito sammasanto. Samannāharatīti vipassanāvajjanaṃ
tika-s0201t:520_8: sandhāyāha, tasmā yathā “idaṃ dukkha”nti vipassanāñāṇaṃ pavattati, evaṃ samannāharati
tika-s0201t:520_9: āvajjatīti attho. Kathaṃ panettha “manasi karotī”ti iminā “vipassatī”ti ayamattho
tika-s0201t:520_10: vutto hotīti āha “ettha…pe… vuttā”ti. Etthāti ca imasmiṃ sutteti attho. Vipassatīti
tika-s0201t:520_11: ca yathā upari visesādhigamo hoti, evaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā vipassati, oloketīti attho.
tika-s0201t:520_12: Maggopi vattabbo. Purimañhi saccadvayaṃ gambhīrattā duddasaṃ, itaraṃ duddasattā gambhīraṃ.
tika-s0201t:521_0: Abhinivesoti vipassanābhiniveso vipassanāpaṭipatti. Tadārammaṇeti taṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ
tika-s0201t:521_1: ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatte. Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvāti aviparītaṃ attano
tika-s0201t:521_2: ārammaṇaṃ sabhāvacchedanādikiccañceva aññāṇādilakkhaṇañca asaṅkarato hadaye ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0201t:521_3: Iminā pubbe nāmarūpaparicchede katepi dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇavavatthāpanaṃ paccayapariggahena
tika-s0201t:521_4: suvavatthāpitaṃ nāma hotīti dasseti yathā “dvikkhattuṃ baddhaṃ subaddha”nti. Evañhi
tika-s0201t:521_5: ñātapariññāya kiccaṃ siddhaṃ nāma hoti. Paccayato paccayuppannato ca vavatthāpitattā
tika-s0201t:521_6: pākaṭabhāvena siddhenapi siddhabhāvo pākaṭo hotīti vuttaṃ “ahutvā hontī”ti. Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:521_7: āropetīti asato hi uppādena bhavitabbaṃ, na sato, uppādavantato ca nesaṃ ekantena
tika-s0201t:521_8: icchitabbā paccayāyattavuttibhāvato, sati uppāde avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti nattheva
tika-s0201t:521_9: niccatāvakāsoti. Sūpaṭṭhitāniccatāya ca udayabbayadhammehi abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanato dukkhamanaṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:521_10: dukkhaṃ. Tenāha “udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā dukkhāti dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ āropetī”ti. Katthacipi
tika-s0201t:521_11: saṅkhāragate “mā jīri mā byādhiyī”ti alabbhanato natthi vasavattananti āha “avasavattanato
tika-s0201t:522_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇeti sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe. Ekapaṭivedhenevāti ekañāṇeneva paṭivijjhanena.
tika-s0201t:522_1: Paṭivedho paṭighātābhāvena visaye nissaṅgacārasaṅkhātaṃ nibbijjhanaṃ. Abhisamayo
tika-s0201t:522_2: avirajjhitvā visayassa adhigamasaṅkhāto avabodho. “Idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:522_3: na ito bhiyyo”ti paricchinditvā jānanameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti pariññāpaṭivedho.
tika-s0201t:522_4: Ayaṃ yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā
tika-s0201t:522_5: pavattiṃ gahetvā vutto, na pana maggañāṇassa “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādināpi vattanato. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:522_6: “na hissa tasmiṃ samaye”tiādi. Pahīnassa puna appahātabbatāya pakaṭṭhaṃ hānaṃ cajanaṃ
tika-s0201t:522_7: samucchindanaṃ pahānaṃ, pahānameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti pahānapaṭivedho. Ayampi
tika-s0201t:522_8: yena kilesena appahīyamānena maggabhāvanāya na bhavitabbaṃ, asati ca maggabhāvanāya
tika-s0201t:522_9: yo uppajjeyya, tassa kilesassa padaghātaṃ karontassa anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentassa
tika-s0201t:522_10: ñāṇassa tathāpavattiyā paṭighātābhāvena nissaṅgacāraṃ upādāya evaṃ vutto. Sacchikiriyā
tika-s0201t:522_11: paccakkhakaraṇaṃ, anussavākāraparivitakkādike muñcitvā sarūpato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ idaṃ
tika-s0201t:522_12: tanti yathāsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ, sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho.
tika-s0201t:522_13: Ayaṃ pana yassa āvaraṇassa asamucchindanato ñāṇaṃ nirodhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:522_14: tassa samucchindanato taṃ sarūpato vibhāvitameva pavattatīti evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0201t:523_0: Bhāvanā uppādanā vaḍḍhanā ca, tattha paṭhamamagge uppādanaṭṭhena, dutiyādīsu vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena,
tika-s0201t:523_1: ubhayatthāpi vā ubhayathāpi veditabbaṃ. Paṭhamamaggopi hi yathārahaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:523_2: pavattaṃ parijānanādiṃ vaḍḍhento pavattoti tatthāpi vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā sakkā
tika-s0201t:523_4: bhāvanā, sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti bhāvanā paṭivedho. Ayampi hi yathā ñāṇe pavatte
tika-s0201t:523_5: pacchā maggadhammānaṃ sarūpaparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā pavattimeva gahetvā
tika-s0201t:523_6: vutto, tiṭṭhatu tāva yathādhigatamaggadhammaṃ yathāpavattesu phaladhammesupi ayaṃ
tika-s0201t:523_7: yathādhigatasaccadhammesu viya vigatasammohova hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo
tika-s0201t:523_8: viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo”ti. Yato cassa dhammatāsañcoditā yathādhigatasaccadhammāvalambiniyo
tika-s0201t:523_11: vibhāvetabbā. Ekābhisamayena abhisametīti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0201t:524_0: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha “ariyamaggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena kiccakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:524_1: na ekābhisamayavasena. Tañhi kālena dukkhaṃ pajānāti, kālena samudayaṃ pajahati,
tika-s0201t:524_2: kālena nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, kālena maggaṃ bhāveti, aññathā ekassa ñāṇassa ekasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:524_3: khaṇe catukiccakaraṇaṃ na yujjati. Na hidaṃ katthaci diṭṭhampi suttaṃ atthī”ti. So
tika-s0201t:524_4: vattabbo – yadi ariyamaggañāṇaṃ nānābhisamayavasena saccāni abhisameti, na ekābhisamayavasena,
tika-s0201t:524_5: evaṃ sante paccekampi saccesu nānakkhaṇeneva pavatteyya, na ekakkhaṇena, tathā sati
tika-s0201t:524_6: dukkhādīnaṃ ekadesekadesameva parijānāti pajahatīti āpajjatīti nānābhisamaye paṭhamamaggādīhi
tika-s0201t:524_8: tato eva ekadesasotāpannāditā ca āpajjati anantaraphalattā lokuttarakusalānaṃ, na
tika-s0201t:524_9: ca taṃ yuttaṃ. Na hi kālabhedena vinā so eva sotāpanno ca asotāpanno cāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0201t:525_0: Apicāyaṃ nānābhisamayavādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “maggañāṇaṃ saccāni paṭivijjhantaṃ kiṃ
tika-s0201t:525_1: ārammaṇato paṭivijjhati, udāhu kiccato”ti? Jānamāno “kiccato”ti vadeyya, “kiccato
tika-s0201t:525_2: paṭivijjhantassa kiṃ nānābhisamayenā”ti vatvā paṭipāṭiyānidassanena saññāpetabbo.
tika-s0201t:525_3: Atha “ārammaṇato”ti vadeyya, evaṃ sante tassa ñāṇassa vipassanāñāṇassa viya dukkhasamudayānaṃ
tika-s0201t:525_4: accantapariññāsamucchedā na yuttā anissaṭattā. Tathā maggadassanaṃ. Na hi maggo sayameva
tika-s0201t:525_5: attānaṃ ārabbha pavattatīti yuttaṃ, maggantaraparikappanāya pana anavaṭṭhānaṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0201t:525_6: tasmā tīṇi saccāni kiccato, nirodhaṃ kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca paṭivijjhatīti evaṃ
tika-s0201t:525_7: asammohato paṭivijjhantassa maggañāṇassa nattheva nānābhisamayo. Vuttañhetaṃ “yo
tika-s0201t:525_8: bhikkhave dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passatī”tiādi. Na cetaṃ kālantaradassanaṃ
tika-s0201t:525_9: sandhāya vuttaṃ “yo nu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi …pe… dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadampi
tika-s0201t:525_11: āyasmatā gavampatittherena ābhatattā, paccekañca saccattayadassanassa yojitattā,
tika-s0201t:525_12: aññathā purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādidassanamayojaniyaṃ siyā. Na hi
tika-s0201t:525_13: lokuttaramaggo lokiyamaggo viya katakārībhāvena pavattati samucchedakattā, tathā
tika-s0201t:525_14: yojanena ca sabbadassanaṃ dassanantaraparamanti dassanānuparamo siyāti evaṃ āgamato
tika-s0201t:525_15: yuttito ca nānābhisamayo na yujjatīti saññāpetabbo. Evaṃ ce saññattiṃ gacchati, iccetaṃ
tika-s0201t:525_16: kusalaṃ. No ce gacchati, abhidhamme odhisokathāya saññāpetabboti.
tika-s0201t:526_0: Nirodhaṃ ārammaṇatoti nirodhameva ārammaṇatoti niyamo gahetabbo, na ārammaṇatovāti.
tika-s0201t:526_1: Tena nirodhe kiccatopi paṭivedho siddho hoti. Tasmiṃ samayeti saccānaṃ abhisamaye.
tika-s0201t:526_2: Vīsativatthukātiādi “tīṇi saññojanānī”ti vuttānaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. Catūsu āsavesūti
tika-s0201t:526_3: idaṃ abhidhammanayena vuttaṃ, na suttantanayena. Na hi sutte katthaci cattāro āsavā
tika-s0201t:526_4: āgatā atthi. Yadi vicikicchā na āsavo, atha kasmā “sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso,
tika-s0201t:526_5: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā dassanā pahātabbā”ti vuttanti āha “dassanā pahātabbā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:526_6: Ettha pariyāpannattāti etena sammāsaṅkappassa viya paññākkhandhe kiccasabhāgatāya
tika-s0201t:527_0: Sabbo attaggāho sakkāyadiṭṭhivinimutto natthīti vuttaṃ “channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ…pe… vibhattā”ti.
tika-s0201t:527_1: Sā hi diṭṭhi ekasmiṃ cittuppāde santāne ca ṭhitaṃ ekaṭṭhaṃ, tattha paṭhamaṃ sahajātekaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:527_2: itaraṃ pahānekaṭṭhaṃ, tadubhayampi niddhāretvā dassetuṃ “diṭṭhāsavehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:527_4: diṭṭhāsavato avasiṭṭhā. Tayopi āsavāti kāmāsavabhavāsavaavijjāsavā. Tathā hi pubbe
tika-s0201t:527_5: “catūsu āsavesū”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā bahū evettha āsavā pahātabbā, tasmā bahuvacananiddeso
tika-s0201t:527_6: kato “ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā dassanā pahātabbā”ti. Porāṇānanti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:528: Dassanā pahātabbātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0201t:531_1: catunnampi ariyamaggānaṃ. Ayanti saṃvarāpahātabbādikathā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:531_2: Tathā hi heṭṭhā “upakkilesavisodhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā āsavakkhayapaṭipattidassanattha”nti
tika-s0201t:531_3: suttantadesanāya payojanaṃ vuttaṃ. Na hi sakkā ādito eva ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetuṃ, atha
tika-s0201t:531_4: kho samādinnasīlo indriyesu guttadvāro “saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti,
tika-s0201t:531_5: saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodetī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ caturāpassenapaṭipattiṃ
tika-s0201t:531_6: paṭipajjamāno sammasanavidhiṃ otaritvā anukkamena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0201t:531_7: āsave khepeti. Tenāha bhagavā “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo
tika-s0201t:531_8: anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto, evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye
tika-s0201t:531_9: anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā, na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho”ti.
tika-s0201t:532_0: Idhāti ayaṃ idha-saddo sabbākārato indriyasaṃvarasaṃvutassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano,
tika-s0201t:532_1: aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano cāti vuttaṃ “imasmiṃ sāsane”ti. Ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhāti
tika-s0201t:532_3: Tañhi ayoniso manasikaroto kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato “anubyañjana”nti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:532_4: Nimittaggāhoti itthipurisanimittādikassa vā kilesavatthubhūtassa vā nimittassa gāho.
tika-s0201t:532_5: Ādittapariyāyanayenāti ādittapariyāye āgatanayena veditabbā ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhāti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:532_6: Yathā itthiyā indriyanti itthindriyaṃ, na evamidaṃ, idaṃ pana cakkhumeva indriyanti
tika-s0201t:532_7: cakkhundriyanti. Titthakāko viyāti titthe kāko titthakāko, nadiyā samatikkamanatitthe
tika-s0201t:533_0: Evaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya cakkhundriye niyataṭṭhāno saṃvaro cakkhundriyasaṃvaro.
tika-s0201t:533_1: Muṭṭhassaccaṃ satipaṭipakkhā akusaladhammā. Yadipi aññattha asaṅkheyyampi bhavaṅgacittaṃ
tika-s0201t:533_2: nirantaraṃ uppajjati, pasādaghaṭṭanāvajjanuppādānaṃ pana antare dve eva bhavaṅgacittāni
tika-s0201t:533_3: uppajjantīti ayaṃ cittaniyāmoti āha bhavaṅge “dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe”ti.
tika-s0201t:534_0: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vātiādi puna avacanatthaṃ idheva sabbaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0201t:534_1: chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Na hi pañcadvāre kāyavacīduccaritasaṅkhāto
tika-s0201t:534_2: dussīlyasaṃvaro atthīti so manodvāravasena, itaro channampi dvārānaṃ vasena yojetabbo.
tika-s0201t:534_4: uppatti, na tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ
tika-s0201t:535_0: Yathā kinti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṃvaro “cakkhudvāre asaṃvaro”ti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:535_1: taṃ nidassanaṃ kinti attho. Yathātiādinā nagaradvāre asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:535_2: gharādīnaṃ asaṃvutatā viya javane asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ dvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutatāti
tika-s0201t:535_3: aññāsaṃvare aññāsaṃvutatāsāmaññameva nidasseti, na pubbāparasāmaññaṃ, antobahisāmaññaṃ
tika-s0201t:535_4: vā. Sambandho ca javanena dvārādīnaṃ ekasantatipariyāpannatāya eva daṭṭhabbo. Paccayabhāvena
tika-s0201t:535_5: purimanipphannaṃ javanakāle asantampi bhavaṅgādi phalanipphattiyā cakkhādi viya santaṃyeva
tika-s0201t:535_6: nāma. Na hi dharamānaṃyeva “santa”nti vuccati, tasmā sati dvārabhavaṅgādike pacchā
tika-s0201t:535_7: uppajjamānaṃ javanaṃ bāhiraṃ viya katvā nagaradvārasamānaṃ vuttaṃ. Itarañca antonagaragharādisamānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:535_8: Javanassa hi paramatthato asatipi bāhirabhāve itarassa ca abbhantarabhāve “pabhassaramidaṃ,
tika-s0201t:535_9: bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭha”nti ādivacanato
tika-s0201t:535_10: āgantukabhūtassa kadāci kadāci uppajjamānassa javanassa bāhirabhāvo, tabbidhurasabhāvassa
tika-s0201t:535_11: itarassa abbhantarabhāvo ca pariyāyato veditabbo. Javane vā asaṃvare uppanne tato
tika-s0201t:535_12: paraṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ asaṃvarahetubhāvāpattito nagaradvārasadisena javanena pavisitvā
tika-s0201t:535_13: dussīlyādicorānaṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīsu musanaṃ kusalabhaṇḍavināsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uppanne
tika-s0201t:535_14: hi asaṃvare dvārādīnaṃ tassa hetubhāvo paññāyati, so ca uppajjamānoyeva dvārādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:535_15: saṃvarūpanissayabhāvaṃ paṭibāhentoyeva pavattatīti ayañhettha asaṃvarādīnaṃ pavattinayo.
tika-s0201t:535_16: Pañcadvāre rūpādiārammaṇe āpāthagate yathāpaccayaṃ akusalajavane uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ
tika-s0201t:535_17: otiṇṇe manodvārikajavanaṃ taṃyeva ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, puna tasmiṃyeva
tika-s0201t:535_18: dvāre “itthī puriso”tiādinā visayaṃ vavatthapetvā javanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, puna
tika-s0201t:535_19: vāre rajjanādivasena javanaṃ javati, punapi yadi tādisaṃ ārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati,
tika-s0201t:535_20: taṃsadisameva pañcadvāre rūpādīsu javanaṃ uppajjati. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “evameva
tika-s0201t:535_21: javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi agutta”ntiādi. Ayaṃ tāva
tika-s0201t:536_0: Saṃvarapakkhepi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Saṃvarena samannāgato puggalo saṃvutoti
tika-s0201t:536_1: vuttoti āha “upetoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Ekajjhaṃ katvāti “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti
tika-s0201t:536_2: padañca atthato abhinnaṃ samānaṃ katvā. Ayameva cettha attho sundarataro uparipāḷiyā
tika-s0201t:536_3: saṃsandanato. Tenāha “tathāhī”tiādi. Yanti ādesoti iminā liṅgavipallāsena saddhiṃ
tika-s0201t:536_4: vacanavipallāso katoti dasseti, nipātapadaṃ vā etaṃ paccattaputhuvacanatthaṃ. Vighātakarāti
tika-s0201t:536_6: vipākā eva vipākapariḷāhā. Yathā panettha āsavā aññe ca vighātakarā kilesavipākapariḷāhā
tika-s0201t:536_7: sambhavanti, taṃ dassetuṃ “cakkhudvārehī”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva. Ettha
tika-s0201t:536_8: ca saṃvaraṇūpāyo, saṃvaritabbaṃ, saṃvaro, yato so saṃvaro, yattha saṃvaro, yañca
tika-s0201t:536_9: saṃvaraphalanti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Paṭisaṅkhā yonisoti hi saṃvaraṇūpāyo.
tika-s0201t:536_10: Cakkhundriyaṃ saṃvaritabbaṃ. Saṃvaraggahaṇena gahitā sati saṃvaro. Asaṃvutassāti
tika-s0201t:536_11: saṃvaraṇāvadhi. Asaṃvarato hi saṃvaraṇaṃ. Saṃvaritabbaggahaṇena siddho idha saṃvaravisayo.
tika-s0201t:536_12: Cakkhundriyañhi saṃvarañāṇaṃ rūpārammaṇe saṃvarīyatīti avuttasiddhoyamattho. Āsavatannimittakilesādipariḷāhābhāvo
tika-s0201t:536_13: phalaṃ. Evaṃ sotadvārādīsupi yojetabbaṃ. Sabbatthevāti manodvāre pañcadvāre cāti sabbasmiṃ dvāre.
tika-s0201t:539_0: 23. Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvarantiādīsu “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā vuttaṃ paccavekkhaṇameva
tika-s0201t:539_1: yoniso paṭisaṅkhā. Īdisanti evarūpaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ. Bhavapatthanāya assādayatoti
tika-s0201t:539_2: bhavapatthanāmukhena bhāvitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assādentassa. Cīvaranti nivāsanādi yaṃ kiñci
tika-s0201t:539_3: cīvaraṃ. Paṭisevatīti nivāsanādivasena paribhuñjati. Yāvadevāti payojanaparimāṇaniyamanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:539_4: Sītapaṭighātādiyeva hi yogino cīvarapaṭisevane payojanaṃ. Sītassāti dhātukkhobhato
tika-s0201t:539_5: vā utupariṇāmato vā uppannasītassa. Paṭighātāyāti paṭibāhanatthaṃ tappaccayassa vikārassa
tika-s0201t:539_6: vinodanatthaṃ. Uṇhassāti aggisantāpato uppannassa uṇhassa. Ḍaṃsādayo pākaṭāyeva.
tika-s0201t:539_7: Puna yāvadevāti niyatapayojanaparimāṇaniyamanaṃ. Niyatañhi payojanaṃ cīvarapaṭisevanassa
tika-s0201t:539_8: hirikopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ, itaraṃ kadāci kadāci. Hirikopīnanti sambādhaṭṭhānaṃ. Yasmiñhi
tika-s0201t:539_9: aṅge vivaṭe hirīkuppati vinassati, taṃ hiriyā kopanato hirikopīnaṃ, tassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ cīvaraṃ paṭisevati.
tika-s0201t:540_0: Piṇḍapātanti yaṃ kiñci āhāraṃ. So hi piṇḍolyena bhikkhanāya patte patanato tattha
tika-s0201t:540_1: tattha laddhabhikkhāpiṇḍānaṃ pāto sannipātoti “piṇḍapāto”ti vuccati. Neva davāyāti
tika-s0201t:540_2: na kīḷanāya. Na madāyāti na balamadamānamadapurisamadatthaṃ. Na maṇḍanāyāti na aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ
tika-s0201t:540_3: pīṇanabhāvatthaṃ. Na vibhūsanāyāti na tesaṃyeva sobhanatthaṃ, chavisampatiatthanti
tika-s0201t:540_5: veditabbāni. Purimaṃ vā dvayaṃ attano attano saṃkilesuppattinisedhanatthaṃ, itaraṃ
tika-s0201t:540_6: parassapi. Cattāripi kāmasukhallikānuyogassa pahānatthaṃ vuttānīti veditabbāni. Kāyassāti
tika-s0201t:540_7: rūpakāyassa. Ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti pabandhaṭṭhitatthañceva pavattiyā avicchedanatthañca
tika-s0201t:540_10: Itīti evaṃ iminā upāyena. Purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmīti purāṇaṃ abhuttapaccayā
tika-s0201t:540_11: uppajjanakavedanaṃ paṭihanissāmi. Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti navaṃ bhuttapaccayā
tika-s0201t:540_12: uppajjanakavedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti. Tassā hi anuppannāya anuppajjanatthameva āhāraṃ
tika-s0201t:540_13: paribhuñjati. Ettha ca abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā nāma yathāpavattā jighacchānimittā
tika-s0201t:540_14: vedanā. Sā hi abhuñjantassa bhiyyo bhiyyo pavaḍḍhanavasena uppajjati, bhuttapaccayā
tika-s0201t:540_15: uppajjanakavedanāpi khudānimittāva aṅgadāhasūlādivedanā appavattā. Sā hi bhuttapaccayā
tika-s0201t:540_16: anuppannāva na uppajjissatīti. Vihiṃsānimittatā cetāsaṃ vihiṃsāya viseso.
tika-s0201t:541_0: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti yāpanā ca me catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ bhavissati. Yāpanāyāti
tika-s0201t:541_1: iminā jīvitindriyayāpanā vuttā, idha catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanāti
tika-s0201t:541_2: ayametāsaṃ viseso. Anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cāti ayuttapariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogaparivajjanena
tika-s0201t:544: Ettāvatā payojanapariggaho, majjhimā ca paṭipadā dīpitā hoti.
tika-s0201t:545_0: Senāsananti sayanañca āsanañca. Yattha hi vihārādike seti nipajjati, āsati nisīdati,
tika-s0201t:545_2: parissayo, sarīrābādhacittavikkhepakaro, atha vā yathāvutto utu ca sīhabyagghādipākaṭaparissayo
tika-s0201t:545_3: ca rāgadosādipaṭicchannaparissayo ca utuparissayo, tassa vinodanatthañceva ekībhāvasukhatthañca.
tika-s0201t:545_4: Idañca cīvarapaṭisevane hirikopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ viya tassa niyatapayojananti puna
tika-s0201t:546_1: eva bhisakkassa anuññātavatthutāya bhesajjaṃ, jīvitassa parivārasambhārabhāvehi parikkhāro
tika-s0201t:546_2: cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro, taṃ. Uppannānanti jātānaṃ nibbattānaṃ. Veyyābādhikānanti
tika-s0201t:546_3: byābādhato dhātukkhobhato ca tannibbattarogato ca jātānaṃ. Vedanānanti dukkhavedanānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:546_4: Abyābajjhaparamatāyāti niddukkhaparamabhāvāya paṭisevāmīti yojanā. Evamettha saṅkhepeneva
tika-s0201t:546_5: pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā. Navavedanuppādanatopīti na kevalaṃ āyatiṃ eva vipākapariḷāhā,
