tika-s0201t:546_6: atha kho atibhojanapaccayā alaṃsāṭakādīnaṃ viya navavedanuppādanatopi veditabbāti attho.
tika-s0201t:549_0: 24. Khamoti khamanako. Kammaṭṭhānikassa calanaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānapariccāgoti āha “calati
tika-s0201t:549_1: kampati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti. Adhimattampi uṇhaṃ sahati, sahanto ca na naggasamaṇādayo
tika-s0201t:549_2: viya sahati, atha kho kammaṭṭhānāvijahanenāti āha “sveva thero viyā”ti. Bahicaṅkameti
tika-s0201t:549_3: leṇato bahi caṅkame. Uṇhabhayenevāti narakaggiuṇhabhayeneva. Tenāha “avīcimahānirayaṃ
tika-s0201t:549_4: paccavekkhitvā”ti, tampi “mayā anekakkhattuṃ anubhūtaṃ, idaṃ pana tato mudutara”nti
tika-s0201t:549_5: evaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Etthāti etasmiṃ ṭhāne. Aggisantāpova veditabbo sūriyasantāpassa
tika-s0201t:550_1: pītiṃ uppādesi. Saha pītuppādāti pharaṇapītiyā uppādena saheva. Visaṃ nivattitvāti
tika-s0201t:550_2: pītivegena ajjhotthataṃ daṭṭhamukheneva bhassitvā. Tatthevāti sappena daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva.
tika-s0201t:550_3: Cittekaggataṃ labhitvāti “pītimanassa kāyo passambhatī”tiādinā nayena samādhānaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
tika-s0201t:551_0: Paccayesu santoso bhāvanāya ca āramitabbaṭṭhānatāya ārāmo assāti paccayasantosabhāvanārāmo,
tika-s0201t:551_1: tassa bhāvo paccaya…pe… rāmatā, tāya. Mahātheroti vuḍḍhataro thero. Vacanameva tadatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:552_0: Asukhaṭṭhena vā tibbā. Yañhi na sukhaṃ, taṃ aniṭṭhaṃ “tibba”nti vuccati. Evaṃsabhāvoti
tika-s0201t:552_1: “adhivāsanajātiyo”ti padassa atthamāha. Muhuttena khaṇeva vāte hadayaṃ phāletuṃ āraddheyeva.
tika-s0201t:552_2: Anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyīti arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyi.
tika-s0201t:553_0: Evaṃ sabbatthāti “uṇhena phuṭṭhassa sītaṃ patthayato”tiādinā sabbattha uṇhādinimittaṃ
tika-s0201t:553_1: kāmāsavuppatti veditabbā, sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā aniṭṭhanti adhippāyo. Attaggāhe sati
tika-s0201t:553_2: attaniyaggāhoti āha “mayhaṃ sītaṃ uṇhanti gāho diṭṭhāsavo”ti. Sītādike upagate sahantī
tika-s0201t:553_3: khamantī te attano upari vāsentī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “āropetvā vāsetiyevā”ti. Na nirassatīti
tika-s0201t:553_4: na vidhunati. Yo hi sītādike na sahati, so te nirassanto vidhunanto viya hotīti.
tika-s0201t:556_0: 25. Ahaṃ samaṇoti “ahaṃ samaṇo, kiṃ mama jīvitena vā maraṇena vā”ti evaṃ acintetvāti
tika-s0201t:556_1: adhippāyo. Paccavekkhitvāti gāmappadesaṃ payojanādiñca paccavekkhitvā. Paṭikkamatīti
tika-s0201t:556_2: hatthiādīnaṃ samīpagamanato apakkamati. Kaṇṭakā yattha tiṭṭhanti, taṃ kaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:556_3: Amanussaduṭṭhānīti amanussasañcārena dūsitāni, saparissayānīti attho. Samānanti samaṃ,
tika-s0201t:556_4: avisamanti attho. Akāsi vā tādisaṃ anācāraṃ.
tika-s0201t:557_0: Sīlasaṃvarasaṅkhātenāti “kathaṃ parivajjanaṃ sīla”nti yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā
tika-s0201t:557_1: vuttameva. Apica “caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī”ti vacanato hatthiādiparivajjanampi
tika-s0201t:560_1: kusalapaṭipakkhatopītiādīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ vitakko akusaloti attho. Iminā nayena sāvajjotiādīsupi
tika-s0201t:560_2: attho veditabbo. Ettha ca akusalotiādinā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ kāmavitakkassa ādīnavaṃ
tika-s0201t:560_3: dasseti, dukkhavipākoti iminā samparāyikaṃ. Attabyābādhāya saṃvattatītiādīsupi imināva
tika-s0201t:560_4: nayena ādīnavavibhāvanā veditabbā. Uppannassa kāmavitakkassa anadhivāsanaṃ nāma puna
tika-s0201t:560_5: tādisassa anuppādanaṃ, taṃ panassa pahānaṃ vinodanaṃ byantikaraṇaṃ anabhāvagamananti
tika-s0201t:560_6: ca vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pāḷiyaṃ “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”ti vatvā “pajahatī”tiādi
tika-s0201t:560_7: vuttanti tamatthaṃ dassento “anadhivāsento kiṃ karotīti pajahatī”tiādimāha. Pahānañcettha
tika-s0201t:560_8: vikkhambhanameva, na samucchedoti dassetuṃ “vinodetī”tiādi vuttanti vikkhambhanavaseneva attho dassito.
tika-s0201t:561_0: Kāmavitakkoti sampayogato ārammaṇato ca kāmasahagato vitakko. Tenāha “kāmapaṭisaṃyutto
tika-s0201t:561_1: takko”tiādi. Kāmapaṭisaṃyuttoti hi kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena sampayutto vatthukāmasaṅkhātena
tika-s0201t:561_2: paṭibaddho ca. Uppannuppanneti tesaṃ pāpavitakkānaṃ uppādāvatthāgahaṇaṃ vā kataṃ
tika-s0201t:561_3: siyā anavasesaggahaṇaṃ vā. Tesu paṭhamaṃ sandhāyāha “upannamatte”ti, sampatijāteti
tika-s0201t:561_4: attho. Anavasesaggahaṇaṃ byāpanicchāya hotīti dassetuṃ “satakkhattumpi uppanne”ti
tika-s0201t:561_5: vuttaṃ. Ñātivitakkoti “amhākaṃ ñātayo sukhajīvino sampattiyuttā”tiādinā gehassitapemavasena
tika-s0201t:561_6: ñātake ārabbha uppannavitakko. Janapadavitakkoti “amhākaṃ janapado subhikkho sampannasasso
tika-s0201t:561_7: ramaṇīyo”tiādinā gehassitapemavaseneva janapadaṃ ārabbha uppannavitakko. Ukkuṭikappadhānādīhi
tika-s0201t:561_8: dukkhe nijjiṇṇe samparāye attā sukhī hoti amaroti dukkarakārikāya paṭisaṃyutto amaratthāya
tika-s0201t:561_9: vitakko, taṃ vā ārabbha amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhisahagato amaro ca so vitakko cāti amaravitakko.
tika-s0201t:561_10: Parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyuttoti paresu upaṭṭhākādīsu sahanandikādivasena pavatto anuddayatāpatirūpako
tika-s0201t:561_12: ceva sakkārena ca kittisaddena ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭisaṃyutto. Anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttoti
tika-s0201t:561_13: “aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyuṃ, na heṭṭhā katvā maññeyyuṃ, pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya
tika-s0201t:562_0: Kāmavitakko kāmasaṅkappanasabhāvattā kāmasaṅkappapavattiyā sātisayattā ca kāmanākāroti
tika-s0201t:562_1: āha “kāmavitakko panettha kāmāsavo”ti. Tabbisesoti kāmāsavaviseso, rāgasahavuttīti
tika-s0201t:562_2: adhippāyo. Kāmavitakkādike vinodeti attano santānato nīharati etenāti vinodanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:565_0: 27. “Satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiyo paripūrentī”ti vacanato vijjāvimuttīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:565_1: anadhigamo tato ca sakalavaṭṭadukkhānativatti abhāvanāya ādīnavo, vuttavipariyāyena
tika-s0201t:565_2: bhagavato orasaputtabhāvādivasena ca bhāvanāya ānisaṃso veditabbo. Uparimaggattayasamayasambhūtāti
tika-s0201t:565_3: dutiyādimaggakkhaṇe jātā, bhāvanādhikārato dutiyamaggādipariyāpannāti attho. Nanu
tika-s0201t:565_4: ca te lokuttarā eva, kasmā visesanaṃ katanti? Nayidaṃ visesanaṃ, visesitabbaṃ panetaṃ,
tika-s0201t:565_5: lokuttarabojjhaṅgā eva adhippetā, te ca kho uparimaggattayasamayasambhūtāti. Bojjhaṅgesu
tika-s0201t:565_7: hi bojjhaṅgesu vuccamānesu tadaṅgādivivekadassanavasena vipassanābojjhaṅgādayo vibhajitvā
tika-s0201t:565_8: vuccanti, na nibbattitalokuttarabojjhaṅgā evāti bojjhaṅgesu sammoho na hoti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāpaṭipattiyā
tika-s0201t:565_9: ca sammadeva pakāsitattā. Idha panāti imasmiṃ sutte, imasmiṃ vā adhikāre. Lokuttaranayo
tika-s0201t:566_0: Ādipadānanti “satisambojjhaṅga”nti evamādīnaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vākye ādibhūtānaṃ padānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:566_1: Atthatoti visesavasena sāmaññavasena ca padatthato. Lakkhaṇādīhīti lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0201t:566_2: Kamatoti anupubbito. Anūnādhikatoti tāvattakato. Vibhāvināti viññunā.
tika-s0201t:567_1: ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ. Udake alābu viya pilavitvā
tika-s0201t:567_2: gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ sāraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:567_3: apilāpanaṃ. Vuttampi hetaṃ milindapañhe. Bhaṇḍāgārikoti bhaṇḍagopako. Apilāpe karoti
tika-s0201t:567_4: apilāpeti. Therenāti nāgasenattherena. Sammosapaccanīkaṃ kiccaṃ asammoso, na sammosābhāvamattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:568: Bodhiyā dhammasāmaggiyā, aṅgo avayavo, bodhissa vā ariyasāvakassa aṅgo kāraṇaṃ. Patiṭṭhānāyūhanā oghataraṇasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ –
tika-s0201t:569_1: avasesakilesābhisaṅkhārehi āyūhanā. Taṇhāvasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhivasena āyūhanā.
tika-s0201t:569_2: Sassatadiṭṭhiyā patiṭṭhānaṃ, ucchedadiṭṭhiyā āyūhanā. Līnavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, uddhaccavasena
tika-s0201t:569_3: āyūhanā. Kāmasukhānuyogavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, attakilamathānuyogavasena āyūhanā. Sabbākusalābhisaṅkhāravasena
tika-s0201t:570_0: Vuttesu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbā. Yā hi ayaṃ bodhīti vuccatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:570_2: Taṃ pana paṭibujjhanaṃ atthato catunnaṃ saccānaṃ paṭivedho, nibbānasseva vā sacchikiriyāti
tika-s0201t:570_3: āha “cattārī”tiādi. Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viyāti yathā aṅgāni eva jhānamaggā, na aṅgavinimuttā,
tika-s0201t:570_4: evamidhāpīti attho. Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viyāti etena puggalapaññattiyā avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:571_0: Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgāti idaṃ kāraṇattho aṅga-saddoti katvā vuttaṃ. Bujjhantīti
tika-s0201t:571_1: bodhiyo, bodhiyo eva aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ “bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti. Anubujjhantīti
tika-s0201t:571_2: vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ bujjhitabbānañca saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ bujjhanti. Paṭibujjhantīti
tika-s0201t:571_3: kilesaniddāya uṭṭhahanato paccakkhabhāvena vā paṭimukhaṃ bujjhanti. Sambujjhantīti
tika-s0201t:571_4: aviparītabhāvena sammā ca bujjhanti. Evaṃ upasaggānaṃ atthavisesadīpanatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:571_5: Bodhi-saddo hi sabbavisesayuttaṃ bujjhanaṃ sāmaññena gahetvā ṭhito.
tika-s0201t:572_0: Vicinātīti “tayidaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā vīmaṃsati. Obhāsanaṃ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvapaṭicchādakassa
tika-s0201t:572_1: sammohassa viddhaṃsanaṃ yathā āloko andhakārassa. Yasmiṃ dhamme sati vīro nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:572_2: so dhammo vīrabhāvo. Īrayitabbatoti pavattetabbato. Kosajjapakkhato patituṃ appadānavasena
tika-s0201t:572_3: sampayuttānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ paggaho. Upatthambhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ. Osīdanaṃ layāpatti,
tika-s0201t:572_4: tappaṭipakkhato anosīdanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pīṇayatīti tappeti vaḍḍheti vā. Pharaṇaṃ paṇītarūpehi
tika-s0201t:572_5: kāyassa byāpanaṃ. Tuṭṭhi nāma pīti. Udaggabhāvo odagyaṃ, kāyacittānaṃ ukkhipananti
tika-s0201t:572_6: attho. Kāyacittadarathapassambhanatoti kāyadarathassa cittadarathassa ca passambhanato
tika-s0201t:572_7: vūpasamanato. Kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā. Daratho sārambho, dukkhadomanassapaccayānaṃ
tika-s0201t:572_8: uddhaccādikilesānaṃ, tappadhānānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Uddhaccādikilesapaṭipakkhabhāvo
tika-s0201t:572_9: daṭṭhabbo, evañcettha passaddhiyā aparipphandanasītibhāvo daṭṭhabbo asāraddhabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:573_0: Samādhānatoti sammā cittassa ādhānato ṭhapanato. Avikkhepo sampayuttānaṃ avikkhittatā,
tika-s0201t:573_1: yena sasampayuttā dhammā avikkhittā honti, so dhammo avikkhepoti. Avisāro attano
tika-s0201t:573_2: eva avisaraṇasabhāvo. Sampiṇḍanaṃ sampayuttānaṃ avippakiṇṇabhāvāpādanaṃ nhānīyacuṇṇānaṃ
tika-s0201t:573_3: udakaṃ viya. Cittaṭṭhitipaccupaṭṭhānoti “cittassa ṭhitī”ti vacanato cittassa pabandhaṭhitipaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-s0201t:573_4: Ajjhupekkhanatoti udāsīnabhāvato. Sāti bojjhaṅgaupekkhā. Samappavatte dhamme paṭisañcikkhati
tika-s0201t:573_5: upapattito ikkhati tadākārā hutvā pavattatīti paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇā, evañca katvā
tika-s0201t:573_7: vuttā. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ yathāsakakiccakaraṇavasena samaṃ pavattanapaccayatā samavāhitā.
tika-s0201t:573_9: upacchindantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “pakkhapātupacchedarasā”ti. Ajjhupekkhanameva majjhattabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:574_0: Sabbasmiṃ līnapakkhe uddhaccapakkhe ca atthikā patthanīyā icchitabbāti sabbatthikā,
tika-s0201t:574_1: taṃ sabbatthikaṃ. Samānakkhaṇapavattīsu sattasupi sambojjhaṅgesu vācāya kamappavattito
tika-s0201t:574_2: paṭipāṭiyā vattabbesu yaṃ kiñci paṭhamaṃ avatvā satisambojjhaṅgasseva paṭhamaṃ vacanassa
tika-s0201t:574_3: kāraṇaṃ sabbesaṃ upakārakattanti vuttaṃ “sabbesa”ntiādi. Sabbesanti ca līnuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:575_0: “Kasmā satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā”ti codako saddhālobhādīnampi bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ āsaṅkati,
tika-s0201t:575_1: itaro satiādīnaṃyeva bhāvanāya upakārataṃ dassento “līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato
tika-s0201t:575_2: cā”tiādimāha. Tattha līnassāti atisithilavīriyatādīhi bhāvanāvīthiṃ anotaritvā saṃkuṭitassa
tika-s0201t:575_3: cittassa. Tadā hi passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgā na bhāvetabbā. Tañhi etehi
tika-s0201t:575_4: allatiṇādīhi viya paritto aggi dussamuṭṭhāpiyaṃ hotīti. Tenāha bhagavā “seyyathāpi,
tika-s0201t:575_5: bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni
tika-s0201t:575_7: viya paritto aggi līnaṃ cittaṃ etehi susamuṭṭhāpiyaṃ hotīti. Tena vuttaṃ “yasmiñca
tika-s0201t:575_8: kho”tiādi. Tattha yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:575_9: Vuttañhetaṃ “atthi, bhikkhave, kusalākusalā dhammā…pe… pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya…pe…
tika-s0201t:576_1: tadā dhammavicayavīriyapītisambojjhaṅgā na bhāvetabbā. Tañhi etehi sukkhatiṇādīhi
tika-s0201t:576_2: viya aggikkhandho duvūpasamayaṃ hoti. Tenāha bhagavā “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso
tika-s0201t:576_3: mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:576_4: Passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgā pana bhāvetabbā, allatiṇādīhi viya aggikkhandho
tika-s0201t:576_5: uddhataṃ cittaṃ etehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “yasmiñca kho”tiādi. Etthāpi
tika-s0201t:576_6: yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0201t:576_8: saṃvattatī”ti. Tattha yathāssa passaddhiādayo uppannapubbā, taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-s0201t:576_9: tesaṃ uppādanavasena tathā manasikarontova passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.
tika-s0201t:576_10: Satisambojjhaṅgo pana sabbattha bahūpakāro. So hi cittaṃ līnapakkhikānaṃ passaddhiādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:576_11: vasena layāpattito, uddhaccapakkhikānañca dhammavicayādīnaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato
tika-s0201t:576_12: rakkhati, tasmā so loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu sabbakammikaamacco viya ca rājakiccesu
tika-s0201t:576_13: sabbattha icchitabbo. Tenāha “satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti.
tika-s0201t:577_0: Ñatvā ñātabbāti sambandho. Vaḍḍhi nāma vepullaṃ bhiyyobhāvo punappunaṃ uppādo evāti
tika-s0201t:577_1: āha “punappunaṃ janetī”ti. Abhivuddhiṃ pāpento nibbatteti. Vivittatāti vivittabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:577_2: Yo hi vivecanīyato viviccati, yaṃ viviccitvā ṭhitaṃ, tadubhayaṃ idha vivittabhāvasāmaññena
tika-s0201t:577_3: “vivittatā”ti vuttaṃ. Tesu purimo vivecanīyato viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātāya viviccanakiriyāya
tika-s0201t:577_4: samaṅgī dhammasamūho tāya eva viviccanakiriyāya vasena vivekoti gahito. Itaro sabbaso
tika-s0201t:577_5: tato tato vivittasabhāvatāya. Tattha yasmiṃ dhammapuñje satisambojjhaṅgo viviccanakiriyāya
tika-s0201t:577_6: pavattati, taṃ yathāvuttāya viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātaṃ nissāyeva pavattati,
tika-s0201t:577_7: itaraṃ pana tanninnatātadārammaṇatāhīti vuttaṃ “viveke nissita”nti. Yathā vā vivekavasena
tika-s0201t:577_8: pavattaṃ jhānaṃ “vivekaja”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ vivekavasena pavatto bojjhaṅgo “vivekanissito”ti
tika-s0201t:577_9: daṭṭhabbo. Nissayaṭṭho ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ veditabbo. Asatipi
tika-s0201t:577_10: pubbāparabhāve “paṭiccasamuppādā”ti ettha paccayānaṃ samuppādanaṃ viya abhinnadhammādhārā
tika-s0201t:577_11: nissayanabhāvanā sambhavantīti. Ayamevāti viveko eva. Viveko hi pahānavinayavirāganirodhā ca samānatthā.
tika-s0201t:578_1: “satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetī”tiādinā bhāvetabbānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ idha vuttattā. Bhāvitabbojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0201t:578_2: hi ye sacchikātabbā phalabojjhaṅgā, tesaṃ kiccaṃ paṭipassaddhiviveko. Ajjhāsayatoti
tika-s0201t:578_4: cittaṃ, saṅkhāresu pana ādīnavaṃ suṭṭhu disvā tappaṭipakkhe nibbāne adhimuttatāya
tika-s0201t:578_6: viya. Na paṭisiddhā vipassanāpādakesu kasiṇārammaṇādijhānesu satiādīnaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyattā.
tika-s0201t:578_7: Anuddharantā pana vipassanā viya bodhiyā maggassa āsannakāraṇaṃ jhānaṃ na hoti, nāpi
tika-s0201t:578_8: tathā ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ, na ca vipassanākiccassa viya jhānakiccassa niṭṭhānaṃ maggoti
tika-s0201t:578_9: katvā na uddharanti. Ettha ca kasiṇaggahaṇena tadāyattāni āruppānipi gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-s0201t:578_10: Tānipi hi vipassanāpādakāni nibbedhabhāgiyāni ca hontīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati tanninnabhāvasabbhāvato.
tika-s0201t:578_11: Yadaggena hi nibbānaninnatā, tadaggena phalaninnatāpi siyā. “Kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ
tika-s0201t:579_0: Vossagga-saddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā. Vossajjanañhi
tika-s0201t:579_1: pahānaṃ, vissaṭṭhabhāvena nirāsaṅkapavati ca, tasmā vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena,
tika-s0201t:579_2: maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena paṭipakkhassa pahānaṃ vossaggo, tathā vipassanākkhaṇe
tika-s0201t:579_3: tanninnabhāvena, maggakkhaṇe ārammaṇakaraṇena vissaṭṭhasabhāvato vossaggoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:579_5: ca. Pubbe vossagga-padasseva atthassa vuttattā āha “sakalena vacanenā”ti. Pariṇamantaṃ
tika-s0201t:579_6: vipassanākkhaṇe, pariṇataṃ maggakkhaṇe. Pariṇāmo nāma paripākoti āha “paripaccantaṃ
tika-s0201t:579_7: paripakkañcā”ti. Paripāko ca āsevanalābhena āhitasāmatthiyassa kilesassa pariccajituṃ
tika-s0201t:579_8: nibbānañca pakkhandituṃ tikkhavisadasabhāvo. Tenāha “ayañhī”tiādi. Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:579_10: esa nayoti evaṃ tattha netabbanti attho.
tika-s0201t:580_0: Evaṃ ādikammikānaṃ bojjhaṅgesu asammohatthaṃ missakanayaṃ vatvā idāni nibbattitalokuttarabojjhaṅgavasena
tika-s0201t:580_1: atthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “idha panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idha panāti imasmiṃ sabbāsavasuttante.
tika-s0201t:580_2: Maggo eva vossaggavipariṇāmī bhāvanāmaggassa idha adhippetattā. Tañca khoti satisambojjhaṅgaṃ.
tika-s0201t:581_0: Diṭṭhāsavassa paṭhamamaggavajjhattā “tayo āsavā”ti vuttaṃ. Tepi anapāyagamanīyā eva
tika-s0201t:581_1: veditabbā apāyagamanīyānaṃ dassaneneva pahīnattā. Satipi sambojjhaṅgānaṃ yebhuyyena
tika-s0201t:581_2: maggabhāve tattha tattha sambojjhaṅgasabhāvānaṃ maggadhammānaṃ vasena vuttamaggattayasampayuttā
tika-s0201t:583_0: 28. Thomentoti āsavappahānassa sudukkarattā tāya eva dukkarakiriyāya taṃ abhitthavanto.
tika-s0201t:583_2: Etehi pahānādisaṃkittanehi. Ussukkaṃ janentoti evaṃ dhammassāmināpi abhitthavanīyaṃ
tika-s0201t:583_3: mahānisaṃsañca āsavappahānanti tattha ādarasahitaṃ ussāhaṃ uppādento. Dassaneneva
tika-s0201t:583_4: pahīnāti dassanena pahīnā eva. Tena vuttaṃ “na appahīnesuyeva pahīnasaññī”ti.
tika-s0201t:584_1: bhedo daṭṭhabbo. Dassanābhisamayāti pariññābhisamayā pariññākiccasiddhiyā. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:584_2: “kiccavasenā”ti, asammohapaṭivedhenāti attho. Samussayo kāyo, attabhāvo vā.
tika-s0201t:585_1: na tabbiparītaṃ anatthāvahattāti pītisampayuttacittataṃ sandhāyāha “attamanāti sakamanā”ti.
tika-s0201t:585_2: Tenāha “tuṭṭhamanā”ti. Attamanāti vā pītisomanassehi gahitamanā. Yasmā pana tehi
tika-s0201t:585_3: gahitatā sampayuttatāva, tasmā vuttaṃ “pītisomanassehi vā sampayuttamanā”ti. Yadettha
tika-s0201t:585_4: atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyattā cāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:588_0: 29. Tasmā taṃ dassetvāti yasmā suttantavaṇṇanā suttanikkhepaṃ dassetvā vuccamānā
tika-s0201t:588_1: pākaṭā hoti, yasmā cassa dhammadāyādasuttassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo, tasmā taṃ nikkhepaṃ
tika-s0201t:588_2: dassetvā, kathetvāti attho. Lābhasakkāreti lābhasakkārasaṅkhātāya aṭṭhuppattiyāti
tika-s0201t:588_3: keci, lābhasakkāre vā aṭṭhuppattiyāti apare. Yā hi lābhasakkāranimittaṃ tadā bhikkhūsu
tika-s0201t:588_4: paccayabāhullikatā jātā, taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā bhagavā imaṃ desesīti. Yamakamahāmeghoti
tika-s0201t:588_6: ceva bhagavati katthaci nibaddhavāsaṃ vasante, cārikaṃ pana gacchante anubandhanti
tika-s0201t:588_7: ca. Bhikkhūnampi yebhuyyena kappasatasahassaṃ tato bhiyyopi pūritadānapāramisañcayattā
tika-s0201t:589_0: Sakkatoti sakkārappato. Garukatoti garukārappatto. Mānitoti bahumato manasā piyāyito
tika-s0201t:589_1: ca. Pūjitoti mālādipūjāya ceva catupaccayābhipūjāya ca pūjito. Apacitoti apacāyanappatto.
tika-s0201t:589_2: Yassa hi cattāro paccaye sakkatvāpi abhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte upanenti, so sakkato.
tika-s0201t:589_3: Yasmiṃ garubhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā te denti, so garukato. Yaṃ manasā piyāyanti bahumaññanti
tika-s0201t:589_4: ca, so bahumato. Yassa sabbametaṃ pūjāvasena karonti, so pūjito. Yassa abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānañjalikammādivasena
tika-s0201t:589_5: paramanipaccakāraṃ karonti, so apacito. Bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca loko evaṃ paṭipanno.
tika-s0201t:589_6: Tena vuttaṃ “tena kho pana…pe… parikkhārāna”nti. Lābhaggayasaggapattanti lābhassa
tika-s0201t:589_7: ca yasassa ca aggaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:590_0: Paccayā cīvarādayo garukātabbā etesanti paccayagarukā, āmisacakkhukāti attho. Paccayesu
tika-s0201t:590_1: giddhā gadhitā paccayānaṃ bahulabhāvāya paṭipannāti paccayabāhulikā. Bhagavatopi
tika-s0201t:590_2: pākaṭā ahosi pakaticārittavasenāti adhippāyo aññathā apākaṭasseva abhāvato. Dhammasabhāvacintāvasena
tika-s0201t:590_3: pavattaṃ sahottappañāṇaṃ dhammasaṃvego, idha pana so bhikkhūnaṃ lābhagarutādhammavasena
tika-s0201t:590_4: veditabbo. Samaṇadhammavuttīti samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ. Sāti dhammadāyādadesanā. Paṭibimbadassanavasena
tika-s0201t:591_0: Pitu-dāyaṃ, tena dātabbaṃ, tato laddhabbaṃ arahabhāvena ādiyantīti dāyādā, puttā.
tika-s0201t:591_1: Tañca loke āmisameva, sāsane pana dhammopīti tattha yaṃ sāvajjaṃ aniyyānikañca, taṃ
tika-s0201t:591_2: paṭikkhipitvā, yaṃ niyyānikaṃ anavajjañca, tattha bhikkhū niyojento bhagavā avoca
tika-s0201t:591_3: “dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā”ti. Dhammassa me dāyādāti mama
tika-s0201t:591_4: dhammassa ogāhino, dhammabhāgabhāginoti attho. Tathā hi vakkhati “dhammakoṭṭhāsasseva
tika-s0201t:591_6: Pariyāyeti sabhāvato parivattetvā ñāpeti etenāti pariyāyo, leso, lesakāraṇaṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:591_7: Tadabhāvato nippariyāyadhammo maggappattiyā apāyapatanādito accantameva vāraṇato.
tika-s0201t:591_8: Itaro vuttavipariyāyato pariyāyadhammo accantaṃ apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhapātanato paramparāya
tika-s0201t:591_9: vāraṇato. Yathā hi lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dānasīlādi vivaṭṭaṃ uddissa nibbattitaṃ, ayaṃ
tika-s0201t:591_10: taṃ asampādentampi taṃ sampāpakassa dhammassa nibbattakāraṇabhāvapariyāyena pariyāyadhammo
tika-s0201t:591_11: nāma hoti, evaṃ taṃ vaṭṭaṃ uddissa nibbattitaṃ, yaṃ taṇhādīhi savisesaṃ āmasitabbato
tika-s0201t:591_12: āmisanti loke pākaṭaṃ acchādanabhojanādi, tassa, taṃsadisassa ca phalavisesassa nimittabhāvapariyāyena
tika-s0201t:591_13: pariyāyāmisanti vuccatīti dassento āha “yaṃ panidaṃ…pe… idaṃ pariyāyāmisaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0201t:592_0: “Sakalameva hidaṃ, ānanda, brahmacariyassa yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā”ti ādivacanato
tika-s0201t:592_1: sāvakehi adhigatopi lokuttaradhammo satthuyevāti vattabbataṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ “nippariyāyadhammopi
tika-s0201t:592_3: visesapaccayo paratoghoso ca tathāgatādhīnoti tehi paṭividdhopi dhammo dhammassāminoyevāti
tika-s0201t:592_4: vattuṃ yuttaṃ. Tenāha “bhagavatā hī”tiādi. Tattha anuppannassa maggassāti kassapassa
tika-s0201t:592_5: bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti yāva imasmā buddhuppādā asambodhavasena na uppannassa
tika-s0201t:592_6: ariyamaggassa. Uppādetāti nibbattetā. Taṃ panetaṃ maggassa bhagavato nibbattanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:592_7: na paccekabuddhānaṃ viya sasantāneyeva, atha kho parasantānepīti dassetuṃ “asañjātassa
tika-s0201t:592_8: maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā”ti vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ maggassa uppādanaṃ
tika-s0201t:592_9: sañjānanañca atthato jānanaññeva asammohapaṭivedhabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “maggaññū maggavidū”ti.
tika-s0201t:592_10: Akkhānaṃ panassa sukusalabhāvenāti vuttaṃ “maggakovido”ti. Satthārā yathāgataṃ maggaṃ
tika-s0201t:592_11: anugacchantīti maggānugā bhagavato eva taṃ maggaṃ suṭṭhu adhigamanato. Pacchā parato
tika-s0201t:592_12: sammā anu anu āgatā paṭipannāti pacchā samannāgatā.
tika-s0201t:593_0: Jānaṃ jānātīti jānitabbameva abhiññeyyādibhedaṃ jānāti ekantahitapaṭipattito. Passaṃ
tika-s0201t:593_1: passatīti tathā passitabbameva passati. Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇena
tika-s0201t:593_2: jānitabbaṃ jānātiyeva. Na hi padesañāṇena jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ ekantato jānāti. Passaṃ
tika-s0201t:593_3: passatīti dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu dhammacakkhu buddhacakkhu samantacakkhusaṅkhātehi
tika-s0201t:593_4: pañcahi cakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passatiyeva. Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti yathā aññe savipallāsā
tika-s0201t:593_5: kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti, na evaṃ bhagavā. Bhagavā
tika-s0201t:593_6: pana pahīnavipallāsattā jānanto jānātiyeva, diṭṭhidassanassa ca abhāvā passanto passatiyevāti
tika-s0201t:593_7: attho. Cakkhubhūtoti paññācakkhumayattā tassa ca pattattā sattesu ca taduppādanato
tika-s0201t:593_8: dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena lokassa cakkhu viya bhūto. Ñāṇabhūtoti etassa ca evameva
tika-s0201t:593_9: attho daṭṭhabbo. Dhammā bodhipakkhiyā, brahmā maggo, tehi uppannattā, tesaṃvā pattattā
tika-s0201t:593_10: adhigatattā, lokassa ca taduppādanato “dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto”ti ca veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:593_11: Vattāti catusaccadhammaṃ vadatīti vattā. Ciraṃ saccappaṭivedhaṃ pavattento vadatīti
tika-s0201t:593_12: pavattā. Atthassa ninnetāti dhammatāsaṅkhātaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānañca niddhāretvā
tika-s0201t:593_13: dassetā, pāpayitā vā. Amatassa dātāti amataṃ sacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ
tika-s0201t:593_14: dadātīti amatassa dātā. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tadāyattabhāvato dhammassāmī.
tika-s0201t:597_0: Evamādiṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvā eva bhikkhū dānādipuññānaṃ vivaṭṭasannissayataṃ
tika-s0201t:597_1: jānanti, na aññathāti vuttaṃ “pariyāyadhammopi…pe… paṭilabhatī”ti. “Edisaṃ paribhuñcitabba”nti
tika-s0201t:597_2: kappiyassa ca cīvarādipaccayassa bhagavato vacanena vinā paṭiggahopi bhikkhūnaṃ na
tika-s0201t:598_0: Pariyāyāmisassa bhagavato santakabhāvo pariyāyadhammassa tabbhāveneva dīpito. Tadeva
tika-s0201t:598_1: sāmibhāvaṃ dassentoti sambandho. Tasmāti attādhīnapaṭilābhapaṭiggahatāya attano santakattā
tika-s0201t:599_0: Paccayā cīvarādayo paramā pāpuṇitabbabhāvena uttamamariyādā etassa na uttarimanussadhammā
tika-s0201t:599_1: appicchatādayo cāti paccayaparamo, lābhagarūti attho. Taṇhuppādesūti “cīvarahetu
tika-s0201t:599_2: vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, piṇḍapātasenāsanaitibhavābhavahetu
tika-s0201t:599_3: vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti evaṃ vuttesu catūsu taṇhuppattikoṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0201t:600_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ ovāde, tesu vā dhammapaṭiggāhakesu bhikkhūsu. Bhavissati vā yesaṃ
tika-s0201t:600_1: tatthāti yojanā. Imasmiṃ pakkhe tatthāti tasmiṃ ovāde icceva attho daṭṭhabbo. Adhippāyo
tika-s0201t:600_3: ca ākaṅkhā. Tenāha “passatī”tiādi. Tattha āmise upakkhalitānanti āmisahetu vippaṭipannānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:600_4: Atītakāleti kassapasammāsambuddhakāle. Kapilassa bhikkhuno vatthu kapilasuttena,
tika-s0201t:600_5: “saṅghāṭipiādittā hotī”tiādinā lakkhaṇasuttena ca vibhāvetabbaṃ. Āmisagaruko appagghabhāvena
tika-s0201t:600_6: kūṭakahāpaṇo viya nittejo samaṇatejena anujjalato nibbutaṅgāro viya nippabho ca hotīti
tika-s0201t:600_7: yojanā. Tatoti paccayagarukabhāvato. Vivattitacittoti vinivattitamānaso, sallekhavuttīti attho.
tika-s0201t:601_0: Dhammadāyādāti ettāvatā antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ vacananti tena avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:601_1: vibhāvetuṃ “mā āmisadāyādā”ti paṭikkhepo dassito. Tatheva ca vibhāvetuṃ adhippāyānisaṃsavibhāvanesupi
tika-s0201t:601_2: dassito, tathā ādīnavavibhāvanena dhammadāyādatāpaṭikkhepo. Apadisitabbāti heṭṭhā
tika-s0201t:601_3: katvā vattabbāti. Ādiyāti ettha yasmā ā-kāro mariyādattho, tasmā dhammadāyādatāvidhurena
tika-s0201t:601_4: āmisadāyādabhāvena hetubhūtena, karaṇabhūtena vā ādiyaṃ vivecanaṃ viññūhi visuṃ karaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:601_5: vavatthānassa hotīti āha “visuṃ kātabbā”ti. Tenāha “viññūhi gārayhā bhaveyyāthāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:602_0: “Atthi me tumhesu anukampā…pe… no āmisadāyādā”ti bhikkhūsu attano karuṇāyanākittanaṃ
tika-s0201t:602_1: tesaṃ mudukaraṇaṃ, “ahampi tenā”tiādi pana tatopi savisesaṃ mudukaraṇanti āha “atīva mudukaraṇattha”nti.
tika-s0201t:603_0: Nāḷakapaṭipadādayo nāḷakasuttādīsu āgatapaṭipattiyo. Tā pana yasmā nāḷakattherādīhi
tika-s0201t:603_1: paṭipannā paramasallekhavuttibhūtā atiukkaṭṭhapaṭipattiyo, tasmā idha dhammadāyādapaṭipadāya
tika-s0201t:603_2: udāharaṇabhāvena uddhaṭā. Sakkhibhūtāti tāya paṭipattiyā vuccamānāya “kiṃ me vinā
tika-s0201t:603_3: paṭipajjanako atthī”ti asaddahantānaṃ paccakkhakaraṇena sakkhibhūtā. Imasminti “tumhe
tika-s0201t:603_4: ca me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā”tiādike vākye. Sesanti “tumhe ca me”tiādikaṃ sukkapakkhe
tika-s0201t:603_5: āgataṃ pāḷipadaṃ. Vuttanayapaccanīkenāti “tena dhammadāyādabhāvena no āmisadāyādabhāvenā”ti
tika-s0201t:604_0: 30. Thomanaṃ sutvāti paṭipajjanakassa puggalassa pasaṃsanaṃ sutvā yathā taṃ saparisassa
tika-s0201t:604_1: āyasmato upasenassa paṭipattiyā sīlathomanaṃ sutvā. Nipātapadanti iminā idha-saddassa
tika-s0201t:604_2: anatthakatamāha. Pavāritoti paṭikkhepito. Yo hi bhuñjanto bhojanena titto parivesakena
tika-s0201t:604_3: upanītabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati, so tena pavāritena paṭikkhepito nāma hoti. Tenāha “pavāritoti…pe…
tika-s0201t:604_4: vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Pakārehi diṭṭhādīhi vāreti saṅghādike yācāpeti bhatte karoti etāyāti
tika-s0201t:604_5: pavāraṇā, āpattivisodhanāya attavossaggo okāsadānaṃ. Sā pana yasmā yebhuyyena vassaṃvutthehi
tika-s0201t:604_6: kātabbā vuttā, tasmā “vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā”ti vuttaṃ. Pavāreti paccaye icchāpeti
tika-s0201t:604_7: etāyāti pavāraṇā, cīvarādīhi upanimantanā. Pakārayuttā vāraṇāti pavāraṇā, vippakatabhojanatādicaturaṅgasahito
tika-s0201t:604_8: bhojanapaṭikkhepo. Sā pana yasmā anatirittabhojananimittāya āpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:605_1: paripuṇṇo”ti. Pariyositoti etthāpi eseva nayo “bhojanena bhojanakiriyāya pariyosito”ti.
tika-s0201t:605_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana adhippetatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ bhojana-saddassa lopo vutto.
tika-s0201t:605_3: Dhātoti titto. Sādhakānīti ñāpakāni. Pariyositabhojanaṃ suhitayāvadatthatāgahaṇehi
tika-s0201t:605_4: bhuttāvitādayo, bhuttāvitādiggahaṇehi vā itare bodhitā hontīti aññamaññaṃ nesaṃ ñāpakañāpetabbataṃ
tika-s0201t:605_5: dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ chahipi padehi udarāvadehakaṃ bhojanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:605_6: tañca kho parikappanāvasena. Na hi bhagavā evaṃ bhuñjati. Tenāha “sabbañcetaṃ parikappetvā vutta”nti.
tika-s0201t:606_0: “Siyā eva, nāpi siyā”ti ca idaṃ atthadvayampi idha sambhavatīti vuttaṃ “idha ubhayampi
tika-s0201t:606_1: vaṭṭatī”ti. Athāti anantaraṃ, mama bhojanasamanantaramevāti attho. Taṃ pana yasmā
tika-s0201t:606_2: yathāvuttakālapaccāmasanaṃ hoti, tasmā “tamhi kāle”ti vuttaṃ. Apparuḷhahariteti ruhamānatiṇādiharitarahite.
tika-s0201t:607_0: Kathitepīti pi-saddo avuttasamuccayattho. Tena vāpasamīkaraṇādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā
tika-s0201t:607_1: hesa vutta-saddo “no ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati, “pannalomo
tika-s0201t:607_3: “gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samihita”ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite, loke pana “vuttaṃ parāyaṇa”ntiādīsu
tika-s0201t:608_0: Na ettha piṇḍapātabhojanena dhammadāyādatā nivāritā, piṇḍapātabhojanaṃ pana anādaritvā
tika-s0201t:608_1: dhammānudhammapaṭipattīti ettha kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “piṇḍapātaṃ…pe… vītināmeyyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:608_2: Tattha vītināmeyyāti kammaṭṭhānānuyogena khepeyya. Tenāha “ādittasīsūpamaṃ paccavekkhitvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:609_0: Kiñcāpīti ayaṃ “yadipī”ti iminā samānattho nipāto. Nipāto ca nāma yattha yattha vākye
tika-s0201t:609_1: payujjati, tena tena vattabbatthajotako hotīti idha “piṇḍapāta”ntiādinā anuññāpasaṃsāvasena
tika-s0201t:609_2: vuccamānassa atthassa jotakoti adhippāyena “anujānanapasaṃsanatthe nipāto”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:609_3: anuññāpasaṃsārambhe pana “asambhāvanatthe”ti vuttaṃ siyā purimeyeva sambhāvanāvibhāvanato
tika-s0201t:610_0: Ekavāraṃ pavattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhipanaṃ kathaṃ dīgharattaṃ appicchatādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:610_1: hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tassa hī”tiādi. Tattha atricchatāti atra icchatīti atriccho,
tika-s0201t:610_2: tassa bhāvo atricchatā, atthato paralābhapatthanā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “purimeyeva sakalābhena
tika-s0201t:610_3: asantuṭṭhi, paralābhe ca patthanā, etaṃ atricchatālakkhaṇa”nti. Pāpicchatāti asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyatā.
tika-s0201t:610_4: Pāpā icchā etassāti pāpiccho, tassa bhāvo pāpicchatā. Yathāha “asantaguṇasambhāvanatā
tika-s0201t:610_5: paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā, etaṃ pāpicchalakkhaṇa”nti. Mahantāni vatthūni icchati,
tika-s0201t:610_6: mahatī vā tassa icchāti mahiccho, tassa bhāvo mahicchatā. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaguṇasambhāvanatā
tika-s0201t:610_7: paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā, etaṃ mahicchalakkhaṇa”nti. Paccavekkhamāno nivāressatīti
tika-s0201t:611_0: Mahiccho puggalo yathā paccayadānavasena paccayadāyakehi bharituṃ asakkuṇeyyo, evaṃ
tika-s0201t:611_1: paccayapariyesanavasena attanāpīti vuttaṃ “attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi dubbharo hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:611_2: Saddhādeyyassa vinipātavasena pavattiyā aññassa ghare chaḍḍento. Rittapattovāti yesu
tika-s0201t:611_3: kulesu paṭipiṇḍavasena pavattati, tesaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ attano yathāladdhaṃ datvā
tika-s0201t:611_4: tattha kiñci aladdhā rittapatto vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati jighacchādubbalyenāti
tika-s0201t:611_5: adhippāyo. Yathāladdhapaccayaparibhogena, puna pariyesanānāpajjanena attano subharatā,
tika-s0201t:611_6: yathāladdhapaccayena avaññaṃ akatvā santosāpattiyā upaṭṭhākānaṃ subharatā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:612_0: Kathāvatthūnīti appicchatādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ kathānaṃ vatthūnīti kathāvatthūni, appicchatādayo
tika-s0201t:612_1: eva. Tīṇīti tīṇi kathāvatthūni. Abhisallekhikāti ativiya kilese sallikhatīti abhisallekho,
tika-s0201t:612_2: appiccha tādiguṇasamudāyo, so etissā atthīti abhisallekhikā, mahicchatādīnaṃ tanubhāvāya
tika-s0201t:612_5: sappāyā. Samathavipassanācittasseva vā vibhūtibhāvakaraṇāya sappāyā upakārikāti cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā.
tika-s0201t:612_6: Ekantanibbidāyātiādi yena nibbidādiānisaṃsena ayaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā
tika-s0201t:612_7: ca nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha ekantanibbidāyāti ekaṃsena vaṭṭadukkhato
tika-s0201t:612_8: nibbindanatthāya. Virāgāya nirodhāyāti tasseva virajjanatthañca nirujjhanatthañca.
tika-s0201t:612_9: Upasamāyāti sabbakilesavūpasamāya. Abhiññāyāti sabbassapi abhiññeyyassa abhijānanāya.
tika-s0201t:612_10: Sambodhāyāti catumaggasambodhāya. Nibbānāyāti anupādisesanibbānāya. Etesu hi ādito
tika-s0201t:612_11: tīhi vipassanā vuttā, puna tīhi maggo, itarena nibbānaṃ. Tena samathavipassanā ādiṃ
tika-s0201t:612_12: katvā nibbānapariyosāno ayaṃ sabbo uttarimanussadhammo dasakathāvatthulābhino sambhavatīti
tika-s0201t:612_13: dasseti. Paripūressantīti taṃsabhāvato upakārato ca saṃvattissanti. Appicchatādayo
tika-s0201t:612_14: hi ekavārauppannā upari tadatthāya saṃvattissanti. Kathāvatthuparipūraṇaṃ sikkhāparipūraṇañca
tika-s0201t:613_0: Amataṃ nibbānanti anupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ. Itarā pana sekkhāsekkhadhammapāripūriyā
tika-s0201t:613_1: paripuṇṇā. Nibbānapāripūri cettha tadāvahadhammapāripūrivasena pariyāyato vuttāti
tika-s0201t:613_2: veditabbā. Idāni yāyaṃ appicchatādīnaṃ anukkamaparivuddhiyā guṇapāripūritā, taṃ upamāya
tika-s0201t:613_3: sādhento “seyyathāpī”tiādimāha. Tattha pāvussakoti vassānamāse uṭṭhito. So hi cirānuppavatti
tika-s0201t:613_5: yattha upariunnatapadesato udakaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhati ceva sandati ca, te. Kusobbhā
tika-s0201t:613_6: khuddakataḷākā. Kunnadiyoti pabbatapādato nikkhantā khuddakanadiyo. Tā hi mahānadiyo
tika-s0201t:613_7: otarantiyo paripūrenti. Paramadhammadāyādanti paramaṃ uttamaṃ dhammadāyādabhāvaṃ,
tika-s0201t:613_8: paramaṃ dhammadāyajjaṃ vā. Te bhikkhūti te dhammapaṭiggāhake bhikkhū. Sanniyojentoti
tika-s0201t:614_0: Uggahetvāti atthato byañjanato ca upadhāraṇavasena gahetvā aviparītaṃ gahetvā. Saṃsandetvāti
tika-s0201t:614_1: mama desanānusārena mamajjhāsayaṃ avirajjhitvā. Yathā idheva cintesīti yathā imissā
tika-s0201t:614_2: dhammadāyādadesanāya cintesi, evaṃ aññatthāpi dhammathomanatthaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisanto
tika-s0201t:614_3: cintesi. Ekajjhāsayāyāti samānādhippāyāya. Matiyāti paññāya. Ayaṃ desanā aggātiādi
tika-s0201t:614_4: bhagavā dhammasenāpatiṃ guṇato eva paggaṇhātīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:615_0: Cittagatiyāti cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti
tika-s0201t:615_1: kāyassa cittena samānagatikatādhiṭṭhānena. Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattanacittena
tika-s0201t:615_2: samānagatiko hotīti? Na sabbathā samānagatiko. Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane
tika-s0201t:615_3: cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ na hoti. Na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano
tika-s0201t:615_4: khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattituṃ sakkoti, “idaṃ
tika-s0201t:615_5: cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū”ti pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato
tika-s0201t:615_6: yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti, tāva kāyagatiṃ anulomentameva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ
tika-s0201t:615_7: cittaṃ kāyagatikaṃ katvā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti, evaṃ “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya
tika-s0201t:615_8: hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva lahusaññāya sukhumasaññāya ca sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ
tika-s0201t:615_9: viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahuṃ katipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti,
tika-s0201t:615_10: evaṃ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatikabhāveneva pariṇāmito nāma hoti, na ekacittakkhaṇeneva
tika-s0201t:615_11: pavattiyā. Evañca katvā bāhusamiñjanappasāraṇūpamāpi upacārena vinā suṭṭhutaraṃ yuttā
tika-s0201t:615_12: hoti, aññathā dhammatāvilomitā siyā. Na hi dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ iddhibalena
tika-s0201t:616_0: 31. Bhagavato adhippāyānurūpaṃ bhikkhūnañca ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvāti vacanaseso. Desakāle
tika-s0201t:616_1: viya bhājanampi oloketvā eva mahāthero dhammaṃ katheti. Pakkantassāti idaṃ anādare
tika-s0201t:616_2: sāmivacananti dassento “pakkantassa sato”tiādimāha. Kittakenāti kena parimāṇena.
tika-s0201t:616_3: Taṃ pana parimāṇaṃ yasmā parimeyyassa atthassa paricchindanaṃ hoti, tasmā “kittāvatāti
tika-s0201t:616_4: paricchedavacana”nti āha. Nukāro pucchāyanti ayaṃ nu-saddo idheva pucchāyaṃ āgatoti
tika-s0201t:616_5: katvā vuttaṃ. Nu-saddena hettha jotiyamāno attho kiṃ-saddena parimāṇo attho parimeyyattho
tika-s0201t:616_6: ca. Ettha saṃkilesapakkho vivekassa ananusikkhanaṃ āmisadāyādatā, vodānapakkho tassa
tika-s0201t:616_7: anusikkhanaṃ dhammadāyādatāti. Tīhi vivekehīti vivekattayaggahaṇaṃ tadantogadhattā
tika-s0201t:616_8: vivekapañcakassa. Vivekapañcakaggahaṇe panassa sarūpena kāyaviveko gahito na siyā,
tika-s0201t:616_9: tadāyattattā vā satthārā tadā payujjamānavivekadassanavasena “tīhi vivekehī”tiādi
tika-s0201t:616_10: vuttaṃ. Aññatarampīti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi kāyavivekamattena dhammadāyādabhāvo sijjhatīti?
tika-s0201t:616_11: Na, vivekadvayasannissayasseva kāyavivekassa idhādhippetattā. Evañca katvā cittavivekaggahaṇampi
tika-s0201t:616_12: samatthitaṃ hoti. Na hi lokiyajjhānādhigamamattena nippariyāyato satthudhammadāyādabhāvo
tika-s0201t:616_13: icchito, nibbānādhigamena pana so icchito, tasmā sabbāpi sāsane vivekānusikkhanā
tika-s0201t:616_14: nibbānapoṇā nibbānapabbhārā nibbānogadhā cāti vuttaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatarampī”ti.
tika-s0201t:616_15: Asati āloke andhakāro viya asati dhammadāyādatāya ekaṃsiyā āmisadāyādatāti āha “āmisadāyādāva
tika-s0201t:616_16: hontī”ti. Esa nayo sukkapakkhepīti kaṇhapakkhato sādhāraṇavasena labbhamānaṃ atthasāmaññaṃ
tika-s0201t:616_17: atidisati, na atthavisesaṃ tassa visadisattā, atthavisesameva vā atidisati visadisūdāharaṇūpāyañāyena.
tika-s0201t:616_18: “Tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatara”nti idaṃ idha na labbhati. Tayopi hi vivekā, tesu eko
tika-s0201t:617_1: paṭi-saddāpekkhāya “sāriputta”nti upayogavacanaṃ, attho pana sāmivacanavaseneva veditabboti
tika-s0201t:617_2: dassento āha “āyasmatoyeva sāriputtassā”ti. Bhāgo hotūti iminābhāgattho paṭi-saddoti
tika-s0201t:617_3: dasseti lakkhaṇādiatthānaṃ idha ayujjanato. Tenāha “evaṃ saddalakkhaṇena sametī”ti.
tika-s0201t:617_4: Dissatūti ñāṇena dissatu, passatūti vā attho. Upaṭṭhātūti ñāṇassa paccupatiṭṭhatu.
tika-s0201t:617_5: Uggahessantīti vācuggataṃ karissanti. Vācuggatakaraṇañhi uggaho. Pariyāpuṇissantīti
tika-s0201t:617_6: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Puripucchanādinā vā atthassa citte āpādanaṃ paṭṭhapanaṃ pariyāpuṇanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:617_7: Kāraṇavacananti yathāvuttassa kāraṇabhāvena vacanaṃ “hetumhi karaṇavacana”nti katvā.
tika-s0201t:618_0: Ekenevākārenāti āmisadāyādatāsiddhena ādiyatāsaṅkhātena ekeneva pakārena. Tameva
tika-s0201t:618_1: hi ākāraṃ sandhāyāha “bhagavatā vuttamattha”nti. Aññathā “satthu pavivittassa viharato
tika-s0201t:618_2: sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī’ti ekeneva ākārena so attho therenapi vutto. Tīhi ākārehīti
tika-s0201t:619_0: Vitthārato suvibhatto hoti anavasesato sammadeva niddiṭṭhattā. Nanu ca uddese satthunopi
tika-s0201t:619_1: ādiyatā bhagavatā gahitā, sā na niddiṭṭhāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “so ca kho”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:619_2: Sāvake anuggaṇhantassāti “āmisadāyādā satthu sāvakā”ti satthu parappavādapariharaṇatthampi
tika-s0201t:619_3: “tumhehi dhammadāyādehi bhavitabba”nti evaṃ sāvake anukampamānassa. Sāvakānaṃ taṃ
tika-s0201t:619_4: na yuttaṃ sāmīciabhāvatoti yojanā. Esa nayoti yadidaṃ “ettāvatāyaṃ bhagavā”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:619_5: kaṇhapakkhe uddesassa atthavibhāgadassanamukhena sambandhadassanaṃ, esa nayo sukkapakkhepi
tika-s0201t:619_6: sambandhadassaneti adhippāyo. Tenāha “ayaṃ tāvettha anusandhikkamayojanā”ti, satthārā
tika-s0201t:619_7: desitāya uddesadesanāya mahātherena desitāya ca anusandhikkamena sambandhoti attho.
tika-s0201t:620_0: Accantapavivittassāti ekantaupadhiviveko viya itarepi viveko satthu ekantikāvāti.
tika-s0201t:620_1: Anusikkhanaṃ nāma anu anu pūraṇanti tappaṭikkhepena āha “na paripūrentī”ti, na paribrūhentīti
tika-s0201t:620_2: attho, na paripūrentīti vā na paripālentīti attho. Yadaggena hi vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti,
tika-s0201t:620_3: tadaggena na paribrūhenti, na paripālentīti vā vattabbataṃ labhantīti. Kasmā panettha
tika-s0201t:620_4: “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti uddese viya avisesavacane kāyavivekasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti
tika-s0201t:620_5: codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yadi panā”tiādi. Pucchāyāti pucchāto aviseso siyā vibhāgassa
tika-s0201t:620_6: alabbhamānattā vissajjanassa. Nanu ca “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti avisesavacanato pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:620_7: vibhāgo na labbhatevāti? Na, padantarena vibhāvitattā. Tenāha “yesañca dhammāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:620_8: Byākaraṇapakkhoti vissajjanapakkho. Vissajjanañca na pucchā viya avisesajotanā, atha
tika-s0201t:620_9: kho yathādhippetatthavibhajananti adhippāyo. Iminā padenāti “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti
tika-s0201t:620_10: iminā padena kāyavivekaṃ aparipūriyamānaṃ dassetīti adhippāyo. Cittavivekaṃ upadhivivekanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:621_0: Ettha ca nappajahantīti pahātabbadhammānaṃ pahānābhāvavacanaṃ pahānalakkhaṇavivekābhāvadīpanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:621_1: taṃ vatvā puna “viveke nikkhittadhurā”ti vacanaṃ tato sātisayavivekābhāvadīpananti
tika-s0201t:621_4: Avigatataṇhatāya taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahuṃ lanti ādiyantīti bahulā, bahulā eva
tika-s0201t:621_5: bāhulikā yathā “venayiko”ti. Te pana yasmā paccayabahulabhāvāya yuttappayuttā nāma
tika-s0201t:621_6: honti, tasmā āha “cīvarādibāhullāya paṭipannā”ti. Sikkhāya ādarabhāvābhāvato sithilaṃ
tika-s0201t:621_7: adaḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti “sāthalikā”ti vuttaṃ. Sithilanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, sithila-saddena
tika-s0201t:621_8: vā samānatthassa sāthala-saddassa vasena “sāthalikā”ti padasiddhi veditabbā. Avagamanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0201t:622_0: Aniyamenevāti kiñci visesaṃ anāmasitvā “sāvakā”ti aviseseneva. Niyamento“therā”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:622_1: Dasavasse upādāyāti dasavassato paṭṭhāya. Issariyeti “seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ senāpatiṭṭhāna”ntiādīsu
tika-s0201t:622_2: viya. Acirakkhaṇobhāsena lakkhavedhako akkhaṇavedhi. Ṭhitiyanti avaṭṭhāne. Ṭhānasoti
tika-s0201t:622_4: sattasaṅkhāresu udāsīnatāpi asaṅkhatādhigamassa upāyoti tabbipariyāyato cīvarādimaṇḍanā
tika-s0201t:622_5: na upadhivivekapāripūriyā saṃvattatīti āha “cīvarapatta…pe… apūrayamānā”ti. Tatthāti
tika-s0201t:622_6: theravāre. Idhāti majjhimanavakavāresu. Tathā hi “majjhimatherakāle”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:623_0: 32. Imasmiñca kaṇhapakkheti imasmiñca niddesavāre kaṇhapakkhe, na uddesavāre kaṇhapakkhe.
tika-s0201t:623_1: Uddesavāre pana kaṇhapakkhe vuttavipariyāyena gahetabbattho “esa nayo sukkapakkhepī”ti
tika-s0201t:623_2: atidesena dassito. Vuttapaccanīkanayenāti “kāyavivekaṃ nānusikkhanti na paripūrentī”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:623_4: nayena. Etthāti etasmiṃ sukkapakkhe. Saṅkhepoti atthasaṅkhepo. Yojanaparamparāyāti
tika-s0201t:623_5: gāmantato dūrabhāvena ekaṃ dve tīṇīti evaṃ yojanānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā. Araññavanapatthānīti
tika-s0201t:623_6: araññesu vanasaṇḍabhūtāni. Pantānīti pariyantāni. Upagantuṃ yuttakālo jarājiṇṇakālo
tika-s0201t:623_7: gocaragāme dūre gamanāgamanasamatthatābhāvato. “Evaṃ guṇavantesu dinnaṃ aho sudinna”nti
tika-s0201t:623_8: paccayadāyakānaṃ pasādaṃ janenti. Pāsaṃsāti pasaṃsitabbā. Ayampi mahātherotiādi ekaṃ
tika-s0201t:623_9: appamādavihārinaṃ vuddhataraṃ niddisitvā vadantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Paviṭṭho vivekaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:623_10: Sāyaṃ nikkhamati yonisomanasikāraṃ upabrūhetvāti adhippāyo. Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karoti,
tika-s0201t:623_11: na yaṃ kiñci kiccantaraṃ. Samāpattiyo nibbatteti, na moghamanasikāraṃ. Sabbathātiādito
tika-s0201t:623_12: tāva tadaṅgavasena kilesehi cittaṃ vivecento tato vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena
tika-s0201t:623_13: paṭipassaddhivasenāti sabbappakārena cittavivekaṃ pūreti. Paṃsukūlāni dhāretīti iminā
tika-s0201t:623_14: bāhulikatābhāvaṃ dasseti, asithilaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvāti iminā sāthalikatābhāvaṃ, vigatanīvaraṇoti
tika-s0201t:623_15: iminā okkamane nikkhittadhurataṃ, phalasamāpattintiādinā pavivekapubbaṅgamataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:624_0: 33. Tatrāvusoti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho. Tena “lobho ca pāpako”tiādinayappavattaṃ
tika-s0201t:624_1: uparidesanaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyati. Ko anusandhīti yā sā bhagavatā saṃkilesapakkhena
tika-s0201t:624_2: saha dhammadāyādapaṭipattibhāvinī “dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:624_3: desanā uddiṭṭhā, taṃ “satthu pavivittassa viharato”tiādinā ārabhitvā aṭṭhārasavārapaṭimaṇḍitāya
tika-s0201t:624_4: niddesadesanāya vibhajitvā tato paraṃ “tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako”tiādinayāya uparidesanāya
tika-s0201t:624_7: yaṃ-taṃ-saddehi dhamma-saddena sāmaññato ye pahātabbadhammā vuttā, te sarūpato dassetunti
tika-s0201t:624_8: yojanā. Ime teti ettha kasmā lobhādayo eva pahātabbadhammā vuttā, nanu ito aññepi
tika-s0201t:624_9: mohadiṭṭhivicikicchādayo pahātabbadhammā santīti? Saccaṃ santi, te pana lobhādīhi
tika-s0201t:624_10: tadekaṭṭhatā gahitā eva hontīti vuttā. Atha vā imesaṃyevettha gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0201t:625_0: Idāni upacayena anusandhiṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sāvakānaṃ yassa dhammassa
tika-s0201t:625_1: dāyādabhāvo satthu abhirucito, so “cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetī”tiādinā akatthetvā
tika-s0201t:625_2: “vivekaṃ anusikkhanti, te ca dhamme pajahanti, na ca bāhulikā”tiādinā kathitattā
tika-s0201t:625_3: heṭṭhā pariyāyeneva dhammo kathitoti vuttaṃ. “Te ca dhamme nappajahanti, okkamane
tika-s0201t:625_4: pubbaṅgamā”tiādinā āmisaṃ pariyāyenapi kathitaṃ. “Siyā ca me piṇḍapāto”tiādinā, “bāhulikā
tika-s0201t:625_5: ca hontī”tiādinā ca āmisaṃ nippariyāyenapi kathitaṃ. Atha vā yāyaṃ bhagavatā āmisadāyādapaṭikkhepanā
tika-s0201t:625_6: dhammadāyādatā vuttā, yañca tadatthaṃ vibhajantena mahātherena attanā vivekānusikkhanādi
tika-s0201t:625_7: vuttaṃ, tadubhayaṃ hetuvasena vibhāvetuṃ “tatrāvuso, lobho cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Hetunirodhena
tika-s0201t:625_8: hi saṃkilesapakkhassa, nirodhahetusampādanena ca vodānapakkhassa tappāpakatā.
tika-s0201t:626_0: Atītadesanānidassananti atītāya therena yathādesitāya desanāya ca paccāmasanaṃ. Tenevāha
tika-s0201t:626_1: “satthu pavivittassa…pe… desanāyanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Tatthāti yaṃ vuttaṃ visesato
tika-s0201t:626_2: “yesaṃ dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāhā”ti, etasmiṃ pade. Tattha hi pahātabbadhammā lobhādayo
tika-s0201t:626_3: sāmaññato vuttā. Lāmakāti nihīnā. Lobhadosā hi hetuto paccayato sabhāvato phalato
tika-s0201t:626_4: nissandato saṃkiliṭṭhapakatikā, āyatiṃ dukkhassa pāpanaṭṭhena vā pāpakā. Lubbhanalakkhaṇoti
tika-s0201t:626_5: ārammaṇassa abhigijjhanalakkhaṇo. Tathā hi so lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati,
tika-s0201t:626_6: lubbhanamattameva vā tanti “lobho”ti vuccati. Rasādīsu abhisaṅgaraso, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno,
tika-s0201t:626_7: saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno. Dussanalakkhaṇoti ārammaṇe byāpajjanalakkhaṇo.
tika-s0201t:626_8: Tathā hi so dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā dussati, dussanamattameva vā tanti “doso”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:626_9: Rasādīsu visappanaraso, sanissayadahanaraso vā, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno, āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno.
tika-s0201t:627_0: Tesūtiādinā dassanena lobhadosānaṃ ekantato pahātabbatādassanaṃ. Āmisadāyādassa paccayānaṃ
tika-s0201t:627_1: lābhe hotīti idaṃ lobhassa ārammaṇaggahaṇasabhāvataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṇhāya vasena
tika-s0201t:627_2: pana anugijjhanaṃ sandhāya “aladdhaṃ patthetī”ti āha. Alābhe paccayānaṃ āmisadāyādassa
tika-s0201t:627_3: hotīti ānetvā yojanā. Alabhantoti ettha “paccaye”ti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:627_4: Vighātavāti “yampicchaṃ na labhati, tampi dukkha”nti vacanato icchāvighātavā. Lobho
tika-s0201t:627_5: ca deyyadhamme hoti āmisadāyādassāti sambandho. Esa nayo anantarapadepi. Deyyadhammeti
tika-s0201t:627_6: ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ sattakelāyanādivasenapi tassa lobhuppattisabbhāvato. “Taṇhaṃ
tika-s0201t:627_7: paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho”ti evamādayo nava taṇhāmūlakā. Paripūreti
tika-s0201t:627_8: āmisadāyādoti vibhattivipariṇāmo veditabbo. Āvāsamacchariyādīni pañca macchariyāni.
tika-s0201t:628_0: Magganti ariyamaggaṃ. So hi kilese mārento gacchati, nibbānatthikehi ca maggīyati,
tika-s0201t:628_1: sayaṃ vā sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena nibbānaṃ maggatīti nippariyāyena “maggo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:628_2: Eko antoti itarena asammisso eko koṭṭhāso, hīnatāya vā lāmakaṭṭhena eko anto. Kāmaṃ
tika-s0201t:628_3: aññepi kusaladhammā ete ante asampayogato na upenti, tehi vimuttā eva, ayaṃ pana
tika-s0201t:628_4: accantavimuttiyā na upetīti āha “vimutto etehi antehī”ti. Tasmāti antadvayavimuttattā.
tika-s0201t:628_5: Etesaṃ majjhe bhavattāti idaṃ maggassa ubhayantavimuttatāya eva vuttaṃ, na tappariyāpannatāya,
tika-s0201t:628_6: vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi paṭipajjitabbato ca. Tathāti yathā itarena asammissaṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:628_7: lāmakaṭṭhena ca lobho eko anto, tathā kāmasukhallikānuyogoti attho. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0201t:628_8: Maggassa anupagamanañca nesaṃ antānaṃ sabbaso appavattikaraṇeneva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purimanayenāti
tika-s0201t:628_9: “ete dve ante na upetī”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena.
tika-s0201t:629_0: Saccānanti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ. Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti dassanassa pariññābhisamayādibhedassa
tika-s0201t:629_1: parito sabbathā nayanaṭṭhena pavattanaṭṭhena. Cakkhukaraṇīti dhammacakkhussa karaṇī
tika-s0201t:629_2: nipphādikā. Tayidaṃ satipi paṭipadāya dhammacakkhuto anaññatte avayavavasena sijjhamāno
tika-s0201t:629_3: attho samudāyena kato nāma hotīti upacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati
tika-s0201t:629_4: “maggoyeva hi maggatthāya saṃvattati maggena kātabbakiccakaraṇato”ti. Ñāṇāyāti yāthāvato
tika-s0201t:629_6: Vūpasamanatoti samucchindanavasena vūpasamanato. Dukkhādīnaṃ pariññeyyādibhāvo viya
tika-s0201t:629_7: abhiññeyyabhāvopi maggavaseneva pākaṭo hotīti āha “catunnampi saccānaṃ abhiññeyyabhāvadassanato”ti,
tika-s0201t:629_8: vibhāvanatoti attho. Sambodhoti maggo “sambujjhati etenā”ti katvā. Tassatthāyāti
tika-s0201t:629_9: maggakiccatthāya. Na hi maggato añño maggakiccakaro atthi. Tenāha “maggoyeva hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:629_10: Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi uppajjamānā sahajātādipaccayabhāvena itare uppādeti, evaṃ sesamaggadhammāpīti
tika-s0201t:629_11: evampi maggatthāya saṃvattanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sacchikiriyāya paccakkhakammāyāti sacchikaraṇasaṅkhātapaccakkhakammāya.
tika-s0201t:629_12: Nibbānāyāti vā anupādisesanibbānāya. Upasamāyāti iminā saupādisesanibbānaṃ gahitanti.
tika-s0201t:629_13: Ayanti “sā hi saccāna”ntiādinā yathāvutto atthanayo. Etthāti “cakkhukaraṇī”tiādīsu
tika-s0201t:629_14: padesu. Sāro sundaro anapanīto. Ito aññathāti “dukkhassa pariññāya diṭṭhivisuddhiṃ
tika-s0201t:630_0: Ayamevāti ettha ayanti iminā attano aññesañca tassaṃ parisāyaṃ ariyānaṃ maggassa
tika-s0201t:630_1: paccakkhabhāvaṃ dasseti. Āsannapaccakkhavācī hi ayaṃ-saddo. Aññamaggapaṭisedhanatthanti
tika-s0201t:630_2: aññassa nibbānagāmimaggassa atthibhāvapaṭisedhanatthaṃ. Sattāpaṭikkhepo hi idha paṭisedhanaṃ
tika-s0201t:630_3: alabbhamānattā aññassa maggassa. Buddhādīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvo anaññatā. Tenāha brahmā sahampati –
tika-s0201t:635_0: Ārakattāti iminā niruttinayena ariya-saddasiddhimāha. Aripahānāyāti atthavacanamattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:635_1: Arayo pāpadhammā yanti apagamanti etenāti ariyo. Ariyena desitoti ettha ariyassa
tika-s0201t:635_2: bhagavato ayanti ariyo. Ariyabhāvappaṭilābhāyāti ettha ariyakaro ariyoti uttarapadalopena
tika-s0201t:635_3: ariya-saddasiddhi veditabbā. Yasmā maggaṅgasamudāye maggavohāro hoti, samudāyo ca
tika-s0201t:635_4: samudāyīhi samannāgato nāma hotīti āha “aṭṭhahi aṅgehi upetattā”ti, tasmā attano
tika-s0201t:635_5: avayavabhūtāni aṭṭha aṅgāni etassa santīti aṭṭhaṅgiko. Yasmā pana paramatthato aṅgāniyeva
tika-s0201t:635_6: maggo, tasmā vuttaṃ “na ca aṅgavinimutto”ti yathā “chaḷaṅgo vedo”ti. Sadisūdāharaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:635_7: pana dassento “pañcaṅgikatūriyādīni viyā”ti āha. Ādi-saddena caturaṅginī senāti evamādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:635_8: saṅgaho. Mārento gacchatīti niruttinayena saddasiddhimāha. Maggatīti gavesati. Ariyamaggo
tika-s0201t:635_9: hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonto taṃ gavesanto viya hotīti. Maggīyati nibbānatthikehi
tika-s0201t:635_10: vivaṭṭūpanissayapuññakaraṇato paṭṭhāya tadatthaṃ paṭipattito. Gammatīti etena ādiantavipariyāyena
tika-s0201t:635_11: saddasiddhimāha yathā “kakū”ti. “Seyyathidanti nipāto”ti vatvā tassa sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanasādhāraṇatāya
tika-s0201t:635_12: “katamāni tāni aṭṭhaṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ. Nanu ca aṅgāni samuditāni maggo antamaso sattaṅgavikalassa
tika-s0201t:635_13: ariyamaggassa abhāvatoti? Saccametaṃ saccapaṭivedhena, maggapaccayatāya pana yathāsakaṃ
tika-s0201t:635_14: kiccakaraṇena paccekampi tāni maggoyevāti āha “ekamekañhi aṅgaṃ maggoyevā”ti, aññathā
tika-s0201t:635_15: samuditānampi nesaṃ maggakiccaṃ na sambhaveyyāti. Idāni tamevatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ
tika-s0201t:636_0: Sammā aviparītaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ
tika-s0201t:636_1: lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sammādassanalakkhaṇā. Sammā aviparītaṃ sampayuttadhamme nibbānārammaṇe
tika-s0201t:636_2: abhiniropanaṃ appanālakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sammāabhiniropanalakkhaṇo musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya
tika-s0201t:636_3: lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato siniddhasabhāvattā sampayuttadhamme, sammāvācappaccayasubhāsitasotārañca
tika-s0201t:636_4: janaṃ sammadeva pariggaṇhātīti sammāvācā sammāpariggaho lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sammāpariggahalakkhaṇā.
tika-s0201t:636_5: Yathā kāyikā kiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ
tika-s0201t:636_6: hoti, tathā sammākammantasaṅkhātā viratipīti sammāsamuṭṭhānalakkhaṇo sammākammanto.
tika-s0201t:636_7: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:636_8: Jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā suddhi vodānaṃ, ājīvasseva vā jīvitappavattiyā
tika-s0201t:636_9: suddhi vodānaṃ etenāti sammāvodānalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā
tika-s0201t:636_10: sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:636_11: tassa vā anissajjanaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ. Ārammaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ sammā, samaṃ vā ādhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:636_12: samādhānaṃ. Sammā saṅkappeti sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhiniropetīti sammāsaṅkappo.
tika-s0201t:636_13: Sammā vadati etāyāti sammāvācā. Sammā karoti etenāti sammākammaṃ, tadeva sammākammanto.
tika-s0201t:636_14: Sammā ājīvati etenāti sammāājīvo. Sammā vāyamati ussahati etenāti sammāvāyāmo. Sammā
tika-s0201t:636_15: sarati anussaratīti sammāsati. Sammā samādhiyati cittaṃ etenāti sammāsamādhīti evaṃ
tika-s0201t:637_0: Micchādiṭṭhinti sabbampi micchādassanaṃ. Tappaccanīyakileseti ettha taṃ-saddena sammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0201t:637_1: Na hi micchādiṭṭhiyā kilesā paccanīyā, atha kho sammādiṭṭhiyā. Avijjañcāti avijjāggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:637_2: tassā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ pamukhabhāvato. Tenāha “avijjā, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ
tika-s0201t:637_3: dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā”ti. Dassananivārakassa sammohassa samugghātena asammohato.
tika-s0201t:637_4: Ettha ca micchādiṭṭhiṃ…pe… pajahatīti etena pahānābhisamayaṃ, nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:637_6: sammādiṭṭhikiccaṃ dasseti. Pariññābhisamayo pana nānantariyatāya atthato vutto eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:638_0: Kathaṃ pana ekameva ñāṇaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri kiccāni sādhentaṃ pavattati. Na hi
tika-s0201t:638_1: tādisaṃ loke diṭṭhaṃ, na āgamo vā tādiso atthīti na vattabbaṃ. Yathā hi padīpo ekasmiṃyeva
tika-s0201t:638_2: khaṇe vaṭṭiṃ dahati, snehaṃ pariyādiyati, andhakāraṃ vidhamati, ālokañca vidaṃseti,
tika-s0201t:638_3: evametaṃ ñāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudayepetaṃ
tika-s0201t:638_4: ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṃ ñāṇanti suttapadaṃ
tika-s0201t:638_5: ettha udāharitabbaṃ. Yathā ca sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge dukkhādīsu visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā
tika-s0201t:638_6: maggakkhaṇe ekāva catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati, evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādayo
tika-s0201t:638_7: pubbabhāge nekkhammasaṅkappādināmakā hutvā kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ pajahanavasena visuṃ
tika-s0201t:638_8: visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ catunnañca kiccaṃ sādhentā pavattanti. Sammāsamādhi
tika-s0201t:638_9: pana pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi nānāyeva hutvā pavattatīti kāmañcettha sammādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0201t:638_10: sabbepi pāpadhammā paṭipakkhā, ujuvipaccanīkatādassanavasena pana sammādiṭṭhiyā kiccaniddese
tika-s0201t:638_11: micchādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Teneva ca “tappaccanīyakilese cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:639_0: Yesaṃ kilesānaṃ anupacchindane sammādiṭṭhi na uppajjeyya, te micchādiṭṭhiyā sahajekaṭṭhatāya
tika-s0201t:639_1: tadekaṭṭhāva tappaccanīyakilesā daṭṭhabbā. Sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ kiccaniddesepi eseva
tika-s0201t:639_2: nayo. Sotāpattimaggādivasena cattāro lokuttaramaggabhāvasāmaññena ekato katvā. Lobhadosā
tika-s0201t:639_3: samudayasaccaṃ, yassa pana so samudayo taṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, pahānabhāvo maggasaccaṃ,
tika-s0201t:639_4: yattha taṃ pahānaṃ, taṃ nirodhasaccanti imāni cattāri saccāni. Kasmā panettha lobhadosānaṃ
tika-s0201t:639_5: visuṃ ādito ca gahaṇaṃ? Visuṃ gahaṇaṃ tāva tathābujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena,
tika-s0201t:639_6: imehi lobhadosehi āmisadāyādatā, tappahānena ca dhammadāyādatāti dassanatthaṃ, tadanusārena
tika-s0201t:639_7: catusaccayojanāya evaṃ ekekassa niyyānamukhaṃ hotīti dassanatthañca. Sesavāresupi
tika-s0201t:639_8: eseva nayo. Ādito gahaṇaṃ pana ativiya oḷārikatāya supākaṭabhāvato vakkhamānānaṃ
tika-s0201t:639_9: aññesañca pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhāvato tadekaṭṭhatāya ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:640_0: Kujjhanalakkhaṇoti kuppanasabhāvo, cittassa byāpajjanāti attho. Caṇḍikkaṃ luddatā,
tika-s0201t:640_1: kururabhāvoti attho. Āghātakaraṇarasoti “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā citte āghātassa
tika-s0201t:640_3: viya sapatto. Upanandhanaṃ nānappakārassa uparūpari nandhanaṃ viya hotīti katvā.
tika-s0201t:640_5: Aparakāle upanāhotiādīti ādi-saddena “upanayhanā upanayhitattaṃ āṭhapanā ṭhapanā
tika-s0201t:640_6: saṇṭhapanā anusaṃsandanā anuppabandhanā daḷhīkamma”ntiādīnaṃ niddesapadānaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ
tika-s0201t:640_7: saṅgayhati. Upanāhasamaṅgī hi puggalo verassa anissajjanato ādittapūtialātaṃ viya
tika-s0201t:640_8: jalati eva, cittañcassa dhoviyamānaṃ acchacammaṃ viya, masimakkhitapilotikā viya ca na sujjhateva.
tika-s0201t:641_0: Paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇoti udakapuñchaniyā udakaṃ viya paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanasabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:641_1: Tathābhūto cāyaṃ attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantaṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkheti
tika-s0201t:641_2: evāti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hessa saparasantānesu guṇaṃ makkhetīti makkhoti vuccati. Yugaggāho
tika-s0201t:641_3: samadhuraggahaṇaṃ asamānassapi abhūtassa samāropanaṃ. Samabhāvakaraṇaṃ samīkaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:641_4: Paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena attano guṇānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti āha “paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena
tika-s0201t:641_5: upaṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti. Tathā hesa paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya attano guṇehi same
tika-s0201t:642_0: Parasampattikhīyanaṃ parasampattiyā usūyanaṃ. Issati parasampattiṃ na sahatīti issā.
tika-s0201t:642_1: Tathā hesā “parasampattiyā akkhamanalakkhaṇā”ti vuccati. Tatthāti parasampattiyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:642_3: appadānato. Nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ attano sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanato. Asukhāyanaṃ
tika-s0201t:643_0: Katassa kāyaduccaritādipāpassa paṭicchādanaṃ katapāpapaṭicchādanaṃ. Tassa pāpassa
tika-s0201t:643_1: āvaraṇabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti tadāvaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā, māyā, yāya samannāgato
tika-s0201t:643_2: puggalo bhasmachanno viya aṅgāro, udakachanno viya khāṇu, pilotikapaṭicchāditaṃ viya
tika-s0201t:643_3: ca satthaṃ hoti. Avijjamānaguṇappakāsanaṃ attani avijjamānasīlādiguṇavibhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:643_4: yena sāṭheyyena samannāgatassa puggalassa asantaguṇasambhāvanena cittānurūpakiriyāviharato
tika-s0201t:643_5: “evaṃcitto, evaṃkiriyo”ti dubbiññeyyattā kucchiṃ vā piṭṭhiṃ vā jānituṃ na sakkā. Yato –
tika-s0201t:647_0: Cittassa uddhumātabhāvo thaddhalūkhabhāvo. Appatissayavuttīti anivātavutti. Amaddavākārena
tika-s0201t:647_1: paccupatiṭṭhati, amaddavataṃ vā paccupaṭṭhapetīti amaddavatāpaccupaṭṭhāno, thambho,
tika-s0201t:647_2: yena samannāgato puggalo gilitanaṅgalasīso viya ajagaro, vātabharitabhastā viya ca
tika-s0201t:647_3: thaddho hutvā garuṭṭhāniye ca disvā onamitumpi na icchati, pariyanteneva carati.
tika-s0201t:647_4: Karaṇassa uttarakiriyā karaṇuttariyaṃ. Visesato paccanīkabhāvo vipaccanīkatā. Parena
tika-s0201t:647_5: hi kismiñci kate taddiguṇaṃ karaṇavasena sārambho pavattati.
tika-s0201t:648_0: Seyyādiākārehi unnamanaṃ unnati. Omānopi hi evaṃ karaṇamukhena sampaggahavaseneva
tika-s0201t:648_1: pavattati. “Ahamasmi seyyo”tiādinā ahaṃkaraṇaṃ sampaggaho ahaṅkāro. Pare abhibhavitvā
tika-s0201t:648_2: adhikaṃ unnamanaṃ abbhunnati. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “pubbakāle attānaṃ hīnato dahati
tika-s0201t:649_0: Mattabhāvo jātiādiṃ paṭicca cittassa majjanākāro, yassa vā dhammassa vasena puggalo
tika-s0201t:649_1: matto nāma hoti, so dhammo mattabhāvo. Madaggāhaṇaraso madassa gāhaṇakicco. Mado
tika-s0201t:649_2: hi attano majjanākāraṃ sampayuttadhamme gāhento viya pavattamāno taṃsamaṅgiṃ puggalampi
tika-s0201t:649_3: tathā karonto viya hoti. Ahaṅkāravasena puggalaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ karonto cittassa ummādabhāvo
tika-s0201t:649_4: viya hotīti ummādapaccupaṭṭhāno. Satiyā aniggaṇhitvā cittassa vossajjanaṃ cittavossaggo,
tika-s0201t:649_5: sativirahitoti attho. Yathāvuttassa vossaggassa anuppadānaṃ punappunaṃ vissajjanaṃ
tika-s0201t:649_6: vossaggānuppadānaṃ. Imesaṃ kodhādīnaṃ lobhādīnampi vā. Lakkhaṇādīnīti lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0201t:649_7: Padaṭṭhānaṃ pana dhammantaratāya na gahitaṃ. Nibbacanaṃ “kujjhatīti kodho, upanayhatīti
tika-s0201t:649_8: upanāho”tiādinā suviññeyyamevāti na vuttaṃ, atthato pana kodho doso eva, tathā upanāho.
tika-s0201t:649_9: Pavattiākāramattato hi kato nesaṃ bhedo, makkhapaḷāsasārambhā tadākārappavattā paṭighasahagatacittuppādadhammā,
tika-s0201t:649_11: vā mānaviseso cittassa thaddhabhāvena gahetabbato, tathā mado. Tathā hi so “māno
tika-s0201t:649_12: maññanā”tiādinā vibhaṅge niddiṭṭho. Idha pana mānātimānānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā majjanākārena
tika-s0201t:649_13: pavattadhammā eva “mado”ti gahetabbā. Sesānaṃ dhammantarabhāvo pākaṭo eva.
tika-s0201t:650_0: Kasmā panettha ete eva aṭṭha dukā gahitā, kimito aññepi kilesadhammā natthīti? No
tika-s0201t:650_1: natthi, ime pana āmisadāyādassa savisesaṃ kilesāya saṃvattantīti taṃ visesaṃ vibhāventena
tika-s0201t:650_2: āmisadāyādassa lobhādīnaṃ pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “visesato”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0201t:650_3: etthāti etesu lobhādīsu. Alabhanto āmisanti adhippāyo. Tatuttari uppanno kodhoti
tika-s0201t:650_4: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Santepīti vijjamānepi. Issatīti issaṃ janeti. Padussatīti
tika-s0201t:650_5: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Tathā hi sā “issati dussati padussatī”tiādinā niddiṭṭhā. Yasmā
tika-s0201t:650_6: vā issaṃ janento ekaṃsato paduṭṭhacitto eva hoti, tasmā “padussatī”ti vuttaṃ. Assāti
tika-s0201t:650_7: āmisadāyādassa. Evaṃ paṭipannoti evaṃ asantaguṇappakāsanaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno. Ovadituṃ
tika-s0201t:650_8: asakkuṇeyyoti etena thambho nāma dovacassakaraṇo dhammoti dasseti. Kiñci vadati ovādadānavasena.
tika-s0201t:650_9: Thambhena…pe… maññantoti iminā ca thambhassa mānavisesabhāvaṃ dasseti, thambhena
tika-s0201t:650_10: vā hetunāti attho. Matto samānoti matto honto. Kāma…pe… pamajjatīti etena madavasena
tika-s0201t:651_0: Evanti iminā āmisadāyādassa lobhādīnaṃ uppattikkamadassaneneva idha pāḷiyaṃ nesaṃ
tika-s0201t:651_1: desanākkamopi dassitoti daṭṭhabbo. Na kevalaṃ imeheva, atha kho aññehi ca evarūpehi
tika-s0201t:651_2: pāpakehi dhammehi aparimutto hotīti sambandho. Ke pana teti? Atricchatāmahicchatādayoti.
tika-s0201t:651_3: Evaṃ mahādīnavā āmisadāyādatāti tato balavataro saṃvego janetabboti ayamettha ovādo
tika-s0201t:651_4: veditabbo. Etthāti etasmiṃ sutte. Sabbatthāti sabbesu vāresu. Nibbisesoyevāti eteneva
tika-s0201t:651_5: paṭhamataraṃ idha dassitasaccayojanānayena sabbavāresu yojetabboti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:652_1: āsevanaṭṭhena paricayo ñāṇaparicayo, tassa paṭubhāvatthaṃ kosallatthaṃ. Etthāti ariyamagge.
tika-s0201t:652_2: Bhedoti viseso. Kamoti aṅgānaṃ desanānupubbī. Bhāvanānayoti bhāvanāvidhi. “Kadāci
tika-s0201t:652_3: aṭṭhaṅgiko, kadāci sattaṅgiko”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto puna “ayaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:652_4: Tattha lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānavasenāti lokuttarassa paṭhamajjhānassa vasena. Ettha
tika-s0201t:652_5: ca keci jhānadhammā maggasabhāvāti ekantato jhānaṃ maggato visuṃ katvā vattuṃ na
tika-s0201t:652_7: vuttaṃ. Atha vā lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānavasenāti lokuttarā hutvā paṭhamajjhānassa vasenāti
tika-s0201t:652_8: evamettha attho veditabbo. Ariyamaggo hi vipassanāya pādakabhūtassa, sammasitassa
tika-s0201t:652_9: vā paṭhamajjhānassa vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko hoti. Atha vā ajhānalābhino sukkhavipassakassa,
tika-s0201t:652_10: jhānalābhino vā pādakamakatvā paṭhamajjhānassa, pakiṇṇakasaṅkhārānaṃ vā sammasane
tika-s0201t:652_11: uppanno ariyamaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko hoti, svāssa aṭṭhaṅgikabhāvo paṭhamajjhānikabhāvenāti
tika-s0201t:652_12: dassento “paṭhamajjhānavasenā”ti āha. Evaṃ “avasesajjhānavasenā”ti etthāti yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:653_0: Yadi ariyamaggo sattaṅgikopi hoti, atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “aṭṭhaṅgiko”icceva vuttanti
tika-s0201t:653_1: āha “ukkaṭṭhaniddesato”tiādi. Yathā cettha paṭipadāya maggavasena aṭṭhaṅgikasattaṅgikabhedo,
tika-s0201t:653_2: evaṃ bojjhaṅgavasena sattaṅgikachaḷaṅgikabhedo veditabbo appītikajjhānavasena chaḷaṅgikattā,
tika-s0201t:653_3: maggavasena pana desanā āgatāti svāyaṃ bhedo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na uddhaṭo. Ito paranti
tika-s0201t:653_4: ito aṭṭhaṅgato paraṃ ukkaṃsato, avakaṃsato pana sattaṅgato paraṃ maggaṅgaṃ nāma natthīti.
tika-s0201t:653_5: Nanu maggavibhaṅge pañcaṅgikavāre pañceva maggaṅgāni uddhaṭāni, mahāsaḷāyatane ca
tika-s0201t:653_6: “yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi, yo tathābhūtassa saṅkappo, yo tathābhūtassa vāyāmo, yā
tika-s0201t:653_7: tathābhūtassa sati, yo tathābhūtassa samādhi, svāssa hoti sammāsamādhī”ti vatvā pubbabhāgavasena
tika-s0201t:653_8: pana “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti sammāvācādayo
tika-s0201t:653_9: āgatāti? Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ kārāpakaṅgānaṃ atirekakiccadassanavasena
tika-s0201t:653_10: vuttaṃ, tasmā na ariyamaggo sammāvācādivirahito atthīti “ito parañhi maggaṅgaṃ natthī”ti
tika-s0201t:654_0: Sabbakusalānanti sabbesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Kāmāvacarādivasena
tika-s0201t:654_1: taṃtaṃkusaladhammesu sā sammādiṭṭhi seṭṭhā. Tassā seṭṭhabhāvena hi “paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu
tika-s0201t:654_2: seṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ, maggasammādiṭṭhiyā pana sabbaseṭṭhabhāve vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0201t:654_5: Sā sammādiṭṭhi pabhavo etassāti tappabhavo, sammāsaṅkappo. Sammādassanavasena hi
tika-s0201t:654_6: sammāsaṅkappo hoti. Tato abhinibbattānīti tappabhavābhinibbattāni. Tappabhavābhinibbattānipi
tika-s0201t:654_8: sesaṅgānī”ti. Tenāha “sammādiṭṭhissā”tiādi. Yathā hi sammādassanaṃ sammāvitakkanassa
tika-s0201t:654_9: visesapaccayo, evaṃ sammāvitakkanaṃ sammāpariggahassa sammāpariggaho sammāsamuṭṭhānassa,
tika-s0201t:654_10: sammāsamuṭṭhānaṃ sammāvodānassa, sammāvodānaṃ sammāvāyāmassa, sammāvāyāmo sammāupaṭṭhānassa,
tika-s0201t:654_11: sammāupaṭṭhānaṃ sammādhānassa visesapaccayo, tasmā “purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa
tika-s0201t:654_12: visesapaccayo hotī”ti iminā visesapaccayabhāvadassanatthena kamena etāni sammādiṭṭhiādīni
tika-s0201t:655_0: Bhāvanānayoti samathavipassanānaṃ yuganaddhabhāvena pavatto bhāvanāvidhi. Ayañhi
tika-s0201t:655_1: ariyamaggakkhaṇe bhāvanāvidhi. Tassa pana pubbabhāge bhāvanānayo kassaci samathapubbaṅgamo
tika-s0201t:655_2: hoti, kassaci vipassanāpubbaṅgamoti. Taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ “kocī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0201t:655_3: paṭhamo samathayānikassa vasena vutto, dutiyo vipassanāyānikassa. Tenāha “idhekacco”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:655_4: Tanti samathaṃ samādhiṃ, jhānadhammeti vā attho. Taṃsampayutteti samādhisampayutte,
tika-s0201t:655_5: jhānasampayutte vā dhamme. Ayañca nayo yebhuyyena samathayānikā arūpamukhena, tatthāpi
tika-s0201t:655_6: jhānamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ karontīti katvā vutto. Vipassanaṃ bhāvayatoti paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ
tika-s0201t:655_7: ārabhitvā yathādhigataṃ taruṇavipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa. Maggo sañjāyatīti pubbabhāgiyo
tika-s0201t:655_8: lokiyamaggo uppajjati. Āsevati nibbidānupassanāvasena. Bhāveti muñcitukamyatāvasena.
tika-s0201t:655_9: Bahulīkaroti paṭisaṅkhānupassanāvasena. Āsevati vā bhayatūpaṭṭhānañāṇavasena. Bahulīkaroti
tika-s0201t:655_10: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāvasena. Saṃyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantī honti maggapaṭipāṭiyā.
tika-s0201t:656_0: Samathaṃ anuppādetvāvāti avadhāraṇena upacārasamādhiṃ nivatteti, na khaṇikasamādhiṃ.
tika-s0201t:656_1: Na hi khaṇikasamādhiṃ vinā vipassanā sambhavati. Vipassanāpāripūriyāti vipassanāya
tika-s0201t:656_3: uppannānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Vavassaggārammaṇatoti
tika-s0201t:656_4: vavassaggassa ārammaṇatāya. Vavassaggo vossaggo paṭinissaggoti ca apavaggoti ca atthato
tika-s0201t:656_5: ekaṃ, nibbānanti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā nibbānassa ārammaṇakaraṇenāti attho. Cittassa
tika-s0201t:656_6: ekaggatāti maggasammāsamādhimāha. Ariyamaggo hi ekanta samāhito asamādhānahetūnaṃ
tika-s0201t:657_0: Yuganaddhāva honti tadā samādhipaññānaṃ samarasatāya icchitabbato. Maggakkhaṇe hi
tika-s0201t:657_1: na samathabhāvanāyaṃ viya samādhi, vipassanābhāvanāyaṃ viya ca paññā kiccato adhikā
tika-s0201t:657_2: icchitabbā, samarasatāya pana aññamaññassa anativattanaṭṭhena dvepi yuganaddhā viya
tika-s0201t:660_0: 34. Evaṃ me sutanti bhayabheravasuttaṃ. Ko nikkhepo? Keci tāva evamāhu “pucchāvasiko
tika-s0201t:660_1: nikkhepo”ti. Duvidhā hi pucchā pākaṭāpākaṭabhedato. Tattha yassā desanāya nimittabhūto
tika-s0201t:660_2: ñātuṃ icchito attho kiṃ-saddapubbakena pakāsīyati, sā pākaṭā pucchā yathā “kiṃsūdha
tika-s0201t:660_3: vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”nti evamādi. Yassā pana desanāya nimittabhūto ñātuṃ icchito
tika-s0201t:660_4: attho kiṃ-saddarahitena kevaleneva saddapayogena pakāsīyati, sā apākaṭā pucchā. Ñātuṃ
tika-s0201t:660_5: icchito hi attho “pañhā, pucchā”ti vuccati, tasmāyeva idha “ye me bho gotamā”tiādikā
tika-s0201t:660_6: apākaṭāti “pucchāvasiko nikkhepo”ti. Tayidaṃ akāraṇaṃ, yasmā so brāhmaṇo “yeme bho
tika-s0201t:660_7: gotamā”tiādīni vadanto na tattha kaṅkhī vicikicchī saṃsayamāpanno avoca, atha kho
tika-s0201t:660_8: attanā yathānicchitamatthaṃ bhagavati pasādabhāvabahumānaṃ pavedento kathesi. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:660_9: “bhagavati pasādaṃ alatthā”tiādi. Vihāreti vihārake nivāse. Avicchinneyevāti pavattamāneyeva.
tika-s0201t:660_10: Padadvayassapi vasante evāti attho. Etaṃ purohitaṭṭhānaṃ uṇhīsādikakudhabhaṇḍehi
tika-s0201t:660_11: saddhiṃ laddhaṃ, tathā ca “assa raññā dinna”nti vadanti. Tenāha “taṃ tassa raññā
tika-s0201t:660_12: dinna”nti. Brahmanti vedaṃ. So pana mantabrahmakappavasena tividho. Tattha mantā
tika-s0201t:660_13: padhānaṃ mūlabhāvato, ye aṭṭhakādīhi pavuttā, itare tannissayena jātā, tena tesaṃyeva
tika-s0201t:660_14: gahaṇaṃ “mante sajjhāyatī”ti. Te hi guttabhāsitabbatāya “mantā”ti vuccanti. Idameva
tika-s0201t:661_0: Yena vā kāraṇenāti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Hetuattho hi kiriyākāraṇaṃ, na karaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:661_1: viya kiriyattho, tasmā nānappakāraguṇavisesādhigamatthā idha upasaṅkamanakiriyāti
tika-s0201t:661_2: “annena vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthamevetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ, na karaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:661_3: tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”tiādi. Bhagavato satatappavattaniratisayasāduvipulāmatarasasaddhammaphalatāya
tika-s0201t:662_0: Upasaṅkamīti upasaṅkanto. Sampattukāmatāya hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena
tika-s0201t:662_1: upasaṅkami, upasaṅkantoti vā vattabbataṃ labhati. Tenāha “gatoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti,
tika-s0201t:662_3: Tatoti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto “upasaṅkamī”ti vutto, tato upagataṭṭhānato. Yathā khamanīyādīni
tika-s0201t:662_4: pucchantoti yathā bhagavā “kacci te brāhmaṇa khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā
tika-s0201t:662_5: khamanīyādīni pucchanto tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi pubbabhāsitāya,
tika-s0201t:662_6: tadanukaraṇena evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:662_7: Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0201t:662_8: sammoditanti saṃsanditaṃ. Ekībhāvanti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ ekarūpataṃ. Khamanīyanti
tika-s0201t:662_9: “idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ khaṇabhaṅguratāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ, kacci
tika-s0201t:662_10: khamituṃ sakkuṇeyya”nti pucchati. Yāpanīyanti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya
tika-s0201t:662_11: yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sīsarogādiābādhābhāvena kacci appābādhaṃ. Dukkhajīvikābhāvena
tika-s0201t:662_12: kacci appātaṅkaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ. Tadanarūpabalayogato
tika-s0201t:662_13: kacci balaṃ. Sukhavihārasabbhāvena kacci phāsuvihāro atthīti tattha tattha kacci-saddaṃ
tika-s0201t:663_0: Balavappattā pīti pītiyeva. Taruṇapīti pāmojjaṃ. Sammodanaṃ janeti karotīti sammodanikaṃ,
tika-s0201t:663_1: tadeva sammodanīyanti āha “sammodajananato”ti. Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti imaṃ
tika-s0201t:663_2: pana atthaṃ dassento “sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato”ti āha. Saritabbabhāvatoti anussaritabbabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:663_3: “Saraṇīya”nti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā “sāraṇīya”nti vuttaṃ. Suyyamānasukhatoti āpāthamadhurataṃ
tika-s0201t:663_5: tassā kathāya vacanacāturiyamāha, atthaparisuddhatāyāti atthassa nirupakkilesataṃ.
tika-s0201t:664_0: Abhidūraaccāsannapaṭikkhepena nātidūranāccāsannaṃ nāma gahitaṃ, taṃ pana avakaṃsato
tika-s0201t:664_1: ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthasaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gīvaṃ pasāretvāti gīvaṃ parivattanavasena pasāretvā.
tika-s0201t:665_0: Yemeti ettha sandhivasena ikāralopoti dassento “ye ime”tiādimāha. Uccākulīnatāya
tika-s0201t:665_1: jātivasena abhijātā jātikulaputtā. Tenāha “uccākulappasutā”ti. Ācārasampattiyā abhijātā
tika-s0201t:665_2: ācārakulaputtā. Tenāha “ācārasampannā”ti. Yattha katthaci apākaṭepi kule. Tena brāhmaṇena
tika-s0201t:665_3: adhippetā bhikkhūsu duvidhāpi saṃvijjantīti āha “idha pana dvīhipi kāraṇehi kulaputtāyevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:666_0: Saddhāti idaṃ karaṇatthe paccattavacananti āha “saddhāyā”ti, saddhāti vā saddahitvāti
tika-s0201t:666_1: attho. Imasmiṃ pakkhe pāḷiyaṃ ya-kāralopena niddesoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Agāratoti agāravāsato,
tika-s0201t:666_2: uttarapadalopena, nissayūpacārena vā ayaṃ niddesoti. Bhikkhanasīlatādilakkhaṇo bhikkhubhāvo
tika-s0201t:666_3: pabbajjāsahacaritāya saddhiṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ anvācinantoti āha “pabbajjaṃ bhikkhubhāvañcā”ti.
tika-s0201t:666_4: Kammavācālakkhaṇe pana bhikkhubhāve adhippete samuccayattho ca-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Anagārassa
tika-s0201t:666_5: bhāvoti etena pabbajjānissito suvisuddho sīlācāraguṇaviseso gahito, kasigorakkhādikammapaṭikkhepo
tika-s0201t:666_6: idha anuppādādīhi veditabbo. Sesaggahaṇe pana saraṇagamanādivasena pabbajjāya, saraṇagamanādivasena
tika-s0201t:666_7: upasampadāya ca anekabhedattā āha “sabbathāpī”ti, tena tena pakārenāti attho. Puratogāmitā
tika-s0201t:666_8: paṭipattigamanena, na kāyagamanenāti āha “nāyako”ti, sammāpaṭipattiyā nibbānasampāpakoti
tika-s0201t:666_9: attho. Hitakiriyāyāti diṭṭhadhammikādihitacariyāya. Gāhaṇaṃ adhisīlādīsu accantāya
tika-s0201t:666_10: niyojanaṃ, na kathanamattanti dassento “gāhetā”ti vatvā “sikkhāpetā”ti āha. Diṭṭhānugatinti
tika-s0201t:666_11: diṭṭhiyā anugamananti dassento “dassanānugati”nti vatvā sikkhāttayasaṅgahaṃ bhagavato
tika-s0201t:666_12: sāsanaṃ tena diṭṭhattā diṭṭhi, tassa tasseva khamanavasena khanti, ruccanavasena
tika-s0201t:667_0: Esa kira alatthāti sambandho. Devaputte viyātiādi kassaci pārijuññassa abhāvadīpanato
tika-s0201t:667_1: “saddhāyā”tiādinā vuttassa pabbajitabhāvassa pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ. Saddhāya gharā nikkhamma
tika-s0201t:668_0: Evametantiādinā āmeḍitavacanaṃ sampahaṃsanavasena, pasādavasena vā katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:668_1: Tathā hi evaṃ-saddo sampaṭicchanattho abbhanumodanattho ca vutto. Mamanti upayogatthe
tika-s0201t:668_2: sāmivacanaṃ, nipātapadaṃ vā etaṃ “ma”nti iminā samānatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ādīnīti
tika-s0201t:668_3: ādi-saddena najīvikāpakatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti īdisānaṃyevāti saddhāpabbajjāya vibhāvitaanabhijjhāluādisabhāvānaṃyeva,
tika-s0201t:669_0: “Saṅghāṭikaṇṇe cepi me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa
tika-s0201t:669_1: pade padaṃ nikkhipanto, so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo
tika-s0201t:669_2: muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākaṭindriyo, atha kho ārakāva mama ahañca tassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:670_0: Ajjhogāhetvā adhippetatthaṃ sambhavituṃ sādhetuṃ dukkhānīti durabhisambhavāni. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:670_1: pana tattha nivāsoyeva dukkhoti dassetuṃ “sambhavituṃ dukkhāni dussahānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:670_2: Araññavanapatthānīti araññalakkhaṇappattāni vanasaṇḍāni. Vanapattha-saddo hi saṇḍabhūte
tika-s0201t:670_3: rukkhasamūhepi vattatīti araññaggahaṇaṃ. Kiñcāpīti anujānanasambhāvanatthe nipāto.
tika-s0201t:670_4: Kiṃ anujānāti? Nippariyāyato araññābhāvaṃ “gāmato bahi arañña”nti. Tenāha “nippariyāyenā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:670_5: Kiṃ sambhāveti? Āraññakaṅganipphādakattaṃ. Yañhi āraññakaṅganipphādakaṃ, taṃ visesato
tika-s0201t:670_6: “arañña”nti vuttanti. Tenevāha “yaṃ taṃ pañcadhanusatika”ntiādi. Nikkhamitvā bahi
tika-s0201t:670_7: indakhīlāti indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvā, tato bahi paṭṭhāyāti attho. Bahi indakhīlāti
tika-s0201t:670_8: yattha dve tīṇi indakhīlāni, tattha bahiddhā indakhīlato paṭṭhāya, yattha taṃ natthi,
tika-s0201t:670_9: tattha tadarahaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāyāti vadanti. Yasmā bahi indakhīlato paṭṭhāya manussūpacāre
tika-s0201t:670_10: bhayabheravaṃ natthi, tasmā idha nādhippetanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:671_1: Tenāha “yattha na kasīyati na vapīyatī”ti. Pantānīti iminā “pariyantāna”nti imassa
tika-s0201t:671_2: pariyāyassa idha pāḷiyaṃ gahitattā vuttaṃ “pariyantānanti imamekaṃ pariyāyaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:671_3: Dūrānanti pana ayaṃ pariyāyo ṭhapetabbo siyā tassāpi “pantānī”ti imināva atthato
tika-s0201t:671_4: gahitattā, tathā sati “na manussūpacārāna”nti edisānampi ṭhapetabbatā āpajjati, tasmā
tika-s0201t:671_5: saddato eva ṭhapanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pavivekanti pakārato, pakārehi vā vivecanaṃ, rūpādiputhuttārammaṇe
tika-s0201t:671_6: pakārato gamanādiiriyāpathappakārehi attano kāyassa vivecanaṃ gacchatopi tiṭṭhatopi
tika-s0201t:671_7: nisajjatopi ekasseva pavattati. Teneva hi vivecetabbānaṃ vivecanākārassa ca bhedato
tika-s0201t:671_8: bahuvidhattā te ekattena gahetvā “paviveka”nti ekavacanena vuttaṃ. Dukkaraṃ pavivekanti
tika-s0201t:671_9: vā pavivekaṃ kattuṃ na sukhanti attho. Ekībhāveti ekikabhāve. Dvayaṃdvayārāmoti dvinnaṃ
tika-s0201t:671_10: dvinnaṃ bhāvābhirato. Haranti viyāti saṃharanti viya vighātuppādanena. Tenāha “ghasanti
tika-s0201t:671_11: viyā”ti, bhayasantāsuppādanena khādituṃ āgatā yakkharakkhasapisācādayo viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:671_13: migapakkhiādīnañca bhiṃsanakehi bheravehi saddehi vividhehi ca aññehi khāṇuādīhi
tika-s0201t:671_14: yakkhādiākārehi upaṭṭhitehi bhiṃsanakehi. Evaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ nāma karonto
tika-s0201t:673_0: 35. Soḷasasu ṭhānesūti “ye kho kecī”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vakkhamānesu soḷasasu kāraṇesu.
tika-s0201t:673_2: vikkhepāvahā, parisuddhakāyakammantatādayo pana tadabhāvato tesaṃ avikkhepāvahā.
tika-s0201t:673_4: gahetvā vuttaṃ. Saṃkilesaggahaṇampi yāvadeva vodānadassanatthanti. Ārammaṇapariggaharahitānanti
tika-s0201t:673_5: aparisuddhakāyakammantādikassa araññe diṭṭhassa tassa ārammaṇassa “ye kho kecī”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:673_7: vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Attanāti bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati, sayanti
tika-s0201t:674_0: Sambujjhati etenāti sambodho, ariyamaggoti āha “ariyamaggappattito”ti. Aggamaggādhigamādhīno
