tika-s0201t:1075_5: Kilesesu hi nissaṭṭhesu kammavaṭṭaṃ vipākavaṭṭañca nissaṭṭhameva hotīti. Sotthinti
tika-s0201t:1076_0: Ñāyati nicchayena kamati nibbānaṃ, taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo, ariyamaggoti
tika-s0201t:1076_1: āha “ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti. Taṇhāvānavirahitattāti taṇhāsaṅkhātavānavivittattā.
tika-s0201t:1076_2: Taṇhā hi khandhehi khandhaṃ, kammunā vā phalaṃ, sattehi vā dukkhaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti
tika-s0201t:1076_3: vānanti vuccati. Tayidaṃ natthi ettha vānaṃ, na vā etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa vānanti
tika-s0201t:1076_4: nibbānaṃ, asaṅkhatā dhātu. Parapaccayena vinā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sacchikiriyāti āha
tika-s0201t:1077_1: gahitā eva honti, te puna kasmā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi
tika-s0201t:1077_3: Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpetīti ye ye bodhaneyyapuggalā saṅkhepavitthārādivasena yathā yathā
tika-s0201t:1077_4: bodhetabbā, attano desanāvilāsena bhagavā te te tathā tathā bodhento taṃ tamatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1077_5: ñāpeti. Taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassentoti atthāpattiṃ agaṇento taṃ taṃ atthaṃ pākaṭaṃ
tika-s0201t:1077_6: katvā dassento. Na hi sammāsambuddhā atthāpattiñāpakādisādhanīyavacanāti. Saṃvattatīti
tika-s0201t:1077_7: jāyati, hotīti attho. Yasmā anatikkantasokaparidevassa na kadāci cittavisuddhi atthi
tika-s0201t:1077_9: samatikkamena hotī”ti. Yasmā pana domanassapaccayehi dukkhadhammehi puṭṭhaṃ puthujjanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1077_10: sokādayo abhibhavanti, pariññātesu ca tesu te na honti, tasmā vuttaṃ “sokaparidevānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1077_11: samatikkamo dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamenā”ti. Ñāyassāti aggamaggassa tatiyamaggassa
tika-s0201t:1077_12: ca. Tadadhigamena hi yathākkamaṃ dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamo. Sacchikiriyābhisamayasahabhāvīpi
tika-s0201t:1077_14: nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti. Phalañāṇena vā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “nibbānassa
tika-s0201t:1078_0: Vaṇṇabhaṇananti pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Tayidaṃ na idheva, atha kho aññatthāpi satthā akāsiyevāti
tika-s0201t:1078_1: dassento “yatheva hī”tiādimāha. Tatthaādimhi kalyāṇaṃ, ādi vā kalyāṇaṃ etassāti ādikalyāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1078_2: Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ. Byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1078_3: Sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhapāripūrito upanetabbassa abhāvā ca kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ. Nirupakkilesato
tika-s0201t:1078_4: apanetabbassa abhāvā ca parisuddhaṃ. Seṭṭhacariyabhāvato sāsana brahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca
tika-s0201t:1078_5: vo pakāsessāmīti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1078_6: Ariyavaṃsāti ariyānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ vaṃsā paveṇiyo. Aggaññāti “aggā”ti jānitabbā sabbavaṃsehi
tika-s0201t:1078_8: jānitabbā. Porāṇāti purātanā anadhunātanattā. Asaṃkiṇṇāti avikiṇṇā anapanītā. Asaṃkiṇṇapubbāti
tika-s0201t:1078_9: “kiṃ imehī”ti ariyehi na apanītapubbā. Na saṃkīyantīti idānipi tehi na apanīyanti.
tika-s0201t:1078_10: Na saṃkīyissantīti anāgatepi tehi na apanīyissanti. Appaṭikuṭṭhā…pe… viññūhīti ye
tika-s0201t:1078_11: loke viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā, tehi apaccakkhatā aninditā, agarahitāti attho. Visuddhiyātiādīhīti
tika-s0201t:1078_12: visuddhiādidīpanehi. Padehīti vākyehi, visuddhiatthatādibhedabhinnehi vā dhammakoṭṭhāsehi.
tika-s0201t:1079_0: Upaddaveti anatthe. Visuddhinti visujjhanaṃ saṃkilesappahānaṃ. Vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho.
tika-s0201t:1079_1: Pariyāpuṇanaṃ paricayo. Atthassa hadaye ṭhapanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ. Parivattanaṃ vācanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1079_2: Gandhārakoti gandhāradese uppanno. Pahontīti sakkonti aniyyānamaggāti micchāmaggā,
tika-s0201t:1079_3: micchattaniyatāniyatamaggāpi vā. Suvaṇṇanti kūṭasuvaṇṇampi vuccati. Paṇīti kācamaṇipi.
tika-s0201t:1079_4: Muttāti veḷujāpi. Pavāḷanti pallavopi vuccatīti rattajambunadādipadehi te visesitā.
tika-s0201t:1080_0: Na tato heṭṭhāti idhādhippetakāyādīnaṃ vedanādisabhāvattābhāvā, kāyavedanācittavimuttassa
tika-s0201t:1080_1: tebhūmakadhammassa visuṃ vipallāsavatthantarabhāvena gahitattā ca heṭṭhāgahaṇesu
tika-s0201t:1080_2: vipallāsavatthūnaṃ aniṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, pañcamassa pana vipallāsavatthuno
tika-s0201t:1080_3: abhāvā “na uddha”nti āha. Ārammaṇavibhāgena hettha satipaṭṭhānavibhāgoti. Tayo satipaṭṭhānāti
tika-s0201t:1080_4: satipaṭṭhānasaddassa atthuddhāradassanaṃ, na idha pāḷiyaṃ vuttassa satipaṭṭhānasaddassa
tika-s0201t:1080_5: atthadassananti. Ādīsu hi satigocaroti ettha ādi-saddena “phassasamudayā vedanānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1080_6: samudayo, nāmarūpasamudayā cittassa samudayo, manasikārasamudayā dhammānaṃ samudayo”ti
tika-s0201t:1080_7: satipaṭṭhānāti vuttānaṃ satigocarānaṃ pakāsake suttapadese saṅgaṇhāti. Evaṃ paṭisambhidāpāḷiyampi
tika-s0201t:1080_8: avasesapāḷippadesadassanattho ādi-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Satiyā paṭṭhānanti satiyā patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1080_9: Dānādīni satiyā karontassa rūpādīni kasiṇādīni ca satiyā ṭhānaṃ hontīti taṃnivāraṇatthamāha
tika-s0201t:1080_10: “padhānaṃ ṭhāna”nti. Pa-saddo hi idha “paṇītā dhammā”tiādīsu viya padhānatthadīpakoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1081: Ariyoti ariyaṃ sabbasattaseṭṭhaṃ sammāsambuddhamāha. Etthāti etasmiṃ saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasutte. Suttekadesena hi suttaṃ dasseti. Tattha hi –
tika-s0201t:1082_0: “Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo…pe… marahatīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca
tika-s0201t:1082_1: vuttaṃ. Idha, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ
tika-s0201t:1082_2: upādāya “idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāyā’ti. Tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti, na sotaṃ
tika-s0201t:1082_3: odahanti, na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthusāsanā vattanti. Tatra,
tika-s0201t:1082_4: bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti,
tika-s0201t:1082_5: anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, yadariyo…pe… arahati.
tika-s0201t:1083_0: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, satthā…pe… idaṃ vo sukhāyāti. Tassa ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti…pe…
tika-s0201t:1083_1: vattanti. Ekacce sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā vattanti. Tatra,
tika-s0201t:1083_2: bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti,
tika-s0201t:1083_3: na ceva attamano hoti, na ca attamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Anattamanatañca attamanatañca
tika-s0201t:1083_4: tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhato viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave,
tika-s0201t:1084_0: Puna caparaṃ…pe… sukhāyāti. Tassa sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave,
tika-s0201t:1084_1: tathāgato attamano ceva hoti, attamanatañca paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati
tika-s0201t:1084_2: sato sampajāno. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, tatiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ…pe… arahatī”ti –
tika-s0201t:1085_0: Evaṃ paṭighānunayehi anavassutatā, niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya tadubhayavītivattatā
tika-s0201t:1085_1: “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttā. Buddhānaṃyeva hi niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti āveṇikadhammabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1085_2: na paccekabuddhādīnaṃ. Pa-saddo ārambhaṃ joteti, ārambho ca pavattīti katvā āha “pavattayitabbatoti
tika-s0201t:1085_3: attho”ti. Satiyā karaṇabhūtāya paṭṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Ana-saddo
tika-s0201t:1086_0: Tathāssa kattuatthopi labbhatīti “patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha pa-saddo
tika-s0201t:1086_1: bhūsatthavisiṭṭhaṃ pakkhandhanaṃ dīpetīti “okkantitvā pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho”ti
tika-s0201t:1086_2: āha. Puna bhāvatthaṃ sati-saddaṃ paṭṭhāna-saddañca vaṇṇento “atha vā”tiādimāha. Tena
tika-s0201t:1086_3: purimavikappe sati-saddo paṭṭhāna-saddo ca katthuatthoti viññāyati. Saraṇaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0201t:1086_4: cirakatassa cirabhāsitassa ca anussaraṇaṭṭhena. Idanti yaṃ “satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-s0201t:1086_5: vuttaṃ, idaṃ idha imasmiṃ suttapadese adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1087_0: Yadi evanti yadi sati eva satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sati nāma eko dhammo, evaṃ sante kasmā “satipaṭṭhānā”ti
tika-s0201t:1087_1: bahuvacananti āha “satibahuttā”tiādi. Yadi bahukā etā satiyo, atha kasmā “maggo”ti
tika-s0201t:1087_2: ekavacananti yojanā. Maggaṭṭhenāti niyyānaṭṭhena. Niyyāniko hi maggadhammo, teneva
tika-s0201t:1087_3: niyyānikabhāvena ekattupagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati, atthikehi ca tadatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1087_4: maggīyatīti attanāva pubbe vuttaṃ paccāharati “vuttañceta”nti. Tattha catassopi cetāti
tika-s0201t:1087_5: kāyānupassanādivasena catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo. Aparabhāgeti ariyamaggakkhaṇe.
tika-s0201t:1087_6: Kiccaṃ sādhayamānāti pubbabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu subhasaññādividhamanena visuṃ
tika-s0201t:1087_7: visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe sakiṃyeva tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena
tika-s0201t:1087_8: pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ gacchanti. Catubbidhakiccasādhaneneva
tika-s0201t:1087_9: hettha bahuvacananiddeso. Evañca satīti maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ upādāya “maggo”ti ekavacanena
tika-s0201t:1087_10: ārammaṇabhedena catubbidhataṃ upādāya “cattāro”ti ca vattabbatāya sativijjamānattā.
tika-s0201t:1087_11: Vacanānusandhinā “ekāyano aya”ntiādikā desanā sānusandhikāva, na ananusandhikāti
tika-s0201t:1088_0: Visesato kāyo ca vedanā ca assādassakāraṇanti tappahānatthaṃ tesu taṇhāvatthūsu oḷārikasukhumesu
tika-s0201t:1088_1: asubhadukkhabhāvadassanāni mandatikkhapaññehi taṇhācaritehi sukarānīti tāni tesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1088_2: “visuddhimaggo”ti vuttāni tathā “niccaṃ attā”ti abhinivesavatthutāya diṭṭhiyā visesakāraṇesu
tika-s0201t:1088_4: ca nātippabhedaatippabhedagatesu tesu tappahānatthaṃ mandatikkhapaññānaṃ diṭṭhicaritānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1088_5: sukarānīti tesaṃ tāni “visuddhimaggo”ti vuttāni. Ettha ca yathā cittadhammānampi
tika-s0201t:1088_6: taṇhāya vatthubhāvo sambhavati, tathā kāyavedanānampi diṭṭhiyāti satipi nesaṃ catunnampi
tika-s0201t:1088_7: taṇhādiṭṭhiyā vatthubhāve yo yassa sātisayapaccayo, taṃdassanatthaṃ visesaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1088_8: katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tikkhapaññasamathayāniko oḷārikārammaṇaṃ pariggaṇhanto tattha
tika-s0201t:1088_9: aṭṭhatvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya vedanaṃ pariggaṇhātīti vuttaṃ. “Oḷārikārammaṇe
tika-s0201t:1088_10: asaṇṭhahanato”ti. Vipassanāyānikassa pana sukhume citte dhammesu ca cittaṃ pakkhandatīti
tika-s0201t:1089_0: Tesaṃ tatthāti ettha tattha-saddassa “pahānattha”nti etena yojanā. Parato tesaṃ tatthāti
tika-s0201t:1089_1: etthāpi esevanayo. Pañca kāmaguṇā savisesā kāye labbhantīti visesena kāyo kāmoghassa
tika-s0201t:1089_2: vatthu, bhavesu sukhaggahaṇavasena bhavassādo hoti bhavoghassa vedanā vatthu, santatighanagahaṇavasena
tika-s0201t:1089_3: visesato citte attābhiniveso hotīti diṭṭhoghassa cittaṃ vatthu, dhammesu vinibbhogassa
tika-s0201t:1089_4: dukkarattā dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya duppaṭivijjhattā sammoho hotīti avijjoghassa
tika-s0201t:1089_5: dhammā vatthu, tasmā tesaṃ pahānatthaṃ cattārova vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1090_0: Yadaggena ca kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu, tadaggena abhijjhākāyaganthassa vatthu, dukkhāya
tika-s0201t:1090_2: vedanā visesena byāpādakāyaganthassa vatthu, citte niccaggahaṇavasena sassatassa
tika-s0201t:1090_3: attano sīlena suddhītiādi parāmasanaṃ hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu,
tika-s0201t:1090_4: nāmarūpaparicchedena bhūtaṃ bhūtato apassantassa bhavavibhavadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto idaṃsaccābhiniveso
tika-s0201t:1090_5: hotīti tassa dhammā vatthu, sukhavedanāssādavasena paralokanirapekkho “natthi dinna”ntiādikaṃ
tika-s0201t:1090_6: parāmāsaṃ uppādetīti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā vatthu santatighanagahaṇavasena sarāgādicitte
tika-s0201t:1090_7: sammoho hotīti mohāgatiyā cittaṃ vatthu, dhammasabhāvānavabodhena bhayaṃ hotīti bhayāgatiyā
tika-s0201t:1090_8: dhammā vatthu. Ye panettha avuttā, tesaṃ vuttanayena vatthubhāvo yojetabbo. Tathā
tika-s0201t:1090_9: hi oghesu vuttanayā eva yogāsavesupi yojanā atthato abhinnattā. Tathā paṭhamoghatatiyacatutthaganthayojanāya
tika-s0201t:1090_10: vuttanayā eva kāyacittadhammānaṃ itarūpādānavatthutā yojanā, tathā kāmoghabyāpādakāyaganthayojanāya
tika-s0201t:1090_11: vuttanayā eva kāyavedanānaṃ chandadosāgati vatthutā yojanā vā.
tika-s0201t:1092_0: Saraṇavasenāti kāyādīnaṃ kusalādidhammānañca upadhāraṇavasena. Saranti gacchanti
tika-s0201t:1092_1: nibbānaṃ etāyāti satīti imasmiṃ atthe ekatte ekasabhāve nibbāne samosaraṇaṃ samāgamo
tika-s0201t:1092_2: ekattasamosaraṇaṃ. Etadeva hi dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekanibbānapavesahetubhūtā
tika-s0201t:1092_3: vā samānatā eko satipaṭṭhānassa bhāvo ekattaṃ, tattha samosaraṇaṃ taṃsabhāgatā ekattasamosaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1092_4: Ekanibbānapavesahetubhāvaṃ pana dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Etasmiṃ atthe saraṇekattasamosaraṇāni
tika-s0201t:1092_5: saheva satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇatthena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbāni, purimasmiṃ visuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1092_6: Saraṇavasenāti vā “gamanavasenā”ti atthe sati tadeva gamanaṃ samosaraṇanti, samosaraṇe
tika-s0201t:1092_7: vā satisaddatthavasena avuccamāne dhāraṇatāva satīti satisaddatthantarābhāvā purimaṃ
tika-s0201t:1092_8: satibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, pacchimaṃ ekabhāvassāti nibbānasamosaraṇepi sahitāneva tāni
tika-s0201t:1092_9: satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇāni vuttāni honti. Cuddasavidhena, navavidhena, soḷasavidhena,
tika-s0201t:1092_10: pañcavidhenāti idaṃ upari pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ ānāpānapabbādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, tesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1092_11: pana antarabhedavasena tadanugatabhedavasena ca bhāvanāya anekavidhatā labbhatiyeva.
tika-s0201t:1093_0: “Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye”tiādivacanato bhikkhugocarā ete dhammā,
tika-s0201t:1093_1: yadidaṃ kāyānupassanādayo. Tattha yasmā kāyānupassanādipaṭipattiyā bhikkhu hoti,
tika-s0201t:1093_2: tasmā “kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā bhikkhuṃ dasseti, bhikkhumhi taṃ niyamatoti āha
tika-s0201t:1094_0: Samaṃ careyyāti kāyādivisamacariyaṃ pahāya kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya. Rāgādivūpasamena
tika-s0201t:1094_1: santo. Indriyadamena danto. Catumagganiyāmena niyato. Seṭṭhacaritāya brahmacārī.
tika-s0201t:1094_2: Kāyadaṇḍādioropanena nidhāya daṇḍaṃ. Ariyabhāve ṭhito so evarūpo bāhitapāpasamitapāpabhinnakilesatāhi
tika-s0201t:1095: “Ayañceva kāyo bahiddho ca nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu khandhapañcakaṃ, “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”tiādīsu nāmakāyo kāyoti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “kāyeti rūpakāye”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1096_0: Asammissatoti “vedanādayopi ettha sitā ettha paṭibaddhā”ti kāye vedanādianupassanāpasaṅgepi
tika-s0201t:1096_1: āpanne tato asammissatoti attho. Samūhavisayatāya cassa kāya-saddassa samudāyupādānatāya
tika-s0201t:1096_2: ca asubhākārassa “kāye”ti ekavacanaṃ, tathā ārammaṇādivibhāgena anekabhedabhinnampi
tika-s0201t:1096_3: cittaṃ cittabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “citte”ti ekavacanaṃ, vedanā pana sukhādibhedabhinnā
tika-s0201t:1096_4: visuṃ visuṃ anupassitabbāti dassentena “vedanāsū”ti bahuvacanena vuttā, tatheva ca
tika-s0201t:1096_5: niddeso pavattito, dhammā ca paropaṇṇāsabhedā anupassitabbākārena ca anekabhedā evāti
tika-s0201t:1096_7: kāyaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgehi, tāni ca kesādīhi, kesādike ca bhūtupādāyarūpehi vinibbhujjanto
tika-s0201t:1096_9: na karonti, nagaraṃ nāma koci attho atthīti pana kesañci samaññātidhāvanaṃ siyāti
tika-s0201t:1096_11: bhūtupādāyasamūho ca yathāvuttasamūhe tabbinimutto kāyopi nāma koci natthi, pageva
tika-s0201t:1096_12: itthiādayoti āha “kāyo vā…pe… dissatī”ti. Koci dhammoti iminā sattajīvādiṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-s0201t:1096_13: avayavī pana kāyapaṭikkhepeneva paṭikkhittoti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ kāyādisaññābhidhānānītiāha
tika-s0201t:1097_0: Yaṃ passati itthiṃ purisaṃ vā. Nanu cakkhunā itthipurisadassanaṃ natthīti? Saccametaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1097_1: “itthiṃ passāmi, purisaṃ passāmī”ti pana pavattasaññāya vasena “yaṃ passatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1097_2: Micchādassanena vā diṭṭhiyā yaṃ passati, na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ na hotīti
tika-s0201t:1097_3: attho viparītaggāhavasena micchāparikappitarūpattā. Atha vā taṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0201t:1097_4: diṭṭhaṃ na hoti acakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyattā, diṭṭhaṃ vā taṃ na hoti. Yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ
tika-s0201t:1097_5: na passatīti yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ paññācakkhunā
tika-s0201t:1097_6: bhūtato na passatīti attho. Apassaṃ bajjhateti imaṃ attabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paññācakkhunā
tika-s0201t:1097_7: apassanto “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me atto”ti kilesabandhanena bajjhati.
tika-s0201t:1098_0: Na aññadhammānupassīti na aññasabhāvānupassī, asubhādito aññākārānupassī na hotīti
tika-s0201t:1098_1: attho. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotītiādinā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. Pathavīkāyanti kesādikoṭṭhāsapathaviṃ
tika-s0201t:1098_2: dhammasamūhattā “kāyo”ti vadati, lakkhaṇapathavimeva vā anekappabhedaṃ sakalasarīragataṃ
tika-s0201t:1098_3: pubbāpariyabhāvena ca pavattamānaṃ samūhavasena gahetvā “kāyo”ti vadati. Āpokāyantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:1099_0: Evaṃ gahetabbassāti “ahaṃ mama”nti evaṃ attattaniyabhāvena andhabālehi gahetabbassa.
tika-s0201t:1099_1: Idāni sattannaṃ anupassanākārānampi vasena kāyānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1099_2: Tattha aniccato anupassatīti catusamuṭṭhānikakāyaṃ “anicca”nti anupassati, evaṃ passanto
tika-s0201t:1099_3: evaṃ cassa aniccākārampi anupassatīti vuccati. Tathābhūtassa cassa niccaggāhassa
tika-s0201t:1099_4: lesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ “no niccato”ti tathāhesa “niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1099_5: Ettha ca “aniccato eva anupassatī”ti eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1099_6: dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ. Na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:1100_0: Dukkhato anupassatītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – aniccassa dukkhattā tameva
tika-s0201t:1100_1: kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati, dukkhassa anattattā anattato anupassati. Yasmā pana yaṃ
tika-s0201t:1100_2: aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, taṃ anabhinanditabbaṃ, na tattha rajjitabbaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:1100_3: “nibbindati no nandati, virajjati no rajjatī”ti. So evaṃ arajjanto rāgaṃ nirodheti
tika-s0201t:1100_4: no samudeti, samudayaṃ na karotīti attho. Evaṃ paṭipanno ca paṭinissajjati no ādiyati.
tika-s0201t:1100_6: kilesānaṃ pariccajanato, saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato
tika-s0201t:1100_7: “pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cā”ti vuccati, tasmā tāya samannāgato
tika-s0201t:1100_8: bhikkhu vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati, nibbāne ca pakkhandati, tathābhūto ca
tika-s0201t:1100_9: nibbattanavasena kilese na ādiyati, nāpi adosadassitāvasena saṅkhatārammaṇaṃ. Tena
tika-s0201t:1100_10: vuttaṃ “paṭinissajjati no ādiyatī”ti. Idānissa tāhi anupassanāhi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1100_11: pahānaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “so taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1100_12: Tattha niccasaññanti “saṅkhārā niccā”ti evaṃ pavattaviparītasaññaṃ. Diṭṭhicittavipallāsapahānamukheneva
tika-s0201t:1100_13: saññāvipallāsappahānanti saññāgahaṇaṃ, saññāsīsena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1101_0: Viharatīti iminā kāyānupassanāsamaṅgino iriyāpathavihāro vuttoti āha “iriyatī”ti
tika-s0201t:1101_1: iriyāpathaṃ pavattetīti attho. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena abhibyāpanato “tīsu bhavesū”ti
tika-s0201t:1101_2: vuttaṃ, uppajjanavasena pana kilesā parittabhūmakā evāti. Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1101_3: ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātāpa-saddo pana vīriyeyeva niruḷhoti
tika-s0201t:1101_4: vuttaṃ “vīriyassetaṃ nāma”nti. Atha vā paṭipakkhapahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena
tika-s0201t:1101_5: pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati, na aññe
tika-s0201t:1101_6: dhammā. Ātāpīti cāyamīkāro pasaṃsāya, atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ
tika-s0201t:1101_7: dasseti. Sammā, samantato, sāmañca pajānanto sampajāno, asammissato vavatthāne aññadhammānupassitābhāvena
tika-s0201t:1101_8: sammā aviparītaṃ, sabbākārapajānanena samantato, uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā
tika-s0201t:1101_9: sayaṃ pajānantoti attho. Yadi paññāya anupassati, kathaṃ satipaṭṭhānatāti āha “na
tika-s0201t:1101_10: hī”tiādi. Sabbatthikanti sabbattha bhavaṃ sabbattha līne uddhate ca citte icchitabbattā,
tika-s0201t:1101_11: sabbe vā līne uddhate ca bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā atthikā etāyāti sabbatthikā. Satiyā
tika-s0201t:1101_12: laddhūpakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte kāye kammaṭṭhāniko bhikkhu kāyānupassī
tika-s0201t:1101_13: viharati. Antosaṅkhepo anto olīyano, kosajjanti attho. Upāyapariggaheti ettha sīlavisodhanādi
tika-s0201t:1101_14: gaṇanādi uggahakosallādi ca upāyo, tabbipariyāyato anupāyo veditabbo. Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassati
tika-s0201t:1101_15: yathāvuttaupāyaṃ na pariccajati, anupāyañca na upādiyati, tasmā vuttaṃ “muṭṭhassati…pe…
tika-s0201t:1101_16: asamattho hotī”ti. Tenāti upāyānupāyānaṃ pariggahaparivajjanesu apariccāgāpariggahesu
tika-s0201t:1102_0: Yasmā satiyevettha satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttā, tasmāssa sampayuttā dhammā vīriyādayo aṅganti
tika-s0201t:1102_1: āha “sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā”ti. Aṅga-saddo cettha kāraṇapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0201t:1102_2: satiggahaṇeneva cettha samādhissati gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0201t:1102_3: Yasmā vā satisīsenāyaṃ desanā. Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ hoti, nibbānādhigamo
tika-s0201t:1102_4: vā, na ca kevalā sati pavattati, tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya
tika-s0201t:1102_6: kāmehī”tiādīsu viya pahātabbaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ. Yasmā ettha lokiyamaggo adhippeto, na
tika-s0201t:1102_7: lokuttaramaggo, tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento “tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena
tika-s0201t:1102_8: vā”ti āha. Tesaṃ dhammānanti vedanādidhammānaṃ. Tesañhi tattha anadhippetattā “atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1103_0: Avisesena dvīhipi nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vuttanti katvā puna ekekena vuttaṃ pahānavisesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1103_1: dassetuṃ “visesenā”ti āha. Atha vā “vineyya nīvaraṇānī”ti avatvā abhijjhādomanassavacanassa
tika-s0201t:1103_3: anurodhādīnaṃ pahānaṃ dassanaṃ etassa payojananti. Kāyasampattimūlakassāti rūpa-bala-yobbanārogyādi-sarīrasampadā-nimittassa.
tika-s0201t:1103_4: Vuttavipariyāyato kāyavipattimūlako virodho veditabbo. Kāyabhāvanāyāti kāyānupassanābhāvanāya.
tika-s0201t:1103_5: Sā hi idha “kāyabhāvanā”ti adhippetā. Tenāti anurodhādippahānavacanena. Yogānubhāvo
tika-s0201t:1104_1: mettā maraṇassati asubhabhāvanā ca. Idañhi catukkaṃ yoginā parihariyamānaṃ “sabbatthikakammaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-s0201t:1104_2: vuccati atisampajaññabalena avicchinnassa tassa pariharitabbattā, satiyā vā samatho
tika-s0201t:1105_0: Tenāti saddatthaṃ anādiyitvā bhāvatthasseva vibhajanavasena pavattena vibhaṅgapāṭhena
tika-s0201t:1105_1: saha. Aṭṭhakathānayoti saddatthassapi vivaraṇavasena yathārahaṃ vutto atthasaṃvaṇṇanānayo.
tika-s0201t:1105_2: Yathā saṃsandatīti yathā atthato adhippāyato ca avilomento aññadatthu saṃsandati
tika-s0201t:1106_0: Vedanādīnaṃ puna vacaneti ettha nissayapaccayabhāvavasena cittadhammānaṃ vedanāsannissitattā
tika-s0201t:1106_1: pañcavokārabhave arūpadhammānaṃ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttito ca vedanāya kāyādianupassanāpasaṅgepi
tika-s0201t:1106_3: Tena na vedanāyaṃ kāyānupassī, cittadhammānupassī vā, atha kho vedanānupassīyevāti
tika-s0201t:1106_4: vedanāsaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ vedanānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1106_5: dassitaṃ hoti. Tathā “yasmiṃ samaye sukhā vedanā, na tasmiṃ samaye dukkhā adukkhamasukhā
tika-s0201t:1106_6: vā vedanā. Yasmiṃ vā pana samaye dukkhā adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā, na tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0201t:1106_7: itarā vedanā”ti vedanābhāvasāmaññe aṭṭhatvā taṃ taṃ vedanaṃ vinibbhujitvā dassanena
tika-s0201t:1106_8: ghanavinibbhogo dhuvabhāvaviveko dassito hoti. Tena tāsaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānadassanena
tika-s0201t:1106_9: aniccatāya tato eva dukkhatāya anattatāya ca dassanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ hoti. Ghanavinibbhogādīti
tika-s0201t:1106_10: ādi-saddena ayampi attho veditabbo. Ayañhi vedanāyaṃ vedanānupassīyeva, na aññadhammānupassī.
tika-s0201t:1106_11: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā nāma bālo amaṇisabhāvepi udakabubbuḷake maṇiākārānupassī
tika-s0201t:1106_12: hoti, na evamayaṃ ṭhitiramaṇīyepi vedayite, pageva itarasmiṃ manuññākārānupassī,
tika-s0201t:1106_13: atha kho khaṇabhaṅguratāya avasavattitāya kilesāsucipaggharaṇatāya ca aniccaanattaasubhākārānupassī,
tika-s0201t:1106_14: vipariṇāmadukkhatāya saṅkhāradukkhatāya ca visesato dukkhānupassīyevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1106_15: Evaṃ cittadhammesupi yathārahaṃ puna vacane payojanaṃ vattabbaṃ. “Kevalaṃ panidhā”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1106_16: idha ‘ettakaṃ veditabba”nti veditabbaparicchedaṃ dasseti. Esa nayoti iminā yathā
tika-s0201t:1106_17: cittaṃ dhammā ca anupassitabbā, tathā tāni anupassanto “citte cittānupassī, dhammesu
tika-s0201t:1107_0: Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addāti yo bhikkhu sukhavedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya “dukkha”nti
tika-s0201t:1107_1: paññācakkhunā addakkhi. Dukkhamaddakkhi sallatoti dukkhavedanaṃ pīḷājananato antotudanato
tika-s0201t:1107_2: dunnīharaṇato ca sallanti addakkhi passi. Adukkhamasukhanti upekkhāvedanaṃ. Santanti
tika-s0201t:1107_3: sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikatāya paccayavasena vūpasantasabhāvatāya ca santaṃ. Aniccatoti
tika-s0201t:1107_4: hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato tāvakālikatoniccapaṭikkhepato ca “anicca”nti yo
tika-s0201t:1107_5: addakkhi. Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu ekaṃsena paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya sammā passanakoti attho.
tika-s0201t:1108_0: Dukkhātipīti saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhā itipi. Sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti sabbaṃ taṃ
tika-s0201t:1108_1: vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhatānativattanato.
tika-s0201t:1108_3: ca vuttattā tissopi sukhato, tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho. Rūpādi-ārammaṇachandādi-adhipati-ñāṇādi-sahajāta-
tika-s0201t:1108_7: vasena. “Kāmañcetthā”tiādinā pubbe pahīnattā puna pahānaṃ na vattabbanti codanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1108_8: dasseti, maggacittakkhaṇe vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sabbattha pahīnameva hotīti visuṃ visuṃ
tika-s0201t:1108_9: na vattabbanti. Tattha purimāya codanāya nānāpuggalaparihāro, pacchimāya nānācittakkhaṇikaparihāro.
tika-s0201t:1108_10: Lokiyabhāvanāya hi kāye pahīnaṃ na vedanādīsu pahīnaṃ hoti yadipi na pavatteyya,
tika-s0201t:1108_11: na paṭipakkhabhāvanāya tattha sā abhijjhādomanassassa appavatti hotīti puna tappahānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1108_12: vattabbamevāti. Ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hotīti maggasatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1108_13: lokiyabhāvanāya vā sabbattha appavattimattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Pañcapi khandhā loko”ti
tika-s0201t:1112_0: 107. Bāhirakesupi ito ekadesassa sambhavato sabbappakāraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ “sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1112_1: Tena ye ime ānāpānapabbādivasena āgatā cuddasappakārā, tadantogadhā ca ajjhattādianupassanā
tika-s0201t:1112_3: lokiyādippakārā ca, te sabbepi anavasesato saṅgaṇhāti. Ime ca pakārā imasmiṃyeva
tika-s0201t:1112_4: sāsane, na ito bahiddhāti vuttaṃ “sabbappakāra…pe… paṭisedhano cā”ti. Tattha tathābhāvapaṭisedhanoti
tika-s0201t:1112_6: Etena “idha, bhikkhave”ti ettha idha-saddo antogadhaevasaddatthoti dasseti. Santi
tika-s0201t:1112_7: hi ekapadānipi sāvadhāraṇāni yathā “vāyubhakkho”ti. Tenāha “idheva samaṇo”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1112_8: Paripuṇṇasamaṇakaraṇadhammo hi so, yo sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattako. Parappavādāti
tika-s0201t:1113_0: Araññādikasseva bhāvanānurūpasenāsanataṃ dassetuṃ “imassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Duddamo
tika-s0201t:1113_1: damathaṃ anupagato goṇo kūṭagoṇo. Dohanakāle yathā thanehi anavasesato khīraṃ na
tika-s0201t:1113_2: paggharati, evaṃ dohapaṭibandhinī kūṭadhenu. Rūpasaddādike paṭicca uppajjanakaassādo
tika-s0201t:1113_3: rūpārammaṇādiraso. Pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇanti pabbajjāto pubbe, anādimati vā saṃsāre paricitārammaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1114_0: Nibandheyyāti bandheyya. Satiyāti sammadeva kammaṭṭhānassa sallakkhaṇavasena pavattāya
tika-s0201t:1114_1: satiyā. Ārammaṇeti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe. Daḷhanti thiraṃ, yathā satokārissa upacārappanābhedo
tika-s0201t:1114_2: samādhi ijjhati, tathā thāmagataṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1115_1: buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa, aññena kammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa
tika-s0201t:1115_2: ca padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Vatthuvijjācariyo viya bhagavā yogīnaṃ anurūpanivāsaṭṭhānupadisanato.
tika-s0201t:1115_3: Bhikkhu dīpisadiso araññe ekākī viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanena icchitatthasādhanato.
tika-s0201t:1116_1: bhāvanānuyogaṃ sikkhato, tathābhūto vā hutvā tisso sikkhā pavattayato. Assāsapassāsanimitteti
tika-s0201t:1116_3: vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto, yo “assāsapassāsakammiko”ti vutto. Jhānaṅgāni pariggaṇhāti
tika-s0201t:1116_4: arūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto. Vatthu nāma karajakāyo cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1116_5: Añño satto vā puggalo vā natthīti visuddhadiṭṭhi “tayidaṃ dhammamattaṃ na ahetukaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1116_6: nāpi issarādivisamahetukaṃ, atha kho avijjādīhi eva sahetuka”nti addhattayepi kaṅkhāvitaraṇena
tika-s0201t:1116_7: vitiṇṇakaṅkho “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā kalāpasammasanavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā
tika-s0201t:1117_0: Parassa vā assāsapassāsakāyeti idaṃ sammasanacāravasenāyaṃ pāḷi pavattāti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1117_1: samathavasena pana parassa assāsapassāsakāye appanānimittuppatti eva natthīti. Idaṃ
tika-s0201t:1117_2: ubhayaṃ na labbhatīti “ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā”ti ca vuttaṃ idaṃ dhammadvayaghaṭitaṃ
tika-s0201t:1118_0: Samudeti etasmāti samudayo, so eva kāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti samudayadhammo, assāsapassāsānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1118_1: pavattihetukarajakāyādi. Tassa anupassanasīlo samudayadhammānupassī. Taṃ pana samudayadhammaṃ
tika-s0201t:1118_2: upamāmukhena dassento “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha bhastanti ruttiṃ. Gaggaranāḷinti
tika-s0201t:1118_3: ukkāpanāḷiṃ. Teti karajakāyādike. Yathā assāsapassāsakāyo karajakāyādisambandhī phalabhāvena,
tika-s0201t:1118_5: vattabbataṃ labhantīti vuttaṃ “samudaya…pe… vuccatī”ti. Pakativācī vā dhamma-saddo
tika-s0201t:1118_7: vutto. Tenāha – “karajakāyañcā”tiādi. Evañca katvā kāyasminti bhummavacanañca samatthitaṃ
tika-s0201t:1118_8: hoti. Vayadhammānupassīti ettha ahetukattepi vināsassa yesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ abhāve
tika-s0201t:1118_9: yaṃ na hoti, tadabhāvo tassa abhāvassa hotu viya voharīyatīti upacārato karajakāyādiabhāvo
tika-s0201t:1118_10: assāsapassāsakāyassa vayakāraṇaṃ vutto. Tenāha “yathā bhastāyā”tiādi. Ayaṃ tāvettha
tika-s0201t:1118_11: paṭhamavikappavasena atthavibhāvanā. Dutiyavikappavasena pana upacārena vināyeva
tika-s0201t:1118_12: attho veditabbo. Ajjhattabahiddhānupassanā viya bhinnavatthuvisayatāya samudayavayadhammānupassanāpi
tika-s0201t:1118_13: ekakāle na labbhatīti āha “kālena samudayaṃ kālena vayaṃ anupassanto”ti.
tika-s0201t:1119_0: Atthi kāyoti eva-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti “kāyova atthī”ti vatvā avadhāraṇena nivatthitaṃ
tika-s0201t:1119_1: dassento “na satto”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yo rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya paresañca
tika-s0201t:1119_2: sajjāpanaṭṭhena, satvaguṇayogato vā “satto”ti parehi parikappito. Tassa sattanikāyassa
tika-s0201t:1119_3: pūraṇato ca cavanupapajjanadhammatāya galanato ca “puggalo”ti. Thīyati saṃhaññati
tika-s0201t:1119_4: ettha gabbhoti “itthī”ti. Puri pure bhāge seti pavattatīti “puriso”ti. Āhito ahaṃmāno
tika-s0201t:1119_5: etthāti “attā”ti, attano santakabhāvena “attaniya”nti. Paro na hotīti katvā “aha”nti,
tika-s0201t:1119_6: mama santakanti katvā “mama”nti. Vuttappakāravinimutto aññoti katvā “kocī”ti, tassa
tika-s0201t:1119_7: santakabhāvena “kassacī”ti parikappetabbo koci natthi, kevalaṃ kāyo eva atthīti attattaniyasuññatameva
tika-s0201t:1119_8: kāyassa vibhāveti. Evanti “kāyova atthī”tiādinā vuttappakārena. Ñāṇapamāṇatthāyāti
tika-s0201t:1119_10: satiparaṃ pamāṇaṃ pāpanatthāya. Imassa hi vuttanayena “atthi kāyo”ti aparāparuppattivasena
tika-s0201t:1119_11: paccupaṭṭhitā sati bhiyyoso mattāya tattha ñāṇassa satiyā ca paribrūhanāya hoti.
tika-s0201t:1120_0: Imissā bhāvanāya taṇhādiṭṭhigāhānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhattā vuttaṃ “taṇhā…pe… viharatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1120_1: Tathābhūto ca loke kiñci “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahetabbaṃ na passati, kuto gaṇheyya.
tika-s0201t:1120_2: Tenāha “na ca kiñcī”tiādi. Evampīti ettha pi-saddo heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhassa tādisassa
tika-s0201t:1120_3: atthassa abhāvato avuttasamuccayatthoti dassento “upari atthaṃ upādāyā”ti āha. “Eva”nti
tika-s0201t:1120_4: pana niddiṭṭhākārassa paccāmasanaṃ nigamanavasena katanti āha “iminā pana…pe… dassetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1120_5: Pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānassa idhādhippetattā vuttaṃ “sati dukkhasacca”nti. Sā pana sati
tika-s0201t:1120_6: yasmiṃ attabhāve, tassa samuṭṭhāpikā taṇhā tassāpi samuṭṭhāpikā eva nāma hoti tadabhāve
tika-s0201t:1120_7: abhāvatoti āha “tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā”ti. Appavattīti appavattinimittaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1120_8: na pavattati etthāti vā appavatti. Catusaccavasenāti catusaccakammaṭṭhānavasena.
tika-s0201t:1120_9: Ussakkitvāti visuddhiparamparāya āruhitvā, bhāvanaṃ upari netvāti attho. Niyyānamukhanti
tika-s0201t:1123_0: 108. Iriyāpathavasenāti iriyanaṃ iriyā, kiriyā, idha pana kāyikapayogo veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1123_1: Iriyānaṃ patho pavattimaggoti iriyāpatho, gamanādisarīrāvatthā. Gacchanto vā hi satto
tika-s0201t:1123_2: kāyena kattabbakiriyaṃ kareyya ṭhito vā nisinno vā nipanno vāti. Tesaṃ vasena, iriyāpathavibhāgenāti
tika-s0201t:1123_3: attho. Puna caparanti puna ca aparaṃ, yathāvuttaānāpānakammaṭṭhānato bhiyyopi aññaṃ
tika-s0201t:1123_4: kāyānupassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ kathemi, suṇāthāti vā adhippāyo. Gacchanto vātiādi gamanādimattajānanassa
tika-s0201t:1123_5: gamanādigatavisesajānanassa ca sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. Tattha gamanādimattajānanaṃ idha
tika-s0201t:1123_6: nādhippetaṃ, gamanādigatavisesajānanaṃ pana adhippetanti taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0201t:1123_7: “tattha kāma”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sattūpaladdhinti satto atthīti upaladdhiṃ sattaggāhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1123_8: na jahati na pariccajati “ahaṃ gacchāmi, mama gamana”nti gāhasabbhāvato. Tato eva
tika-s0201t:1123_9: attasaññaṃ “atthi attā kārako vedako”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ na ugghāṭeti
tika-s0201t:1123_10: nāpaneti apaṭipakkhabhāvato, ananabrūhanato vā. Evaṃ bhūtassa cassa kuto kammaṭṭhānādibhāvoti
tika-s0201t:1123_11: āha “kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hotī”ti. Imassa panātiādisukkapakkhassa
tika-s0201t:1123_12: vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Tameva hi atthaṃ vivarituṃ “idaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1123_13: Tattha ko gacchatīti gamanakiriyāya kattupucchā, sā kattubhāvavisiṭṭhaattapaṭikkhepatthā
tika-s0201t:1123_16: attā manasā saṃyujjati, mano indriyehi, indriyāni attehī”ti evamādigamanakāraṇapaṭikkhepanato.
tika-s0201t:1124_0: Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhito tabbinimuttassa
tika-s0201t:1124_1: ca kassaci abhāvato. Idāni dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhiṃ dassetuṃ “cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārenā”tiādi
tika-s0201t:1124_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha cittakiriyā ca sā vāyodhātuyā vipphāro vipphandanañcāti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāro,
tika-s0201t:1124_3: tena. Ettha ca cittakiriyaggahaṇena anindriyabaddhavāyodhātuvipphāraṃ nivatteti,
tika-s0201t:1124_5: pana kāyaviññattiṃ vibhāveti. “Gacchatī”ti vatvā yathā pavattamāne kāye “gacchatī”ti
tika-s0201t:1124_6: vohāro hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tanti gantukāmatāvasena pavattacittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1124_7: Vāyaṃ janetīti vāyodhātuadhikaṃ rūpakalāpaṃ janeti, adhikatā cettha sāmatthiyato,
tika-s0201t:1124_9: paccayabhūtena ākāravisesena pavattamānaṃ vāyodhātuṃ sandhāyāha “vāyo viññattiṃ janetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1124_10: Adhippāyasahabhāvī hi vikāro viññatti, yathāvuttaadhikabhāveneva ca vāyogahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1124_11: na vāyodhātuyā eva janakabhāvato, aññathā viññattiyā upādāyarūpabhāvo durupapādo
tika-s0201t:1124_12: siyā. Purato abhinīhāro puratobhāgena kāyassa pavattanaṃ, yo “abhikkamo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1125: “Eseva nayo”ti atidesavasena saṅkhepato vatvā tamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “tatrāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Koṭito paṭṭhāyāti heṭṭhimakoṭito paṭṭhāya. Ussitabhāvoti ubbiddhabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:1126_0: Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva gamanādibhāvo hotīti pajānato
tika-s0201t:1126_1: tassa evaṃ pajānanāya nicchayagamanatthaṃ “evaṃ hotī”ti vicāraṇā vuccati loke yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0201t:1126_2: ajānantehi micchābhinivesavasena, lokavohāravasena vā. Atthi panāti attano eva vīmaṃsanavasena
tika-s0201t:1126_3: pucchāvacanaṃ. Natthīti nicchayavasena sattassa paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Yathā panātiādi
tika-s0201t:1127_0: Nāvā mālutavegenāti yathā acetanā nāvā vātavegena desantaraṃ yāti, yathā ca acetano
tika-s0201t:1127_1: tejanaṃ kaṇḍo jiyāvegena desantaraṃ yāti, tathā acetano kāyo vātāhato yathāvuttavāyunā
tika-s0201t:1127_2: nīto desantaraṃ yātīti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sace pana koci vadeyya “yathā
tika-s0201t:1127_3: nāvāya tejanassa ca pellakassa purisassa vasena desantaragamanaṃ, evaṃ kāyassāpī”ti,
tika-s0201t:1127_4: hotu, evaṃ icchitovāyamattho. Yathā hi nāvā tejanānaṃ saṃhatalakkhaṇasseva purisassa
tika-s0201t:1127_5: vasena gamanaṃ, na asaṃhatalakkhaṇassa, evaṃ kāyassāpīti kā no hāni, bhiyyopi dhammamattatāva
tika-s0201t:1127_6: patiṭṭhaṃ labhati, na purisavādo. Tenāha “yantaṃ suttavasenā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1128_0: Tattha payuttanti heṭṭhā vuttanayena gamanādikiriyāvasena payojitaṃ. Ṭhātīti tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0201t:1128_2: vinā. Tiṭṭheti tiṭṭheyya. Vajeti vajeyya gaccheyya ko nāmāti sambandho. Paṭikkhepattho
tika-s0201t:1128_3: cettha kiṃ-saddoti hetupaccayavirahena ṭhānagamanapaṭikkhepamukhena sabbāyapi dhammappavattiyā
tika-s0201t:1128_4: paccayādhīnavuttitāvibhāvanena attasuññatā viya aniccadukkhatāpi vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1129_0: Paṇihitoti yathā yathā paccayehi pakārato nihito ṭhapito. Sabbasaṅgāhikavacananti
tika-s0201t:1129_1: sabbesaṃ catunnampi iriyāpathānaṃ saṅgaṇhanavacanaṃ, pubbe visuṃ visuṃ iriyāpathānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1129_2: vuttattā idaṃ tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vacananti attho. Purimanayo vā iriyāpathappadhāno
tika-s0201t:1129_3: vuttoti tattha kāyo appadhāno anunipphādīti idha kāyaṃ padhānaṃ appadhānañca iriyāpathaṃ
tika-s0201t:1129_4: anunipphādaṃ katvā dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vuttoti evampettha dvinnaṃ nayānaṃ viseso
tika-s0201t:1130_0: Iriyāpathapariggaṇhanampi iriyāpathavato kāyasseva pariggaṇhanaṃ tassa avatthāvisesabhāvatoti
tika-s0201t:1130_1: vuttaṃ “iriyāpathapariggahaṇena kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti. Tenevettha rūpakkhandhavaseneva
tika-s0201t:1130_2: samudayādayo uddhaṭā. Esa nayo sesavāresupi. Ādināti ettha ādi-saddena yathā “taṇhāsamudayā
tika-s0201t:1130_3: kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā”ti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rupakkhandhassa udayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1130_4: passatīti ime cattāro āhārā saṅgayhanti, evaṃ “avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhā”tiādayopi
tika-s0201t:1130_5: pañca ākārā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0201t:1133_0: 109. Catusampajaññavasenāti samantato pakārehi, pakaṭṭhaṃ vā savisesaṃ jānātīti sampajāno,
tika-s0201t:1133_1: sampajānassa bhāvo sampajaññaṃ, tathāpavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Cattāri sampajaññāni samāhaṭāni
tika-s0201t:1133_2: catusampajaññaṃ, tassa vasena. Abhikkamanaṃ abhikkantanti āha “abhikkantaṃ vuccati
tika-s0201t:1133_3: gamana”nti. Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ paṭikkantanti āha “paṭikkantaṃ vuccati nivattana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1133_4: Nivattananti ca nivattimattaṃ, nivattitvā pana gamanaṃ gamanameva. Abhiharantoti
tika-s0201t:1134_0: Sammā pajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ, tena attanā kātabbassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti āha
tika-s0201t:1134_2: Sampajaññaṃ karotevāti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti eva. Sampajānassa vā kāro
tika-s0201t:1134_3: etassa atthīti sampajānakārī. Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena saha atthena pavattatīti
tika-s0201t:1134_4: sātthakaṃ, abhikkantādi. Sātthakassa sampajānanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Sappāyassa
tika-s0201t:1134_5: attano upakārāvahassa hitassa sampajānanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare,
tika-s0201t:1134_6: aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1134_7: Abhikkamādīsu asammuyhanameva sampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Pariggaṇhitvāti paṭisaṅkhāya.
tika-s0201t:1135_0: Tasminti sātthakasampajaññavasena pariggahitaatthe. Attho nāma dhammato vaḍḍhīti
tika-s0201t:1135_1: yaṃ sātthakanti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ, taṃ sappāyamevāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1135_3: viya, yantapayogena vā vicittakammapaṭimāyo viya. Asamapekkhanaṃ gehasitaaññāṇupekkhāvasena
tika-s0201t:1135_4: ārammaṇassa ayoniso gahaṇaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati
tika-s0201t:1135_5: upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā”tiādi. Hatthiādisammaddena jīvitantarāyo,
tika-s0201t:1136: Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ anuvattanakathā āciṇṇā, ananuvattanakathā pana tassā dutiyā nāma hotīti āha “dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1137_0: Evanti “sace panā”tiādikaṃ sabbampi vuttākāraṃ paccāmasati, na “purisassa mātugāmāsubha”ntiādikaṃ
tika-s0201t:1137_1: vuccamānaṃ. Yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti vuccatīti
tika-s0201t:1137_2: āha “kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara”nti. Uggahetvāti yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:1137_3: evaṃ uggahakosallassa sampādanavasena uggahetvā. Haratīti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pavatteti,
tika-s0201t:1137_4: yāva piṇḍapātapaṭikkamā anuyuñjatīti attho. Na paccāharatīti āhārūpabhogato yāva
tika-s0201t:1138_0: Sarīraparikammanti mukhadhovanādisarīrapaṭijagganaṃ. Dve tayo pallaṅketi dve tayo
tika-s0201t:1138_1: nisajjāvāre, dve tīṇi uṇhāsanāni. Tenāha “usumaṃ gāhāpento”ti. Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti
tika-s0201t:1138_2: kammaṭṭhānaggeneva, kammaṭṭhānaṃ padhānaṃ katvā evāti attho. Tena “pattopi acetano”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1138_3: vakkhamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāparihariyamānaṃ vā avijahitvāti dasseti. “Paribhogacetiyato
tika-s0201t:1138_4: sarīracetiyaṃ garutara”nti katvā “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1138_5: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā bodhisākhā haritabbā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1139_0: Janasaṅgahatthanti “mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī”ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1139_1: Tasmāti. Yasmā “dhammakathā nāma kathetabbāyevā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti, yasmā
tika-s0201t:1139_2: ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā. Anumodanaṃ katvāti etthāpi
tika-s0201t:1140_0: Kammajatejoti gahaṇiṃ sandhāyāha. Kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ nārohati khudāparissamena kilantakāyattā
tika-s0201t:1140_1: samādhānābhāvato. Avasesaṭṭhāneti yāguyā aggahitaṭṭhāne. Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti kammaṭṭhānupaṭṭhānassa
tika-s0201t:1140_2: avicchedadassanavacanametaṃ, yathā poṅkhānupoṅkhapavattāya sarapaṭipāṭiyā avicchedo, evametassāpīti.
tika-s0201t:1141_0: Nikkhittadhuro bhāvanānuyoge. Vattapaṭipattiyā apūraṇena sabbavatthāni bhinditvā.
tika-s0201t:1141_1: “Kāme avītarāgo hoti, kāye avītarāgo, rūpe avītarāgo, yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ
tika-s0201t:1141_2: bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati, aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:1141_3: paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti evaṃ vutta pañcavidhacetokhilavinibandhacitto.
tika-s0201t:1142_0: Attakāmāti attano hitasukhaṃ icchantā, dhammacchandavantoti attho. Dhammoti hi hitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1142_1: tannimittakañca sukhanti. Atha vā viññūnaṃ nibbisesattā attabhāvapariyāpannattā ca
tika-s0201t:1142_2: attā nāma dhammo, taṃ kāmenti icchantīti attakāmā. Usabhaṃ nāma vīsati yaṭṭhiyo.
tika-s0201t:1142_3: Tāya saññāyāti tāya pāsāṇasaññāya, ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgatāti jānantāti adhippāyo. Soyeva
tika-s0201t:1142_4: nayoti “ayaṃ bhikkhū”tiādiko yo ṭhāne vutto, so eva nisajjāyapi nayo. Pacchato āgacchantānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1143_0: Bahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmīti amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena cha vassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ
tika-s0201t:1143_1: evāhaṃ yathāsatti pūjessāmīti. Paṭipattipūjā hi satthupūjā, na āmisapūjā. Ṭhānacaṅkamanamevāti
tika-s0201t:1143_2: adhiṭṭhātabbairiyāpathavasena vuttaṃ, na bhojanādikālesu avassaṃ kattabbanisajjāya paṭikkhepavasena.
tika-s0201t:1144_0: Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito ca anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha “vīthiyo
tika-s0201t:1144_1: sallakkhetvā”ti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuccati “pāsādikena abhikkantenā”ti, taṃ dassetuṃ “tattha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1145_0: Paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti, yadi upanissayasampanno hotīti sambandho. Evaṃ sabbattha
tika-s0201t:1145_1: ito paresupi. Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
tika-s0201t:1145_2: satasahassañca tajjaṃ puññañāṇasambharaṇaṃ, sāvakabodhiyaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
tika-s0201t:1145_3: kappasatasahassañca, mahāsāvakānaṃ kappasatasahassameva, itaresaṃ atītāsu jātīsu
tika-s0201t:1145_4: vivaṭṭasannissayavasena nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ. Bāhiyo dārucīriyoti
tika-s0201t:1145_5: bahi visaye sañjātasaṃvaḍḍhatāya bāhiyo, dārucīrapariharaṇena dārucīriyoti ca samaññāto. So hi āyasmā –
tika-s0201t:1146_0: “Tasmā tiha te, bāhiya, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute…
tika-s0201t:1146_1: mute… viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissatī’ti. Yato kho te, bāhiya, diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ
tika-s0201t:1146_2: bhavissati, sute… mute… viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena.
tika-s0201t:1146_3: Yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha. Yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha,
tika-s0201t:1146_4: tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena, esevanto dukkhassā”ti – ettakāya
tika-s0201t:1147_0: Tanti asammuyhanaṃ. Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena veditabbaṃ. Attā abhikkamatīti iminā
tika-s0201t:1147_1: andhaputhujjanassa diṭṭhiggāhavasena abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti, ahaṃ abhikkamāmīti
tika-s0201t:1147_2: pana iminā mānaggāhavasena, tadubhayaṃ pana taṇhāya vinā na hotīti taṇhāggāhavasenapi
tika-s0201t:1147_3: sammuyhanaṃ dassitameva hoti. “Tathā asammuyhanto”ti vatvā taṃ asammuyhanaṃ yena
tika-s0201t:1147_4: ghanavinibbhogena hoti, taṃ dassento “abhikkamāmī”tiādimāha. Tattha yasmā vāyodhātuyā
tika-s0201t:1147_5: anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo. Uddharaṇagatikā hi tejodhātūti uddharaṇe
tika-s0201t:1147_6: vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā,
tika-s0201t:1147_7: itarāsañca omattatāti dassento “ekeka…pe… balavatiyo”ti āha. Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā
tika-s0201t:1147_8: anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo. Tiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu
tika-s0201t:1147_9: sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato
tika-s0201t:1147_10: adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento “tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1147_12: Tattha akkantaṭṭhānato pādassa ukkhipanaṃ uddharaṇaṃ, ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā purato
tika-s0201t:1147_14: vā passena haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇaṃ, yāva patiṭṭhitapādo, tāva āharaṇaṃ atiharaṇaṃ, tato
tika-s0201t:1147_15: paraṃ haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇanti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0201t:1148_0: Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjanassa paccayo. Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātūti
tika-s0201t:1148_1: vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā tāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato
tika-s0201t:1148_2: adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento āha “vossajjane…pe… balavatiyo”ti. Yasmā
tika-s0201t:1148_3: pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo, patiṭṭhābhāve viya
tika-s0201t:1148_4: patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya
tika-s0201t:1148_5: pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirumbhanassa sijjhanato tatthāpi pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuanugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1148_6: tasmā vuttaṃ “tathā sannikkhepanasannirumbhanesū”ti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ abhikkamane,
tika-s0201t:1148_7: tesu vā vuttesu uddharaṇādīsu chasu koṭṭhāsesu. Uddharaṇeti uddharaṇakkhaṇe. Rūpārūpadhammāti
tika-s0201t:1148_8: uddharaṇākārena pavattā rūpadhammā, taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā arūpadhammā ca atiharaṇaṃ na
tika-s0201t:1148_9: pāpuṇanti khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato. Tattha tatthevāti yattha yattha uppannā, tattha tattheva.
tika-s0201t:1148_10: Na hi dhammānaṃ desantarasaṅkamanaṃ atthi. Pabbaṃ pabbantiādi uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse
tika-s0201t:1148_11: sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃ sabhāgasantativasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atiittaro hi rūpadhammānampi
tika-s0201t:1148_12: pavattikkhaṇo gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi
tika-s0201t:1148_13: pāde ca baddhadhuradhārāsamāgamatopi sīghataro. Yathā tilānaṃ bhajjiyamānānaṃ paṭapaṭāyanena
tika-s0201t:1148_14: bhedo lakkhīyati, evaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ uppādenāti dassanatthaṃ “paṭapaṭāyantā”ti
tika-s0201t:1149_0: Saddhiṃ rūpenāti idaṃ tassa tassa cittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakarūpadhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1149_1: vasena vuttaṃ, yaṃ tato sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ. Aññathā yadi rūpārūpadhammā
tika-s0201t:1149_2: samānakkhaṇā siyuṃ, “rūpaṃ garupariṇāmaṃ dandhanirodha”ntiādivacanehi virodho siyā,
tika-s0201t:1149_3: tathā “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1149_4: yathayidaṃ citta”nti evamādipāḷiyā. Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ
tika-s0201t:1149_5: attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāvento eva uppajjantīti tesaṃ taṃsabhāvanipphattianantaraṃ
tika-s0201t:1149_6: nirodho, rūpadhammā pana anārammaṇā pakāsetabbā, evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanivatti
tika-s0201t:1149_7: soḷasahi cittehi hotīti taṅkhaṇāyukatā tesaṃ icchitā, lahuviññāṇavisayasaṅgatimattapaccayatāya
tika-s0201t:1149_8: tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, visayasaṅgatimattatāya ca viññāṇassa lahuparivattitā, dandhamahābhūtapaccayatāya
tika-s0201t:1149_9: rūpadhammānaṃ dandhaparivattitā, nānādhātuyā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ kho pana tathāgatasseva,
tika-s0201t:1149_10: tena ca purejātapaccayo rūpadhammova vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1149_11: samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva, tasmā vuttanayenevettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1150_0: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ aññaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1150_1: taṃ pana nirujjhantaṃ aparassa anantarādipaccayabhāveneva nirujjhatīti tato laddhapaccayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1150_2: aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ. Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ antaro labbheyyāti noti āha “avīcimanusambandho”ti,
tika-s0201t:1150_3: yathā vīci antaro na labbhati, tadevetanti avisesavidu maññanti, evaṃ anu anu sambandho
tika-s0201t:1150_4: cittasantāno rūpasantāno ca nadīsotova nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya vattati.
tika-s0201t:1151_0: Abhimukhaṃ lokitaṃ ālokitanti āha “puratopekkhana”nti. Yasmā yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati
tika-s0201t:1151_1: tiṭṭhati nisīdati vā, tadabhimukhaṃ pekkhanaṃ ālokitaṃ, tasmā tadanugataṃ vidisālokanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1151_3: olokitassa, ullokaharaṇādīsu ullokitassa, pacchato āgacchantaparissayassa parivajjanādīsu
tika-s0201t:1151_4: apalokitassa siyā sambhavoti āha “iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1152_0: Kāyasakkhinti kāyena sacchikatavantaṃ, paccakkhakārinanti attho. So hi āyasmā vipassanākāle
tika-s0201t:1152_1: eva “yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto,
tika-s0201t:1152_2: tameva suṭṭhu niggaṇhissāmī”ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo, tattha ca katādhikārattā
tika-s0201t:1152_3: indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramippatto, teneva naṃ satthā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
tika-s0201t:1152_4: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
tika-s0201t:1153_0: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca ālokitavilokitassa veditabbā. Tasmāti “kammaṭṭhānāvijahanasseva
tika-s0201t:1153_1: gocarasampajaññabhāvato”ti vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati. Attano kammaṭṭhānavaseneva
tika-s0201t:1153_2: ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ, khandhādikammaṭṭhānā añño upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1153_3: Ālokitādisamaññāpi yasmā dhammamattasseva pavattiviseso, tasmā tassa yāthāvato jānanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1154_1: rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena
tika-s0201t:1154_2: iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobho, aniṭṭhe ca paṭigho uppajjati, manodvāre pana “itthī puriso”ti
tika-s0201t:1154_3: rajjanādi hoti, tassa pañcadvārajavanaṃ mūlaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ vā sabbaṃ bhavaṅgādi,
tika-s0201t:1154_4: evaṃ manodvārajavanassa mūlavasena mūlapariññā vuttā. Āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva
tika-s0201t:1154_5: apubbabhāvavasena ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā. Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesūti
tika-s0201t:1154_6: heṭṭhimassa uparimassa ca aparāparaṃ bhaṅgappattimāha. Tanti javanaṃ. Tassa na yuttanti
tika-s0201t:1154_7: sambandho. Āgantuko abbhāgato. Udayabbayaparicchinno tāvatako kālo etesanti tāvakālikāni.
tika-s0201t:1155_0: Etaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Tatthāti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokane paññāyamāne
tika-s0201t:1155_1: tabbinimutto ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi. Upanissayapaccayoti idaṃ suttantanayena
tika-s0201t:1156: Maṇisappo nāma ekā sappajātīti vadanti. Laḷananti kampananti vadanti, līḷākaraṇaṃ vā laḷanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1157_0: Uṇhapakatiko pariḷāhabahulo. Sīlassa vidūsanena ahitāvahattā micchājīvavasena uppannaṃ
tika-s0201t:1157_1: asappāyaṃ. Cīvarampi acetanantiādinā cīvarassa viya “kāyopi acetano”ti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena
tika-s0201t:1157_3: Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Catupañcagaṇṭhikāhatoti āhatacatupañcagaṇṭhiko, catupañcagaṇṭhikāhi vā hatasobho.
tika-s0201t:1158_0: Aṭṭhavidhopi atthoti aṭṭhavidhopi payojanaviseso. Pathavīsandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā
tika-s0201t:1158_1: viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātunāva āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha “vāyodhātuvaseneva
tika-s0201t:1158_2: tiṭṭhatī”ti. Atiharatīti yāva mukhā abhiharati. Vītiharatīti tato yāva kucchi, tāva
tika-s0201t:1158_3: harati. Atiharatīti vā mukhadvāraṃ atikkāmento harati. Vītiharatīti kucchigataṃ passato
tika-s0201t:1158_4: harati. Parivattetīti aparāparaṃ cāreti. Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasaṃcuṇṇanavisosanāni
tika-s0201t:1158_5: pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu karoti, na kevalāti tāni pathavīdhātuyāpi kiccabhāvena
tika-s0201t:1158_6: vuttāni. Allattañca anupāletīti vāyuādīhi atisosanaṃ yathā na hoti, tathā anupāleti
tika-s0201t:1158_7: allaādīhi atisosanaṃ yathā na hoti, tathā anupāleti allabhāvaṃ. Tejodhātūti gahaṇīsaṅkhātā
tika-s0201t:1158_8: tejodhātu. Sā hi anto paviṭṭhaṃ āhāraṃ paripāceti. Añjaso hotīti āhārassa pavesanādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1158_9: maggo hoti. Ābhujatīti pariyesanajjhoharaṇajiṇṇājiṇṇatādiṃ āvajjeti, vijānātīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1158_10: Taṃtaṃvijānananipphādakoyeva hi payogo “sammāpayogo”ti vutto. Yena hi payogena pariyesanādi
tika-s0201t:1158_11: nipphajjati, so tabbisayavijānanampi nipphādeti nāma tadavinābhāvato. Atha vā sammāpayogaṃ
tika-s0201t:1158_12: sammāpaṭipattiṃ anvāya āgamma ābhujati samannāharati. Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1159_0: Gamanatoti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. Pariyesanatoti gocaragāme
tika-s0201t:1159_1: bhikkhatthaṃ āhiṇḍanato. Paribhogatoti āhārassa paribhuñjanato. Āsayatoti pittādiāsayato.
tika-s0201t:1159_2: Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0201t:1159_3: asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo, āmāsayassa upari tiṭṭhanako pittādiko.
tika-s0201t:1159_4: Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro. Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti
tika-s0201t:1159_5: nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo. Tato nidhānato. Aparipakkatoti gahaṇīsaṅkhātena kammajatejena
tika-s0201t:1159_6: avipakkato. Paripakkatoti yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipakkabhāvato. Phalatoti nipphattito.
tika-s0201t:1159_7: Nissandatoti ito cito ca vissandanato. Sammakkhanatoti sabbaso makkhanato. Ayamettha
tika-s0201t:1160_0: Aññe ca rogā kaṇṇasūlabhagandarādayo. Aṭṭhāneti manussāmanussapariggahite ayutte
tika-s0201t:1160_1: ṭhāne khettadevāyatanādike. Nissaṭṭhattā neva attano kassaci anissajjitattā jigucchanīyattā
tika-s0201t:1160_2: ca na parassa. Udakatumbatoti veḷunāḷiādiudakabhājanato. Tanti chaḍḍitaudakaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1161_0: Addhānairiyāpathā cirappavattikā dīghakālikā iriyāpathā. Majjhimā bhikkhācaraṇādivasena
tika-s0201t:1161_1: pavattā. Cuṇṇikairiyāpathā vihāre aññatthāpi ito cito ca parivattanādivasena pavattāti
tika-s0201t:1161_2: vadanti. “Gateti gamane”ti pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamaggahaṇena gamanenapi purato pacchato
tika-s0201t:1161_3: ca kāyassa atiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahitanti keci.
tika-s0201t:1162_0: Yasmā mahāsīvattheravāde anantare anantare iriyāpathe pavattarūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha
tika-s0201t:1162_1: tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitā, idañcettha sampajaññavipassanācāravasena
tika-s0201t:1162_2: āgataṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “tayidaṃ mahāsīvattherena vuttaṃ asammohadhuraṃ imasmiṃ satipaṭṭhānabhutte
tika-s0201t:1162_3: adhippeta”nti. Sāmaññaphale pana sabbampi catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ labbhati yāvadeva
tika-s0201t:1162_4: sāmaññaphalavisesadassanaparattā tassā desanāya. Satisampayuttassevāti idaṃ yathā
tika-s0201t:1162_5: sampajaññakiccassa padhānatā, evaṃ satikiccassāpīti dassanatthaṃ, na satiyā sabbhāvamattadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1162_6: Na hi kadāci satirahitā ñāṇappavatti atthi. Etāni padānīti sampajaññapadāni. Vibhattānevāti
tika-s0201t:1162_7: visuṃ vibhattāneva. Imināpi sampajaññassa viya satiyāpi padhānataṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1163_0: Aparo nayo – eko bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati, eko
tika-s0201t:1163_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva gacchati, tathā eko tiṭṭhanto nisīdanto sayanto aññaṃ
tika-s0201t:1163_2: cintento aññaṃ vitakkento sayati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva sayati, etthakena
tika-s0201t:1163_3: pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti. Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:1163_5: appatvā ettheva niruddhā, pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ
tika-s0201t:1163_6: appatvā ettheva niruddā, caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0201t:1163_7: caṅkame pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1163_8: nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā etthevaniruddhā”ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva
tika-s0201t:1163_9: cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, uṭṭhahanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva uṭṭhahati, ayaṃ bhikkhu
tika-s0201t:1163_10: gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hoti, evampi sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti, tasmā
tika-s0201t:1163_11: yo bhikkhu yāva sakkoti, tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā
tika-s0201t:1163_12: sayati “kāyo acetano, mañco acetano, kāyo na jānāti “ahaṃ mañce sayito’ti, mañco
tika-s0201t:1163_13: na jānāti “mayi kāyo sayito”ti, acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito”ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhantoyeva
tika-s0201t:1163_14: cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, pabujjhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhati, ayaṃ sutte
tika-s0201t:1164_0: Kāyādikiriyānibbattanena tammayattā āvajjanakiriyāsamuṭṭhitattā ca javanaṃ, sabbampi
tika-s0201t:1164_1: vā chadvārappavattaṃ kiriyāmayapavattaṃ nāma, tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotīti pariggaṇhanto
tika-s0201t:1164_2: jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma. Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse
tika-s0201t:1164_3: jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti. Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṃ desentopi
tika-s0201t:1164_5: bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma. Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi
tika-s0201t:1164_6: dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannopi tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma. Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhāravirahato
tika-s0201t:1164_7: visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāma. Rūpadhammasseva pavattiākāravisesā abhikkamādayoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:1164_8: “rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo”ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0201t:1167_0: 110. Paṭikūlamanasikāravasenāti jigucchanīyatāya. Paṭikūlameva paṭikūlaṃ yo paṭikūlasabhāvo
tika-s0201t:1167_1: paṭikūlākāro, tassa manasikaraṇavasena. Antarenapi hi bhāvavācinaṃ saddaṃ bhāvattho
tika-s0201t:1167_2: viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti. Yasmā visuddhimagge vuttaṃ, tasmā tattha taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca
tika-s0201t:1167_3: vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Vatthādīhi pasibbakākārena bandhitvā kataṃ āvaṭanaṃ putoḷi.
tika-s0201t:1167_4: Vibhūtākāroti paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā asubhabhāvassa upaṭṭhitākāro. Iti-saddassa
tika-s0201t:1167_5: ākāratthataṃ dassento “eva”nti vatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sarūpato dassento “kesādipariggahaṇenā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1170_0: 111. Dhātumanasikāravasenāti pathavīdhātuādikā catasso dhātuyo ārabbha pavattabhāvanāmanasikāravasena,
tika-s0201t:1170_2: hi atthato ekaṃ. Goghātakoti jīvikatthāya gunnaṃ ghātako. Antevāsikoti kammakaraṇavasena
tika-s0201t:1170_4: ṭhā-saddassa vā gativinivattiatthatāya aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya
tika-s0201t:1170_5: bodhako, idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha “catunnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1170_6: iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhita”nti. Tattha ākārenāti ṭhānādinā
tika-s0201t:1170_7: rūpakāyassa pavattiākārena. Ṭhānādayo hi iriyāpathasaṅkhātāya kāyikakiriyāya patho
tika-s0201t:1170_9: “paṇidhāna”nti adhippetanti āha “yathāṭhitattā ca yathāpaṇihita”nti. Ṭhitanti vā
tika-s0201t:1170_11: Ṭhitanti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1170_12: Paṇihitanti paccayakiccavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evampettha
tika-s0201t:1170_13: attho veditabbo. Paccavekkhatīti pati pati avekkhati, ñāṇacakkhunā vinibbhujitvā
tika-s0201t:1171_2: saṃvaḍḍhentassa. Vadhitaṃ matanti hiṃsitaṃ hutvā mataṃ. Matanti ca matamattaṃ. Tenevāha
tika-s0201t:1171_3: “tāvadevā”ti. Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni yathāsanniviṭṭhāni
tika-s0201t:1171_4: upādāya gāvīsamaññā matamattāyapi gāviyā, tesaṃ taṃsannivesassa avinaṭṭhattā. Vilīyanti
tika-s0201t:1171_5: bhijjanti vibhujjantīti bīlā bhāgā va-kārassa ba-kāraṃ, i-kārassa ī-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1171_6: Bīlasoti bīlaṃ bīlaṃ katvā. Vibhajitvāti aṭṭhisaṅghāṭato maṃsaṃ vivecetvā, tato vā
tika-s0201t:1171_7: vivecitamaṃsaṃ bhāgaso katvā. Tenevāha “maṃsasaññā pavattatī”ti. Pabbajitassapi apariggahitakammaṭṭhānassa.
tika-s0201t:1171_8: Ghanavinibbhoganti santatisamūhakiccaghanānaṃ vinibbhujanaṃ vivecanaṃ. Dhātuso paccavekkhatoti
tika-s0201t:1171_9: ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa.
tika-s0201t:1171_10: Sattasaññāti attānudiṭṭhivasena pavattā saññāti vadanti, vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi
tika-s0201t:1171_11: tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato. Evañhi sati
tika-s0201t:1171_12: yathāvuttaopammatthena upameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti. Tenevāha “dhātuvaseneva
tika-s0201t:1171_13: cittaṃ santiṭṭhatī”ti. Dakkhoti cheko taṃtaṃsamaññāya kusalo, yathājāte sūnasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:1171_15: vibhatte, vibhatte pana aṭṭiṃmaṃsādiavayavasamaññāti jānanako. Catumahāpatho viya
tika-s0201t:1171_16: catuiriyāpathoti gāviyā ṭhitacatumahāpatho viya kāyassa pavattimaggabhūto catubbidho
tika-s0201t:1171_17: iriyāpatho. Yasmā visuddhimagge vitthāritā, tasmā tattha taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1174_3: upari maraṇato paraṃ. Samuggatenāti uṭṭhitena. Uddhumātattāti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ dhumātattā
tika-s0201t:1174_4: sūnattā. Setarattehi viparibhinnaṃ vimissitaṃ nīlaṃ vinīlaṃ, purimavaṇṇavipariṇāmabhūtaṃ
tika-s0201t:1174_5: vā nīlaṃvinīlaṃ, vinīlameva vinīlakanti ka-kārena padavaḍḍhanamāha anatthantarato
tika-s0201t:1174_6: yathā “pītakaṃ lohitaka”nti. Paṭikūlakattāti jigucchanīyattā. Kucchitaṃ vinīlaṃ vinīlakanti
tika-s0201t:1174_7: kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā “pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1174_8: Paribhinnaṭṭhānehi kākakaṅkādīhi. Vissandamānaṃ pubbanti vissavantaṃ pubbaṃ, tahaṃ
tika-s0201t:1175_0: So bhikkhūti yo “passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍita”nti vutto, so bhikkhu. Upasaṃharati
tika-s0201t:1175_1: sadisataṃ. Ayampi khotiādi upasaṃharaṇākāradassanaṃ. Āyūti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ, arūpajīvitindriyaṃ
tika-s0201t:1175_2: panettha viññāṇagatikameva. Usmāti kammajatejo. Evaṃpūtikasabhāvoti evaṃ ativiya
tika-s0201t:1175_3: pūtikasabhāvo, na āyuādīnaṃ avigame viya mattasoti adhippāyo. Ediso bhavissatīti
tika-s0201t:1176_0: Luñcitvā luñcitvāti uppāṭetvā uppāṭetvā. Sesāvasesamaṃsalohitayuttanti sabbaso akhāditattā
tika-s0201t:1176_1: tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ. Aññena hatthaṭṭhikanti avisesena
tika-s0201t:1176_2: hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento “catusaṭṭhibhedampī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1176_3: Terovassikānīti tirovassaṃ gatāni. Tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha
tika-s0201t:1176_5: so yathā hoti, taṃ dassento “abbhokāse”tiādimāha. Khajjamānatādivasena dutiyasivathikapabbādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1178_0: Imāneva dveti avadhāraṇena appanākammaṭṭhānaṃ tattha niyameti aññapabbesu tadabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1178_1: Yato hi eva-kāro, tato aññattha niyameti, tena pabbadvayassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānatāpi
tika-s0201t:1178_2: appaṭisiddhāti daṭṭhabbā aniccādidassanato. Saṅkhāresu ādīnavavibhāvanāni sivathikapabbānīti
tika-s0201t:1178_4: pākaṭā evāti “sesāni dvādasāpī”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
tika-s0201t:1181_0: 113. Sukhaṃ vedananti ettha sukhayatīti sukhā, sampayuttadhamme kāyañca laddhassāde
tika-s0201t:1181_1: karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati, khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca ābādhanti sukhā.
tika-s0201t:1181_2: Sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etissāti sukhāti apare. Vedayati ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavatīti vedanā.
tika-s0201t:1181_3: Vedayamānoti anubhavamāno. Kāmantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ iriyāpathapabbe vuttameva.
tika-s0201t:1182_0: “Vohāramattaṃ hotī”ti etena “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti
tika-s0201t:1182_1: idaṃ vohāramattanti dasseti. Vatthuārammaṇāti rūpādiārammaṇā. Rūpādiārammaṇañhi vedanāya
tika-s0201t:1182_2: pavattiṭṭhānatāya “vatthū”ti adhippetaṃ. Assāti bhaveyya. Dhammavinimuttassa aññassa
tika-s0201t:1182_3: kattu abhāvato dhammasseva kattubhāvaṃ dassento “vedanāva vedayatī”ti āha. Nitthunantoti.
tika-s0201t:1182_4: Balavato vedanāvegassa nirodhane ādīnavaṃ disvā tassa avasaradānavasena nitthunanto.
tika-s0201t:1182_5: Vīriyasamataṃ yojetvāti adhivāsanavīriyassa adhimattattā tassa hāpanavasena samādhinā
tika-s0201t:1182_6: samarasatāpādanena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā. Saha paṭisambhidāhīti lokuttarapaṭisambhidāhi
tika-s0201t:1182_7: saha. Lokiyānampi vā sati uppattikāle tattha samatthataṃ sandhāyāha “saha paṭisambhidāhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1182_8: Samasīsīti vārasamasīsī hutvā, paccavekkhaṇavārassa anantaravāre parinibbāyīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1183_0: Yathā ca sukhaṃ, evaṃ dukkhanti yathā “sukhaṃ vedayatī”tiādinā sampajānavediyanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1183_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ, evaṃ dukkhampi. Tattha dukkhayatīti dukkhā, sampayuttadhamme kāyañca
tika-s0201t:1183_2: pīḷeti vibādhatīti attho. Duṭṭhuṃ vā khādati, khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sātanti
tika-s0201t:1183_3: dukkhā. Dukkaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etissāti dukkhāti apare. Arūpakammaṭṭhānanti arūpapariggahaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1183_4: arūpadhammamukhena vipassanābhinivesanti attho. Rūpakammaṭṭhānena pana samathābhinivesopi
tika-s0201t:1183_5: saṅgayhati, vipassanābhiniveso pana idhādhippetoti dassento āha. “Rūpapariggaho arūpapariggahotipi
tika-s0201t:1183_6: etadeva vuccatī”ti. Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ kathesīti etthāpi “yebhuyyenā”ti padaṃ ānetvā
tika-s0201t:1184_1: taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tividho hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha abhinivesoti anuppaveso,
tika-s0201t:1184_2: ārambhoti attho. Ārambhe eva hi ayaṃ vibhāgo, sammasanaṃ pana anavasesatova dhamme
tika-s0201t:1184_3: pariggahetvā vattati. Pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāneti idaṃ rūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1184_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ, arūpamukhena pana vipassanābhiniveso yebhūyyena samathayānikassa
tika-s0201t:1184_5: icchitabbo, so ca paṭhamaṃ jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvā tato paraṃ sesadhamme pariggaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1184_6: Paṭhamābhinipātoti sabbe cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyabhāvena vuccantīti phasso
tika-s0201t:1184_7: cittassa paṭhamābhinipāto vutto, uppannaphasso puggalo, cittacetasikarāsi vā ārammaṇena
tika-s0201t:1184_8: phuṭṭho phassasahajātāya vedanāya taṃsamakālameva vedeti, phasso pana obhāsassa viya
tika-s0201t:1184_9: padīpo vedanādīnaṃ paccayaviseso hotīti purimakālo viya vuccati, yā tassa ārammaṇābhiniropanalakkhaṇatā
tika-s0201t:1184_10: vuccati. Phusantoti ārammaṇassa phusanākārena. Ayañhi arūpadhammatā ekadesena anallīyamānopi
tika-s0201t:1184_11: rūpaṃ viya cakkhu, saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇañca phusanto viya saṅghaṭṭento
tika-s0201t:1185_0: Ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantīti issaravatāya visavitāya sāmibhāvena ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavantī.
tika-s0201t:1185_1: Phassādīnañhi sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe ekadeseneva pavatti phusanādimattabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1185_2: vedanāya pana iṭṭhākārasambhogādivasena pavattanato ārammaṇe nippadesato pavatti.
tika-s0201t:1185_3: Phusanādibhāvena hi ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ ekadesānubhavanaṃ, vedayitābhāvena gahaṇaṃ yathākāmaṃ
tika-s0201t:1185_4: sabbānubhavanaṃ evasabhāvāneva tāni gahaṇānīti na vedanāya viya phassādīnampi yathāsakaṃ
tika-s0201t:1185_5: kiccakaraṇena sāmibhāvānubhavanaṃ codetabbaṃ. Vijānantanti paricchindanavasena visesato
tika-s0201t:1185_6: jānantaṃ. Viññāṇañhi minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minanto puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ paricchijja
tika-s0201t:1185_7: vibhāventaṃ pavattati, na saññā viya sañjānanamattaṃ hutvā. Tathā hi anena kadāci
tika-s0201t:1185_8: lakkhaṇattayavibhāvanāpi hoti. Imesaṃ pana phassādīnaṃ tassa tassa pākaṭabhāvo paccayavisesasiddhassa
tika-s0201t:1186_0: Evaṃ tassa tasseva pākaṭabhāvepi “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya”nti “sabbañca kho,
tika-s0201t:1186_1: bhikkhave, abhijāna”nti ca evamādivacanato sabbe sammasanupagā dhammā pariggahetabbāti
tika-s0201t:1186_2: dassento “tattha yassā”tiādimāha. Tattha phassapañcamakeyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ tadantogadhattā
tika-s0201t:1186_3: taggahaṇeneva gahitattā catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ. Phassapañcamakaggahaṇañhi tassa
tika-s0201t:1186_5: cetanāpadhānattā tesaṃ. Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhavibhaṅge “cakkhusamphassajā
tika-s0201t:1186_6: cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā, itare pana khandhā sarūpeneva gahitā.
tika-s0201t:1187_0: Vatthuṃ nissitāti ettha vatthu-saddo karajakāyavisayoti kathamidaṃ viññāyatīti āha
tika-s0201t:1187_1: “yaṃ sandhāya vutta”ntiādi. Kattha pana vuttaṃ? Sāmaññaphale. Soti karajakāyo. Pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:1187_2: nāmarūpaṃ natthīti idaṃ adhikāravasena vuttaṃ. Aññathā hi khandhavinimuttampi nāmaṃ
tika-s0201t:1187_4: iminā balavavipassanaṃ vatvā puna tassa ussukkāpanaṃ visesādhigamanañca dassento “so”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1188_0: Idhāti imissaṃ dutiyasatipaṭṭhānadesanāyaṃ, tassā pana vedanānupassanāvasena kathetabbattā
tika-s0201t:1188_1: bhagavā vedanāvasena kathesi. Yathāvuttesu ca tīsu kammaṭṭhānābhinivesesu vedanāvasena
tika-s0201t:1188_2: kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso sukaro vedanānaṃ vibhūtabhāvatoti dassetuṃ “phassavasena hī”tiādi
tika-s0201t:1188_3: vuttaṃ. Na pākaṭaṃ hotīti idaṃ tādise puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ, yesaṃ ādito vedanāva
tika-s0201t:1188_4: vibhūtatarā hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Evañhi yaṃ vuttaṃ “phasso pākaṭo hoti, viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ
tika-s0201t:1188_5: hotī”ti, taṃ avirodhitaṃ hoti. Vedanānaṃ uppattipākaṭatāyāti ca idaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1188_6: vasena vuttaṃ. Tāsañhi pavatti oḷārikā, na itarāya. Tadubhayaggahaṇamukhena vā gahetabbattā
tika-s0201t:1188_7: itarāyapi pavatti viññūnaṃ pākaṭā evāti “vedanāna”nti avisesaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1188_8: Yadā sukhaṃ uppajjatītiādi sukhavedanāya pākaṭabhāvavibhāvanaṃ. Neva tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0201t:1188_9: dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedetīti tasmiṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgisamaye neva dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti
tika-s0201t:1188_10: niruddhattā, anuppannattā ca yathākkamaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ, paccuppannāya pana asambhavo
tika-s0201t:1188_11: vuttoyeva. Sakiccakkhaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato aniccā. Sameccasambhuyya paccayehi katattā
tika-s0201t:1188_12: saṅkhatā. Vatthārammaṇādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannattā paṭiccasamuppannā. Khayavayapalujjananirujjhanapakatitāya
tika-s0201t:1189_0: Kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisaṃ nāma pañca kāmaguṇā, ārammaṇakaraṇavasena saha āmisehīti
tika-s0201t:1189_1: āmisā. Tenāha “pañcakāmaguṇāmisanissitā”ti. Ito paranti “atthi vedanā”ti evamādipāḷiṃ
tika-s0201t:1192_0: 114. Sampayogavasena pavattamānena saha rāgenāti sarāgaṃ. Tenāha “lobhasahagata”nti.
tika-s0201t:1192_1: Vītarāganti. Ettha kāmaṃ sarāgapadapaṭiyoginā vītarāgavasena bhavitabbaṃ, sammasanacārassa
tika-s0201t:1192_3: panā”tiādinā tameva adhippāyaṃ vivarati. Sesāni dve dosamūlāni, dve mohamūlānīti
tika-s0201t:1192_4: cattāri akusalacittāni. Tesañhi rāgena sampayogābhāvato nattheva sarāgatā, tannimittakatāya
tika-s0201t:1192_5: pana siyā taṃsahitatālesoti nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukavinimuttatā evettha labbhatīti
tika-s0201t:1192_6: āha “neva purimapadaṃ, na pacchimapadaṃ bhajantī”ti. Yadi evaṃ padesikaṃ pajānanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1192_7: āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati dukantarapariyāpannattā tesaṃ. Akusalamūlesu saha moheneva
tika-s0201t:1192_8: vattatīti samohanti āha “vicikicchāsahagatañceva uddhaccasahagatañcā”ti. Yasmā cettha
tika-s0201t:1192_9: saheva mohenāti samohanti purimapadāvadhāraṇampi labbhatiyeva, tasmā vuttaṃ “yasmā
tika-s0201t:1192_10: panā”tiādi. Yathā pana atimūḷhatāya pāṭipuggalikanayena savisesaṃ mohavantatāya momūhacittanti
tika-s0201t:1192_11: vattabbato vicikicchuddhaccasahagatadvayaṃ visesato “samoha”nti vuccati, na tathā
tika-s0201t:1192_14: Saṅkuṭitacittaṃ nāma ārammaṇe saṅkocanavasena pavattanato. Paccayavisesavasena thāmajātena
tika-s0201t:1192_15: uddhaccena sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti uddhaccasahagataṃ, aññathā sabbampi akusalacittaṃ
tika-s0201t:1192_16: uddhaccasahagatamevāti. Pasaṭacittaṃ nāma sātisayaṃ vikkhepavasena pavattanato.
tika-s0201t:1193_1: gataṃ, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ. Taṃ pana rūpārūpabhūmikaṃ
tika-s0201t:1193_2: tato mahantassa loke abhāvato. Tenāha “rūpārūpāvacara”nti. Tassa cettha paṭiyogī
tika-s0201t:1193_3: parittamevāti āha “amahaggatanti kāmāvacara”nti. Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha
tika-s0201t:1193_4: uttarehīti sauttaraṃ, tappaṭipakkhena anuttaraṃ, tadubhayaṃ upādāya veditabbanti
tika-s0201t:1193_6: āhitaṃ samāhitaṃ. Tenāha “yassā”tiādi. Yassāti yassa cittassa. Yathāvuttena samādhinā
tika-s0201t:1193_7: na samāhitanti asamāhitaṃ. Tenāha “ubhayasamādhirahita”nti. Tadaṅgavimuttiyā vimuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1193_8: kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ. Vikkhambhanavimuttiyā vimuttaṃ, mahaggatanti tadubhayaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-s0201t:1193_9: “tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttīhi vimutta”nti. Yattha tadubhayavimutti natthi, taṃ ubhayavimuttirahitanti
tika-s0201t:1193_10: gayhamāne lokuttaracittepi siyā āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “samuccheda…pe… okāsova
tika-s0201t:1193_11: natthī”ti āha. Okāsābhāvo ca sammasanacārassa adhippetattā veditabbo. Yaṃ panettha
tika-s0201t:1197_1: pāḷito eva viññāyatīti tamatthaṃ ulliṅgento “pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ kathetu”nti
tika-s0201t:1197_2: vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā nīvaraṇādivaseneva niddiṭṭhanti? Veneyyajjhāsayato. Yesañhi
tika-s0201t:1197_3: veneyyānaṃ pahātabbadhammesu paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇāni vibhāgena vattabbāni, tesaṃ vasenettha
tika-s0201t:1197_4: bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇesu dhammānupassanā kathitā. Tathā hi kāyānupassanāpi samathapubbaṅgamā
tika-s0201t:1197_5: desitā, tato pariññeyyesu khandhesu āyatanesu, bhāvetabbesu bojjhaṅgesu pariññeyādivibhāgesu
tika-s0201t:1197_6: saccesu ca uttarā desanā desitā, tasmā cettha samathabhāvanāpi yāvadeva vipassanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1197_7: icchitā, vipassanāpadhānā vipassanābahulā ca satipaṭṭhānadesanāti tassā vipassanābhinivesavibhāgena
tika-s0201t:1197_10: sampiṇḍeti itaresaṃ tadantogadhattā. “Kaṇhasukkānaṃ yugandhatā natthī”ti pajānanakāle
tika-s0201t:1197_11: abhāvā “abhiṇhasamudācāravasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yathāti yenākārena. So pana “kāmacchandassa
tika-s0201t:1197_12: uppādo hotī”ti vuttattā kāmacchandassa kāraṇākārova, atthato kāraṇamevāti āha “yena
tika-s0201t:1198_0: Tatthāti “yathā cā”tiādinā vuttapade. Subhampīti kāmacchandopi. So hi attano gahaṇākārena
tika-s0201t:1198_1: “subha”nti vuccati, tenākārena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā “subhanimitta”nti
tika-s0201t:1198_2: ca. Iṭṭhaṃ, iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādi subhārammaṇaṃ. Ākaṅkhitassa hitasukhassa
tika-s0201t:1198_3: anupāyabhūto manasikāro anupāyamanasikāro. Tanti ayonisomanasikāraṃ. Tatthāti nipphādetabbe
tika-s0201t:1198_4: ārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhepi subhanimitte. Āhāroti paccayo.
tika-s0201t:1199_0: Asubhampīti asubhajjhānampi uttarapadalopena. Taṃ pana dasasu aviññāṇakāsubhesu,
tika-s0201t:1199_1: kesādīsu ca pavattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kesādīsu hi saññā asubhasaññāti girimānandasutte
tika-s0201t:1199_2: vuttāti. Ettha ca catubbidhassa ayonisomanasikārassa yonisomanasikārassa ca gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1199_3: niravasesadassanatthaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu pana asubhe “subha”nti, “asubha”nti
tika-s0201t:1199_4: ca manasikāro idhādhippeto, tadanukūlattā vā itarepīti.
tika-s0201t:1200_0: Ekādasasu asubhesu paṭikūlākārassa uggaṇhanaṃ, yathā vā tattha uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:1200_1: tathā paṭipatti asubhanimittassa uggaho. Upacārappanāvahāya asubhabhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1200_2: asubhabhāvanānuyogo. Bhojane mattaññuno thinamiddhābhibhavābhāvā otāraṃ alabhamāno
tika-s0201t:1200_3: kāmacchando pahīyatīti vadanti. Bhojananissitaṃ pana āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ, tabbipariṇāmassa,
tika-s0201t:1200_4: tadādhārassa, tassa ca udariyabhūtassa asubhatādassanaṃ, kāyassa āhāraṭṭhitikatādassanañca
tika-s0201t:1200_5: yo sammadeva jānāti, so visesato bhojane mattaññū nāma, tassa ca kāmacchando pahīyateva.
tika-s0201t:1200_6: Asubhakammikatissatthero dantaṭṭhidassāvī. Abhidhammapariyāyena sabbopi lobho kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti
tika-s0201t:1201_0: Paṭighampi purimuppannaṃ paṭighanimittaṃ parato uppajjanakapaṭighassa kāraṇanti katvā.
tika-s0201t:1201_1: Mejjati hitapharaṇavasena siniyhatīti mitto, tasmiṃ mitte bhavā, mittassa vā esāti
tika-s0201t:1202_0: Mettāyanassa sattesu hitapharaṇassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ mettānimittassa uggaho.
tika-s0201t:1202_2: sīmāsambhede kate anodhisakatā, ekādidisāpharaṇavasena disāpharaṇatā mettāya uggahaṇe
tika-s0201t:1202_4: puratthimādidisāvasena anodhisakadisāpharaṇanti evaṃ vā dvidhā uggahaṇaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0201t:1202_5: “odhisakaanodhisakadisāpharaṇāna”nti vuttaṃ. Uggaho ca yāva upacārā daṭṭhabbo, uggahitāya
tika-s0201t:1202_6: āsevanā bhāvanā. Tattha “sabbe sattā, pāṇā, bhūtā, puggalā, attabhāvapariyāpannā”ti
tika-s0201t:1202_7: etesaṃ vasena pañcavidhā, ekekasmiṃ “averā hontu, abyāpajjā, anīghā, sukhī attānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1202_8: pariharantū”ti catudhā pavattito vīsatividhā anodhisakapharaṇā mettā, “sabbā itthiyo,
tika-s0201t:1202_9: purisā, ariyā, anariyā, devā, manussā, vinipātikā”ti sattodhikaraṇavasena pavattā
tika-s0201t:1202_10: sattavidhā aṭṭhavīsatividhā vā, dasahi disāhi disodhikaraṇavasena pavattā dasavidhā
tika-s0201t:1202_11: ca, ekekāya vā disāya sattādiitthādiaverādibhedena asītādhikacatusatappabhedā ca
tika-s0201t:1203_0: Yena ayonisomanasikārena aratiādikāni uppajjanti, so aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikāro,
tika-s0201t:1203_1: tena. Nipphādetabbe hi idaṃ bhummaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. Ukkaṇṭhitā pantasenāsanesu
tika-s0201t:1203_2: adhikusalesu dhammesu ca uppajjanabhāvariñcanā. Kāyavināmanāti kāyassa virūpenākārena nāmanā.
tika-s0201t:1204_1: ca ārambhadhātuādito pavattavīriyanti āha “paṭhamārambhavīriya”nti. Yasmā paṭhamārambhamattassa
tika-s0201t:1204_2: kosajjavidhamanaṃ thāmagamanañca natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ “kosajjato nikkhantatāya tato
tika-s0201t:1204_3: balavatara”nti. Yasmā pana aparāparuppattiyā laddhāsevanaṃ uparūparivisesaṃ āvahantaṃ
tika-s0201t:1204_4: ativiya thāmagatameva hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavatara”nti.
tika-s0201t:1205_0: Atibhojane nimittaggāhoti atibhojane thinamiddhassa nimittaggāho, “ettake bhutte
tika-s0201t:1205_1: thinamiddhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti, ettake na hotī”ti thinamiddhassa kāraṇākāraṇaggāho hotīti
tika-s0201t:1205_2: attho. Divā sūriyālokanti divā gahitanimittaṃ sūriyālokaṃ rattiyaṃ manasikarontassapīti
tika-s0201t:1205_3: evamettha attho veditabbo. Dhutaṅgānaṃ vīriyanissitattā vuttaṃ “dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1206: Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena samānalakkhaṇamevāti “avūpasamo nāma avūpasantākāro, uddhaccakukkuccamevetaṃ atthato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1207_0: Bahussutassa ganthato atthato ca suttādīni vicārentassa atthavedādipaṭilābhasabbhāvato
tika-s0201t:1207_1: vikkhepo na hoti, yathāvidhipaṭipattiyā yathānurūpapaṭikārappavattiyā ca katākatānusocanañca
tika-s0201t:1207_2: na hotīti “bāhusaccenapi…pe… uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī”ti āha. Yadaggena bāhusaccena
tika-s0201t:1207_3: uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati, tadaggena paripucchakatāvinayapakataññutāhipi taṃ pahīyatīti
tika-s0201t:1207_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Buddhasevitā ca buddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetaso vūpasamakarattā uddhaccakukkuccapahānakārī
tika-s0201t:1207_5: vuttā. Buddhattaṃ pana anapekkhitvā vinayadharā kukkuccavinodakā kalyāṇamittā vuttāti
tika-s0201t:1207_6: daṭṭhabbā. Vikkhepo ca bhikkhuno yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko hotīti “kappiyākappiyaparipucchāmahulassā”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1207_7: vinayanayeneva paripucchakatādayo niddiṭṭhā. Pahīne uddhaccakukkucceti niddhāraṇe
tika-s0201t:1207_8: bhummaṃ. Kukkuccassa domanassasahagatattā anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo vutto.
