tika-s0201t:1208_0: Tiṭṭhati pavattati etthāti ṭhānīyā, vicikicchāya ṭhānīyā vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā, vicikicchāya
tika-s0201t:1208_1: kāraṇabhūtā dhammā. Tiṭṭhatīti vā ṭhānīyā, vicikicchā ṭhānīyā etissāti vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā,
tika-s0201t:1208_2: atthato vicikicchā eva. Sā hi purimuppannā parato uppajjanakavicikicchāya sabhāgahetutāya asādhāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1209_0: Kusalākusalāti kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalā, tappaṭipakkhato akusalā. Ye akusalā,
tika-s0201t:1209_1: te sāvajjā asevitabbā hīnā ca. Ye kusalā, te anavajjā sevitabbā paṇītā ca. Kusalāpi
tika-s0201t:1209_2: vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā hīnā, paṇītehi paṇītā. Kaṇhāti kāḷakā, cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇā.
tika-s0201t:1209_3: Sukkāti odātā, cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. Kaṇhābhijātihetuto vā kaṇhā, sukkābhijātihetuto
tika-s0201t:1209_4: sukkā. Te eva sappaṭibhāgā. Kaṇhā hi ujuvipaccanīkatāya sukkehi sappaṭibhāgā, tathā
tika-s0201t:1209_5: sukkāpi itarehi. Atha vā kaṇhasukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā ca kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā. Sukhā
tika-s0201t:1209_6: hi vedanā dukkhāyavedanāya sappaṭibhāgā, dukkhā ca vedanā sukhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgāti.
tika-s0201t:1210_0: Kāmaṃ bāhusaccaparipucchakatāhi aṭṭhavatthukāpi vicikicchā pahīyati, tathāpi ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā
tika-s0201t:1210_1: sesavicikicchāti katvā āha “tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā”ti. Ratanattayaguṇāvabodhe hi “satthari
tika-s0201t:1210_2: kaṅkhatī”ti ādivicikicchāya asambhavoti. Vinaye pakataññutā “sikkhāya kaṅkhatī”ti
tika-s0201t:1210_3: vuttāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ karotīti āha “vinaye ciṇṇavasībhāvassapī”ti. Okappanīyasaddhāsaṅkhātaadhimokkhabahulassāti
tika-s0201t:1210_5: adhimokkhuppādanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddhāya vā ninnapoṇatā adhimutti adhimokkho.
tika-s0201t:1211_1: paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha paṭhamena ādi-saddena paṭighanimittādīnaṃ saṅgaho, dutiyena
tika-s0201t:1211_2: mettācetovimuttiādīnaṃ. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttanayamevāti.
tika-s0201t:1214_0: 116. Upādānehi ārammaṇakaraṇādivasena upādātabbā vā khandhā upādānakkhandā. Iti rūpanti
tika-s0201t:1214_1: ettha iti-saddo idaṃ-saddena samānatthoti adhippāyenāha “idaṃ rūpa”nti. Tayidaṃ sarūpato
tika-s0201t:1214_2: anavasesapariyādānaṃ hotīti āha – “ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthī”ti. Itīti
tika-s0201t:1214_3: vā pakāratthe nipāto, tasmā “iti rūpa”nti iminā bhūtupādādivasena yattako rūpassa
tika-s0201t:1214_4: bhedo, tena saddhiṃ rūpaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti. Sabhāvatoti ruppanasabhāvato
tika-s0201t:1214_5: cakkhādivaṇṇādisabhāvato ca. Vedanādīsupīti ettha “ayaṃ vedanā, ettakā vedanā, na
tika-s0201t:1214_6: ito paraṃ vedanā atthīti sabhāvato vedanaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā, sabhāvatoti ca anubhavanasabhāvato
tika-s0201t:1217_0: 117. Chasu ajjhattikabāhiresūti “chasu ajjhattikesu chasu bāhiresu”ti “chasū”ti padaṃ
tika-s0201t:1217_1: paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Kasmā panetāni ubhayāni chaḷeva vuttāni? Chaviññāṇakāyuppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato.
tika-s0201t:1217_2: Cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā pariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ,
tika-s0201t:1217_3: rūpāyatanameva ca ārammaṇaṃ, tathā itarāni itaresaṃ, chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto
tika-s0201t:1217_4: manāyatanekadeso uppattidvāraṃ, asādhāraṇañca dhammāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Cakkhatīti
tika-s0201t:1217_5: cakkhu, rūpaṃ assādeti vibhāveti cāti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṃ. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Jīvitanimittatāya
tika-s0201t:1217_6: raso jīvitaṃ, taṃ jīvitamavhāyatīti jivhā. Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyo uppattidesoti
tika-s0201t:1217_7: kāyo. Munāti ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti mano. Rūpayati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ
tika-s0201t:1217_8: pakāsetīti rūpaṃ. Sappati attano paccayehi harīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gamīyatīti
tika-s0201t:1217_9: saddo. Gandhayati attano vatthuṃ sūcetīti gandho. Rasanti taṃ sattā assādentīti raso.
tika-s0201t:1217_10: Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ. Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti dhammā. Sabbāni pana āyānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1217_11: tananādiatthena āyatanāni. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0201t:1218_0: Cakkhuñca pajānātīti ettha cakkhu nāma pasādacakkhu, na sasambhāracakkhu, nāpi dibbacakkhuādikanti
tika-s0201t:1218_1: āha “cakkhupasāda”nti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya
tika-s0201t:1218_3: attano rasassa ceva lakkhaṇassa ca vasena, rūpesu āviñchanakiccassa ceva rūpābhighātārahabhūtapasādalakkhaṇassa
tika-s0201t:1218_4: ca vasenāti attho. “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”tiādīsu samuditāniyeva rūpāyatanāni
tika-s0201t:1218_5: cakkhuviññāṇuppattihetu, na visuṃ visunti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “rūpe cā”ti
tika-s0201t:1218_6: puthuvacanaggahaṇaṃ, tāya eva ca desanāgatiyā kāmaṃ idhāpi “rūpe ca pajānātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1218_7: rūpabhāvasāmaññena pana sabbaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañcā”ti
tika-s0201t:1218_8: ekavacanavasena attho vutto. Sarasalakkhaṇavasenāti cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvakiccassa
tika-s0201t:1219_0: Ubhayaṃ paṭiccāti cakkhuṃ upanissayapaccayavasena paccayabhūtaṃ, rūpe ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayavasena
tika-s0201t:1219_1: paccayabhūte ca paṭicca. Kāmañcāyaṃ suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā, nippariyāyakathā nāma abhidhammasannissitā
tika-s0201t:1219_2: evāti abhidhammanayeneva saṃyojanāni dassento “kāmarāga…pe… avijjāsaṃyojana”nti āha.
tika-s0201t:1219_3: Tattha kāmesu rāgo, kāmo ca so rāgo cāti kāmarāgo, so eva bandhanaṭṭhena saṃyojanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1219_4: Ayañhi yassa saṃvijjati, taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojeti bandhati, iti dukkhena
tika-s0201t:1219_5: sattaṃ, bhavādike vā bhavantarādīhi, kammunā vā vipākaṃ saṃyojeti bandhatīti saṃyojanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1219_6: Evaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanādīnampi yathārahaṃ attho vattabbo. Sarasalakkhaṇavasenāti ettha
tika-s0201t:1219_7: pana sattassa vaṭṭato anissajjanasaṅkhātassa attano kiccassa ceva yathāvuttabandhanasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0201t:1220_1: Abhinandatoti sapppītikataṇhāvasena nandantassa. Padadvayenapi balavato kāmarāgassa
tika-s0201t:1220_2: paccayabhūtā kāmarāguppatti vuttā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Etaṃ ārammaṇanti etaṃ evaṃsukhumaṃ
tika-s0201t:1220_3: evaṃdubbibhāgaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Niccaṃ dhuvanti etaṃ nidassanamattaṃ, “ucchijjissati vinassissatīti
tika-s0201t:1220_4: gaṇhato”ti evamādīnampi saṅgaho icchitabbo. Bhavaṃ patthentassāti “īdise sampattibhave
tika-s0201t:1220_5: yasmā amhākaṃ idaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ sulabhaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā āyatimpi sampattibhavo bhaveyyā”ti
tika-s0201t:1220_6: bhavaṃ nikāmentassa. Evarūpaṃ sakkā laddhunti yojanā. Usūyatoti usūyaṃ issaṃ uppādayato.
tika-s0201t:1220_7: Aññassa maccharāyatoti aññena asādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇena macchariyaṃ karoto. Sabbeheva
tika-s0201t:1221_3: gahitā. Yena kāraṇenāti yena vipassanāsamathabhāvanāsaṅkhātena kāraṇena. Tañhi tassa
tika-s0201t:1221_4: tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca pahānakāraṇaṃ. Issāmacchariyānaṃ apāyagamanīyatāya
tika-s0201t:1221_5: paṭhamamaggavajjhatā vuttā. Yadi evaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī”ti
tika-s0201t:1221_6: suttapadaṃ kathanti? Taṃ suttantapariyāyena vuttaṃ. Yathānulomasāsanañhi suttantadesanā,
tika-s0201t:1221_7: ayaṃ pana abhidhammanayena saṃvaṇṇanāti nāyaṃ doso. Oḷārikassāti thūlassa, yato abhiṇhasamuppattipariyuṭṭhānatibbatāva
tika-s0201t:1221_8: hoti. Aṇusahagatassāti vuttappakāraoḷārikābhāvena aṇubhāvaṃ sukhumabhāvaṃ gatassa.
tika-s0201t:1221_10: Sotādīnaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena pajānanā, tappaccayānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ uppādādipajānanā
tika-s0201t:1221_11: ca vuttanayeneva veditabbāti dassento “eseva nayo”ti atidisati.
tika-s0201t:1222_0: Attano vā dhammesūti attano ajjhattikāyatanadhammesu, attano ubhayadhammesu vā. Imasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:1222_2: evañca anavasesato saparasantānesu āyatanānaṃ pariggaho siddho hoti. Parassa vā dhammesūti
tika-s0201t:1222_3: etthāpi eseva nayo. Rūpāyatanassāti aḍḍhekādasapabhedarūpasabhāvassa āyatanassa.
tika-s0201t:1222_4: Rūpakkhandhe vuttanayena nīharitabbāti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Sesakhandhesūti vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhesu.
tika-s0201t:1222_5: Vuttanayenāti iminā atidesena rūpakkhandhe āhārasamudayāti, viññāṇakkhandhe nāmarūpasamudayāti,
tika-s0201t:1222_6: sesakkhandhesu phassasamudayāti imaṃ visesaṃ vibhāveti, itaraṃ pana sabbattha samānanti.
tika-s0201t:1222_7: Khandhapabbe viya āyatanapabbepi lokuttaranivattanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ gahitaṃ natthīti āha
tika-s0201t:1225_1: paṭivijjhanakasattassa. Aṅgesūti kāraṇesu, avayavesu vā. Udayabbayañāṇuppādato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0201t:1225_2: sambodhipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhito nāma hotīti āha “āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1226: “Satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā”ti padassa attho “vicikicchaṭṭhānīyā”ti ettha vuttanayena veditabbo. Tanti yonisomanasikāraṃ. Tatthāti satiyaṃ. Nipphādetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1227_0: Sati ca sampajaññañca satisampajaññaṃ. Atha vā satipadhānaṃ abhikkantādisātthakabhāvapariggaṇhanañāṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1227_1: satisampajaññaṃ. Taṃ sabbattha satokāribhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya
tika-s0201t:1227_2: hoti. Yathā paccanīkadhammānaṃ pahānaṃ anurūpadhammasevanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1227_3: dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti, evaṃ satirahitapuggalavivajjhanā, satokārīpuggalasevanā,
tika-s0201t:1227_4: tattha ca yuttapayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “satisampajañña”ntiādinā.
tika-s0201t:1228_0: Dhammānaṃ, dhammesu vā vicayo dhammavicayo, so eva sambojjhaṅgo, tassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa.
tika-s0201t:1228_1: “Kusalākusalā dhammā”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāroti
tika-s0201t:1228_2: kusalādīsu taṃtaṃsabhāvarasalakkhaṇādikassa yāthāvato avabujjhanavasena uppanno ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo.
tika-s0201t:1228_3: So hi aviparītamanasikāratāya “yonisomanasikāro”ti vutto, tadābhogatāya āvajjanāpi
tika-s0201t:1228_4: taggatikāva, tassa abhiṇhapavattanaṃ bahulīkāro. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti punappunabhāvāya.
tika-s0201t:1229_0: Paripucchakatāti pariyogāhetvā pucchakabhāvo. Ācariye payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye
tika-s0201t:1229_1: saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ, taṃ taṃ “idaṃ
tika-s0201t:1229_2: bhante kathaṃ, imassa ko attho”ti khandhāyatanādiatthaṃ pucchantassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo
tika-s0201t:1230_0: Vatthuvisadakiriyāti ettha cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ, tappaṭibaddhāni
tika-s0201t:1230_1: cīvarādīni ca idha “vatthūnī”ti adhippetāni. Tāni yathā cittassa sukhāvahāni honti,
tika-s0201t:1230_2: tathā karaṇaṃ tesaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “ajjhattikabāhirāna”ntiādi. Ussannadosanti
tika-s0201t:1230_3: vātādiussannadosaṃ. Sedamalamakkhitanti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena
tika-s0201t:1230_4: ca makkhitaṃ. Ca-saddena aññampi sarīrassa pīḷāvahaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Senāsanaṃ vāti vā-saddena
tika-s0201t:1230_5: pattādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Avisade sati, visayabhūte vā. Kathaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa
tika-s0201t:1230_6: tāni visayo? Antarantarā pavattanakacittuppādavasenevaṃ vuttaṃ. Te hi cittuppādā
tika-s0201t:1230_8: Ñāṇampīti pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena na kevalaṃ taṃ vatthuyeva, atha kho tasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:1230_9: aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā taṃnissitāparisuddhi
tika-s0201t:1230_10: viya visayassa aparisuddhatāya visayīnaṃ aparisuddhiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1231_1: adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca sithilatādinā
tika-s0201t:1231_2: saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Tenāha “itarāni mandānī”ti. Tatoti tasmā saddhindriyassa
tika-s0201t:1231_3: balavabhāvato itaresañca mandattā. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1231_4: paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho, paggahova kiccaṃ paggahakiccaṃ. “Kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti
tika-s0201t:1231_5: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ. Vikkhepapaṭipakkho,
tika-s0201t:1231_6: yena vā sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so avikkhepo. Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato
tika-s0201t:1231_7: visayasabhāvaṃ passati, taṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena
tika-s0201t:1231_8: abhibhūtattā. Sahajātadhammesu indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1232_0: Tasmāti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. Tanti saddhindriyaṃ. Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti
tika-s0201t:1232_1: yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ
tika-s0201t:1232_2: balavaṃ jātaṃ, tassa paccayapaccayuppannatādivibhāgato yāthāvato vīmaṃsanena. Evañhi
tika-s0201t:1232_3: evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti “ayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1232_4: imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo”ti parijānanavasena paññābyāpārassa sātisayattā. Dhuriyadhammesu
tika-s0201t:1232_5: hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti, evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya
tika-s0201t:1232_6: mandabhāvo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena…pe… hāpetabba”nti.
tika-s0201t:1232_7: Tathā amanasikārenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1232_8: tenākārena bhāvanāya ananuyuñjanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa
tika-s0201t:1232_9: balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesavasena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya.
tika-s0201t:1232_10: Tattha paṭhamavikappe hāpanavidhi dassito, dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto
tika-s0201t:1232_11: vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena, vīriyādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1232_12: paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1233_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanapasuto
tika-s0201t:1233_1: eva hutvā viharanto satthārā “kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho,
tika-s0201t:1233_2: vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi
tika-s0201t:1233_3: taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi. Atha naṃ satthā
tika-s0201t:1236_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā “ehivakkalī”ti āha. So tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1236_1: paṭṭhapesi, saddhāya pana balavabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ na otarati. Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā
tika-s0201t:1236_2: tassa indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So satthārā dinnanayena
tika-s0201t:1236_3: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ “vakkalittheravatthu
tika-s0201t:1237_1: saṅgaho. Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena
tika-s0201t:1237_2: hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhiyattā
tika-s0201t:1237_3: tassā. Tathāhi sā samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā
tika-s0201t:1237_4: viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhantī ekaṃsato hāpeti. Tena
tika-s0201t:1237_6: vatthu. So hi āyasmā, satthu, santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto “mama
tika-s0201t:1237_7: sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo
tika-s0201t:1237_8: kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi
tika-s0201t:1237_9: vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ
tika-s0201t:1237_10: nāsakkhi. Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento
tika-s0201t:1237_11: kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ
tika-s0201t:1237_12: yojetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “soṇattherassa
tika-s0201t:1238_0: Samatanti saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvaṃ, tathā samādhivīriyānaṃ. Yathā
tika-s0201t:1238_1: hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānātivattanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1238_2: visesato icchitabbaṃ, yato nesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjati, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1238_4: antadvayapātābhāvena sammadeva appanā ijjhatīti. Balavasaddhotiādi vuttassevatthassa
tika-s0201t:1238_5: byatirekamukhena samatthanaṃ. Tassattho – yo balavatiyā saddhāya samannāgato avisadañāṇo,
tika-s0201t:1238_6: so mudhāpasanno hoti, na aveccappasanno. Tathā hi so avatthusmiṃ pasīdati seyyathāpi
tika-s0201t:1238_7: titthiyasāvakā. Kerāṭikapakkhanti sāṭheyyapakkhaṃ bhajati. Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto
tika-s0201t:1238_8: “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti
tika-s0201t:1238_9: hetupatirūpakehi vañcito, evaṃbhūto ca sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1238_10: nādiyati, saññattiṃ na gacchati. Tenāha “bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1238_11: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho, anatthāvaho visamabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1238_12: evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avikkhepāvaho samabhāvo, itaro vikkhepāvaho cāti.
tika-s0201t:1238_13: Kosajjaṃ adhibhavati, tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. Uddhaccaṃ adhibhavatīti
tika-s0201t:1238_14: etthāpi eseva nayo. Tadubhayanti saddhāpaññādvayaṃ samādhivīriyadvayañca. Samaṃ kātabbanti samarasaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1239_0: Samādhikammikassāti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. Evanti evaṃ sante, saddhāya thokaṃ balavabhāve
tika-s0201t:1239_1: satīti attho. Saddahantoti “pathavīti manasikāramattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti acintetvā
tika-s0201t:1239_2: “addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento. Okappentoti
tika-s0201t:1239_3: ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto. Ekaggatā
tika-s0201t:1239_4: balavatī vaṭṭati samādhippadhānattā jhānassa. Ubhinnanti samādhipaññānaṃ. Samādhikammikassa
tika-s0201t:1239_5: samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha “samatāyapī”ti, samabhāvenapīti
tika-s0201t:1239_6: attho. Appanāti lokiyaappanā. Tathā hi “hotiyevā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Lokuttarappanā
tika-s0201t:1239_7: pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha “samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1239_8: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samatā icchitā, kathaṃ satīti āha
tika-s0201t:1239_9: “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti. Sabbatthāti līnuddhaccapakkhikesu pañcasu
tika-s0201t:1239_11: pīti ca gahetabbā siyā. Tathā hi “kosajjapakkhikena samādhinā”icceva vuttaṃ, na “passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1239_12: Sāti sati. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyutto sabbakammiko. Tenāti tenā sabbattha icchitabbatthena
tika-s0201t:1239_13: kāraṇena. Āha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā sabbatthikā, sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena
tika-s0201t:1239_14: bojjhaṅgena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā, sabbatthiyāva sabbatthikā. Cittanti kusalacittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1239_15: Tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya.
tika-s0201t:1240_1: Bahussutasevanā hi sutamayañāṇāvahā. Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā
tika-s0201t:1240_2: ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha “samapaññāsa…pe… puggalasevanā”ti. Ñeyyadhammassa
tika-s0201t:1240_4: khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā”ti. Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato
tika-s0201t:1240_5: gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ, tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā,
tika-s0201t:1240_6: tassā paccavekkhaṇāti āha “gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā”ti. Yathā sativepullappatto
tika-s0201t:1240_7: nāma arahā eva, evaṃ so eva paññāvepullappattopīti āha “arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī
tika-s0201t:1241_0: “Tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī”tiādinā pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇaṃ niraye nibbattasattassa
tika-s0201t:1241_1: yebhuyyena sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti devadūtasuttādīsu tassā ādito vuttattā ca āha
tika-s0201t:1241_3: manussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhiyamānakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Ekaṃ buddhantaranti idaṃ
tika-s0201t:1241_4: aparāparaṃ petesuyeva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ, ekaccānaṃ vā petānaṃ ekaccatiracchānānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1241_5: viya tathā dīghāyukabhāvato. Tathā hi kāḷo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ adhigatarūpadassano.
tika-s0201t:1242_0: Evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinoti vīriyāyatto eva sabbo lokuttaro lokiyo ca visesādhigamoti
tika-s0201t:1242_1: evaṃ vīriye ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa. Gamanavīthinti sapubbabhāgaṃ nibbānagāminiṃ ariyamaggapaṭipadaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1242_2: Sā hi bhikkhuno vaṭṭanissaraṇāya gantabbā paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadāti katvā gamanavīthi
tika-s0201t:1242_3: nāma. Kāyadaḷhībahuloti yathā tathā kāyassa daḷhīkammapasuto. Piṇḍanti raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1242_4: Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena
tika-s0201t:1243_0: Nīharantoti pattatthavikato nīharanto. Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre
tika-s0201t:1243_1: ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvā. Manussasampatti dibbasampatti ante nibbānasampattīti
tika-s0201t:1243_2: tisso sampattiyo. Dātuṃ sakkhissasīti “tayi katena dānamayena veyyāvaccamayena ca
tika-s0201t:1243_3: puññakammena khettavisesabhāvūpagamanena aparāparaṃ devamanussasampattiyo ante nibbānasampattiñca
tika-s0201t:1243_4: dātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti thero attānaṃ pucchati. Sitaṃ karontovāti “akiccheneva mayā
tika-s0201t:1243_5: vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.
tika-s0201t:1244_0: Vippaṭipannanti jātidhammakuladhammādilaṅghanena asammāpaṭipannaṃ. Evaṃ yathā asammāpaṭipanno
tika-s0201t:1244_1: putto tāya eva asammāpaṭipattiyā kulasantānato bāhiro hutvā pitu santikā dāyajjassa
tika-s0201t:1244_2: na bhāgī, evaṃ kusītopi teneva kusītabhāvena asammāpaṭipanno satthu santikā laddhabbaariyadhanadāyajjassa
tika-s0201t:1244_3: na bhāgī. Āraddhavīriyova labhati sammāpaṭipajjanato. Uppajjati vīriyasambojjhaṅgoti
tika-s0201t:1245: Mahāti sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto vipulo anaññasādhāraṇo. Taṃ panassa guṇamahattaṃ dasasahassilokadhātukampanena loke pākaṭanti dassento “satthuno hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1246: Yasmā satthusāsane pabbajitassa pabbajjupagamena sakyaputtiyabhāvo sampajāyati, tasmā buddhaputtabhāvaṃ dassento “asambhinnāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1247_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-s0201t:1247_1: seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ tiracchānakathikānaṃ puggalānaṃ dūrato vajjanā kusītapuggalaparivajjanā.
tika-s0201t:1247_3: kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanā āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā. Tenāha – “kucchiṃ pūretvā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1247_5: dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ, thinamiddhavinodanatā sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇatāti idaṃ dvayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1247_6: gahitaṃ. Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā hoti lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa
tika-s0201t:1247_7: vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato. Thinamiddhavinodanaṃ tadadhimuttatāya eva gahitaṃ, vīriyuppādane
tika-s0201t:1248_0: Purimuppannā pīti parato uppajjanakapītiyā kāraṇabhāvato “pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā
tika-s0201t:1248_1: dhammā”ti vuttā, tassā pana bahuso pavattiyā puthuttaṃ upādāya bahuvacananiddeso,
tika-s0201t:1248_2: yathā sā uppajjati, evaṃ paṭipatti, tassā uppādakamanasikāro.
tika-s0201t:1249_0: Buddhānussatiyā upacārasamādhiniṭṭhattā vuttaṃ “yāva upacārā”ti. Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānoti
tika-s0201t:1249_1: pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno. Dhammaguṇe anussarantassapi
tika-s0201t:1249_2: yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti. Evaṃ sesaanussatīsu
tika-s0201t:1249_4: Samāpattiyā…pe… samudācarantīti idañca upasamānussatidassanaṃ. Saṅkhārānañhi sappadesavūpasamepi
tika-s0201t:1249_5: nippadesavūpasame viya tathā paññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho
tika-s0201t:1249_7: uppādāya hotīti. Pasādanīyesu ṭhānesu pasādasinehābhāvena thusasamahadayatā lūkhatā,
tika-s0201t:1249_8: sā tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha “asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve”ti.
tika-s0201t:1250: Kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā passaddhi eva passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, tassa passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa.
tika-s0201t:1251_1: sappāyautuiriyāpathaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tañhi tividhaṃ sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa
tika-s0201t:1251_2: kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1251_3: Ahetukaṃ sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhanti ayameko anto, issarādivisamahetukanti
tika-s0201t:1251_4: pana ayaṃ dutiyo, ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā
tika-s0201t:1251_5: paṭipatti. Majjhatto payogo yassa hoti majjhattapayogo, tassa bhāvo majjhattapayogatā.
tika-s0201t:1251_6: Ayañhi pahāya sāraddhakāyataṃ passaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṃ hontī passaddhidvayaṃ āvahati,
tika-s0201t:1252_0: Yathāsamāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena gayhamāno purimuppanno samatho eva samathanimittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1252_1: Nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo. Tathā hi so
tika-s0201t:1252_2: anavaṭṭhānaraso bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca vutto. Ekaggatābhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti
tika-s0201t:1252_3: abyaggo, samādhi. So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha “avikkhepaṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:1253: Vatthuvisadakiriyā indriyasamattapaṭipādanā ca paññāvahā vuttā, samādhānāvahāpi tā honti samādhānāvahabhāveneva paññāvahabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “vatthuvisada…pe… veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1254_1: nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā”icceva vuttaṃ. Kasiṇanimittassāti ca nidassanamattaṃ
tika-s0201t:1254_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asubhanimittassādikassapi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa uggahaṇakosallaṃ
tika-s0201t:1255_1: Tassa paggahaṇanti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0201t:1256_0: “Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0201t:1256_1: bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
tika-s0201t:1256_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1256_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni
tika-s0201t:1256_4: ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0201t:1256_5: mukhavātañca dadeyya, na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ
tika-s0201t:1257: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbaṃ, sā anantaraṃ vibhāvitā eva.
tika-s0201t:1258_1: Tassa niggahaṇanti tassa uddhatacittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito
tika-s0201t:1259_0: “Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0201t:1259_1: bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
tika-s0201t:1259_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1259_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha
tika-s0201t:1259_4: allāni ceva tiṇāni…pe… paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1260_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti
tika-s0201t:1260_1: veditabbā. Tattha passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanā vuttā eva, samādhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0201t:1261_0: Paññāpayogamandatāyāti paññābyāpārassa appabhāvena. Yathā hi dānaṃ alobhappadhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1261_1: sīlaṃ adosappadhānaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanā amohappadhānā. Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0201t:1261_2: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti, anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa
tika-s0201t:1261_3: yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na janeti, tena taṃ nirassādaṃ hoti, tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva
tika-s0201t:1261_4: avīthipaṭipattiyā upasamasukhaṃ na vindati, tenāpi cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:1261_5: “paññāpayoga…pe… nirassādaṃ hotī”ti. Tassa saṃveguppādanaṃ pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti
tika-s0201t:1261_6: taṃ dassento “aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī”tiādimāha. Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ
tika-s0201t:1261_8: apāyadukkhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ
tika-s0201t:1261_9: gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni. Ye pana sattā
tika-s0201t:1261_10: āhārūpajīvino, tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikadukkhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1261_11: aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanatāti
tika-s0201t:1261_12: ayaṃ sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayena tena saṃvejanavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena
tika-s0201t:1261_13: ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā, saṃvegajananapubbakapasāduppādanena bhāvanācittassa tosanāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1262_0: Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammāti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṃ
tika-s0201t:1262_1: sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma. Alīnantiādīsu kosajjapakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya
tika-s0201t:1262_2: alīnaṃ, uddhaccapakkhiyānaṃ anadhimattatāya anuddhataṃ, paññāpayogasattiyā upasamasukhādhigamena
tika-s0201t:1262_3: ca anirassādaṃ, tato eva ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannañca. Tattha
tika-s0201t:1262_4: alīnatāya paggahe, anuddhatatāya niggahe, anirassādatāya sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ
tika-s0201t:1262_5: āpajjati, alīnānuddhatatāhi ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ, anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1262_6: Samappavattiyā vā alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā anirassādanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1262_7: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa
tika-s0201t:1262_8: paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu byāvaṭatāsaṅkhātaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ abhibhuyya pekkhanā vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1264: Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttānusārena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1265_1: sati sijjhanato, asati ca asijjhanato, so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti
tika-s0201t:1265_2: āha “sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā”ti. Tadubhaye ca virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya
tika-s0201t:1265_5: rāgo paṭipakkho. Tathā cāha “upekkhā rāgabahulassa visuddhimaggo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1266_1: kāraṇehi. Dvīhevāti avadhāraṇaṃ saṅkhyāsamānatāya. Assāmikabhāvo anattaniyatā. Sati
tika-s0201t:1266_2: hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ aññañca kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā, so pana
tika-s0201t:1266_3: koci natthevāti adhippāyo. Anaddhaniyanti na addhānakkhamaṃ, na ciraṭṭhāyi ittaraṃ
tika-s0201t:1267: Mamāyatīti mamattaṃ karoti, “mama”nti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati. Dhanāyantāti dhanaṃ drabyaṃ karontā.
tika-s0201t:1268: Ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānadesanā pubbabhāgamaggavasena desitāti pubbabhāgiyabojjhaṅge sandhāyāha “bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasacca”nti.
tika-s0201t:1271_0: 119. Yathāsabhāvatoti aviparītasabhāvato bādhanalakkhaṇato, yo yo vā sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1271_1: tato, ruppanādikakkhaḷādisabhāvatoti attho. Janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpikanti pavattalakkhaṇassa
tika-s0201t:1271_2: dukkhassa janikaṃ nimittalakkhaṇassa samuṭṭhāpikaṃ. Purimataṇhanti dukkhanibbattito
tika-s0201t:1272_1: sasantatipariyāpanno viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “attano vā cattāri saccānī”ti. Parassa
tika-s0201t:1272_2: vāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tenāha bhagavā – “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi
tika-s0201t:1272_3: samanake lokañca paññapemi, lokasamudayañca paññapemi, lokanirodhañca paññapemi,
tika-s0201t:1272_4: lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadañca paññapemī”ti. Kathaṃ pana ādikampiko nirodhasaccāni
tika-s0201t:1272_5: pariggaṇhātīti? Anussavādisiddhamākāraṃ pariggaṇhāti, evañca katvā lokuttarabojjhaṅge
tika-s0201t:1272_6: uddissapi pariggaho na virujjhati. Yathāsambhavatoti sambhavānurūpaṃ, ṭhapetvā nirodhasaccaṃ
tika-s0201t:1274_1: uddhumātakādīnaṃ sabhāvenevāti navannaṃ sivathikānaṃ appanākammaṭṭhānatā vuttā. Dveyevāti
tika-s0201t:1274_2: “ānāpānaṃ, dvattiṃsākāro”ti imāni dveyeva. Abhinivesoti vipassanābhiniveso, so pana
tika-s0201t:1274_3: sammasanīyadhamme pariggaho. Iriyāpathā ālokitādayo ca rūpadhammānaṃ avatthāvisesamattatāya
tika-s0201t:1274_4: na sammasanupagā viññattiādayo viya. Nīvaraṇabojjhaṅgā ādito na pariggahetabbāti
tika-s0201t:1274_5: vuttaṃ “iriyāpatha…pe… na jāyatī”ti. Kesādiapadesena tadupādānadhammā viya iriyāpathādiapadesena
tika-s0201t:1274_6: tadavatthā rūpadhammā pariggayhanti, nīvaraṇādimukhena ca taṃ sampayuttā taṃnissayadhammāti
tika-s0201t:1274_7: adhippāyena mahāsīvatthero “iriyāpathādīsupi abhiniveso jāyatī”ti āha. Atthi nu kho
tika-s0201t:1274_8: metiādi pana sabhāvato iriyāpathādīnaṃ ādikammikassa anicchitabhāvadassanaṃ. Apariññāpubbikā hi pariññāti.
tika-s0201t:1275_0: 137. Kāmaṃ “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū”tiādinā uddesaniddesesu tattha tattha bhikkhuggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1275_1: kataṃ, taṃ paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatthaṃ, desanā pana sabbasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0201t:1275_2: “yo hi koci, bhikkhave”icceva vuttaṃ, na bhikkhuyevāti dassento “yo hi koci, bhikkhu
tika-s0201t:1275_3: vā”tiādimāha. Dassanamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānantī sikhāppattā aggamaggapaññā
tika-s0201t:1275_4: aññā nāma, tassa phalabhāvato aggaphalampīti āha “aññāti arahatta”nti. Appatarepi
tika-s0201t:1287_0: 139. Suttadesanāvatthusaṅkhātassa atthassa uppatti aṭṭhuppatti, sā tassa atthīti
tika-s0201t:1287_2: saṅghassa ca uppannalābhasakkārahetu, attano vā lābhasakkāruppādanahetu. Titthiyaparideviteti
tika-s0201t:1287_3: titthiyānaṃ “kiṃ bho samaṇoyeva gotamo samaṇo”tiādinā vippalapanimittaṃ. “Mahālābhasakkāro
tika-s0201t:1287_4: uppajjī”ti vatvā samantapāsādikatthaṃ tassa uppattikāraṇaṃ dassento “catuppamāṇiko
tika-s0201t:1287_5: hī”tiādimāha. Cattāri pamāṇāni catuppamāṇāni, catuppamāṇāni etassa atthīti catuppamāṇiko.
tika-s0201t:1287_6: Lokoyeva saṅgamma samāgamma vasanaṭṭhena lokasannivāso, sattakāyoti attho. Pamināti
tika-s0201t:1287_7: uḷāratādivisesaṃ etenāti pamāṇaṃ rūpaṃ rūpakāyo pamāṇaṃ etassāti rūpappamāṇo. Tato
tika-s0201t:1287_8: eva rūpe pasannoti rūpappasanno. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ghosoti pavattathutighoso.
tika-s0201t:1287_9: Lūkhanti paccayalūkhatā. Dhammoti sīlādayo guṇadhammā adhippetā.
tika-s0201t:1288_0: Tesaṃ puggalānaṃ. Ārohanti uccataṃ. Sā ca kho tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle pamāṇayuttā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1288_1: Pariṇāhanti nātikisanātithūlatāvasena mitapariṇāhaṃ. Saṇṭhānanti tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1288_2: susaṇṭhitataṃ. Pāripūrinti sabbesaṃ sarīrāvayavānaṃ paripuṇṇataṃ avekallataṃ. Tattha
tika-s0201t:1288_3: pamāṇaṃ gahetvāti tasmiṃ rūpe rūpasampattiyaṃ pamāṇabhāvaṃ upādāya. Pasādaṃ janetīti
tika-s0201t:1289_0: Paravaṇṇanāyāti “amuko ediso ca ediso cā”ti yasaguṇavacanena. Parathomanāyāti sammukhāva
tika-s0201t:1289_1: parassa silāghuppādanena abhitthavanena. Parapasaṃsanāyāti parammukhā parassa guṇasaṃkittanena.
tika-s0201t:1290_0: Cīvaralūkhanti thūlajiṇṇabahutunnakatādiṃ cīvarassa lūkhabhāvaṃ. Pattalūkhanti anekaganthikāhatādiṃ
tika-s0201t:1290_1: pattassa lūkhabhāvaṃ. Vividhaṃ vā dukkarakārikanti dhutaṅgasevanādivasena pavattaṃ
tika-s0201t:1291: Sīlaṃ vā passitvāti sīlapāripūrivasena visuddhaṃ kāyavacīsucaritaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā passitvā. Jhānādiadhigamasiddhaṃ samādhiṃ vā. Vipassanābhiññāsaṅkhātaṃ paññaṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:1292_0: Bhagavato sarīraṃ disvāti sambandho. Rūpappamāṇopi sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati aparimitakālasamupacitapuññānubhāvanipphannāya
tika-s0201t:1292_2: yassā rucirabhāvo visuddhe vigatavalāhake deve puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakalābhāgamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-s0201t:1292_3: candamaṇḍalaṃ abhibhavitvā atirocati, pabhassarabhāvo saradasamayaṃ saṃvaddhitadiguṇatejakiraṇajālasamujjalaṃ
tika-s0201t:1292_5: vattamānaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vijjotanasamatthaṃ mahābrahmuno pabhāsamudayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1293_1: aṅgapariccāgādiggahaṇaṃ, tatthāpi ca aṅgapariccāgato visuṃ nayanapariccāgaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1293_4: vuttāya phalasampattiyā, “so dhammaṃ desetī”tiādinā vuttāya sattupakārakiriyāya ca
tika-s0201t:1293_5: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇabhāvato
tika-s0201t:1294_0: “Cīvaralūkhaṃ disvā”ti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ “sace bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarenāti
tika-s0201t:1294_1: matakaḷevaraṃ paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitena tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā gahitena sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarena.
tika-s0201t:1294_2: Bhāriyanti garukaṃ, dukkaranti attho. Vadhuyuvatīmajjhimitthivasena, bālayobbanapurāṇavasena
tika-s0201t:1294_3: vā tividhanāṭakatā. Hareṇuyūsaṃ maṇḍalakalāyaraso. “Yāpessati nāmā”ti nāma-saddaṃ
tika-s0201t:1294_4: ānetvā sambandho. Nāma-saddayogena hi anāgatakālassa viya payogo, yāpeti icceva attho.
tika-s0201t:1295_0: Samādhiguṇanti sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ vivarati jhānādiggahaṇena. Mānadabbanimmadanena
tika-s0201t:1295_2: saccakāḷavakabakadamanādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Bāverunti evaṃnāmakaṃ visayaṃ. Sarasampannoti
tika-s0201t:1295_4: lakkhaṇahāranayena avasesalakkhaṇapāripūriṃ viya tadavinābhāvato buddhānaṃ desanāvilāsañca vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1296: Hatappabhāti buddhānubhāvena vigatatejā. Kāḷapakkhūpameti sattānaṃ byāmohandhakārābhibhavena kāḷapakkharattūpame. Sūriyeti sūriye udayitvā obhāsenteti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1297_0: Siṅghāṭaketi tikoṇaracchāyaṃ. Catukketi sandhiyaṃ. Paridevantīti anutthunanavasena
tika-s0201t:1297_1: vippalapanti. Sokādhikakato hi vacīpalāpo paridevo. Loke uppajjamāneyeva uppannāti
tika-s0201t:1298_0: Sesapadesupīti “idha dutiyo samaṇo”tiādīsu sesavāresupi yathā hi “vivicceva kāmehī”ti
tika-s0201t:1298_1: ettha kato niyamo “vivicca akusalehī”ti etthāpi katoyeva hoti sāvadhāraṇasseva atthassa
tika-s0201t:1298_3: nippariyāyato samaṇabhāvoti tesaṃ vasenettha cattāro samaṇā desitāti tamatthaṃ suttantarena
tika-s0201t:1298_4: samatthetuṃ “tenevāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭipattikkamena desanākkamena ca sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1298_5: dutiyāditā vuttāti sotāpannassa paṭhamatā avuttasiddhāti na coditā. Phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva
tika-s0201t:1298_6: adhippetā samitapāpasamaṇaggahaṇato. Kasmā panettha mahāparinibbāne viya maggaṭṭhā
tika-s0201t:1298_7: tadatthāya paṭipannā ca na gahitāti? Veneyyajjhāsayato. Tattha hi maggādhigamatthāya
tika-s0201t:1298_8: vipassanāpi ito bahiddhā natthi, kuto maggaphalānīti dassentena bhagavatā “ñāyassa
tika-s0201t:1298_9: dhammassa padesavattī, ito bahiddhā samaṇopi natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Idha pana niṭṭhānappattameva
tika-s0201t:1298_10: taṃtaṃsamaṇabhāvaṃ gaṇhantena phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva gahitā “maggaṭṭhato phalaṭṭho savisesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1298_11: dakkhiṇeyyo”ti. Svāyamattho dvīsu suttesu desanābhedeneva viññāyatīti.
tika-s0201t:1299_0: Rittāti vivittā. Tucchāti nissārā paṭipannakasārābhāvato. Pavadanti etehīti pavādā,
tika-s0201t:1299_1: diṭṭhigatikānaṃ nānādiṭṭhidīpakā samayāti āha “cattāro sassatavādā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-s0201t:1299_2: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āgamissati. Teti yathāvuttasamaṇā. Etthāti “parappavādā”ti
tika-s0201t:1300_0: Yanti yasmiṃ. Bhummatthe hi idaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. Ñāyo vuccati saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo.
tika-s0201t:1300_1: Tena hi nibbānaṃ ñāyati gammati paṭivijjhatīti. So eva nibbānasampāpakahetutāya dhammoti
tika-s0201t:1301_0: Tesaṃ parappavādasāsanānaṃ akhettatā khettatā ca ariyamaggassa abhāvabhāvā suparisuddhassa
tika-s0201t:1301_1: sīlassa suparisuddhāya samathavipassanāya abhāvato sāvato ca. Tadubhayañca durakkhātasvākkhātabhāvahetukaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1302_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pariyāyato ca pāḷiyā ca samatthetuṃ “tenāha bhagavā”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1302_1: pāḷiṃ dassetvā upamāpadesena tattha suttaṃ vibhāvento “yasmā”tiādimāha. Tattha yasmā
tika-s0201t:1302_2: ekaccānaṃ visesato sīhānaṃ purimaṃ pādadvayaṃ hatthakiccampi karoti, tasmā āha “surattahatthapādo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1302_3: Sīhassa kesā nāma kesarāyatanā khandhalomā. Gocariyahatthikulaṃ nāma pakatihatthikulaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1302_4: yaṃ “kālāvaka”ntipi vuccati. Ghoṭako nāma assakhaḷuṅko. Sineruparibhaṇḍe simbalirukkhehi
tika-s0201t:1302_5: sañchādito paññāsayojano daho simbalidaho, taṃ parivāretvā mahantaṃ simbalivanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1302_6: taṃ sandhāyāha “simbalidahavane”ti. Aññatitthāvāsabhūmiyaṃ imesu samaṇesu ekacco
tika-s0201t:1302_7: na uppajjati, īdiso panettha vikappo natthi, sabbena sabbaṃ na uppajjantevāti dassento
tika-s0201t:1302_9: sāsanikānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ariyamaggo dibbati, tadāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1303_0: Sammāti suṭṭhu. Suṭṭhu nadanaṃ nāma hetuyuttaṃ suṭṭhu katvā kathananti āha “hetunā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1303_1: So ca hetu aviparīto eva icchitabboti āha “nayenā”ti, ñāyenāti attho. Evaṃbhūto ca
tika-s0201t:1303_2: so yathādhippetatthaṃ karoti sādhetīti dassento āha “kāraṇenā”ti. Yadi tiracchānasīhassa
tika-s0201t:1303_3: nādo sabbatiracchānaekaccamanussāmanussanādato seṭṭhattā seṭṭhanādo, kimaṅgaṃ pana
tika-s0201t:1303_4: tathāgatasīhanādoti āha “sīhanādanti seṭṭhanāda”nti. Yadi tiracchānasīhanādassa seṭṭhanādatā
tika-s0201t:1303_5: nibbhayatāya appaṭisattutāya icchitā, tathāgatasīhanādasseva ayamattho sātisayoti
tika-s0201t:1303_6: āha “abhītanādaṃ appaṭināda”nti. Idānissa seṭṭhanādabhāvaṃ kāraṇena paṭipādento “imesañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1303_7: Tena “sammā”ti vuttamatthaṃ samattheti. Tattha atthitāyāti iminā sīhanādassa uttamatthataṃ
tika-s0201t:1303_8: dasseti. Bhūtaṭṭho hi uttamaṭṭho. Tāya eva bhūtaṭṭhatāya abhītanādatāti dassento
tika-s0201t:1303_9: “ime samaṇā…pe… nāma hotī”ti āha. Abhūtañhi vadato kutoci bhayaṃ vā āsaṅkā vā siyāti
tika-s0201t:1303_10: “idhevā”ti niyamassa aviparītataṃ dassento “amhākampi…pe… appaṭinādo nāma hotī”ti
tika-s0201t:1303_11: āha. Yañhi aññatthāpi atthi, taṃ idhevāti avadhāretuṃ na yuttanti.
tika-s0201t:1304_0: 140. Khoti avadhāraṇe. Tena vijjati evāti dasseti. Yanti karaṇatthe paccattanti āha
tika-s0201t:1304_1: “yena kāraṇenā”ti. Titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo tabbinimuttassa kassaci diṭṭhivipphanditassa
tika-s0201t:1304_2: abhāvato. Pāragamanasaṅkhātaṃ taraṇaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ tattha tattheva aparāparaṃ
tika-s0201t:1304_3: ummujjananimujjanavasena pilavananti āha “taranti uppalavantī”ti. Uppādetāti pūraṇādiko.
tika-s0201t:1304_4: Titthe jātāti titthiyā, yathāvuttaṃ vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti
tika-s0201t:1304_5: titthikā, titthikā eva titthiyā. Assasanti ettha, etenāti vā assāso, avassayo.
tika-s0201t:1305_1: vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato satthubhāvena adhigato supākaṭo
tika-s0201t:1305_2: ca, taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya atthabhāvena dassento “yo so…pe…
tika-s0201t:1305_3: abhisambuddho”ti āha. Satipi ñāṇadassanasaddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena
tika-s0201t:1305_4: visesena nesaṃ savisaye visesappavattidassanatthaṃ asādhāraṇavisesavasena vijjāttayavasena
tika-s0201t:1305_6: ca te yojetvā dassento “tesaṃ tesa”ntiādimāha. Tattha āsayānusayaṃ jānatā āsayānusayañāṇena,
tika-s0201t:1305_7: sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ passatā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇehi. Pubbenivāsādīhīti pubbenivāsaāsavakkhayañāṇehi.
tika-s0201t:1305_9: rūpakāyo atikkammeva devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ vattatīti āha “sabbasattānaṃ…pe… passatā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1305_10: Paṭivedhapaññāyāti maggapaññāya. Tāya hi sabbaso ñeyyadhammesu sammohassa vidhamitattā
tika-s0201t:1305_11: pacchā pavattajānanaṃ tassa jānanaṃ viya vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1306_0: Arīnanti kilesārīnaṃ, pañcavidhamārānaṃ vā sāsanapaccatthikānaṃ vā aññatitthiyānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1306_1: tesaṃ hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ ajjhupekkhanaṃ vā. Kesivinayasuttañcettha
tika-s0201t:1306_2: nidassanaṃ. Tathā ca ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni vā jānatā, yathākammupage satte passatā, savāsanānamāsavānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1306_3: khīṇattā arahatā, abhiññeyyādibhede dhamme abhiññeyyādito aviparītāvabodhena sammāsambuddhena.
tika-s0201t:1306_4: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā, kāyakammādīnaṃ ñāṇānuparivattanena
tika-s0201t:1306_5: nisammakāritāya passatā, ravādīnampi abhāvasādhikāya pahānasampadāya arahatā, chandādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1306_7: yojanā veditabbā. Yeti caturo dhamme. Attanīti amhesu. Na rājarājamahāmattādīsu upatthambhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1307_0: Uppannapasādoti aveccappasādaṃ vadati. Vakkhati hi “cattāri sotāpannassa aṅgāni kathitānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1307_1: Kāmaṃ asekkhāpi asekkhāya samasikkhatāya sahadhammikā eva, ciṇṇabrahmacariyatāya
tika-s0201t:1307_2: pana sahadhammaṃ carantīti na vattabbāti asekkhavāro na gahito. Sabbepeteti ete yathāvuttā
tika-s0201t:1307_3: bhikkhuādayo sotāpannādayo ca puthujjanā ariyā cāti sabbepi ete taṃtaṃsikkhāhi samānadhammattā
tika-s0201t:1307_6: “nava maggaṅgāni, aṭṭha bojjhaṅgānī”tiādinā vivādo natthi. Ekadhammacāritāyāti samānadhammacāritāya.
tika-s0201t:1307_7: Na hi paṭividdhasaccānaṃ “mayā dhammo sudiṭṭho, tayā duddiṭṭho”tiādinā vivādo atthi.
tika-s0201t:1307_8: Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṅghātā hi te uttamapurisā. Imināti “sahadhammikā kho panā”tiādivacanena.
tika-s0201t:1307_9: Tattha piyamanāpaggahaṇena sīlesu paripūrakāritāpadesena ekadesena gahitaṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ
tika-s0201t:1307_10: paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dasseti. Ye hi sampannasīlā suvisuddhadassanā, te viññūnaṃ piyā
tika-s0201t:1307_11: manāpāti. Ettāvatāti “atthi kho no āvuso”tiādinayappavattena ratanattayapasādajotanena
tika-s0201t:1308_0: 141. Satthari pasādoti pasādaggahaṇena “bhagavatā”tiādinā vā pasādanīyā dhammā gahitā.
tika-s0201t:1308_1: Tena buddhasubuddhataṃ dasseti, tathā “dhamme pasādo”ti iminā dhammasudhammataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1308_2: itarena saṅghasuppaṭipannataṃ. Yena cittena aññattha anupalabbhamānena sāsaneyeva
tika-s0201t:1308_3: samaṇo ito bahiddhā natthīti ayamattho, sammadeva, patiṭṭhāpitoti veditabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:1308_4: yojanā – yasmā sammāsambuddho amhākaṃ satthā, tasmā atthi kho no, āvuso, satthari
tika-s0201t:1308_5: pasādo, sammāsambuddhattā cassa svākhāto dhammoti atthi dhamme pasādo, tato eva ca
tika-s0201t:1308_6: atthi sīlesu paripūrakāritāti sahadhammikā…pe… pabbajitā cāti evamettha satthari
tika-s0201t:1308_7: pasādena dhamme pasādo, tena saṅghasuppaṭipattīti ayañca nayo lesenapi parappavādesu
tika-s0201t:1309_0: Paṭividdhasaccānaṃ pahīnānurodhānaṃ gehassitapemassa asambhavo evāti “idānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1309_1: Yadi evaṃ “upajjhāyena, bhikkhave, saddhivihārikamhi puttapemaṃ upaṭṭhapetabbaṃ”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1309_2: kathanti? Nayidaṃ gehassitapemaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃsadisattā pana pemamukhena vutto
tika-s0201t:1309_3: mettāsneho. Na hi bhagavā bhikkhū saṃkilese niyojeti. Evarūpaṃ pemaṃ sandhāyāti pasādāvahaguṇāvahato
tika-s0201t:1309_4: pūraṇādīsu bhatti pasādo na hoti, pasādapatirūpakā pana lobhapavattīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1309_5: Theroti mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero. Yena aṭṭhakathā potthakaṃ āropitā. Ekova satthā
tika-s0201t:1309_6: anaññasādhāraṇaguṇattā, aññathā anacchariyattā satthulakkhaṇameva na paripūreyya.
tika-s0201t:1309_7: Visuṃ katvāti aññehi vivecetvā attano āveṇikaṃ katvā. “Amhākaṃ satthā”ti byāvadantānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1309_8: aññesaṃ satthā na hotīti atthato āpannameva hoti, tathā ca padesavattiniṃ tassa satthutaṃ
tika-s0201t:1309_9: paṭijānantā paripuṇṇalakkhaṇasatthutaṃ icchantānampi tato viruddhā satthubhāvapariyesanena
tika-s0201t:1309_11: ajasīla…pe… kukkurasīlādīsūti idaṃ yebhuyyena aññatitthiyānaṃ tādisaṃ vatasamādānasabbhāvato
tika-s0201t:1309_12: vuttaṃ, ādi-saddena yamaniyamacātuyāmasaṃvarādīnaṃ saṅgahoti. Adhippayāsoti adhikaṃ
tika-s0201t:1309_13: payasati payujjati etenāti adhippayāso, savisesaṃ adhikattabbakiriyā. Tenāha “adhikappayogo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1310_0: Tassa pasādassa pariyosānabhūtāti tassa satthari dhamme ca pasādassa niṭṭhānabhūtā.
tika-s0201t:1310_1: Niṭṭhāti mokkho. Samayavādīnañhi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye tadupadesake ca pasādo yāvadeva
tika-s0201t:1310_2: mokkhādhigamanaṭṭho. Diṭṭhigatikā tathā tathā attano laddhivasena niṭṭhaṃ parikappenti
tika-s0201t:1310_3: yevāti āha “niṭṭhaṃ apaññapento nāma natthī”ti. Brāhmaṇānanti brāhmaṇavādīnaṃ. Tesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1310_4: ekacce brahmunā salokatā niṭṭhāti vadanti, ekacce tassa samīpatā, ekacce tena saṃyogo
tika-s0201t:1310_5: niṭṭhāti vadanti. Tattha ye salokatāvādino samīpatāvādino ca, te dvedhāvādino, itare
tika-s0201t:1310_6: advedhāvādino. Sabbepi te atthato brahmalokupapattiyaṃyeva niṭṭhāsaññino. Tattha
tika-s0201t:1310_7: hi nesaṃ niccābhiniveso yathā taṃ bakassa brahmuno. Tena vuttaṃ “brahmaloko niṭṭhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1310_9: viya paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ ābhassaresu eko sabbaseṭṭho natthīti “ābhassarā”ti puthuvacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1310_10: Paribbājakānanti sañcayādiparibbājakānaṃ. Anto ca mano ca etassa natthīti anantamānaso.
tika-s0201t:1310_11: Ājīvakānañhi sabbadābhāvato ananto, sukhadukkhādisamatikkamanato amānaso. Iminā aṭṭhahi
tika-s0201t:1311_0: Papañce yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Taṇhādiṭṭhiyova adhippetā mamaṅkāraahaṅkāravigamassa
tika-s0201t:1311_1: adhippetattā. Yathā pañcasu ṭhānesu ekova kileso lobho āgato, evaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu
tika-s0201t:1311_2: tayo kilesā āgatā “doso moho diṭṭhī”ti. “Sadosassā”ti hi vuttaṭṭhāne paṭighaṃ akusalamūlaṃ
tika-s0201t:1311_4: malyaṃ, asampajaññaṃ vā, “saupādānassā”ti “natthi dinna”ntiādinā nayena gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1312_0: Ākāratoti pavattiākārato. Padantarena rāgavisesassa vuccamānattāādito vuttaṃ sarāgavacanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1312_2: “Anuruddhapaṭiviruddhassā”ti ekapadavasena pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā ekajjhaṃ paduddhāro kato.
tika-s0201t:1312_3: Tattha pana “anuruddhassā”ti subhavasenāti evamattho vattabbo. Na hi paṭivirujjhanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1312_5: saṃsārassa papañcanaṃ papañco, tassa uppattihetubhāvadassanavasena. Taṇhā hi bhavuppattiyā
tika-s0201t:1312_6: visesapaccayo. Taṇhāpaccayā upādānadassanavasenāti taṇhāpaccayassa upādānassa dassanavasena,
tika-s0201t:1312_7: yadavatthā taṇhā upādānassa paccayo, tadavatthādassanavasena. Phalena hi hetuvisesakittanametanti.
tika-s0201t:1312_8: Evaṃ viddhaṃsethāti kāmarāgabhavataṇhādivasena lobhaṃ kasmā evaṃ vippakiretha. Taṇhākaraṇavasenāti
tika-s0201t:1312_9: taṇhāyanakaraṇavasena subhākāraggahaṇavasena. Subhanti hi ārammaṇe pavatto rāgo “subha”nti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1313_0: 142. Vadanti etenāti vādo, diṭṭhivādo. Diṭṭhivasena hi “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0201t:1313_1: asassato attā ca loko cā”ti ca diṭṭhigatikā paññapenti. Tenāha “dvemā, bhikkhave,
tika-s0201t:1313_2: diṭṭhiyo”ti. Taṇhārahitāya diṭṭhiyā abhāvato taṇhāvaseneva ca attano sassatabhāvābhinivesoti
tika-s0201t:1313_3: katvā vuttaṃ “taṇhādiṭṭhivasenā”ti. Allīnāti nissitā. Upagatāti avissajjanavasena
tika-s0201t:1313_4: ekibhāvamiva gatā. Ajjhositāti tāya diṭṭhiyā gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpitā viya tadantogadhā.
tika-s0201t:1313_5: Tenāha “anupaviṭṭhā”ti. Yathā gahaṭṭhānaṃ kāmajjhosānaṃ vivādamūlaṃ, evaṃ pabbajitānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1313_6: diṭṭhajjhosānanti āha “vibhavadiṭṭhiyā te paṭiviruddhā”ti. Diṭṭhivirodhena hi diṭṭhigatikavirodho.
tika-s0201t:1314_1: cettha yathā diṭṭhīnaṃ paṭiccasamuppannatā vibhāvitā, evaṃ diṭṭhivatthunopīti ubhayesampi
tika-s0201t:1314_2: aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā ca vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yāni paṭisambhidānayena “paccayasamudayo
tika-s0201t:1314_3: aṭṭha ṭhānānī”ti vuttāni, tāni dassento “khandhāpī”tiādimāha. Tattha khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1314_5: upanissayādivasena paccayabhāvato. Yathāha – “assutavā, bhikkhave, puthujjano ariyānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1314_6: adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido”tiādi. Phassopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā cāha “tadapi
tika-s0201t:1314_7: phassapaccayā, phussa phussa paṭisaṃvediyantī”ti ca. Saññāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0201t:1314_8: “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhāti, pathaviṃ pathavito saññatvā”ti ca ādi. Vitakkopi
tika-s0201t:1314_9: diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ “takkañca diṭṭhīsu pakappayitvā, saccaṃ musāti dvayadhammamāhū”ti
tika-s0201t:1314_10: “takkī hoti vīmaṃsī”ti ca ādi. Ayonisomanasikāropi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. Yathāha bhagavā
tika-s0201t:1314_11: “tasseva ayoniso manasikaroto channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati, atthi
tika-s0201t:1314_12: me attāti assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjatī”tiādi. Samuṭṭhāti etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1314_13: tassa bhāvo samuṭṭhānaṭṭho, tena. Khaṇikatthaṅgamo khaṇikanirodho. Paccayatthaṅgamo
tika-s0201t:1314_14: avijjādīnaṃ accantanirodho. So pana yena hoti, taṃ dassento “sotāpattimaggo”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1314_15: Cattāro hi ariyamaggā yathārahaṃ tassa tassa saṅkhāragatassa accantanirodhahetu,
tika-s0201t:1315_0: Ānisaṃsanti udayaṃ. So pana diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikavasena duvidho. Tattha samparāyiko
tika-s0201t:1315_3: Sotiādīnavo. Ādīnanti ādi-saddena naggiyānasanasaṅkaṭivatādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Nissarati
tika-s0201t:1315_4: etenāti nissaraṇanti vuccamāne dassanamaggo eva diṭṭhīnaṃ nissaraṇaṃ siyā, tassa
tika-s0201t:1315_5: pana atthaṅgamapariyāyena gahitattā sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ diṭṭhīhipi nissaṭanti
tika-s0201t:1315_6: katvā vuttaṃ “diṭṭhīnaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma nibbāna”nti. Iminātiādīsu vattabbaṃ anuyogavatte vuttanayameva.
tika-s0201t:1316: 143. Diṭṭhicchedanaṃ dassentoti sabbupādānapariññādassanena sabbaso diṭṭhīnaṃ samucchedavidhiṃ dassento. Vuttāyevāti –
tika-s0201t:1319_0: Gāthaṃ uddisitvā atthavibhāgādivasena vuttāyeva. Kāmaṃ ito bāhirakānaṃ “imāni upādānāni
tika-s0201t:1319_1: ettakāni cattāri, na ito bhiyyo”ti īdisaṃ ñāṇaṃ natthi, kevalaṃ pana keci “kāmā pahātabbā”ti
tika-s0201t:1319_2: vadanti, keci “natthi paro lokoti ca, micchā”ti vadanti, apare “sīlabbatena suddhīti
tika-s0201t:1319_3: ca, micchā”ti vadanti, attadiṭṭhiyā pana micchābhāvaṃ sabbaso na jānanti eva. Yattakaṃ
tika-s0201t:1319_4: pana jānanti, tassapi accantappahānaṃ na jānanti, tathāpi sabbassa pariññeyyassa
tika-s0201t:1319_5: pariññeyyaṃ paññapemaicceva tiṭṭhanti. Evaṃbhūtānaṃ pana nesaṃ tattha yādisī paṭipatti,
tika-s0201t:1319_6: taṃ dassento satthā “santi, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tattha santīti saṃvijjanti. Tena
tika-s0201t:1319_7: tesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vijjamānatāya avicchedataṃ dasseti. Eketi ekacce. Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti
tika-s0201t:1319_8: pabbajjupagamanena samaṇā, jātimattena ca brāhmaṇā. Sabbesanti anavasesānaṃ upādānānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1319_9: samatikkamaṃ pahānaṃ. Sammā na paññapentīti yesaṃ paññapenti, tesampi sammā pariññaṃ
tika-s0201t:1319_10: na paññapenti. Idāni taṃ atthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “kecī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hotika-kuṭīcaka-bahūdaka-haṃsa-paramahaṃsa-kājaka-tidaṇḍa-monavata-seva-pārupaka-pañcamarattika-
tika-s0201t:1319_14: sassatavādādayo channavuti taṇhāpāsena ḍaṃsanato, ariyadhammassa vā vibādhanato pāsaṇḍā.
tika-s0201t:1319_15: Vatthupaṭisevanaṃ kāmanti byāpārassa vatthuno paṭisevanasaṅkhātaṃ kāmaṃ. Theyyena
tika-s0201t:1319_16: sevantīti paṭihatthaādisamaññāya lokassa vacanavasena sevanti. Tīṇi kāraṇānīti “natthi
tika-s0201t:1320: Atthasallāpikāti atthassa sallāpikā, dvinnaṃ adhippetatthasallāpavibhāvinīti adhippāyo. Dvinnañhi vacanaṃ sallāpo. Tenāha “pathavī kirā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1321_0: Yo titthiyānaṃ attano satthari dhamme sahadhammikesu ca pasādo vutto, tassa anāyatanagatattā
tika-s0201t:1321_1: appasādakabhāvadassanaṃ pasādapacchedo. Tathāpavatto vādo pasādapacchedavādo vutto.
tika-s0201t:1321_2: Evarūpeti īdise vuttanayena kilesānaṃ anupasamasaṃvattanike. Dhammeti dhammapatirūpake.
tika-s0201t:1321_3: Vinayeti vinayapatirūpake. Titthiyā hi kohaññe ṭhatvā lokaṃ vañcentā dhammaṃ kathemāti
tika-s0201t:1321_4: “sattime kāyā akaṭā akaṭavidhā”tiādinā yaṃ kiñci kathetvā tathā “vinayaṃ paññapemā”ti
tika-s0201t:1321_5: gosīlavaggulivatādīni paññapetvā tādisaṃ sāvake sikkhāpetvā “dhammavinayo”ti kathenti,
tika-s0201t:1321_6: taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “dhammavinaye”ti. Tenāha “ubhayenapi aniyyānikaṃ sāsanaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1321_7: Parittampi nāma puññaṃ kātukāmaṃ maccheramalābhibhūtatāya nivārentassa antarāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:1321_8: tassa karoto diṭṭheva dhamme viññūhi garahitabbatā samparāye ca duggati pāṭikaṅkhā,
tika-s0201t:1321_9: kimaṅgaṃ pana sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāvahe jinacakke pahāradāyino titthakarassa
tika-s0201t:1321_10: tadovādakarassa cāti imamatthaṃ dassento “aniyyānikasāsanamhi hī”tiādimāha. Yathā
tika-s0201t:1321_11: so pasādo samparāye na sammaggato attano pavattivasenāti dassento “kañci kālaṃ gantvāpi
tika-s0201t:1321_12: pacchā vinassati yevā”ti āha, aveccappasādo viya accantiko na hotīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1322_0: Sampajjamānā yathāvidhipaṭipattiyā tiracchānayoniṃ āvahati. Kammasarikkhakena hi
tika-s0201t:1322_1: vipākeneva bhavitabbaṃ. Sabbampi kāraṇabhedanti sabbampi yathāvuttaṃ titthakarānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1322_2: sāvakānaṃ apāyadukkhāvahaṃ micchāpaṭipattisaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇavisesaṃ. So panesa pasādo
tika-s0201t:1322_3: na niyyāti micchattapakkhikattā surāpītasiṅgāle pasādo viya. Suraṃ parissāvetvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ
tika-s0201t:1322_4: surājallikaṃ. Brāhmaṇā nāma dhanaluddhāti adhippāyenāha “imaṃ vañcessāmī”ti. Kaṃsasatāti kahāpaṇasatā.
tika-s0201t:1323_0: 144. Tassāti pasādassa. Sabbopi lobho kāmupādānanteva vuccatīti āha “arahattamaggena
tika-s0201t:1323_1: kāmupādānassa pahānapariñña”nti. Evarūpeti īdise sabbaso kilesānaṃ upasamasaṃvattanike.
tika-s0201t:1323_2: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānānaṃ apāyesu apatanavasena dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhamme. Sabbaso
tika-s0201t:1324_0: Namassamāno aṭṭhāsi dve asaṅkhyeyyāni paccekabodhipāramīnaṃ pūraṇena tattha buddhasāsane
tika-s0201t:1324_1: paricayena ca bhagavati pasannacittatāya ca. “Ulūkā”tyādigāthā rukkhadevatāya bhāsitā.
tika-s0201t:1324_2: Kāluṭṭhitanti sāyanhakāle divāvihārato uṭṭhitaṃ. Duggateso na gacchatīti duggatiṃ
tika-s0201t:1324_3: eso na gamissati. Morajiko murajavādako. Mahābherivādakavatthuādīnipi sitapātukaraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1325_0: Paramattheti lokuttaradhamme. Kiṃ pana vattabbanti dhammepi paramatthe nimittaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0201t:1325_1: suṇantānaṃ. Sāmaṇeravatthūti pabbajitadivaseyeva sappena daṭṭho hutvā kālaṃ katvā
tika-s0201t:1326_0: Khīrodananti khīrena saddhiṃ sammissaṃ odanaṃ. Timbarusakanti tindukaphalaṃ. Tipusasadisā
tika-s0201t:1326_1: ekā vallijāti timbarusaṃ, tassa phalaṃ timbarusakanti ca vadanti. Kakkārikanti khuddakaelāḷukaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1326_2: Mahātipusanti ca vadanti. Vallipakkanti khuddakatipusavalliyā phalaṃ. Hatthapatāpakanti
tika-s0201t:1326_3: mandāmukhi. Ambakañjikanti ambilakañjikaṃ. Khaḷayāguntipi vadanti. Doṇinimmajjaninti
tika-s0201t:1326_4: satelaṃ tilapiññākaṃ. Vidhupananti caturassabījaniṃ. Tālavaṇṭanti tālapattehi katamaṇḍalabījaniṃ.
tika-s0201t:1327_0: Vuttanayānusārenevāti yasmā idhāpi yathāvuttaṃ sabbampi kāraṇabhedaṃ ekato katvā
tika-s0201t:1327_1: dassento satthā “taṃ kissa hetū”ntiādimāha, tasmā tattha aniyyānikasāsane vuttanayassa
tika-s0201t:1328_0: 145. Pariññanti pahānapariññaṃ. Tesaṃ paccayaṃ dassetunti upādānānaṃ pariññā nāma
tika-s0201t:1328_1: pahānapariññā. Tesaṃ accantanirodho adhippeto, so ca paccayanirodhena hotīti tesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1328_2: paccayaṃ mūlakāraṇato pabhuti dassetuṃ. Ayanti idāni vuccamāno ettha “ime cā”tiādipāṭhe
tika-s0201t:1328_4: padesu. Iminā eva ca sabbaggahaṇena “phassanidānā”tiādīnampi padānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1328_5: Ime aññatitthiyā upādānānampi samudayaṃ na jānanti, kuto nirodhaṃ, tathāgato pana
tika-s0201t:1328_6: tesaṃ tappaccayapaccayānampi samudayañca atthaṅgamañca yāthāvato jānāti, tasmā –
tika-s0201t:1328_7: “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti yathāraddhasīhanādaṃ
tika-s0201t:1328_8: matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassento “ime ca, bhikkhave, cattāro upādānā”tiādinā nayena desanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1328_9: paṭiccasamuppādamukhena otārento vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā “yato ca kho”tiādinā vivaṭṭaṃ dassento
tika-s0201t:1328_10: arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi, tamatthaṃ dassento “yasmā pana bhagavā”tiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0201t:1332_0: 146. Aparāparanti punappunaṃ. Visālībhūtatāyāti gāvutantaraṃ gāvutantaraṃ puthubhūtatāya.
tika-s0201t:1332_1: Tatrāti tassaṃ visālībhūtatāyaṃ. Chaḍḍitamatteti vissaṭṭhamatte. Ūmibhayādīhīti ūmikumbhīlaāvaṭṭasaṃsukābhayehi.
tika-s0201t:1332_2: Udakappavāhenāgatassapi ca usmā na vigacchati, usmā ca nāma īdisassa saviññāṇakatāya
tika-s0201t:1332_3: bhaveyyāti “siyā gabbho”ti cintesi. Tathā hītiādi tattha kāraṇacintā. Puññavantatāya
tika-s0201t:1332_4: duggandhaṃ nāhosi, sausumatāya pūtikabhāvo. Dārakānaṃ puññūpanissayato aṅguṭṭhakato
tika-s0201t:1332_5: cassa khīraṃ nibbatti, khīrabhattañca labhi. Carimakabhave bodhisatte kucchigate
tika-s0201t:1332_6: bodhisattamātu viya udaracchaviyā acchavippasannatāya nicchavi viyāti katvā āha “nicchavī
tika-s0201t:1332_7: ahesu”nti. Tesanti dvinnaṃ dārakānaṃ. Mātāpitaroti posakamātāpitaro. Abhisiñcitvā
tika-s0201t:1332_8: rājānaṃ akaṃsu rajjasampattiyā dāyakassa kammassa katattā, asambhinne eva rājakule
tika-s0201t:1332_9: uppannattā ca. Kumārassa puññānubhāvasañcoditā devatādhiggahitāti keci.
tika-s0201t:1333_0: Purassa apareti purassa aparadisāya gāvutamatte ṭhāne jīvakambavanaṃ viya sapākāramandirake.
tika-s0201t:1333_1: Acirapakkantoti ettha na desantarapakkamanaṃ adhippetaṃ, atha kho sāsanato apakkamananti
tika-s0201t:1333_3: janasamūheti attho. Janasamūhagato pana “parisamajjhe”ti vutto. Bhāvanāmanasikārena
tika-s0201t:1333_4: vinā pakatiyāva manussehi nibbattetabbo dhammoti manussadhammo, manussattabhāvāvaho
tika-s0201t:1333_5: vā dhammo manussadhammo, anuḷāraṃ parittakusalaṃ. Yaṃ asatipi buddhuppāde vattati,
tika-s0201t:1333_6: yañca sandhāyāha “hīnena brahmacariyena, khattiye upapajjatī”ti. “Amhākaṃ buddho”ti
tika-s0201t:1333_7: buddhe mamattakārino buddhamāmakā. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:1335_0: Alaṃ ariyāya ariyabhāvāyāti alamariyo, rūpāyatanaṃ jānāti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya passati
tika-s0201t:1335_1: cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ, dibbacakkhu. Sammasanupage ca pana dhamme lakkhaṇattayañca tathā
tika-s0201t:1335_2: jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ, vipassanā. Nibbānaṃ, cattāri vā saccāni asammohapaṭivedhato
tika-s0201t:1335_3: jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ, maggo. Phalaṃ pana nibbānavaseneva yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1335_4: Paccavekkhaṇā maggādhigatassa atthassa paccakkhato jānanaṭṭhena ñāṇadassanaṃ, sabbaññutā
tika-s0201t:1335_5: anāvaraṇatāya samantacakkhutāya ca ñāṇadassanaṃ. Lokuttaramaggo adhippeto, tasmiñhi
tika-s0201t:1335_6: paṭisiddhe sabbesampi buddhaguṇānaṃ asambhavoti adhippāyo. Tenāha “tañhi so bhagavato paṭisedhetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1336_0: Sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ nāma jhānavipassanādikaṃ ācariyānuggahena gahitaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-s0201t:1336_2: vitakkanamattena parito āhataṃ parivattitaṃ katvā. Tenāha “takketvā”tiādi. Lokiyapaññaṃ
tika-s0201t:1336_3: anujānāti upanisinnaparisāya anukūladhammakathanatoti adhippāyo. Tenāha “samaṇo gotamo”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1336_4: Paṭibhātīti paṭibhānaṃ, “iti vakkhāmī”ti evaṃpavattaṃ kathanacittaṃ, tato paṭibhānato
tika-s0201t:1336_5: jānanaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, āgamābhāvato sayameva upaṭṭhitattā sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ. Tenāha “imināssa
tika-s0201t:1336_6: dhammesu paccakkhabhāvaṃ paṭibāhatī”ti. Suphusitanti nibbivaraṃ. Aphusitatte hi sukhena
tika-s0201t:1336_7: vacīghoso na niccharati. Dantāvaraṇanti oṭṭhadvayaṃ. Jivhāpi thaddhatāya sukhena
tika-s0201t:1336_8: vacīghoso na niccharatīti āha “mudukā jivhā”ti. Karavīkarutamañjutāya madhuro saro.
tika-s0201t:1336_9: Elaṃ vuccati doso, elaṃ gaḷatīti elagaḷā, na elagaḷā anelagaḷā, niddosā, na rujjhatīti
tika-s0201t:1336_10: attho. Sabbametaṃ rañjanasseva kāraṇaṃ dassento vadati.
tika-s0201t:1337_1: sandhāyāha. Takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti ettha sammā-saddo ubhayatthāpi yojetabbo
tika-s0201t:1337_2: “sammā takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti. Yo hi sammā dhammaṃ paṭipajjati, tasseva
tika-s0201t:1337_3: sammā dukkhakkhayo hoti. Yo pana vuttanayena takkaro, tassa niyyānaṃ atthato dhammasseva
tika-s0201t:1338_0: 147. Kodhanoti kujjhanasīlo. Yasmā pana sunakkhatto kodhavasena kurūro pharusavacano
tika-s0201t:1338_1: ca, tasmā āha “kodhanoti caṇḍo pharuso cā”ti. Tasmiṃ attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo
tika-s0201t:1338_2: natthīti tasmiṃ attabhāve uppajjanārahānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi. Taṃ buddhā
tika-s0201t:1338_3: “moghapuriso”ti vadanti yathā taṃ sudinnalāḷudāyiādike. Upanissaye satipi tasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:1338_4: khaṇe magge vā phale vā asati “moghapuriso”ti vadanti yathā taṃ dhaniyūpasenattherādike.
tika-s0201t:1338_5: Samucchinnopanissaye pana vattabbameva natthi. Yathā “makkhali moghapuriso manussakhippaṃ
tika-s0201t:1338_6: maññe”ti tathā sunakkhattopīti āha “imassa panā”tiādi. Assāti etena. Kattari hidaṃ
tika-s0201t:1339_0: Bhagavatoti sampadānavacanaṃ kuddhapadāpekkhāya. Pubbeti bhikkhukāle. Saddaṃ sotukāmoti
tika-s0201t:1339_1: so kira dibbacakkhunā tāvatiṃsabhavane devatānaṃ rūpaṃ passanto oṭṭhacalanaṃ passati,
tika-s0201t:1339_2: na pana saddaṃ suṇāti, tasmā tāsaṃ saddaṃ sotukāmo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ “saddaṃ sotukāmo…pe…
tika-s0201t:1339_3: pucchī”ti. So ca atīte ekaṃ sīlavantaṃ bhikkhuṃ kaṇṇasakkhaliyaṃ paharitvā badhiramakāsi,
tika-s0201t:1339_4: tasmā parikammaṃ karontopi abhabbova dibbasotādhigamāya. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “upanissayo
tika-s0201t:1339_5: natthīti ñatvā parikammaṃ na kathesī”ti. Cintesīti attano micchāparivitakkitena ayoniso ummujjanto cintesi.
tika-s0201t:1340_1: vā ariyamaggo bodhetabbo etassa atthīti niyyāniko desanādhammo. Attani atthitaṃ dasseti
tika-s0201t:1340_2: kiccasiddhidassanena tattha tattha pākaṭīkatattā, na paṭiññāmattena. Tathā hi yathāparādhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1340_4: devamanussehi yathābhisaṅkhatapañhānaṃ tadajjhāsayānukūlaṃ ṭhānaso vissajjanena ca
tika-s0201t:1340_5: bhagavato sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacārabhāvena sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viññūnaṃ pākaṭaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1340_6: tathā tattha tattha yamakapāṭihāriyakaraṇādīsu iddhividhañāṇādīnīti. Tenāha “mayhañcā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1340_7: Anveti yathāgahitasaṅketassa anugamanavasena eti jānātīti anvayo. Tenāha “anubujjhatīti
tika-s0201t:1340_9: vuttanayameva. Evaṃ yojanā veditabbāti yathā sabbaññutaññāṇena yojanā katā, evaṃ
tika-s0201t:1343_0: 148. Yadipi ādito abhiññāttayavasena desanāya āgatattā cetopariyañāṇānantaraṃ upari
tika-s0201t:1343_1: tisso abhiññā vattabbā siyunti vattabbaṃ siyā, atthato pana vijjāttayaṃ yathāvuttaabhiññāttayamevāti
tika-s0201t:1343_2: katvā “tisso vijjā vattabbā siyu”nti vuttaṃ. Kasmā panettha “tāsu vuttāsu upari dasabalañāṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1343_3: na paripūratī”ti vuttaṃ, nanu imāni ñāṇāni sesābhiññā viya attano visayassa abhijānanaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1343_4: upādāya abhiññāsu vattabbāni, akampiyaṭṭhaṃ pana upatthambhanaṭṭhañca upādāya balañāṇesu
tika-s0201t:1343_5: yathā sammāsatiādayo indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgesūti? Nayidamevaṃ. Tattha hi dhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1343_6: dhammakiccavisesavibhāvanaparāya desanāya vuttaṃ, idha pana satthu guṇavisesavibhāvanaparāya
tika-s0201t:1343_7: desanāya tathā vattuṃ na sakkā atthato anaññattā, ekaccānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0201t:1343_8: uppajjeyya “kimidaṃ bhagavā heṭṭhā vuttaguṇe punapi gaṇhanto guṇādhikadassanaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1344_0: Aññehi asādhāraṇānīti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu cetāni sāvakānampi ekaccānaṃ uppajjantīti?
tika-s0201t:1344_1: Kāmaṃ uppajjanti, yādisāni pana buddhānaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇādīni, na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1344_2: kadācipi uppajjantīti aññehi asādhāraṇānīti. Tenāha “tathāgatasseva balānī”ti. Imameva
tika-s0201t:1344_3: hi yathāvuttalesaṃ apekkhitvā tadabhāvato āsayānusayañāṇādīsu eva asādhāraṇaguṇasamaññā
tika-s0201t:1344_4: niruḷhā. Kāmaṃ ñāṇabalānaṃ ñāṇasambhāro visesapaccayo, puññasambhāropi pana nesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1344_5: paccayo eva, ñāṇasambhārassapi vā puññasambhārabhāvato “puññussayasampattiyā āgatānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1345_1: balena pākatikā hatthijāti. Dasannaṃ purisānanti thāmamajjhimānaṃ dasannaṃ purisānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1345_2: Ekassa tathāgatassa kāyabalanti ānetvā sambandho. Ekassāti ca tathā heṭṭhākathāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:1345_3: āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ. Nārāyanasaṅghātabalanti ettha nārā vuccanti rasmiyo,
tika-s0201t:1345_4: tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ, tasmā nārāyanasaṅghātabalanti
tika-s0201t:1345_5: vajirasaṅghātabalanti attho. Ñāṇabalaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva, na kāyabalaṃ viya
tika-s0201t:1345_6: aṭṭhakathāruḷhamevāti adhippāyo. “Saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni sattasattati
tika-s0201t:1345_7: ñāṇānī”ti vuttaṃ, tattha pana nidānavagge sattasattati āgatāni catucattārīsañca,
tika-s0201t:1345_8: tesattati pana paṭisambhidāmagge sutamayādīni āgatāni dissanti, na saṃyuttake. Aññānipīti
tika-s0201t:1345_9: etena ñāṇavatthuvibhaṅge ekakādivasena vuttāni, aññattha ca “pubbante ñāṇa”ntiādinā
tika-s0201t:1345_10: brahmajālādīsu ca “tayidaṃ tathāgato pajānāti, imāni diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni evaṃ gahitānī”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1345_11: vuttāni anekāni ñāṇappabhedāni saṅgaṇhāti. Yāthāvapaṭivedhato sayañca akampiyaṃ puggalañca
tika-s0201t:1345_12: taṃsamaṅgiṃ neyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha “akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1346_0: Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ, seṭṭhaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Sabbaññutapaṭijānanavasena abhimukhaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0201t:1346_1: aṭṭha vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti āsabhā, pubbabuddhā. Idaṃ panāti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1346_2: sabbaññutameva vadati. Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1347_0: Aṭṭhasu parisāsūti “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, anekasataṃ khattiyaparisaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:1347_1: tatra vata maṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatīti nimittametaṃ, sāriputta, na samanupassāmī”ti
tika-s0201t:1347_2: vuttāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu. Abhītanādaṃ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena dasabalohanti
tika-s0201t:1348_2: vā vuttāti ādi-saddena tattha ca cakka-saddassa gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vicakkasaṇṭhānā
tika-s0201t:1348_3: asani eva asanivicakkaṃ. Uracakkādīsūti ādi-saddena āṇāsamūhādīsupi cakka-saddassa
tika-s0201t:1348_4: pavatti veditabbā. “Saṅghabhedaṃ karissāma cakkabheda”ntiādīsu hi āṇā “cakka”nti
tika-s0201t:1348_6: paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa
tika-s0201t:1348_7: kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti “aññātakoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe… phalakkhaṇe
tika-s0201t:1348_8: pavattaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva
tika-s0201t:1348_9: pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ pavattitacakkassa cakkavattino cakkaratanassa ṭhānaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:1349_0: “Tiṭṭhatī”ti vuttaṃ, kiṃ bhūmiyaṃ puriso viya? Noti āha “tadāyattavuttitāyā”ti. Ṭhānanti
tika-s0201t:1349_1: cettha attalābho dharamānatā ca, na gatinivattīti āha “uppajjati ceva pavattati cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1349_2: Yattha panetaṃ dasabalañāṇaṃ vitthāritaṃ, taṃ dassento “abhidhamme panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1350_0: Samādiyantīti samādānāni, tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:1350_1: Kammameva vā kammasamādānanti etena samādānasaddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagatasadde
tika-s0201t:1350_2: gatasaddassa viya. Gatīti nirayādigatiyo. Upadhīti attabhāvo. Kāloti kammassa vipaccanārahakālo.
tika-s0201t:1351_0: Agatigāmininti nibbānagāminiṃ. Vakkhati hi “nibbānañcāhaṃ, sāriputta, pajānāmi nibbānagāmiñca
tika-s0201t:1351_1: maggaṃ nibbānagāminiñca paṭipada”nti. Bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu
tika-s0201t:1351_2: kāmaṃ sabbesaṃ cetanā tassevekassa jīvitindriyārammaṇā, taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ nānākāraṃ.
tika-s0201t:1351_3: Tesu hi eko ādarena chandajāto karoti, eko “ehi tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito
tika-s0201t:1351_4: karoti, eko samānacchando viya hutvā appaṭibāhamāno vicarati. Tesu eko teneva kammena
tika-s0201t:1351_5: niraye nibbattati, eko tiracchānayoniyaṃ, eko pettivisaye. Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇe
tika-s0201t:1351_6: eva – “iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati, esa tiracchānayoniyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1351_7: esa pettivisaye”ti jānāti. Niraye nibbattamānampi – “esa mahāniraye nibbattissati,
tika-s0201t:1351_8: esa ussadaniraye”ti jānāti. Tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattamānampi – “esa apādako bhavissati,
tika-s0201t:1351_9: esa dvipādako, esa catuppado, esa bahuppado”ti jānāti. Pettivisaye nibbattamānampi
tika-s0201t:1351_10: – “esa nijjhāmataṇhiko bhavissati, esa khuppipāsiko, esa paradattūpajīvī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1351_11: Tesu ca kammesu – “idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhimākaḍḍhissati, idaṃ aññena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā
tika-s0201t:1352_0: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva,
tika-s0201t:1352_1: taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ nānākāraṃ. Tesu hi eko ādarena karotīti sesaṃ purimasadisaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1352_2: tasmā tesu keci devaloke nibbattanti, keci manussaloke, taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva
tika-s0201t:1352_3: jānāti – “iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa manussaloke nibbattissati, esa devaloke,
tika-s0201t:1352_4: tatthāpi esa khattiyakule, esa brāhmaṇakule, esa vessakule, esa suddakule, esa paranimmitavasavattīsu,
tika-s0201t:1352_5: esa nimmānaratīsu, esa tusitesu, esa yāmesu, esa tāvatiṃsesu, esa cātumahārājikesu,
tika-s0201t:1353_0: Tathā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentesuyeva – “iminā nīhārena esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-s0201t:1353_1: esa mahābhūtamattameva vavatthapessati, esa rūpapariggaheyeva ṭhassati, esa arūpapariggaheyeva,
tika-s0201t:1353_2: esa nāmarūpapariggaheyeva, esa paccayapariggahe eva, esa lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya
tika-s0201t:1353_3: eva, esa paṭhamaphaleyeva, esa dutiyaphale eva, esa tatiyaphale eva, esa arahattaṃ
tika-s0201t:1353_5: bhavissati, esa nimittaṃ uppādessati, esa appanaṃ eva pāpuṇissati, esa jhānaṃ pādakaṃ
tika-s0201t:1353_6: katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti jānāti. Tenāha “imassa cetanā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1354_0: Kāmanato, kāmetabbato, kāmapaṭisaṃyuttato ca kāmo dhātu kāmadhātu. Ādi-saddena byāpādadhātu-rūpadhātu-ādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1354_2: nānādhātuṃ khandhalokaṃ āyatanalokaṃ dhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti yojanā. “Ayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1354_3: rūpakkhandho nāma…pe… ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāma. Tesupi ekavidhena rūpakkhandho,
tika-s0201t:1354_4: ekādasavidhena rūpakkhandho. Ekavidhena vedanākkhandho, bahuvidhena vedanākkhandho.
tika-s0201t:1354_5: Ekavidhena saññākkhandho, bahuvidhena saññākkhandho. Ekavidhena saṅkhārakkhandho,
tika-s0201t:1354_6: bahuvidhena saṅkhārakkhandho. Ekavidhena viññāṇakkhandho, bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandho”ti
tika-s0201t:1354_7: evaṃ tāva khandhalokassa, “idaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nāma…pe… idaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma. Tattha
tika-s0201t:1354_8: dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā, dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā āyatanalokassa, “ayaṃ cakkhudhātu
tika-s0201t:1354_9: nāma…pe… ayaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu nāma, tattha soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1354_10: dhātulokassa anekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca pajānāti. Na kevalaṃ upādinnakasaṅkhāralokasseva,
tika-s0201t:1354_11: atha kho anupādinnakasaṅkhāralokassapi – “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa
tika-s0201t:1354_12: khandho seto, imassa kāḷo, imassa maṭṭho, imassa sakaṇṭako, imassa bahalattaco, imassa
tika-s0201t:1354_13: tanuttaco, imassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena evarūpaṃ, imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ
tika-s0201t:1354_14: lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ, imassa phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ rassaṃ
tika-s0201t:1354_15: vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ mudukaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ
tika-s0201t:1354_16: kaṭukaṃ ambilaṃ kasāvaṃ, imassa kaṇṭako tikhiṇo kuṇṭho ujuko kuṭilo tambo kāḷo odāto
tika-s0201t:1354_17: hotī”tiādinā pajānāti. Sabbaññubuddhādīnaṃ eva hi etaṃ balaṃ, na aññesaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1355_0: Nānādhimuttikatanti nānāajjhāsayataṃ. Adhimutti nāma ajjhāsayadhātu ajjhāsayasabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:1355_1: So pana hīnapaṇītatāsāmaññena pāḷiyaṃ dvidhāva vuttopi hīnapaṇītādibhedena anekavidhoti
tika-s0201t:1355_2: āha “hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāva”nti. Tattha tattha ye ye sattā yaṃyaṃadhimuttikā,
tika-s0201t:1355_3: te te taṃtadadhimuttike eva sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti dhātusabhāgato. Yathā
tika-s0201t:1355_4: gūthādīnaṃ dhātusabhāvo eso, yaṃ gūthādīhi eva saṃsandanti samenti, evaṃ (puggalānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1355_5: ajjhāsayassevesa sabhāvo, yaṃ) hīnajjhāsayā dussīlādīhi eva saṃsandanti samenti,
tika-s0201t:1355_6: sampannasīlādayo ca sampannasīlādīheva. Taṃ nesaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ bhagavā yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti.
tika-s0201t:1356_0: Vuddhiñca hāniñcāti paccayavisesena sāmatthiyato adhikataṃ anadhikatañca. Indriyaparopariyattañāṇaniddese
tika-s0201t:1356_1: “āsayaṃ jānāti anusayaṃ jānātī”ti āsayādijānanaṃ kasmā niddiṭṭhanti? Āsayajānanādinā
tika-s0201t:1356_2: yehi indriyehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti, tesaṃ jānanassa vibhāvanato.
tika-s0201t:1356_4: visuṃ balatā ca siddhā hoti. Tattha āsayanti yattha sattā nivasanti, taṃ tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1356_5: diṭṭhigataṃ vā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ vā āsayo. Anusayo appahīnabhāvena thāmagato kileso.
tika-s0201t:1356_6: Taṃ pana bhagavā sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto tesaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ, vipassanāmaggañāṇānañca
tika-s0201t:1357_0: “Kāmaṃ sevantaṃyeva bhagavā jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0201t:1357_1: Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0201t:1357_2: Nekkhammaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti. Byāpādaṃ, abyāpādaṃ, thinamiddhaṃ, ālokasaññaṃ sevantaṃyeva
tika-s0201t:1358_0: Paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānanti rūpāvacarānaṃ paṭhamādīnaṃ paccanīkajhāpanaṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:1358_1: ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṭṭhena ca jhānānaṃ. Catukkanayena hetaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānanti
tika-s0201t:1358_2: ettha paṭipāṭiyā satta appitappitakkhaṇe paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato ārammaṇe ca
tika-s0201t:1358_3: adhimuccanato vimokkhā nāma, aṭṭhamo pana sabbaso saññāvedayitehi vimuttattā apagamavimokkho
tika-s0201t:1358_4: nāma. Catukkanayapañcakanayesu paṭhamajhānasamādhi savitakkasavicāro nāma, pañcakanaye
tika-s0201t:1358_5: dutiyajjhānasamādhi avitakkavicāramatto, nayadvayepi upari tīsu jhānesu samādhi avitakkaavicāro,
tika-s0201t:1358_6: samāpattīsu paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhannaṃ samādhītipi nāmaṃ, samāpattītipi cittekaggatāsabbhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1358_7: nirodhasamāpattiyā tadabhāvato na samādhīti nāmaṃ. Hānabhāgiyadhammanti appaguṇehi
tika-s0201t:1358_11: dassitāni, tehi pana jhānānaṃ taṃsabhāvatā dhamma-saddena vuttā. Tasmāti vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1358_12: hetubhāvena paccāmasati. Vodānanti paguṇatāsaṅkhātaṃ vodānaṃ. Tañhi paṭhamajjhānādīhi
tika-s0201t:1358_13: vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādiadhigamassa paccayattā “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Ye pana “nirodhato
tika-s0201t:1358_14: phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānanti pāḷi natthī”ti vadanti, te “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1358_15: phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā. Yo samāpattilābhī
tika-s0201t:1358_16: samāno eva “na labhāmaha”nti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ samānaṃ eva “na kammaṭṭhāna”nti saññī
tika-s0201t:1358_17: hoti, so sampattiṃyeva samānaṃ “vipattī”ti paccetīti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1359_0: 149. Appananti nigamanaṃ. Na tathā daṭṭhabbanti yathā paravādinā vuttaṃ, tathā na
tika-s0201t:1359_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakasakakiccameva jānātīti ṭhānāṭṭhānajānanādiṃ sakaṃ sakaṃyeva kiccaṃ
tika-s0201t:1359_2: kātuṃ jānāti, yathāsakameva visayaṃ paṭivijjhatīti attho. Tampīti tehi dasabalañāṇehi
tika-s0201t:1359_6: Tañhi ñāṇaṃ tadubhayampi jānāti, “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā”tiādinā tathā ceva
tika-s0201t:1359_8: Appetuṃ na sakkoti aṭṭhamanavamabalāni viya taṃsadisaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ viya vikubbituṃ.
tika-s0201t:1359_9: Etenassa balasadisatañca nivāreti. Jhānādiñāṇaṃ viya vā appetuṃ vikubbituñca. Yadipi
tika-s0201t:1359_10: hi “jhānādipaccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ sattamabala”nti tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā, tathāpi
tika-s0201t:1359_11: “jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthī”ti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā
tika-s0201t:1359_12: evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ
tika-s0201t:1359_13: kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti iddhi hutvā vikubbituṃ
tika-s0201t:1359_14: na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ, na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-s0201t:1359_15: kiccavisesavasenapi dasabalañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ visesaṃ dassetvā idāni vitakkattikabhūmantaravasenapi
tika-s0201t:1359_16: taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭipāṭiyātiādito paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-s0201t:1360_0: Anupadavaṇṇanaṃ katvā veditabbānīti sambandho. Kilesāvaraṇaṃ niyatamicchādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0201t:1360_1: kilesāvaraṇassa abhāvo āsavakkhayādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ, tabbhāvo aṭṭhānaṃ, anadhigamassa
tika-s0201t:1360_2: pana tadubhayaṃ yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhānañca ṭhānañcāti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “lokiya…pe…
tika-s0201t:1360_3: dassanato cā”ti āha. Tattha lokiyasammādiṭṭhiyā ṭhiti āsavakkhayādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1360_4: kilesāvaraṇābhāvassa kāraṇattā. Sā hi tasmiṃ sati na hoti, asati ca hoti. Etena tassā
tika-s0201t:1360_5: aṭṭhitiyā tassa aṭṭhānatā vuttā eva. Nesaṃ veneyyasattānaṃ. Dhātuvemattadassanatoti
tika-s0201t:1360_6: kāmadhātuādīnaṃ pavattibhedadassanato. Yadaggena dhātuvemattaṃ jānāti, tadaggena
tika-s0201t:1360_7: cariyāvisesampi jānāti. Dhātuvemattadassanatoti vā dhammadhātuvemattadassanato. Sabbāpi
tika-s0201t:1360_8: hi cariyā dhammadhātupariyāpannā evāti. Payogaṃ anādiyitvāpi santatimahāmattādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1360_9: viya. Dibbacakkhuñāṇānubhāvato pattabbenāti ettha dibbacakkhunā parassa hadayavatthusannissayalohitavaṇṇadassanamukhena
tika-s0201t:1360_10: tadā pavattamānacittajānanatthaṃ parikammakaraṇaṃ nāma sāvakānaṃ, tañca kho ādikammikānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1360_11: yato dibbacakkhuānubhāvato cetopariyañāṇassa pattabbatā siyā, buddhānaṃ pana yadipi
tika-s0201t:1360_12: āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamato pageva dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamo, tathāpi tathā parikammakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1360_13: natthi vijjāttayasiddhiyā sijjhanato. Sesābhiññāttaye cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamena
