tika-s0201t:1645_5: katāti āpajjati, na ca taṃ atthi. Vakkhati hi “bahudeva rattinti diyaḍḍhayāmamatta”nti.
tika-s0201t:1645_6: Dasabalādiguṇavisesā viya dhammagāravahetukā parahitapaṭipattipi sabbabuddhānaṃ majjhe
tika-s0201t:1645_7: bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya sadisā evāti imassa bhagavato dhammagāravakittane “kassapopi
tika-s0201t:1646_0: Cārikaṃ nikkhamīti janapadacārikaṃ carituṃ nikkhami. Janapadacārikāya akāle nikkhantattā
tika-s0201t:1646_1: kosalarājādayo vāretuṃ ārabhiṃsu. Pavāretvā hi caraṇaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ. Puṇṇāya sammāpaṭipattiṃ
tika-s0201t:1647_0: Anahātovāti dhammasavanussukkena sāyanhe buddhāciṇṇaṃ nhānaṃ akatvāva. Attahitaparahitapaṭipattīsu
tika-s0201t:1647_1: ekissā dvinnañca atthitāsiddhā catubbidhatā paṭipattikatā eva nāma hotīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:1647_2: “paṭipannako ca nāma…pe… catubbidho hotī”ti. Paṭikkhepapubbakopi hi paṭipanno atthato
tika-s0201t:1647_3: paṭipannattho evāti. Kāmaṃ attahitāya paṭipanno tāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sāsanaṃ sobhati,
tika-s0201t:1647_4: na pana sāsanaṃ vaḍḍheti appossukkabhāvato, na ca kāruṇikassa bhagavato sabbathā
tika-s0201t:1647_5: manorathaṃ pūreti. Tathā hi bhagavā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ekasaṭṭhiyā ca arahantesu jātesu
tika-s0201t:1647_7: Tena vuttaṃ “evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhagavā na pucchati, kasmā? Na mayhaṃ sāsanassa vuḍḍhipakkhe ṭhito”ti.
tika-s0201t:1648_0: Samudāyo appakena ūnopi anūno viya hotīti bākulattheraṃ catuttharāsito bahi katvāpi
tika-s0201t:1648_1: “asītimahātherā viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Asītimahātherasamaññā vā avayavepi aṭṭhasamāpattisāmaññā
tika-s0201t:1648_2: viya daṭṭhabbā. Īdise ṭhāne bahūnaṃ ekato kathanaṃ mahatā kaṇṭhena ca kathanaṃ satthu
tika-s0201t:1648_3: cittārādhanamevāti tehi bhikkhūhi tathā paṭipannanti dassento “te bhikkhū meghasaddaṃ
tika-s0201t:1651_0: Appa-saddassa parittapariyāyataṃ manasi katvā āha “byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ viyā”ti. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:1651_1: “na hi tassā”tiādi. Appa-saddo panettha abhāvatthoti sakkā viññātuṃ “appābādhatañca
tika-s0201t:1652_0: Atricchatā nāma atra atra icchāti katvā. Asantaguṇasambhāvanatāti attani avijjamānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1652_1: guṇānaṃ vijjamānānaṃ viya paresaṃ pakāsanā. Saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti vattapaṭipattikārakavisesalābhīti
tika-s0201t:1652_3: ṭhatvā attani vijjamānasīladhutadhammādiguṇavibhāvanā. Tādisassa hi paṭiggahaṇe amattaññutāpi hoti.
tika-s0201t:1654_0: Appicchatāpadhānaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena catubbidhaṃ icchāpabhedaṃ dassetvā punapi puggalādhiṭṭhānena
tika-s0201t:1654_1: catubbidhaṃ icchāpabhedaṃ dassento “aparopi catubbidho appiccho”tiādimāha. Dāyakassa
tika-s0201t:1654_2: vasanti dāyakassa cittavasaṃ. Deyyadhammassa vasanti deyyadhammassa appabahubhāvaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1655_0: Ekabhikkhupi na aññāsi sosānikavatte sammadeva vuttittā. Abbokiṇṇanti avicchedaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1655_1: Dutiyo maṃ na jāneyyāti dutiyo sahāyabhūtopi yathā maṃ jānituṃ na sakkuṇeyya, tathā
tika-s0201t:1655_2: saṭṭhi vassāni nirantaraṃ susāne vasāmi, tasmā ahaṃ aho sosānikuttamo.
tika-s0201t:1656_1: itarañca “kathaṃ nu kho ayyassa santikeva dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti kolāhalavasena mahājanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1656_2: khobhetvā. Gatoti “ayaṃ so, tena rattiyaṃ dhammakathā katā”ti jānanabhayena pariyattiappicchatāya pariveṇaṃ gato.
tika-s0201t:1657: Tayo kulaputtā viyāti pācīnavaṃsadāye samaggavāsaṃ vutthā tayo kulaputtā viya. Pahāyāti pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena pacchā aggamaggeneva pajahitvā.
tika-s0201t:1660_0: Pakatidubbalādīnaṃ garucīvarādīni naphāsubhāvāvahāni sarīrakhedāvahāni ca hontīti
tika-s0201t:1660_1: payojanavasena naatricchatādivasena tāni parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogo na santosavirodhīti
tika-s0201t:1660_2: āha “lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hotī”ti. Mahagghacīvaraṃ, bahūni vā cīvarāni
tika-s0201t:1660_3: labhitvāpi tāni vissajjetvā tadaññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti
tika-s0201t:1660_4: āha “tesaṃ…pe… dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hotī”ti. Evaṃ sesapaccayesupi yathābalayathāsāruppasantosaniddesesu
tika-s0201t:1660_5: apisaddaggahaṇe adhippāyo veditabbo. Yathāsāruppasantosoyeva aggo alobhajjhāsayassa ukkaṃsanato.
tika-s0201t:1663_0: Ekoti ekākī. Gacchatīti cuṇṇikairiyāpathavasena vuttaṃ. Caratīti vihārato bahi sañcāravasena,
tika-s0201t:1663_1: viharatīti divāvihārādivasena. Kāyavivekoti ca nekkhammādhimuttassa bhāvanānuyogavasena
tika-s0201t:1663_4: paramaṃ uttamaṃ vodānaṃ pattānaṃ. Nirupadhīnanti kilesupadhiādīnaṃ vigamena nirupadhīnaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1666_0: Saṃsīdati etenāti saṃsaggo, rāgo. Savanahetuko, savanavasena vā pavatto saṃsaggo
tika-s0201t:1666_1: savanasaṃsaggo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Kāyasaṃsaggo pana kāyaparāmāso. Itthī vāti vadhū,
tika-s0201t:1666_2: yuvatī vā. Sandhānetunti pubbenāparaṃ ghaṭetuṃ. Sotaviññāṇavīthivasenāti idaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ
tika-s0201t:1666_3: savanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tassa piṭṭhivattakamanodvārikajavanavīthīsu uppannopi rāgo
tika-s0201t:1666_4: savanasaṃsaggoyeva. Dassanasaṃsaggepi eseva nayo. Anitthigandhabodhisatto parehi
tika-s0201t:1666_5: kathiyamānavasena pavattasavanasaṃsaggassa nidassanaṃ. Tissadaharo attanā suyyamānavasena.
tika-s0201t:1666_6: Tattha paṭhamaṃ jātake veditabbanti itaraṃ dassento “daharo kirā”tiādimāha. Kāmarāgena
tika-s0201t:1666_7: viddhoti rāgasallena hadaye appito anto anuviddho.
tika-s0201t:1667_0: Soti dassanasaṃsaggo. Evaṃ veditabboti vatthuvasena pākaṭaṃ karoti. Tasmiṃ kira gāme
tika-s0201t:1667_1: yebhuyyena itthiyo abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā, tasmā thero “sace antogāme na carissasī”ti
tika-s0201t:1667_2: āha. Kālasseva paviṭṭhattā yāguṃ adāsi, tasmā yāgumeva gahetvā gacchantaṃ “nivattatha,
tika-s0201t:1667_3: bhante, bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti āhaṃsu. Yācitvāti “na mayaṃ, bhante, bhikkhaṃ dātukāmā
tika-s0201t:1667_4: nivattema, apica idaṃ bhante kāraṇa”nti yācitvā.
tika-s0201t:1668: Ādito lapanaṃ ālāpo, vacanapaṭivacanavasena pavatto lāpo sallāpo. Bhikkhuniyāti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ. Yāya kāyacipi itthiyā santakaparibhogavasena uppannarāgopi sambhogasaṃsaggova.
tika-s0201t:1671_0: Bhikkhuno bhikkhūhi kāyaparāmāso kāyasambāhanādivasena. Kāyasaṃsagganti kāyaparāmāsasaṃsaggaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1671_1: Gāhagāhakoti gaṇhanakānaṃ gaṇhanakoti attho. Gāhamuttakoti ayoniso āmisehi saṅgaṇhanakehi
tika-s0201t:1671_2: sayaṃ muccanako. Muttagāhakoti yathāvuttasaṅgahato muttānaṃ saṅgaṇhanako. Muttamuttakoti
tika-s0201t:1671_3: muccanakehi sayampi muccanako. Gahaṇavasena saṅgaṇhanavasena. Upasaṅkamanti tato
tika-s0201t:1671_4: kiñci lokāmisaṃ paccāsīsantā, na dakkhiṇeyyavasena. Bhikkhupakkhe gahaṇavasenāti
tika-s0201t:1672_0: Ṭhānanti attano ṭhānāvatthaṃ. Pāpuṇituṃ na deti uppannameva taṃ paṭisaṅkhānabalena
tika-s0201t:1672_1: nīharanto vikkhambheti. Tenāha “mantenā”tiādi. Yathā jīvitukāmo puriso kaṇhasappena,
tika-s0201t:1672_2: amittena vā saha na saṃvasati, evaṃ khaṇamattampi kilesehi saha na saṃvasatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1673_0: Catupārisuddhisīlaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca. Tathā samādhipi. Vipassanāya pādakā vipassanāpādakāti
tika-s0201t:1673_1: aṭṭhasamāpattiggahaṇena yathā lokiyasamādhi gahito, evaṃ vipassanāpādakā etesanti
tika-s0201t:1673_2: vipassanāpādakāti aṭṭhasamāpattiggahaṇeneva lokuttaro samādhi gahito. Yathā hi cattāri
tika-s0201t:1673_3: rūpajjhānāni adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā pavatto maggasamādhi vipassanāpādako, evaṃ cattāri
tika-s0201t:1673_4: arūpajjhānāni adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā pavattopi. Samāpattipariyāyo pana pubbavohārena veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1673_5: Paṭipakkhasamucchedanena sammā āpajjanato vā yathā “sotāpattimaggo”ti. Evamettha
tika-s0201t:1673_6: sīlasamādhīnampi missakabhāvo veditabbo, na paññāya eva. Vimuttīti ariyaphalanti
tika-s0201t:1673_7: vuttaṃ “vimuttisampanno”ti vuttattā. Tañhi nipphādanaṭṭhena sampādetabbaṃ, na nibbānanti.
tika-s0201t:1674_0: Ettha ca appicchatāya laddhapaccayena paritussati, santuṭṭhatāya laddhā te agadhito
tika-s0201t:1674_1: amucchitoādīnavadassī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati, evaṃbhūto ca katthaci alaggamānasatāya
tika-s0201t:1674_2: pavivekaṃ paribrūhento kenaci asaṃsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā. So
tika-s0201t:1674_3: evaṃ ajjhāsayasampanno vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā, anadhigamassa adhigamāya.
tika-s0201t:1674_4: Ārabhanto ca yathāsamādinnaṃ attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhati, tassa sīlassa suparisuddhataṃ
tika-s0201t:1674_5: nissāya uppajjati avippaṭisāro, ayamassa sīlasampadā. Tassa avippaṭisāramūlakehi
tika-s0201t:1674_6: pāmojjapītipassaddhisukhehi sammā brūhitaṃ cittaṃ sammadeva samādhiyati, ayamassa
tika-s0201t:1674_7: samādhisampadā. Tato yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā
tika-s0201t:1674_8: vimuccati, ayamassa paññāsampadā. Vimuttacittatā panassa vimuttisampadā, tato vimuttito
tika-s0201t:1674_9: ñāṇadassananti etesaṃ dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ anupubbī veditabbā. Tassa yo dasahi
tika-s0201t:1674_10: kathāvatthūhi samannāgamo, ayaṃ attahitāya paṭipatti. Yā nesaṃ paresaṃ saṃkittanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1674_11: ayaṃ parahitāya paṭipatti. Tāsu purimā ñāṇapubbaṅgamā ñāṇasampayuttā ca, itarā karuṇāpubbaṅgamā
tika-s0201t:1675_0: Dasahi kathāvatthūhi karaṇabhūtehi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ deti, “bhikkhunā nāma atricchatādike
tika-s0201t:1675_1: dūrato vajjetvā sammadeva appicchena bhavitabba”ntiādinā taṃ taṃ kathāvatthuṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1675_2: upadisatīti attho. Upadisanto hi tāni “tehi bhikkhū ovadatī”ti vutto. Ovadatiyeva
tika-s0201t:1675_3: sarūpadassanamattena. Sukhumaṃ atthaṃ parivattetvāti evampi appicchatā hoti evampīti
tika-s0201t:1675_4: appicchatādivasena aparāparaṃ appicchatāvuttiṃ dassetvā tattha sukhumanipuṇaṃ appicchatāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0201t:1675_5: atthaṃ jānāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Viññāpetīti yathāvuttehi visesehi viññāpeti. Kāraṇanti
tika-s0201t:1675_6: yena kāraṇena appicchatā ijjhati, taṃ pana “mahicchatādīsu ete dosā, appicchatāya
tika-s0201t:1675_7: ayamānisaṃso”tiādīnavānisaṃsadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammā hetunā appicchataṃ dassetīti
tika-s0201t:1675_8: sandassako. Gāhetunti yathā gaṇhati, tathā kātuṃ, tattha paṭṭhapetunti attho. Ussāhajananavasenāti
tika-s0201t:1675_9: yathā taṃ samādānaṃ niccalaṃ hoti, evaṃ ussoḷhiyā uppādanavasena sammadeva uttejetīti
tika-s0201t:1675_10: samuttejako. Ussāhajāteti appicchatāya jātussāhe. Vaṇṇaṃ vatvā tattha sampattiṃ āyatiñca
tika-s0201t:1675_11: labbhamānaguṇaṃ kittetvā sampahaṃseti sammadeva pakārehi tosetīti sampahaṃsako. Evaṃ
tika-s0201t:1678_0: 253. Satthu sammukhā evaṃ vaṇṇo abbhuggatoti. Iminā tassa vaṇṇassa yathābhūtaguṇasamuṭṭhitataṃ
tika-s0201t:1678_1: dasseti. Mandamando viyāti ati viya acheko viya. Abalabalo viyāti ati viya abalo
tika-s0201t:1678_2: viya. Bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viyāti ati viya dummukho viya. Anumassāti anumasitvā, dasa
tika-s0201t:1678_3: kathāvatthūni sarūpato visesato ca anupariggahetvāti attho. Pariggaṇhanaṃ pana nesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1678_4: anupavisanaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “anupavisitvā”ti. Sabrahmacārīhi vaṇṇabhāsanaṃ eko
tika-s0201t:1678_5: lābhoti yojanā. Evaṃ sesesupi. Patthayamāno evamāha dhammagarutāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1681_0: 254. Abhiramanaṃ abhirataṃ, tadeva anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ “abhiranta”nti. Bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1681_1: Anabhirati nāma natthi, abhiramitvā ciravihāropi natthi sammadeva pariññātavatthukattā.
tika-s0201t:1682_1: ekadesena dassetvā vanavāsitissasāmaṇerassa vatthuṃ vitthāretvā janapadacārikaṃ kathetuṃ
tika-s0201t:1682_2: “bhagavā hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Ākāsagāmīhi saddhiṃ gantukāmo “chaḷabhiññānaṃ ārocehī”ti
tika-s0201t:1682_3: āha. Saṅghakammena sijjhamānāpi upasampadā satthu āṇāvaseneva sijjhanato “buddhadāyajjaṃ
tika-s0201t:1682_4: te dassāmī”ti vuttanti vadanti. Apare “aparipuṇṇavīsativassasseva tassa upasampadaṃ
tika-s0201t:1682_5: anujānanto satthā ‘buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī’ti avocā”ti vadanti. Upasampādetvāti
tika-s0201t:1683_0: Navayojanasatikaṃ majjhimadesapariyāpannameva, tato paraṃ nādhippetaṃ dandhatāvasena
tika-s0201t:1683_1: gamanato. Samantāti gatagataṭṭhānassa catūsu passesu. Aññenapi kāraṇenāti bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1683_3: nikkhamati, antomaṇḍalaṃ otarati. Sattahi vātiādi “ekaṃ māsaṃ vā”tiādinā vuttānukkamena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1684_0: Sarīraphāsukatthāyāti ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nibaddhavāsena ussannadhātukassa sarīrassa
tika-s0201t:1684_2: maghadevajātakādidesanānaṃ viya dhammadesanāya aṭṭhuppattikālassa ākaṅkhanena. Surāpānasikkhāpadapaññāpane
tika-s0201t:1684_3: viya sikkhāpadapaññāpanatthāya. Bodhaneyyasatte aṅgulimālādike bodhanatthāya. Nibaddhavāsañca
tika-s0201t:1685_0: 255. Apariggahabhāvaṃ katthaci alaggabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yūthaṃ pahāya…pe… mattahatthī
tika-s0201t:1685_1: viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Asahāyakiccoti sahāyakiccarahito sīho viya. Tenassa ekavihāritaṃ
tika-s0201t:1685_2: tejavantatañca dasseti. Tadā pana kāyaviveko na sakkā laddhunti idamettha kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1685_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bahūhītiādi pana sabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Therassa parisā suvinītā
tika-s0201t:1686_0: Vuttakāraṇayutte addhānagamane cārikānaṃ vohāro sāsane niruḷhoti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1686_1: Kenacideva nimittena kismiñci atthe pavattāya saññāya tannimittarahitepi aññasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:1686_2: pavatti ruḷhī nāma. Vijitamārattā saṅgāmavijayamahāyodho viya. Aññaṃ sevitvāti “mama
tika-s0201t:1686_3: āgatabhāvaṃ satthu ārocehī”ti ārocanatthaṃ aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ sevitvā.
tika-s0201t:1687_0: Bhagavā dhammaṃ desento taṃtaṃpuggalajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tadanucchavikameva dhammiṃ kathaṃ
tika-s0201t:1687_2: pana vo, anuruddhā, samaggā sammodamānā”tiādinā sāmaggirasānisaṃsaṃ kathesi. Āvasathānisaṃsanti
tika-s0201t:1687_4: jotipālatthere lāmakaṃ ṭhānaṃ otiṇṇamatte mahābodhipallaṅke pana sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
tika-s0201t:1687_5: patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūrento āgato. Tādisassa nāma pamādavihāro na yuttoti yathā
tika-s0201t:1687_6: kassapo bhagavā bodhisattassa satiṃ paṭilabhituṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, tathā ayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1687_7: bhagavā tameva pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ghaṭikārasuttaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0201t:1687_8: Cattāro dhammuddeseti – “upanīyati loko addhuvo, atāṇo loko anabhissaro, assako loko
tika-s0201t:1687_9: sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso cā”ti ime cattāro dhammuddese
tika-s0201t:1687_10: kathesi. Kāmañcete dhammuddesā raṭṭhapālasutte āyasmatā raṭṭhapālattherena rañño
tika-s0201t:1687_11: korabyassa kathitā, te pana bhagavato eva āharitvā therena tattha kathitāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:1687_12: “raṭṭhapālasutte”tiādi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ sutte – “atthi kho, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā
tika-s0201t:1687_13: jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena cattāro dhammuddesā uddiṭṭhā”tiādi pānakānisaṃsakathanti
tika-s0201t:1687_14: “aggihuttaṃ mukhaṃ yaññā”tiādinā anumodanaṃ vatvā puna pakiṇṇakakathāvasena pānakapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:1687_15: ānisaṃsakathaṃ kathesi. Ekībhāve ānisaṃsaṃ kathesi, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho
tika-s0201t:1687_16: bhagavā āyasmantaṃ bhaguṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesī”tiādi. Anantanayanti aparimāṇadesanānayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1687_17: appicchatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ. Tenāha “puṇṇa, ayampi appicchakathāyevā”tiādi
tika-s0201t:1687_18: bahūhi pariyāyehi nānānayaṃ deseti. Kathaṃ tathā desitaṃ thero aññāsīti āha “paṭisambhidāpattassa…pe… ahosī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1690_0: 256. Tato paṭṭhāyāti. Yadā jātibhūmakā bhikkhū satthu sammukhā therassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu,
tika-s0201t:1690_1: tato paṭṭhāya. Sīsānulokī hutvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhanaṃ therena samāgame ādaravasena
tika-s0201t:1690_2: katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ pāṭhe “appeva nāmā”tiādi, “taramānarūpo”ti ca.
tika-s0201t:1690_3: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīna”ntiādi, taṃ akāraṇaṃ. Na hi dhammasenāpati
tika-s0201t:1690_4: tassa therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇena jānituṃ na sakkoti. “Kacci nu kho maṃ
tika-s0201t:1690_5: adisvāva gamissatī”ti ayampi cintā ādaravasenevāti yuttaṃ. Na hi satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ
tika-s0201t:1690_6: āgato sāvako api āyasmā aññātakoṇḍañño satthukappaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ tattha vasantaṃ
tika-s0201t:1690_7: adisvāva gacchanako nāma atthi. Divāvihāranti sampadāne upayogavacananti āha “divāvihāratthāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1691_1: na jāyatīti pacchā vattabbakathāya avasaro na hoti. Satta visuddhiyo pucchi diṭṭhasaṃsandanavasena.
tika-s0201t:1691_2: Ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma ariyamaggo. Yasmā tato uttarimpi pattabbaṃ attheva, tasmā
tika-s0201t:1691_3: “catupārisuddhisīlādīsu ṭhitassapi brahmacariyavāso matthakaṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1691_4: Tasmāti brahmacariyavāsassa matthakaṃ appattattā. Sabbaṃ paṭikkhipīti sattamampi
tika-s0201t:1692_1: dassetuṃ “dvedhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha gahaṇūpādānanti daḷhaggahaṇabhūtaṃ upādānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1692_2: Tenāha “kāmupādānādika”nti. Paccayūpādānanti yaṃ kiñci paccayamāha. So hi attano
tika-s0201t:1692_3: phalaṃ upādiyati upādānavasena gaṇhatīti upādānanti vuccati. Tenāha “paccayūpādānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1692_4: nāma…pe… paccayā”ti. “Anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī”ti vacanato arahattaphalaṃ
tika-s0201t:1692_5: anupādāparinibbānanti kathenti. Na ca upādānasampayuttanti upādānehi etaṃ na sahitaṃ
tika-s0201t:1692_6: nāpi upādānehi saha pavatti hutvā. Na ca kañci dhammaṃ upādiyatīti kassaci dhammassa
tika-s0201t:1692_7: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena na upādiyati. Parinibbutanteti aggamaggena kātabbakilesaparinibbānapariyosānante
tika-s0201t:1692_8: jātattā. Amatadhātumeva anupādāparinibbānaṃ kathenti, kathentānañca yathā tassa koci
tika-s0201t:1692_9: paccayo nāma natthi, evaṃ adhigatopi yathā koci paccayo nāma na hoti, tathā parinibbānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1692_10: apaccayaparinibbānanti dassento “ayaṃ anto”tiādimāha. Puna pucchaṃ ārabhi anupādāparinibbānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1693_0: 258. Sabbaparivattesūti sabbesu pañhaparivattanesu, pañhavāresūti attho. Sagahaṇadhammamevāti
tika-s0201t:1693_1: “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā gaṇhatīti gahaṇaṃ, saha gahaṇenāti sagahaṇaṃ, upādāniyanti attho.
tika-s0201t:1693_2: Vivaṭṭasannissitassa abhāvato vaṭṭameva anugatoti vaṭṭānugato. Tenāha “catupārisuddhisīlamattassapi
tika-s0201t:1693_3: abhāvato”ti. Yo pana catubbidhe vivaṭṭūpanissaye sīle ṭhito, sopi “aññatra imehi
tika-s0201t:1696_1: Cittavisuddhi hettha sīlavisuddhiṃ payojeti tassa tadatthattā. Sīlavisuddhikiccaṃ
tika-s0201t:1696_2: kataṃ nāma hoti samādhisaṃvattanato. Samādhisaṃvattanikā hi sīlavisuddhi nāma. Sabbapadesūti
tika-s0201t:1696_4: ṭhitassa cittavisuddhakiccaṃ kataṃ nāma hotītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1697_0: Sāvatthinagaraṃ viya sakkāyanagaraṃ atikkamitabbattā. Sāketanagaraṃ viya nibbānanagaraṃ
tika-s0201t:1697_1: pāpuṇitabbattā. Accāyikassa kiccassa uppādakālo viya navameneva khaṇena pattabbassa
tika-s0201t:1697_2: abhisamayakiccassa upādakālo. Yathā rañño sattamena rathavinītena sākete antepuradvāre
tika-s0201t:1697_3: oruḷhassa na tāva kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti, saṃvidhātabbasaṃvidhānaṃ ñātimittagaṇaparivutassa
tika-s0201t:1697_4: surasabhojanaparibhoge niṭṭhitaṃ nāma siyā, evametaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā kilese
tika-s0201t:1697_6: niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti. Tenāha “yogino…pe… kālo daṭṭhabbo”ti. Tattha paropaṇṇāsa kusaladhammā
tika-s0201t:1697_7: nāma cittuppādapariyāpannā phassādayo paropaṇṇāsa anavajjadhammā. Nirodhasayaneti nibbānasayane.
tika-s0201t:1698_0: “Visuddhiyo”ti vā “kathāvatthūnī”ti vā atthato ekaṃ, byañjanameva nānanti tesaṃ atthato
tika-s0201t:1698_1: anaññabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “itī”ti āraddhaṃ. Āyasmā puṇṇo dasa kathāvatthūni vissajjesīti
tika-s0201t:1698_2: satta visuddhiyo nāma vissajjantopi dasa kathāvatthūni vissajjesi tesaṃ atthato anaññattā.
tika-s0201t:1698_3: Eteneva dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero satta visuddhiyo pucchanto dasa kathāvatthūni
tika-s0201t:1698_4: pucchīti ayampi attho vuttovāti veditabbo. Nti pañhaṃ. Kiṃ jānitvā pucchīti visuddhipariyāyena
tika-s0201t:1698_5: kathāvatthūni pucchāmīti kiṃ jānitvā pucchi. Dasakathāvatthulābhinaṃ theraṃ visuddhiyo
tika-s0201t:1698_6: pucchanto pucchitaṭṭhāneyeva pucchanena kiṃ titthakusalo vā pana hutvā visayasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:1698_7: pucchi, udāhu pānīyatthikamatitthehi chinnataṭehi pātento viya atitthakusalo hutvā
tika-s0201t:1698_8: apucchitabbaṭṭhāne avisayasmiṃ pucchīti yojanā. Iminā nayena vissajjanapakkhepi atthayojanā
tika-s0201t:1698_9: veditabbā. Yadatthamassa vicāraṇā āraddhā, taṃ dassentena “titthakusalo hutvā”tiādiṃ
tika-s0201t:1698_10: vatvā visuddhikathāvatthūnaṃ atthato anaññattepi ayaṃ viseso veditabboti dassetuṃ
tika-s0201t:1698_11: “yaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tadamināti yaṃ “saṃkhittaṃ, vitthiṇṇa”nti ca vuttaṃ, taṃ iminā
tika-s0201t:1699_0: Ekā sīlavisuddhīti visuddhīsu visuṃ ekā sīlavisuddhi. Dasasu kathāvatthūsu cattāri
tika-s0201t:1699_1: kathāvatthūni hutvā āgatā appicchatādīhi vinā sīlavisuddhiyā asambhavato. Appicchakathātiādīsu
tika-s0201t:1699_2: kathāsīsena dasakathāvatthu gahitaṃ. Kathetabbattā vā vatthu kathāvatthūti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1699_3: Evañca upakārato, sabhāvato vā catunnaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ sīlavisuddhisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1699_4: Tiṇṇaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ cittavisuddhisaṅgahepi eseva nayo. Pañca visuddhiyoti nāmarūpaparicchedo
tika-s0201t:1699_6: pahāya uppannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi, udayabbayañāṇādi navavidhañāṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1699_7: paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi, ariyamaggañāṇaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti imā pañca visuddhiyo.
tika-s0201t:1701_0: 260. Sammoditunti anantaraṃ vuccamānena sammodituṃ. Aṭṭhānaparikappenāti akāraṇassa
tika-s0201t:1701_1: vatthuno parikappanena tadā asambhavantaṃ atthaṃ parikappetvā vacanena. Abhiṇhadassanassāti
tika-s0201t:1702_0: Ukkhipīti guṇato kathitabhāvena ukkaṃseti. Therassāti āyasmato puṇṇattherassa. Imasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:1702_1: ṭhāne imasmiṃ kāraṇe ekapadeneva sāvakavisaye anaññasādhāraṇaguṇāvikaraṇanimittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1702_2: Idāni tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “amaccañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Apacāyamānoti pūjayanto.
tika-s0201t:1703_0: “Anumassa anumassa pucchitā”ti vuttattā vicāraṇavasenāha “kiṃ pana pañhassa pucchanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1703_1: bhāriyaṃ udāhu vissajjana”nti. Sahetukaṃ katvāti yuttāyuttaṃ katvā. Sakāraṇanti tasseva
tika-s0201t:1703_2: vevacanaṃ. Pucchanampīti evaṃ sahadhammena pucchitabbamatthaṃ sayaṃ sampādetvā pucchanampi
tika-s0201t:1703_3: bhāriyaṃ dukkaraṃ. Vissajjanampīti sahadhammena vissajjanampi dukkaraṃ. Evañhi vissajjento
tika-s0201t:1703_4: viññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādhetīti. Yathānusandhināva desanā niṭṭhitāādito saparikkhāraṃ
tika-s0201t:1703_5: sīlaṃ, majjhe samādhiṃ, ante vasībhāvappattaṃ paññaṃ dassetvā desanāya niṭṭhāpitattāti.
tika-s0201t:1706_0: 261. Nivappatīti nivāpo, nivāpaṃ vatteti, nivāpabhojanaṃ vā etassāti nevāpiko, nivāpena
tika-s0201t:1706_1: mige palobhetvā gaṇhanakamāgaviko. Tiṇabījānīti nivāpatiṇabījāni. Vappanti sassaṃ
tika-s0201t:1706_2: viya vapitabbaṭṭhena vappaṃ. “Mayaṃ viya aññe ke īdisaṃ labhissantī”ti mānamadaṃ
tika-s0201t:1706_3: āpajjissanti. Vissaṭṭhasatibhāvanti anussaṅkitaparisaṅkitabhāvaṃ. Tiracchānā hi vijātiyabalavatiracchānavasanaṭṭhānesu
tika-s0201t:1706_4: sāsaṅkā ubbiggahadayā appamattā honti visesato māgavikādimanussūpacāre, rasataṇhāya
tika-s0201t:1706_5: pana baddhā pamādaṃ āpajjassanti. Nivapati etthāti nivāpo, nivāpabhūmi nivāpaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1706_7: vuttaṃ. Tattha nīvāravanaṃ viyāti nīvārassa samūho viya. Nīvāro nāma araññe sayaṃjātavīhijāti.
tika-s0201t:1706_8: Meghamālā viyāti meghaghaṭā viya. Ekagghananti ekajjhaṃ viya aviraṭṭhaṃ. Pakkamantīti
tika-s0201t:1706_9: āsaṅkaparisaṅkā hutvā pakkamanti. Kaṇṇe cālayamānāti anāsaṅkantānaṃ pahaṭṭhākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1707: 262. Kappetvāti upamābhāvena parikappetvā. Mige attano vase vattāpanaṃ vasībhāvo. So eva ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi, pabhāvanaṭṭhena ānubhāvo.
tika-s0201t:1708_0: 263. Bhayena bhogatoti bhayena saha sabhayaṃ nivāpaparibhogato. Balavīriyanti kāyabalañca
tika-s0201t:1708_1: uṭṭhānavīriyañca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana balameva vīriyaṃ. Balanti ca sarīrabalaṃ, tañca
tika-s0201t:1708_2: atthato manasikāramaggehi aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakavātoti vuttaṃ “aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇavāyodhātū”ti.
tika-s0201t:1709_0: 264. Sikkhitakerāṭikāti paricitasāṭheyyā, vañcakāti attho. Iddhimanto viya ānubhāvavanto
tika-s0201t:1709_1: viya. Pacurajanehi parabhūtā jātāti parajanā, mahābhūtā. Tenāha “yakkhā”ti. Samantā
tika-s0201t:1709_2: sappadesanti samantato padesavantaṃ vipulokāsasannivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Tassa pana sappadesatā
tika-s0201t:1710_1: attho. Pariccajissantīti nibbisissanti. Mahallakoti jātiyā mahallako jiṇṇo. Dubbaloti
tika-s0201t:1711_0: 267. Nivāpasadisatāya nivāpoti vā. Lokapariyāpannaṃ hutvā kilesehi āmasitabbatāya
tika-s0201t:1711_1: lokāmisānīti vā. Vaṭṭe āmisabhūtattā vaṭṭāmisabhūtānaṃ. Vasaṃ vattetīti kāmaguṇehi
tika-s0201t:1711_2: kāmaguṇe giddhe satte tasseva gedhassa vasena attano vase vattetīti. Tenāha –
tika-s0201t:1713: Tena taṃ bādhayissāmi, na me samaṇa mokkhasī”ti. ;
tika-s0201t:1715_0: 268. Kāmato cittassa vimutti idha cetovimuttīti adhippetāti āha “cetovimutti nāma…pe…
tika-s0201t:1715_1: uppannaajjhāsayo”ti. Kāme vissajjetvā puna tattha nimuggatāya dutiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇā
tika-s0201t:1716_0: 269. Tatiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇā yathāpariccatte kāme pariccajitvā evaṃ ṭhitā, na dutiyā
tika-s0201t:1716_1: viya tattha nimuggāti adhippāyena “kiṃ pana te akaṃsū”ti pucchati. Itare kāmaṃ ujukaṃ
tika-s0201t:1716_2: kāmaguṇesu na nimuggā, pariyāyena pana nimuggā diṭṭhijālena ca ajjhotthaṭāti dassento
tika-s0201t:1717_0: 271. Khandhakilesābhisaṅkhāramārā vā idha māraggahaṇena gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Akkhīni
tika-s0201t:1717_2: māro yaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ samāpannassapi bhikkhuno cittaṃ imaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ nissāya
tika-s0201t:1717_3: vattatīti na jānāti, idhādhippetassa pana bhikkhuno vasena “vipassanāpādakajjhāna”nti
tika-s0201t:1717_4: vuttaṃ. Teneva pariyāyenāti “na mārassa akkhīni bhindī”ti evamādinā yathāvuttapariyāyena.
tika-s0201t:1717_5: Adassanaṃ gatoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Cakkhussa padaṃ patiṭṭhāti ca idha ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1717_6: adhippetaṃ taṃ pariggayha pavattanatoti āha “appatiṭṭhaṃ nirārammaṇa”nti. Soti māro.
tika-s0201t:1717_7: Disvāti dassanahetu. Yasmā maggena catusaccadassanahetu āsavā na parikkhīṇā. Phalakkhaṇe
tika-s0201t:1718_0: Loketi sattaloke saṅkhāraloke ca. Sattavisattabhāvenāti laggabhāvena ceva savisesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1718_1: āsattabhāvena ca. Atha vātiādinā niddesanayavasena visattikāpadaṃ niddisati. Visatāti
tika-s0201t:1718_2: vitthaṭā rūpādīsu tebhūmakadhammesu byāpanavasena visaṭāti purimavacanameva takārassa
tika-s0201t:1718_3: ṭakāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Visālāti vipulā. Visakkatīti parisakkati sahati. Ratto hi rāgavatthunā
tika-s0201t:1718_4: pādena tāliyamānopi sahati. Osakkanaṃ, vipphandanaṃ vā visakkanantipi vadanti. Visaṃharatīti
tika-s0201t:1718_5: yathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ dassentī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito
tika-s0201t:1718_6: cittaṃ saṃharati saṅkhipati, visaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, taṃ harati upanetīti attho. Visaṃvādikāti
tika-s0201t:1718_7: aniccādiṃ niccādito gaṇhāpentī visaṃvādikā hoti. Dukkhanibbattakassa kammassa hetubhāvato
tika-s0201t:1718_8: visamūlā, visaṃ vā dukkhadukkhādibhūtā vedanā mūlaṃ etissāti visamūlā. Dukkhasamudayattā
tika-s0201t:1718_9: visaṃ phalaṃ etissāti visaphalā. Taṇhāya rūpādikassa dukkhasseva paribhogo hoti,
tika-s0201t:1718_10: na amatassāti sā “visaparibhogā”ti vuttā. Sabbattha niruttivasena saddasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1718_11: Yo panettha padhāno attho, taṃ dassetuṃ puna “visālā vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nittiṇṇo
tika-s0201t:1718_12: uttiṇṇoti upasaggavasena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Niravasesato vā tiṇṇo nittiṇṇo. Tena tena
tika-s0201t:1718_13: maggena uddhamuddhaṃ tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0201t:1721_0: 272. Sādhumayanti ettha sādhu-saddo āyācanattho, na “sādhāvuso”tiādīsu viya abhinandanādiatthoti
tika-s0201t:1721_1: āha “āyācantā”ti. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ “labheyyāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na sakkonti, kasmā? Buddhā
tika-s0201t:1721_2: hi garū honti, paramagarū uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānaṃ, na yathā tathā upasaṅkamanīyā. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:1722_0: “Pākaṭakiriyāyā”ti saṅkhepena vuttaṃ vivarituṃ “yaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhagavā sabbakālaṃ
tika-s0201t:1722_1: kimevamakāsīti? Na sabbakālamevamakāsi. Yadā pana akāsi, taṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavā paṭhamabodhiya”ntiādi
tika-s0201t:1722_2: vuttaṃ. Manussattabhāveti iminā purisattabhāvaṃ ulliṅgeti. Dhanapariccāgo kato nāma
tika-s0201t:1723_0: Mālākacavaranti milātamālākacavaraṃ. Rajojallaṃ na upalimpati acchatarachavibhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1723_1: Vuttañhetaṃ “sukhumattā chaviyā kāye rajojallaṃ na limpatī”ti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā bhagavā
tika-s0201t:1724_0: Vihāroti jetavanavihāro. Vīsatiusabhaṃ gāvutassa catuttho bhāgoti vadanti. Kadācīti
tika-s0201t:1724_1: kasmiñci buddhuppāde. Acalamevāti aparivattameva anaññabhāvato, mañcānaṃ pana appamahantatāhi
tika-s0201t:1725_0: Yantanāḷikāhi paripuṇṇasuvaṇṇarasadhārāhi. Nhānavattanti “pabbajitena nāma evaṃ nhāyitabba”nti
tika-s0201t:1725_1: nahānacārittaṃ dassetvā. Yasmā bhagavato sarīraṃ sudhantacāmīkarasamānavaṇṇaṃ suparisodhitapavāḷarucirakaracaraṇāvaraṃ
tika-s0201t:1725_3: upari mahaggharatanāvaḷisañchāditaṃ jaṅgamamiva kanakagirisikharaṃ virocittha. Tasmiñca
tika-s0201t:1725_4: samaye dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhamitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo samantato asītihatthappamāṇe
tika-s0201t:1725_8: gaganatalaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ pavanañca sammā pharanti. Tena vuttaṃ “vaṇṇabhūmi nāmesā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1725_9: Atthanti upameyyatthaṃ. Upamāyoti “īdiso ca hotī”ti yathārahaṃ tadanucchavikā upamā.
tika-s0201t:1725_10: Kāraṇānīti upamupameyyasambandhavibhāvanāni kāraṇāni. Pūretvāti vaṇṇanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1726_1: saṅghāṭiñca sandhāya vadati. Kiṃ panāyaṃ nayo buddhānampi sarīre hotīti? Na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1726_2: vattadassanatthaṃ panetaṃ katanti dassetuṃ “buddhānaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gamanavasena
tika-s0201t:1727_0: Aññatarāya pāramiyāti nekkhammapāramiyā. Vīriyapāramiyāti apare. Mahābhinikkhamanassāti
tika-s0201t:1727_1: mahantassa carimabhave abhinikkhamanassa. Tañhi mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca
tika-s0201t:1727_2: ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ mahantañca cakkavattisiriṃ pajahitvā sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa
tika-s0201t:1727_3: ca acinteyyāparimeyyabhedassa mahato atthāya hitāya sukhāya pavattattā mahanīyatāya
tika-s0201t:1728_0: Purimoti “katamāya nu kathāya sannisinnā bhavathā”ti evaṃ vuttaattho. Kā ca pana
tika-s0201t:1728_1: voti ettha ca-saddo byatireke. Tena yathāpucchitāya kathāya vakkhamānaṃ vippakatabhāvaṃ
tika-s0201t:1728_2: joteti. Pana-saddo vacanālaṅkāre. Yāya hi kathāya te bhikkhū sannisinnā, sā eva antarākathābhūtā
tika-s0201t:1728_3: vippakatā visesena puna pucchīyati. Aññāti antarā-saddassa atthamāha. Aññattho hi
tika-s0201t:1728_4: ayaṃ antarā-saddo “bhūmantaraṃ samayantara”ntiādīsu viya, antarāti vā vemajjheti
tika-s0201t:1728_5: attho. Dasakathāvatthunissitāti “kiṃ sīlaṃ nāma, kathañca pūretabbaṃ, kāni cassa
tika-s0201t:1728_6: saṃkilesavodānānī”tiādinā appicchādinissitā sīlādinissitā ca kathā. Ariyoti niddoso.
tika-s0201t:1728_7: Atha vā atthakāmehi araṇīyoti ariyo, ariyānaṃ ayanti vā ariyoti. Bhāvanāmanasikāravasena
tika-s0201t:1728_8: tuṇhī bhavanti, na ekaccabāhirakapabbajitā viya mūgabbatasamādānena. Dutiyajjhānampi
tika-s0201t:1728_9: ariyo tuṇhībhāvo vacīsaṅkhārapahānato. Mūlakammaṭṭhānanti pārihāriya kammaṭṭhānampi.
tika-s0201t:1729_0: 274. “Sannipatitānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dvaya”nti aṭṭhuppattivasena desanā pavattāti
tika-s0201t:1729_1: tassā uparidesanāya sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyesanāti ko anusandhī”ti
tika-s0201t:1729_2: anusandhiṃ pucchati. Ayaṃ tumhākaṃ pariyesanāti yā mahābhinikkhamanapaṭibaddhā dhammī
tika-s0201t:1729_3: kathā, sā tumhākaṃ dhammapariyesanā dhammavicāraṇā ariyapariyesanā nāma. Apāyamagganti
tika-s0201t:1729_4: anatthāvahaṃ maggaṃ. Uddesānukkamaṃ bhinditvāti uddesānupubbiṃ laṅghitvā. Dhamma-saddo
tika-s0201t:1730_0: Sabbatthāti yathā “puttabhariya”nti dvandasamāsavasena ekattaṃ, esa nayo sabbattha
tika-s0201t:1730_1: “dāsidāsa”ntiādīsu sabbapadesu. Parato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā sabbadā jātarūpameva hotīti
tika-s0201t:1730_2: jātarūpaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ. Dhavalasabhāvatāya rañjīyatīti rajataṃ, rūpiyaṃ. Idha pana suvaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1730_3: ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci upabhogaparibhogārahaṃ rajataṃteva gahitaṃ. Upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti
tika-s0201t:1730_4: upadhayo. Cutīsaṅkhātaṃ maraṇanti ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ maraṇamāha.
tika-s0201t:1730_5: Khaṇikanirodho pana khaṇe khaṇe. Tenāha “sattānaṃ viyā”ti. Saṃkilissatīti dūsavisena
tika-s0201t:1730_6: viya attānaṃ dūsissati. Tenāha bhagavā – “pañcime, bhikkhave, jātarūpassa upakkilesā
tika-s0201t:1730_7: ayo loha”ntiādi. Malaṃ gahetvāti yehi sahayogato malinaṃ hoti, tesaṃ malinabhāvapaccayānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1730_8: vasena malaṃ gahetvā. Jīraṇato jarādhammavāre jātarūpaṃ gahitanti yojanā. Ye pana
tika-s0201t:1730_9: jātidhammavārepi jātarūpaṃ na paṭhanti, tesaṃ itaresaṃ viya jīraṇadhammavāre sarūpato
tika-s0201t:1730_10: anāgatampi upadhiggahaṇena gahitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pariggahe ṭhitānaṃ pana vasena
tika-s0201t:1730_11: vuccamāne apākaṭānampi jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ vasena yojanā labbhateva. Jātarūpasīsena
tika-s0201t:1730_12: cettha sabbassapi anindriyabaddhassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, puttabhariyādiggahaṇena
tika-s0201t:1731: 275. Ariyehi pariyesanā, ariyānaṃ pariyesanāti vā ariyapariyesanāti samāsadvayaṃ dasseti “ayaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:1732_0: 276. Mūlato paṭṭhāyāti yaṃ mahābhinikkhamanassa mūlabhāvesuādīnavadassanaṃ, tato
tika-s0201t:1732_1: paṭṭhāya. Yasmā te bhikkhū tattha mahābhinikkhamanakathāya sannisinnā, sā ca nesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1732_2: antarākathā vippakatā, tasmā bhagavā tesaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya mahābhinikkhamanakathaṃ
tika-s0201t:1732_3: kathetuṃ ārabhi. Ahampi pubbeti visesavacanaṃ aparipakkañāṇena sayaṃ carimabhave
tika-s0201t:1732_4: tīsu pāsādesu tividhanāṭakaparivārassa dibbasampattisadisāya mahāsampattiyā anubhavanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1732_6: pariyesinti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pañcavaggiyāpīti yathāsakaṃ gihibhogaṃ anuyuttā taṃ
tika-s0201t:1732_7: pahāya pabbajitvā attakilamathānuyoge ṭhitā satthu dhammacakkapavattanadesanāya tampi
tika-s0201t:1733_0: 277. Kāmaṃ dahara-saddo “daharaṃ kumāraṃ mandaṃ uttānaseyyaka”nti ettha bāladārake
tika-s0201t:1733_1: āgato, “bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato”ti pana vakkhamānattā yuvāvatthā idha dahara-saddena
tika-s0201t:1733_2: vuttāti āha “taruṇova samāno”ti. Paṭhamavayena ekūnatiṃsavayattā. Jātiyā hi yāva
tika-s0201t:1733_3: tettiṃsavayā paṭhamavayo. Anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ yathā “devadattassa rudantassa
tika-s0201t:1733_4: pabbajī”ti. Kāmaṃ assumuccanaṃ rodanaṃ, taṃ assumukhānanti iminā pakāsitaṃ, taṃ pana
tika-s0201t:1733_5: vatvā “rudantāna”nti vacanaṃ balavasokasamuṭṭhānaṃ ārodanavatthuṃ pakāsetīti āha
tika-s0201t:1733_6: “kanditvā rodamānāna”nti. Kiṃ kusalanti gavesamānoti kinti sabbaso avajjarahitaṃ
tika-s0201t:1733_7: ekanta niyyānikaṃ pariyesamāno. Varapadanti vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi ekantena
tika-s0201t:1733_8: varaṇīyaṭṭhena varaṃ, pajjitabbaṭṭhena padaṃ. Tuṅgasarīratāya dīgho, piṅgalacakkhutāya
tika-s0201t:1733_9: piṅgaloti dīghapiṅgalo. Dhammoti vinayo, samayoti attho. Sutvāva uggaṇhinti tena
tika-s0201t:1734_0: Paṭilapanamattakenāti puna lapanamattakena. Jānātīti ñāṇo, ñāṇoti vādo ñāṇavādo,
tika-s0201t:1734_1: taṃ ñāṇavādaṃ. “Vadāmī”ti āgatattā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jānāmī”ti uttamapurisavasena attho
tika-s0201t:1734_2: vutto. Aññepi bahūti aññepi bahū mama tathābhāvaṃ jānantā “ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ jānātī”ti,
tika-s0201t:1734_3: “akampanīyatāya thiro”ti vā evaṃ vadanti. Lābhīti aññāsīti dhammassa uddisanena mahāpaññatāya
tika-s0201t:1734_4: “ayaṃ attanā gatamaggaṃ pavedeti, na anussutiko”ti aññāsi. Assāti bodhisattassa.
tika-s0201t:1734_5: Etadahosīti etaṃ “na kho āḷāro kālāmo”tiādi manasi ahosi, cintesīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1735_0: Heṭṭhimasamāpattīhi vinā uparimasamāpattīnaṃ sampādanassa asambhavato “satta samāpattiyo
tika-s0201t:1735_1: maṃ jānāpesī”ti āha. Payogaṃ kareyyanti bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjeyyanti attho. Evamāhāti
tika-s0201t:1735_2: evaṃ “ahaṃ, āvuso”tiādimāha, sattannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ adhigamaṃ paccaññāsīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1736_0: Anusūyakoti anissukī. Tena mahāpurise pasādaṃ pavedesi. Bodhisattassa tā samāpattiyo
tika-s0201t:1736_1: nibbattetvā ṭhitassa purimajātiparicayena ñāṇassa ca mahantatāya tāsaṃ gati ca abhisamparāyo
tika-s0201t:1736_2: ca upaṭṭhāsi. Tena “vaṭṭapariyāpannā evetā”ti nicchayo udapādi. Tenāha “nāyaṃ dhammo
tika-s0201t:1736_3: nibbidāyā”tiādi. Ekaccānaṃ virāgabhāvanāsamatikkamāvahopi neva tesampi accantāya
tika-s0201t:1736_4: samatikkamāvaho, sayañca vaṭṭapariyāpannoyeva, tasmā neva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya,
tika-s0201t:1736_5: yadaggena na nibbidāya, tadaggena na virajjanatthāya, rāgādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ na
tika-s0201t:1736_6: nirujjhanatthāya, na upasamatthāya, tasmā taṃ abhiññeyyadhammaṃ na abhijānanatthāya…pe…
tika-s0201t:1737_0: Yāvadeva ākiñcaññāyatanupapattiyāti sattasu samāpattīsu ukkaṭṭhaṃ gahetvā vadati.
tika-s0201t:1737_1: Uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya acutidhammaṃ pariyesituṃ yuttattā tañca anatikkantajātidhammamevāti
tika-s0201t:1737_2: mahāsatto pajahatīti āha “yañca ṭhānaṃ pāpetī”tiādi. Tato paṭṭhāyāti yadā samāpattidhammassa
tika-s0201t:1737_3: gatiñca abhisamparāyañca abbhaññāsi, tato paṭṭhāya. Makkhikāvasenāti bhojanassa makkhikāmissatāvasena.
tika-s0201t:1737_4: Manaṃ na uppādeti bhuñjitunti adhippāyo. Mahantena ussāhenāti idaṃ katipāhaṃ tattha
tika-s0201t:1737_5: bhāvanānuyogamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na aññesaṃ viya kasiṇaparikammādikaraṇaṃ. Na
tika-s0201t:1737_6: hi antimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ samāpattinibbattane bhāriyaṃ nāma. Analaṅkaritvāti
tika-s0201t:1737_7: anu anu alaṃkatvā punappunaṃ “iminā na kiñci payojana”nti katvā.
tika-s0201t:1738: 278. Vācāya uggahitamattovāti ettha pubbe vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1739_0: 279. Mahāvelā viya mahāvelā, vipulavālikapuñjatāya mahanto velātaṭo viyāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1739_1: Tenāha “mahāvālikarāsīti attho”ti. Uru maru sikatā vālukā vaṇṇu vālikāti ime saddā
tika-s0201t:1740_0: Senā nigacchi nivisi etthāti senānigamo, senāya niviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Senānigāmoti pana
tika-s0201t:1740_1: ayaṃ samaññā aparakālikā. Gocaragāmanidassanañcetaṃ. Uparisuttasminti mahāsaccakasutte.
tika-s0201t:1740_2: Idha pana bodhipallaṅko adhippeto ariyapariyesanāya vuccamānattā.
tika-s0201t:1741_1: ca gahitattā anavasesañeyyāvabodhanasamatthameva ñāṇavisesaṃ bodheti, na ñāṇamattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1741_2: na dassanamattanti āha “sabbadhammadassanasamatthañca me sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ udapādī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1741_3: Akuppatāyāti vimokkhantatāya sabbaso paṭipakkhadhammehi asaṅkhobhanīyatāya. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:1741_4: “rāgādīhi na kuppatī”ti. Ārammaṇasantatāyapi tadārammaṇānaṃ atthi viseso yathā taṃ
tika-s0201t:1741_6: sabbaññutaññāṇameva, atha kho yathādhigate paṭivedhasaddhamme ekūnavīsatividhapaccavekkhaṇañāṇampi.
tika-s0201t:1742_1: patto, yathābhūtaṃ avabuddhoti attho. Gambhīroti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā
tika-s0201t:1742_2: aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:1742_4: sarūpato ca passituṃ na sakkāti āha “gambhīrattāva duddaso”ti. Dukkhena daṭṭhabboti
tika-s0201t:1742_5: kicchena kenacideva daṭṭhabbo. Yaṃ pana daṭṭhumeva na sakkā, tassa ogāhetvā anu anu
tika-s0201t:1742_6: bujjhane kathā eva natthīti āha “duddasattāva duranubodho”ti. Dukkhena avabujjhitabbo
tika-s0201t:1742_7: avabodhassa dukkarabhāvato. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne – “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ
tika-s0201t:1742_8: nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā”ti suttapadaṃ vattabbaṃ. Santārammaṇatāya
tika-s0201t:1742_9: vā santo. Nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya nibbuto. Padhānabhāvaṃ nītoti vā paṇīto. Atittikaraṭṭhena
tika-s0201t:1742_10: atappako sādurasabhojanaṃ viya. Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti santārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1742_11: maggasaccaṃ santaṃ santārammaṇañcāti santārammaṇaṃ. Anupasantasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1742_12: saṅkhārānañca abhāvato nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya santapaṇītabhāveneva ca asecanakatāya
tika-s0201t:1742_13: atappakatā daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha “idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva sandhāya vutta”nti. Uttamañāṇavisayattā
tika-s0201t:1742_14: na takkena avacaritabbo, tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya ca saṇho. Sukhumasabhāvattā
tika-s0201t:1742_15: ca nipuṇo, bālānaṃ avisayattā paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti paṇḍitavedanīyo. Ālīyanti
tika-s0201t:1742_16: abhiramitabbaṭṭhena sevīyantīti ālayā, pañca kāmaguṇā. Ālayanti allīyantī abhiramaṇavasena
tika-s0201t:1742_17: sevantīti ālayā, taṇhāvicaritāni. Ramantīti ratiṃ vindanti kīḷanti laḷanti. Ālayaratāti ālayaniratā.
tika-s0201t:1743_0: Ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāti ṭhāna-saddaṃ sandhāya. Atthato pana ṭhānanti ca paṭiccasamuppādo
tika-s0201t:1743_1: eva adhippeto. Tiṭṭhati phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayabhūtā
tika-s0201t:1743_2: avijjādayo. Imesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayāti idappaccayā, avijjādayova. Idappaccayā
tika-s0201t:1743_3: eva idappaccayatā yathā “devo eva devatā”ti, idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano
tika-s0201t:1743_4: phalaṃ pati paccayabhāvo uppādanasamatthatā idappaccayatā. Tena samatthapaccayalakkhaṇo
tika-s0201t:1743_5: paṭiccasamuppādo dassito hoti. Paṭicca samuppajjati phalaṃ etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
tika-s0201t:1743_6: Padadvayenapi dhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭho eva vibhāvito. Tenāha “saṅkhārādipaccayānaṃ etaṃ
tika-s0201t:1743_7: adhivacana”nti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1744_1: nibbānameva. Idāni tassa nibbānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nti nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1744_2: Āgammāti paṭicca ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvahetu. Sammantīti appaṭisandhikūpasamavasena
tika-s0201t:1744_3: sammanti. Tathā santā savisesaṃ upasantā nāma hontīti āha “vūpasammantī”ti. Etena
tika-s0201t:1744_4: “sabbe saṅkhārā sammanti etthāti sabbasaṅkhārasamatho, nibbāna”nti dasseti. Sabbasaṅkhatavisaṃyutte
tika-s0201t:1744_5: ca nibbāne sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamapariyāyo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Sesapadesupi
tika-s0201t:1744_6: eseva nayo. Paṭinissaṭṭhāti samucchedavasena pariccattā honti. Sabbā taṇhāti aṭṭhasatappabhedā
tika-s0201t:1744_7: sabbāpi taṇhā. Sabbe kilesarāgāti kāmarāgarūparāgādibhedā sabbepi kilesabhūtā rāgā,
tika-s0201t:1744_8: sabbepi vā kilesā idha “kilesarāgā”ti veditabbā, na lobhavisesā eva cittassa vipariṇatabhāvāpādanato.
tika-s0201t:1744_9: Yathāha “rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, duṭṭhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, mūḷhampi cittaṃ
tika-s0201t:1745_1: ca veditabbā. Sā ca kho desanāya atthaṃ ajānantānaṃ vasena vuttā, jānantānaṃ pana
tika-s0201t:1745_2: desanāya kāyaparissamopi satthu aparissamova. Tenāha bhagavā – “na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1745_3: vihesesī”ti. Tenevāha “yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma, so mama kilamatho assā”ti. Ubhayanti
tika-s0201t:1745_4: cittakilamatho ceva cittavihesā cāti ubhayampetaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā.
tika-s0201t:1746_0: Anubrūhanaṃ sampiṇḍanaṃ. Soti “apissū”ti nipāto. Manti paṭi-saddayogena sāmiatthe
tika-s0201t:1746_1: upayogavacananti āha “mamā”ti. Vuddhippattā vā acchariyā anacchariyā. Vuddhiatthopi
tika-s0201t:1746_2: hi a-kāro hoti yathā “asekkhā dhammā”ti. Kappānaṃ satasahassaṃ cattāri ca asaṅkhyeyyāni
tika-s0201t:1746_3: sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva pāramiyo pūretvā idāni adhigatadhammarajjassa
tika-s0201t:1746_4: tattha appossukkatāpattidīpanatā, gāthātthassa acchariyatā, tassa vuddhippatti cāti
tika-s0201t:1746_5: veditabbaṃ. Atthadvārena hi gāthānaṃ anacchariyatā. Gocarā ahesunti upaṭṭhahesuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1747_0: Yadi sukhāpaṭipadāva, kathaṃ kicchatāti āha “pāramīpūraṇakāle panā”tiādi. Evamādīni
tika-s0201t:1747_1: duppariccajāni dentassa. Ha-iti vā “byatta”nti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto. Ekaṃsattheti
tika-s0201t:1747_2: keci. Ha byattaṃ, ekaṃsena vā alaṃ nippayojanaṃ evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa
tika-s0201t:1747_3: desitanti yojanā. Halanti vā “ala”nti iminā samānatthaṃ padaṃ “halanti vadāmī”tiādīsu
tika-s0201t:1747_4: viya. Rāgadosapariphuṭṭhehīti phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena rāgena dosena ca samphuṭṭhehi
tika-s0201t:1747_5: abhibhūtehi. Rāgadosānugatehīti rāgena ca dosena ca anubandhehi.
tika-s0201t:1748_0: Kāmarāgarattā bhavarāgarattā ca nīvaraṇehi nivutatāya, diṭṭhirāgarattā viparītābhinivesena.
tika-s0201t:1748_1: Na dakkhantīti yāthāvato dhammaṃ na paṭivijjhissanti. Evaṃ gāhāpetunti “anicca”ntiādinā
tika-s0201t:1748_2: sabhāvena yāthāvato dhammaṃ jānāpetuṃ. Rāgadosaparetatāpi nesaṃ sammūḷhabhāvenevāti
tika-s0201t:1749_0: 282. Dhammadesanāya appossukkatāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kasmā panā”tiādinā sayameva
tika-s0201t:1749_1: codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tattha aññātavesenāti imassa bhagavato sāvakabhāvūpagamanena
tika-s0201t:1749_2: aññātarūpena. Tāpasavesenāti keci. So pana arahattādhigameneva vigaccheyya. Tividhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1749_3: kāraṇaṃ appossukkatāpattiyā paṭipakkhassa balavabhāvo, dhammassa gambhīratā, tattha
tika-s0201t:1749_4: ca sātisayaṃ gāravanti, ta dassetuṃ “tassa hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. (Tattha paṭipakkhā
tika-s0201t:1749_5: nāma rāgādayo kilesā sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarattā. Tesaṃ balavabhāvato ciraparibhāvanāya
tika-s0201t:1749_6: sattasantānato dubbisodhiyatāya te satte mattahatthino viya dubbalapurisaṃ adhibhavitvā
tika-s0201t:1749_7: ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā anekasatayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ sunicitaṃ ghanasannivesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1749_8: kaṇṭakaduggampi adhisenti. Dūrappabhedaducchejjatāhi dubbisodhiyataṃ pana dassetuṃ
tika-s0201t:1749_9: “athassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ca anto amaṭṭhatāya kañjiyapuṇṇā lābu. Cirapārivāsikatāya
tika-s0201t:1749_10: takkabharitā cāṭi. Snehatintadubbalabhāvena vasāpītapilotikā. Telamissitatāya añjanamakkhitahattho
tika-s0201t:1749_11: dubbisodhanīyā vuttā, hīnūpamā cetā rūpapabandhabhāvato acirakālikattā ca malīnatāya,
tika-s0201t:1749_12: kilesasaṃkileso eva pana dubbisodhanīyataro anādikālikattā anusayitattā ca. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:1750_0: Paṭipakkhavigamanena gambhīropi dhammo supākaṭo bhaveyya. Paṭipakkhavigamanaṃ pana
tika-s0201t:1750_1: sammāpaṭipattipaṭibaddhaṃ, sā saddhammassavanādhīnā. Taṃ satthari dhamme ca pasādāyattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1750_2: so garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ ajjhesanahetukoti panāḷikāya sattānaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā brahmayācanānimittanti
tika-s0201t:1751_0: Upakkilesabhūtaṃ appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ etassāti apparajaṃ, apparajaṃ akkhi paññācakkhu
tika-s0201t:1751_1: yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvāti katvā apparajakkhajātikāti ayamattho vibhāvito “paññāmaye”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:1751_2: Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ yesaṃ taṃsabhāvā apparajakkhajātikāti evampi saddattho sambhavati.
tika-s0201t:1752_0: Rāgādimalena samalehi pūraṇādīhi chahi satthārehi satthupaṭiññehi kabbaracanāvasena
tika-s0201t:1752_1: cintākaviādibhāve ṭhatvā takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ cintito.
tika-s0201t:1752_2: Te kira buddhakolāhalānussavena sañjātakutūhalaṃ lokaṃ vañcetvā kohaññe ṭhatvā sabbaññutaṃ
tika-s0201t:1752_3: paṭijānantā yaṃ kiñci adhammaṃyeva dhammoti dīpesuṃ. Tenāha “te hi puretaraṃ uppajjitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1752_4: Apāpuretanti etaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti pihitaṃ nibbānanagarassa
tika-s0201t:1753_0: Selapabbato ucco hoti thiro ca, na paṃsupabbato missakapabbato cāti āha “sele yathā
tika-s0201t:1753_1: pabbatamuddhanī”ti. Dhammamayaṃ pāsādanti lokuttaradhammamāha. So hi sabbaso pasādāvaho,
tika-s0201t:1753_2: sabbadhamme atikkamma abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādasadiso ca. Paññāpariyāyo vā idha dhamma-saddo.
tika-s0201t:1753_3: Sā hi abbhuggataṭṭhena “pāsādo”ti abhidhamme niddiṭṭhā. Tathā cāha –
tika-s0201t:1756: Uṭṭhehīti vā dhammadesanāya appossukkatāsaṅkhātasaṅkocāpattito kilāsubhāvato uṭṭhaha.
tika-s0201t:1757_0: 283. Garuṭṭhāniyaṃ payirupāsitvā garutaraṃ payojanaṃ uddissa abhipatthanā ajjhesanā,
tika-s0201t:1757_1: sāpi atthato yācanāva hotīti āha “ajjhesananti yācana”nti. Padesavisayaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1757_2: ahutvā buddhānaṃyeva āveṇikabhāvato idaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ “buddhacakkhū”ti vuccatīti āha
tika-s0201t:1757_3: “imesañhi dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ buddhacakkhūti nāma”nti. Tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānanti heṭṭhimānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1757_5: tāni ñāṇāni vijjūpamabhāvena vuttāni, aggamaggañāṇaṃ pana ñāṇakiccassa sikhāppattiyā
tika-s0201t:1757_6: na dassanamattaṃ hotīti “dhammacakkhū”ti na vuccati, tato taṃ vajirūpamabhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1757_9: tikkhāni sūrāni visadāni, vuttavipariyāyena mudūni. Saddhādayo ākārāti saddahanādippakāre
tika-s0201t:1757_10: vadati. Sundarāti kalyāṇā. Sammohavinodaniyaṃ pana “yesaṃ āsayādayo koṭṭhāsā sundarā,
tika-s0201t:1757_11: te svākārā, viparītā dvākārā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ imāya atthavaṇṇanāya aññadatthu saṃsandati
tika-s0201t:1757_12: sametīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāraṇaṃ nāma paccayākāro, saccāni vā.
tika-s0201t:1758_0: Ayaṃ panettha pāḷīti ettha apparajakkhādipadānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ tassatthassa
tika-s0201t:1758_1: vibhāvanī pāḷi. Saddhādīnaṃ vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ balavabhāvo tappaṭipakkhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1758_2: pāpadhammānaṃ dubbalabhāveneva hoti, tesañca balavabhāvo saddhādīnaṃ dubbalabhāvenāti
tika-s0201t:1758_4: vibhajitvā dassitā. Khandhādayo eva lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko. Sampattibhavabhūto
tika-s0201t:1758_5: loko sampattibhavaloko, sugatisaṅkhāto upapattibhavo. Sampatti sambhavati etenāti
tika-s0201t:1759_0: Puna ekakadukādivasena lokaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “eko loko”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āhārādayo
tika-s0201t:1759_1: viya hi āhāraṭṭhitikā saṅkhārā lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti. Ettha eko loko sabbe
tika-s0201t:1759_2: sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti yāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavutti,
tika-s0201t:1759_3: tāya sabbe saṅkhārā ekova loko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato. Dve lokātiādīsupi
tika-s0201t:1759_4: iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Nāmaggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā.
tika-s0201t:1759_5: Nanu ca āhāraṭṭhitikāti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphalānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
tika-s0201t:1759_6: Nāpajjati pariññeyyānaṃ dukkhasaccadhammānaṃ idha “loko”ti adhippetattā. Atha vā
tika-s0201t:1759_7: na lujjati na palujjatīti yo gahito tathā na hoti, so lokoti taṃ-gahaṇarahitānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1759_8: lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā upādānakkhandhā. Dasāyatanānīti
tika-s0201t:1760_0: Vivaṭṭajjhāsayassa adhippetattā tassa ca sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ garahitabbaṃ vajjitabbañca
tika-s0201t:1760_1: hutvā upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ “sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjaṃ, sabbe bhavagāmikammā vajja”nti.
tika-s0201t:1760_2: Apparajakkhamahārajakkhādīsu pañcasu dukesu ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa katvā “paññāsāya
tika-s0201t:1760_3: ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā anvayato byatirekato ca saddhādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1760_4: indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ jānātīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ. Ettha ca apparajakkhādibhabbādivasena
tika-s0201t:1760_5: āvajjentassa bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, na ekekā.
tika-s0201t:1761_0: Uppalāni ettha santīti uppalinī, gacchopi jalāsayopi, idha pana jalāsayo adhippetoti
tika-s0201t:1761_1: āha “uppalavane”ti. Yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pusanti vaḍḍhanti, tāni
tika-s0201t:1761_2: antonimuggaposīni. Dīpitānīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitāni, idheva vā “aññānipī”tiādinā bhāsitāni.
tika-s0201t:1762_0: Ugghaṭitaññūti ugghaṭitaṃ nāma ñāṇugghaṭanaṃ, ñāṇe ugghaṭitamatte eva jānātīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1762_1: Vipañcitaṃ vitthāritameva atthaṃ jānātīti vipañcitaññū. Uddesādīhi netabboti neyyo.
tika-s0201t:1762_2: Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhāre udāhaṭamatteyeva. Dhammābhisamayoti catusaccadhammassa
tika-s0201t:1762_3: ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena
tika-s0201t:1762_4: saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ
tika-s0201t:1762_5: samattho puggalo “ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṃkhittena mātikaṃ
tika-s0201t:1762_6: ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo “vipañcitaññū”ti
tika-s0201t:1762_7: vuccati. Uddesatoti uddesahetu, uddisantassa, uddisāpentassa vāti attho. Paripucchatoti
tika-s0201t:1762_8: atthaṃ paripucchantassa. Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatti
tika-s0201t:1762_9: hoti. Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā
tika-s0201t:1762_10: antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo padaparamoti
tika-s0201t:1762_11: ayaṃ puggalo byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assāti padaparamoti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1763_1: Yasmā pana duhetukānampi ariyamaggapaṭivedho natthi, tasmā duhetukā paṭisandhipi
tika-s0201t:1763_4: manussā acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā. Duppaññāti bhavaṅgapaññāya parihīnā. Bhavaṅgapaññāya
tika-s0201t:1763_5: pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti, sopi duppañño eva
tika-s0201t:1763_6: nāma. Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0201t:1763_7: maggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā. Na kammāvaraṇenātiādīni vuttavipariyāyena veditabbāni.
tika-s0201t:1764_0: Nibbānassa dvāraṃ pavisanamaggo. Vivaritvā ṭhapito mahākaruṇūpanissayena sayambhuñāṇena
tika-s0201t:1764_1: adhigatattā. Saddhaṃ pamuñcantūti attano saddhaṃ pavesentu, saddahanākāraṃ upaṭṭhapentūti
tika-s0201t:1764_2: attho. Sukhena akicchena pavattanīyatāya suppavattitaṃ. Na bhāsiṃ na bhāsissāmīti cintesiṃ.
tika-s0201t:1765_0: 284. Dhammaṃ desessāmīti evaṃ pavattitadhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyuttassa vitakkassa sattamasattāhato
tika-s0201t:1765_1: paraṃ aṭṭhamasattāheyeva uppannattā vuttaṃ “aṭṭhame sattāhe”ti. Na itarasattāhāni
tika-s0201t:1765_2: viya paṭiniyatakiccalakkhitassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma pavattitassa sabbhāvā.
tika-s0201t:1766_0: Vivaṭanti devatāviggahena vivaṭaaṅgapaccaṅganiddāya janānaṃ pākaṭaṃ vippakāranti
tika-s0201t:1766_2: pathavīparivattanacetiyaṃ nāma dassetvā. Sākiyakoliyamallarajjavasena tīṇi rajjāni.
tika-s0201t:1766_3: Rukkhamūleti nigrodhamūle. Vatvā pakkāmi, pakkamantiyā cassā mahāsatto ākāraṃ dassesi
tika-s0201t:1767_0: Divāvihāraṃ katvāti nānāsamāpattiyo samāpajjanena divāvihāraṃ viharitvā. “Kāmaṃ taco
tika-s0201t:1767_1: ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, upasussatu sarīre maṃsalohita”ntiādinā sutte āgatanayena
tika-s0201t:1768_0: Navayojananti ubbedhato vuttaṃ, puthulato dvādasayojanā, dīghato yāva cakkavāḷā āyatāti
tika-s0201t:1768_1: vadanti. Ajjhottharanto upasaṅkamitvā – “uṭṭhehi so, siddhattha, ahaṃ imassa pallaṅkassa
tika-s0201t:1768_2: anucchaviko”ti vatvā tattha sakkhiṃ otārento attano parisaṃ niddisi. Ekappahāreneva
tika-s0201t:1768_3: – “ayameva anucchaviko, ayameva anucchaviko”ti kolāhalamakāsi, taṃ sutvā mahāsatto…pe…
tika-s0201t:1771_0: Pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ visodhetvāti ānetvā sambandho sīhāvalokanañāyena. Vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0201t:1771_1: sammasitvāti catusaccamanasikāraṃ sandhāyāha. Imassa pallaṅkassa atthāyāti pallaṅkasīsena
tika-s0201t:1771_2: adhigatavisesaṃ dasseti. Tattha hi sikhāppattavimuttisukhaṃ avijahanto antarantarā
tika-s0201t:1771_3: ca paṭiccasamuppādaṅgaṃ manasikaronto ekapallaṅkena nisīdi. Ekaccānanti yā adhigatamaggā
tika-s0201t:1771_4: sacchikatanirodhā ekadesena ca buddhaguṇe jānanti, tā ṭhapetvā tadaññesaṃ devatānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1771_5: Aññepi buddhattakarāti visākhāpuṇṇamato paṭṭhāya rattindivaṃ evaṃ niccasamāhitabhāvahetukānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1771_6: buddhaguṇānaṃ upari aññepi buddhattasādhakā, “ayaṃ buddho”ti buddhabhāvassa paresaṃ
tika-s0201t:1771_7: vibhāvanā dhammā kiṃ nu kho atthīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1772_1: devatāhi māpite ratanamayacaṅkame. Ratanabhūtānaṃ sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ tattha ca
tika-s0201t:1772_2: anantanayassa dhammaratanassa sammasanena taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jātantipi
tika-s0201t:1772_3: vadanti. Evanti vakkhamānākārena. Chabbaṇṇānaṃ rasmīnaṃ dantehi nikkhamanato chaddantanāgakulaṃ
tika-s0201t:1773: Heṭṭhā lohapāsādappamāṇoti navabhūmakassa sabbapaṭhamassa lohapāsādassa heṭṭhā lohapāsādappamāṇo. Khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tattha “bhaṇḍāgāragabbhappamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1774_0: Paccaggheti abhinave. Paccekaṃ mahagghatāya paccaggheti keci, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Na
tika-s0201t:1774_1: hi buddhā bhagavanto mahagghaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti paribhuñjanti vā. Piṇḍapātanti ettha
tika-s0201t:1774_2: manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca sandhāya vadati. Ayaṃ vitakkoti – “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0201t:1775_3: medhāya samannāgatoti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Mahājāniyoti mahāparihāniko. Āgamanapādāpi
tika-s0201t:1775_4: natthīti idaṃ paṭhamaṃ vattabbaṃ, athāhaṃ tattha gaccheyyaṃ, gantvā desiyamānaṃ dhammampissa
tika-s0201t:1775_5: sotuṃ sotapasādopi natthīti yojanā. Kiṃ pana bhagavatā attano buddhānubhāvena te
tika-s0201t:1775_6: dhammaṃ ñāpetuṃ na sakkāti? Āma, na sakkā. Na hi parato ghosaṃ antarena sāvakānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1775_7: dhammābhisamayo sambhavati, aññathā itarapaccayarahitassapi dhammābhisamayena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1775_8: na ca taṃ atthi. Vuttañhetaṃ – “dveme, bhikkhave, paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya
tika-s0201t:1775_9: parato ca ghoso ajjhattañca yonisomanasikāro”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ rāmasseva samāpattilābhitā
tika-s0201t:1775_10: āgatā, na udakassa, taṃ tassa bodhisattena samāgatakālavasena vuttaṃ. So hi pubbepi
tika-s0201t:1775_11: tattha yuttappayutto viharanto mahāpurisena khippaññeva samāpattīnaṃ nibbattitabhāvaṃ
tika-s0201t:1775_12: sutvā saṃvegajāto mahāsatte tato nibbijja pakkante ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva
tika-s0201t:1775_13: aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi. Tena vuttaṃ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbattoti addasā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1775_14: Ete aṭṭha brāhmaṇāti sambandho. Chaḷaṅgavāti chaḷaṅgaviduno. Mantanti mantapadaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1776_1: gatiyo bhavanti anaññā”ti vuttaniyāmena nicchinituṃ asakkontā brāhmaṇā vuttameva
tika-s0201t:1776_2: paṭipajjiṃsu, na mahāpurisassa buddhabhāvappattiṃ paccāsīsiṃsu. Ime pana koṇḍaññādayo
tika-s0201t:1776_3: pañca “ekaṃsato buddho bhavissatī”ti jātanicchayattā mantapadaṃ atikkantā. Puṇṇapattanti
tika-s0201t:1776_4: tuṭṭhidānaṃ. Nibbitakkāti nibbikappā, na dvedhā takkā.
tika-s0201t:1777_0: Vappakāleti vapanakāle. Vapanatthaṃ bījāni nīharaṇantena tattha aggaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1777_1: bījaggadānaṃ nāma. Lāyanaggādīsupi eseva nayo. Dhaññaphalassa nātipariṇatakāle puthukakāle.
tika-s0201t:1777_2: Lāyaneti sassalāyane. Yathā lūnaṃ hatthakaṃ katvā veṇivasena bandhanaṃ veṇikaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1777_3: Veṇiyo pana purisabhāravasena bandhanaṃ kalāpo. Khale kalāpānaṃ ṭhapanadivase aggaṃ
tika-s0201t:1777_4: gahetvā dānaṃ khalaggaṃ. Madditvā vīhīnaṃ rāsikaraṇadivase aggaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ bhaṇḍaggaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1777_5: Koṭṭhāgāre dhaññassa pakkhipanadivase dānaṃ koṭṭhaggaṃ. Uddharitvāti khalato dhaññassa
tika-s0201t:1777_6: uddharitvā. Navannaṃ aggadānānaṃ dinnattāti idaṃ tassa rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvatthāya
tika-s0201t:1777_7: katābhinīhārānurūpaṃ pavattitasāvakapāramiyā ciṇṇante pavattitattā vuttaṃ. Tiṇṇampi
tika-s0201t:1777_8: hi bodhisattānaṃ taṃtaṃpāramiyā sikhāppattakāle pavattitaṃ puññaṃ apuññaṃ vā garutaravipākameva
tika-s0201t:1777_9: hoti, dhammassa ca sabbapaṭhamaṃ sacchikiriyāya vinā kathaṃ rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvasiddhīti.
tika-s0201t:1777_10: Bahukārā kho ime pañcavaggiyāti idaṃ pana upakārānussaraṇamattakameva paricayavasena
tika-s0201t:1778_0: 285. Vivareti majjhe. Tenāha “tigāvutantare ṭhāne”ti. Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1778_1: na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarā-saddayogena upayogavacanassa icchitattā.
tika-s0201t:1779_0: Sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ abhibhavitvā pariññābhisamayavasena atikkamitvā. Catubhūmakadhammaṃ
tika-s0201t:1779_1: anavasesaṃ ñeyyaṃ sabbaso ñeyyāvaraṇassa pahīnattā sabbaññutaññāṇena avediṃ. Rajjanadussanamuyhanādinā
tika-s0201t:1779_2: kilesena. Appahātabbampi kusalābyākataṃ tappaṭibaddhakilesamathanena pahīnattā na
tika-s0201t:1779_3: hotīti āha “sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ jahitvā ṭhito”ti. Ārammaṇatoti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena.
tika-s0201t:1780_0: Kiñcāpi lokiyadhammānampi yādiso lokanāthassa adhigamo, na tādiso adhigamo parūpadeso
tika-s0201t:1780_1: atthi, lokuttaradhamme panassa lesopi natthīti āha “lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo
tika-s0201t:1780_2: nāma natthī”ti. Paṭibhāgapuggaloti sīlādīhi guṇehi paṭinidhibhūto puggalo. Sahetunāti
tika-s0201t:1780_3: sahadhammena sapāṭihīrakatāya. Nayenāti abhijānanatādividhinā. Cattāri saccānīti
tika-s0201t:1780_4: idaṃ tabbinimuttassa ñeyyassa abhāvato vuttaṃ. Sayaṃ buddhoti sayameva sayambhuñāṇena
tika-s0201t:1780_5: buddho. Vigatapariḷāhatāya sītibhūto. Tato eva nibbuto. Āhañchanti āhanissāmi. Veneyyānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1780_6: amatādhigamāya ugghosanādiṃ katvā satthu dhammadesanā amatadundubhīti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1781_0: Anantañāṇo jitakilesoti anantajino. Evampi nāma bhaveyyāti evaṃvidhe nāma rūparatane
tika-s0201t:1781_1: īdisena ñāṇena bhavitabbanti adhippāyo. Ayaṃ hissa pabbajjāya paccayo jāto, katādhikāro
tika-s0201t:1781_2: cesa. Tathā hi bhagavā tena samāgamatthaṃ padasāva taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
tika-s0201t:1782: Koṭṭhāsasampannāti aṅgapaccaṅgasaṅkhātaavayavasampannā. Aṭṭīyatīti aṭṭo hoti, domanassaṃ āpajjatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1783_0: Avihaṃ upapannāseti avihesu nibbattā. Vimuttāti aggaphalavimuttiyā vimuttā. Te hitvā
tika-s0201t:1783_1: mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upajjhagunti te upakā dayo mānusaṃ attabhāvaṃ jahitvā orambhāgiyasaṃyojanappahānena
tika-s0201t:1783_2: avihesu nibbattamattāva aggamaggādhigamena dibbayogaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanaṃ samatikkamiṃsu.
tika-s0201t:1784_0: 286. Saṇṭhapesunti “neva abhivādetabbo”tiādinā saṇṭhaṃ kiriyākāraṃ akaṃsu. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:1784_1: “katikaṃ akaṃsū”ti. Padhānatoti pubbe anuṭṭhitadukkaracaraṇato. Pabhāvitanti vācāsamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1784_2: vacīnicchāraṇanti attho. “Ayaṃ na kiñci visesaṃ adhigamissatī”ti anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1784_3: “Mayaṃ yattha katthaci gamissāmā”ti mā vitakkayittha. Obhāsoti vipassanobhāso. Nimittanti
tika-s0201t:1784_4: kammaṭṭhānanimittaṃ. Ekapadenevāti ekavacaneneva. “Anena pubbepi na kiñci micchā
tika-s0201t:1785_0: Antovihāreyeva ahosi daharakumāro viya tehi bhikkhūhi pariharito. Maleti saṃkilese.
tika-s0201t:1785_1: Gāmato bhikkhūhi nīhaṭaṃ upanītaṃ bhattaṃ etassāti nīhaṭabhatto, tena nīhaṭabhattena
tika-s0201t:1785_2: bhagavatā. Ettakaṃ kathāmagganti – “dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyesanā”ti ārabhitvā yāva
tika-s0201t:1785_3: – “natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti padaṃ, ettakaṃ desanāmaggaṃ. Kāmañcettha – “tumhepi
tika-s0201t:1785_4: mamañceva pañcavaggiyānañca maggaṃ ārūḷhā, ariyapariyesanā tumhākaṃ pariyesanā”ti
tika-s0201t:1785_5: aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ. Tena pana – “so kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, attanā jātidhammo samāno…pe…
tika-s0201t:1785_6: asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ ajjhagamanti, atha kho, bhikkhave, pañcavaggiyā
tika-s0201t:1785_7: bhikkhū mayā evaṃ ovadiyamānā…pe… anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ ajjhagamaṃsu…pe…
tika-s0201t:1785_8: natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti imasseva suttapadassa attho vibhāvitoti katvā vuttaṃ “bhagavā
tika-s0201t:1785_9: yaṃ pubbe avaca tumhepi mamañceva pañcavaggiyānañca maggaṃ āruḷhā, ariyapariyesanā
tika-s0201t:1785_10: tumhākaṃ pariyesanāti. Imaṃ ekameva anusandhiṃ dassento āharī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1786_1: gadhitādibhāvena paribhuñjanato. Micchājīvavasenapi anariyapariyesanā hotīti tato
tika-s0201t:1786_3: Idāni catūsu paccayesu kāmaguṇe niddhāretuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paribhogarasoti
tika-s0201t:1786_4: paribhogapaccayapītisomanassaṃ. Ayaṃ pana rasasamānatāvasena gahaṇaṃ upādāya “raso”ti
tika-s0201t:1786_5: vutto, na sabhāvato. Sabhāvena gahaṇaṃ upādāya pītisomanassaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ siyā,
tika-s0201t:1786_6: na rasārammaṇaṃ. Appaccavekkhaṇaparibhogoti paccavekkhaṇarahito paribhogo, idamatthitaṃ
tika-s0201t:1786_7: anissāya gadhitādibhāvena paribhogoti attho. Gadhitāti taṇhāya baddhā. Mucchitāti
tika-s0201t:1786_8: mucchaṃ mohaṃ pamādaṃ āpannā. Ajjhogāḷhāti adhiogāḷhā, taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā
tika-s0201t:1786_9: ṭhitā. Ādīnavaṃ apassantāti sacchandarāgaparibhoge dosaṃ ajānantā. Apaccavekkhitaparibhogahetuādīnavaṃ
tika-s0201t:1787_0: Pāsarāsinti pāsasamudāyaṃ. Luddako hi pāsaṃ oḍḍento na ekaṃyeva, na ca ekasmiṃyeva
tika-s0201t:1787_1: ṭhāne oḍḍeti, atha kho taṃtaṃmigānaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ sallakkhetvā tattha tattha oḍḍento
tika-s0201t:1787_2: bahūyeva oḍḍeti, tasmā te cittena ekato gahetvā “pāsarāsī”ti vuttaṃ. Vāgurassa vā
tika-s0201t:1790_0: 288. Setaparivāroti setapaṭicchado, setavaṇṇālaṅkāroti attho. Pubbe pana “setālaṅkārā”ti
tika-s0201t:1790_1: assālaṅkāro gahito, idha cakkapañjarakubbarādirathāvayavesu kātabbālaṅkāro. Evaṃ
tika-s0201t:1790_2: vuttenāti evaṃ “setāya suda”ntiādinā pakārena saṃyuttamahāvagge vuttena. Nātimahā
tika-s0201t:1790_3: yuddhamaṇḍale sañcārasukhatthaṃ. Yodho sārathīti dvinnaṃ, paharaṇadāyakena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:1791_0: Nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti nagarasobhanatthaṃ. Idaṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa jāṇussoṇiṭṭhānantaraṃ
tika-s0201t:1791_1: jātisiddhaṃ paramparāgataṃ cārittaṃ. Tenāha “ito ettakehi divasehī”tiādi. Cārittavasena
tika-s0201t:1791_2: nagaravāsinopi tathā tathā paṭipajjanti. Puññavādimaṅgalakathane niyuttā māṅgalikā.
tika-s0201t:1791_3: Suvatthipattanāya sovatthikā. Ādi-saddena vandīādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Yasasirisampattiyāti
tika-s0201t:1791_4: yasasampattiyā sirisampattiyā ca, parivārasampattiyā ceva vibhavasobhāsampattiyā cāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1792_0: Nagarābhimukho pāyāsi attano bhikkhācāravelāya. Paṇḍito maññeti ettha maññeti idaṃ
tika-s0201t:1792_1: “maññatī”ti iminā samānatthaṃ nipātapadaṃ. Tassa iti-saddaṃ ānetvā atthaṃ dassento
tika-s0201t:1792_2: “paṇḍitoti maññatī”ti āha. Anumatipucchāvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “udāhu no”ti.
tika-s0201t:1792_3: “Taṃ kiṃ maññati bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiya”nti hi vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1792_4: puna gaṇhanto “paṇḍito maññe”ti āha. Tasmā vuttaṃ “bhavaṃ vacchāyano, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ
tika-s0201t:1792_5: paṇḍitoti maññati, udāhu no”ti, yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ kathehīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1793_0: Ahaṃ ko nāma, mama avisayo esoti dasseti. Ko cāti hetunissakke paccattavacananti
tika-s0201t:1793_1: āha “kuto cā”ti. Tathā cāha “kena kāraṇena jānissāmī”ti, yena kāraṇena samaṇassa
tika-s0201t:1793_2: gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jāneyyaṃ, taṃ kāraṇaṃ mayi natthīti adhippāyo. Buddhoyeva
tika-s0201t:1793_3: bhaveyya, abuddhassa sabbathā buddhañāṇānubhāvaṃ jānituṃ na sakkāti. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0201t:1793_4: – “appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, oramattakaṃ sīlamattakaṃ, yena puthujjano
tika-s0201t:1793_5: tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyya, atthi, bhikkhave, aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā
tika-s0201t:1793_6: duranubodhā …pe… yehi tathāgatassa yathābhuccaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā”ti
tika-s0201t:1793_7: ca. Etthāti “sopi nūnassa tādisovā”ti etasmiṃ pade. Pasattha pasatthoti pasatthehi
tika-s0201t:1793_8: attano guṇeheva so pasattho, na tassa kittinā, pasaṃsāsabhāveneva pāsaṃsoti attho.
tika-s0201t:1793_9: Tenāha “sabbaguṇāna”ntiādi. Maṇiratananti cakkavattino maṇiratanaṃ. Sadevake loke
tika-s0201t:1793_10: pāsaṃsānampi pāsaṃsoti dassetuṃ “pasatthehi vā”ti dutiyavikappo gahito.
tika-s0201t:1794_0: Araṇīyato attho, so eva vasatīti vasoti atthavaso, tassa tassa payogassa ānisaṃsabhūtaṃ
tika-s0201t:1794_1: phalanti āha “atthavasanti atthānisaṃsa”nti. Attho vā vuttalakkhaṇo vaso etassāti
tika-s0201t:1794_2: atthavaso, kāraṇaṃ. Nāgavanavāsikoti hatthināgānaṃ vicaraṇavane tesaṃ gahaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1794_3: vasanako. Anuggahitasippoti asikkhitahatthisippo āyatavitthatassa padamattassa dassanena
tika-s0201t:1794_4: “mahā vata, bho nāgo”ti niṭṭhāgamanato. Parato pana bhagavatā vuttaṭṭhāne. Uggahitasippo
tika-s0201t:1794_5: puriso nāgavanikoti āgato āyatavitthatassa padassa uccassa ca nisevitassa byabhicārabhāvaṃ
tika-s0201t:1794_6: ñatvā tattakena niṭṭhaṃ agantvā mahāhatthiṃ disvāva niṭṭhāgamanato. Ñāṇaṃ pajjati
tika-s0201t:1794_7: etthāti ñāṇapadāni, khattiyapaṇḍitādīnaṃ dhammavinaye vinītattā vinayehi adhigatajjhānādīni.
tika-s0201t:1794_8: Tāni hi tathāgatagandhahatthino desanāñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānāni. Cattārīti pana vineyyānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1795_0: 289. Puggalesu paññāya ca nipuṇatā paṇḍitasamaññā nipuṇatthassa dassanasamatthatāvasenevāti
tika-s0201t:1795_2: Pare pavadanti ettha, etenāti parappavādo, parasamayo. Parehi pavadanaṃ parappavādo,
tika-s0201t:1795_3: viggāhikakathāya paravādamaddanaṃ. Tadubhayampi ekato katvā pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti āha
tika-s0201t:1795_4: “viññātaparappavāde ceva parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicaye cā”ti, parasamayesu paravādamaddanesu
tika-s0201t:1795_5: ca nipphanneti attho. Vālavedhirūpeti vālavedhipatirūpe. Tenāha “vālavedhidhanuggahasadise”ti.
tika-s0201t:1795_6: Vālanti anekadhā bhinnassa vālassa aṃsusaṅkhātaṃ vālaṃ. Bhindantā viyāti ghaṭādiṃ
tika-s0201t:1795_7: saviggahaṃ muggarādinā bhindantā viya, diṭṭhigatāni ekaṃsato bhindantāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1795_8: “Atthaṃ guyhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ katvā pucchissāmā”ti saṅkhataṃ padapañhaṃ pucchantīti
tika-s0201t:1795_9: dassetuṃ “dupadampī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vadanti etenāti vādo, doso. Pucchīyatīti pañho,
tika-s0201t:1795_10: attho. Pucchati etenāti pañho, saddo. Tadubhayaṃ ekato gahetvā āha “evarūpe pañhe”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1795_11: “Evaṃ puccheyya, evaṃ vissajjeyyā”ti ca pucchāvissajjanānaṃ sikhāvagamanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1796_0: Evaṃ attano vādavidhamanabhayenapi pare bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ na visahantīti
tika-s0201t:1796_1: vatvā idāni vādavidhamanena vināpi na visahanti evāti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1796_2: Cittaṃ pasīdati pare attano attabhāvampi vissatthaṃ niyyādetukāmā honti odhisakamettāpharaṇasadisattā
tika-s0201t:1796_3: tassa mettāyanassa. Dassanasampannāti daṭṭhabbatāya sampannā dassanānuttariyabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1797_1: pana sāvakattaṃ parato āgamissati, tañca pabbajitavasena vuccati, idha gahaṭṭhavasena,
tika-s0201t:1797_2: ubhayatthāpi saraṇagamanena sāvakattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Te hi paralokavajjabhayadassāvino
tika-s0201t:1797_3: kulaputtā, ācārakulaputtāpi tādisā bhavanti. Thokenāti iminā “manaṃ anassāmā”ti padassatthaṃ vadati.
tika-s0201t:1798_0: 290. Udāharīyati ubbegapītivasenāti, tathā vā udāharaṇaṃ udānaṃ. Tenāha “udāhāraṃ
tika-s0201t:1798_1: udāharī”ti. Assa dhammassāti assa paṭipattisaddhammapubbakassa paṭivedhasaddhammassa.
tika-s0201t:1798_2: Soti hatthipadopamo hatthipadopamabhāvena vuccamāno dhammo. Ettāvatāti ettakena paribbājakena
tika-s0201t:1798_3: vuttakathāmaggamattena. Kāmaṃ tena vuttakathāmaggenapi hatthipadopamabhāvena vuccamāno
tika-s0201t:1798_4: dhammo paripuṇṇova arahattaṃ pāpetvā paveditattā, so ca kho saṅkhepato, na vitthāratoti
tika-s0201t:1798_5: āha “na ettāvatā vitthārena paripūro hotī”ti. Yadi yathā vitthārena hatthipadopamo
tika-s0201t:1798_6: paripūro hoti, tathā desanā āraddhā, atha kasmā kusaloti na vuttoti codanā.
tika-s0201t:1799_0: 291. Āyāmatopīti pi-saddena ubbedhenapi rassāti dasseti. Nīcakāyā hi tā honti. Uccāti
tika-s0201t:1799_1: uccakā. Nisevanaṃ, nisevati etthāti vā nisevitaṃ. Nisevanañcettha kaṇḍuyitavinodanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1799_2: ghaṃsanaṃ. Tenāha “khandhappadese ghaṃsitaṭṭhāna”nti. Uccāti anīcā, ubbedhavantiyoti
tika-s0201t:1799_3: attho. Kāḷārikāti viraḷadantā, visaṅgatadantāti attho. Tenāha “dantāna”ntiādi. Kaḷāratāyāti
tika-s0201t:1799_4: viraḷatāya. Ārañjitānīti rañjitāni, vilikhitānīti attho. Kaṇerutāyāti kuṭumalasaṇṭhānatāya.
tika-s0201t:1799_5: Ayaṃ vāti ettha vā-saddo saṃsayitanicchayattho yathā aññatthāpi “ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1800_0: Nāgavanaṃ viyāti mahāhatthino vāmanikādīnañca padadassanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ nāgavanaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:1800_1: Ādito paṭṭhāya yāva nīvaraṇappahānā dhammadesanā tathāgatassa bāhiraparibbājakādīnañca
tika-s0201t:1800_2: padadassanabhāvato. Ādito paṭṭhāyāti ca “taṃ suṇāhī”ti padato paṭṭhāya. Kusalo nāgavaniko
tika-s0201t:1800_3: viya yogāvacaro pariyesanavasena pamāṇaggahaṇato. Matthake ṭhatvāti imassa suttassa
tika-s0201t:1800_4: pariyosāne ṭhatvā. Imasmimpi ṭhāneti “evameva kho brāhmaṇā”tiādinā upameyyassa atthassa upaññāsanaṭṭhānepi.
tika-s0201t:1801_0: Svāyanti idha-saddamattaṃ gaṇhāti, na yathāvisesitabbaṃ idha-saddaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati
tika-s0201t:1801_1: “katthaci padapūraṇamattamevā”ti. Lokaṃ upādāya vuccati loka-saddena samānādhikaraṇabhāvena
tika-s0201t:1801_2: vuttattā. Sesapadadvaye pana saddantarasannidhānamattena taṃ taṃ upādāya vuttatā
tika-s0201t:1801_3: daṭṭhabbā. Okāsanti kañci padesaṃ indasālaguhāya adhippetattā. Padapūraṇamattameva
tika-s0201t:1802_1: vutto eva. Tathāgatassa sattanikāyantogadhatāya “idha pana sattaloko adhippeto”ti
tika-s0201t:1802_2: vatvā tatthāyaṃ yasmiṃ sattanikāye, yasmiñca okāse uppajjati, taṃ dassetuṃ “sattaloke
tika-s0201t:1802_3: uppajjamānopi cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷeti imissā eva lokadhātuyā.
tika-s0201t:1802_4: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddho
tika-s0201t:1802_5: apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyu”nti ettha jātikhettabhūtā dasasahassilokadhātu “ekissā
tika-s0201t:1802_6: lokadhātuyā”ti vuttā. Idha pana imaṃyeva lokadhātuṃ sandhāya “imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe”ti
tika-s0201t:1802_7: vuttaṃ. Tisso hi saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane visayakhettaṃ āṇākhettaṃ
tika-s0201t:1802_8: jātikhettanti tividhe khette ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti
tika-s0201t:1802_9: suttaṃ natthi, na uppajjantīti pana atthi. Kathaṃ? “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me
tika-s0201t:1802_10: na vijjati, ekomhi sammāsambuddho”ti evamādīni imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena
tika-s0201t:1802_11: bhagavatā – “kiṃ panāvuso, sāriputta, atthetarahi añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā
tika-s0201t:1802_12: samasamo sambodhiyanti evaṃ puṭṭhāhaṃ, bhante, noti vadeyya”nti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1802_13: dassetuṃ – “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti
tika-s0201t:1802_14: imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ
tika-s0201t:1803_0: Sujātāyātiādinā vuttesu catūsu vikappesu paṭhamo vikappo buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattidassanavasena
tika-s0201t:1803_1: vutto. Āsannatarāya hi paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito “uppajjatī”ti vuccati uppādassa ekantikattā,
tika-s0201t:1803_2: pageva paṭipattiyā matthake ṭhito. Dutiyo buddhabhāvāvahapabbajjato paṭṭhāya āsannapaṭipattidassanavasena,
tika-s0201t:1803_4: Na hi mahāsattānaṃ tusitabhavūpapattito paṭṭhāya bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-s0201t:1803_5: Catuttho buddhakaradhammasamārambhato paṭṭhāya. Bodhiyā niyatabhāvāpattito pabhuti
tika-s0201t:1803_6: hi viññūhi “buddho uppajjatī”ti vattuṃ sakkā uppādassa ekantikattā, yathā pana “tiṭṭhanti
tika-s0201t:1803_7: pabbatā, sandanti nadiyo”ti tiṭṭhanasandanakiriyānaṃ avicchedamupādāya vattamānapayogo,
tika-s0201t:1803_8: evaṃ uppādatthāya paṭipajjanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya catūsu vikappesu “uppajjati
tika-s0201t:1803_9: nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvanti sabbehi upari vuccamānehi visesehi
tika-s0201t:1804_0: So bhagavāti yo “tathāgato araha”ntiādinā kittitaguṇo, so bhagavā. Imaṃ lokanti nayidaṃ
tika-s0201t:1804_1: mahājanassa sammukhāmattaṃ lokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho anavasesaṃ pariyādāyāti
tika-s0201t:1804_2: dassetuṃ “sadevaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha “idāni vattabbaṃ nidassetī”ti. Pajātattāti
tika-s0201t:1804_4: itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā. Sadevakanti ca avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho.
tika-s0201t:1804_5: Chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ paccāsattiñāyena. Tattha hi so jāto tannivāsī ca. Brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇanti
tika-s0201t:1804_8: gahitattā. Kāmaṃ “sadevaka”ntiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo loka-saddoti viññāyati
tika-s0201t:1804_9: tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ, “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso
tika-s0201t:1805_0: Arūpino sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharantā “dibbantīti devā”ti imaṃ nibbacanaṃ
tika-s0201t:1805_2: devānaṃ sahabyata”nti. Samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko gahito tassa savisesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1805_3: mārassa vase vattanato. Rūpī brahmaloko gahito arūpībrahmalokassa visuṃ gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:1805_4: Catuparisavasenāti khattiyādicatuparisavasena. Itarā pana catasso parisā samārakādiggahaṇena
tika-s0201t:1806_0: Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni tena tena visesena abhāgasova
tika-s0201t:1806_1: lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ukkaṭṭhaparicchedatoti
tika-s0201t:1806_2: ukkaṃsagabhivijānanena. Pañcasu hi gatīsu devalokova seṭṭho. Tatthāpi arūpino “dūrasamussāritakilesadukkhatāya,
tika-s0201t:1806_3: santapaṇītaāneñjavihārasamaṅgitāya, ativiya dīghāyukatāyā”ti evamādīhi visesehi ativiya
tika-s0201t:1806_4: itarehi ukkaṭṭhā. Brahmā mahānubhāvotiādiṃ dasasahassiyaṃ mahābrahmuno vasena vadati.
tika-s0201t:1806_5: “Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato”ti hi vuttaṃ. Anuttaranti seṭṭhaṃ navalokuttaraṃ. Bhāvānukkamo
tika-s0201t:1806_6: bhāvavasena paresaṃ ajjhāsayavasena “sadevaka”ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ anukkamo. Tīhākārehīti
tika-s0201t:1806_8: tīsu padesu. Tena tenākārenāti sadevakattādinā tena tena pakārena. Tedhātukameva
tika-s0201t:1807_0: Abhiññāti ya-kāralopenāyaṃ niddeso, abhijānitvāti ayamettha atthoti āha “abhiññāya,
tika-s0201t:1807_2: ekappamāṇattā. Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇācāratāya hi sabbapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto.
tika-s0201t:1807_3: Anuttaraṃ vivekasukhanti phalasamāpattisukhaṃ. Tena vītimissāpi kadāci bhagavato
tika-s0201t:1807_4: dhammadesanā hotīti āha “hitvāpī”ti. Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā
tika-s0201t:1807_5: sādhukāraṃ vā deti, yathāsutaṃ vā dhammaṃ paccavekkhati, taṃ khaṇaṃ pubbabhāgena
tika-s0201t:1807_6: paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, yathāparicchedañca samāpattito vuṭṭhāya
tika-s0201t:1808_0: Desakāyattena āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanāti sā pariyattidhammavasena
tika-s0201t:1808_1: veditabbāti āha “desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi gāthāyā”tiādi. Sāsitabbapuggalagatena
tika-s0201t:1808_4: maggakusalānaṃ, kusalānanti vā anavajjānaṃ. Tena phaladhammānampi saṅgaho siddho
tika-s0201t:1808_5: hoti. Ādibhāvo sīladiṭṭhīnaṃ tammūlakattā uttarimanussadhammānaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe
tika-s0201t:1808_6: kathāvadhisaddappabandho gāthāvasena suttavasena ca vavatthito pariyattidhammo, yo
tika-s0201t:1808_7: idheva “desanā”ti vutto. Tassa pana attho visesena sīlādi evāti āha “bhagavā hi dhammaṃ
tika-s0201t:1808_8: desento…pe… nibbānaṃ dassetī”ti. Tattha sīlaṃ dassetvāti sīlaggahaṇena sasambhāraṃ
tika-s0201t:1808_9: sīlaṃ gahitaṃ. Tathā maggaggahaṇena sasambhāro maggoti tadubhayena anavasesato pariyattiatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1808_10: pariyādiyati. Tenāti sīlādidassanena. Atthavasena hi idha desanāya ādikalyāṇādibhāvo
tika-s0201t:1808_11: adhippeto. Kathikasaṇṭhitīti kathikassa saṇṭhānaṃ kathanavasena samavaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1809_0: Na so sātthaṃ deseti niyyānatthavirahato tassā desanāya. Ekabyañjanādiyuttā vāti
tika-s0201t:1809_1: sithilādibhedesu byañjanesu ekappakāreneva, dvippakāreneva vā byañjanena yuttā vā
tika-s0201t:1809_2: damiḷabhāsā viya. Sabbattha niroṭṭhaṃ katvā vattabbatāya sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā
tika-s0201t:1809_3: kirātabhāsā viya. Sabbattheva vissajjanīyayuttatāya sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā vā yavanabhāsā
tika-s0201t:1809_4: viya. Sabbattheva sānusāratāya sabbaniggahitabyañjanā vā pārasikādimilakkhabhāsā
tika-s0201t:1809_5: viya. Sabbāpesā ekadesabyañjanavaseneva pavattiyā aparipuṇṇabyañjanāti katvā “abyañjanā”ti
tika-s0201t:1809_6: vuttā. Amakkhetvāti apalicchetvā avināsetvā, ahāpetvāti vā attho.
tika-s0201t:1810_0: Bhagavā yamatthaṃ ñāpetuṃ ekagāthampi ekavākyampi deseti, tamatthaṃ tāya desanāya
tika-s0201t:1810_1: sabbaso paripuṇṇameva katvā deseti, evaṃ sabbatthāti āha “ekadesanāpi aparipuṇṇā
tika-s0201t:1810_2: natthī”ti. Ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitenāti saṃkilesapakkhato vaṭṭadukkhato ca uddharaṇasabhāvāvaṭṭhitena
tika-s0201t:1810_3: cittena. Tasmāti yasmā sikkhāttayasaṅgahaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ idha “brahmacariya”nti
tika-s0201t:1810_4: adhippetaṃ, tasmā. Brahmacariyanti iminā samānādhikaraṇāni sabbapadāni yojetvā atthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1810_5: dassento “so dhammaṃ deseti…pe… pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1811_0: Dūrasamussāritamānasseva sāsane sammāpaṭipatti sambhavati, na māna jātikassāti āha
tika-s0201t:1811_2: honti nimittassa anavaṭṭhānato’ na tathā kulavijjāmadāti khattiyabrāhmaṇakulīnānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1811_3: pabbajitānampi jātivijjā nissāya mānajappanaṃ duppajahanti āha “yebhuyyena hi…pe…
tika-s0201t:1811_4: mānaṃ karontī”ti. Vijātitāyāti nihīnajātitāya. Patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkontīti suvisuddhiṃ
tika-s0201t:1811_5: katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkonti. Sīlavasena hi sāsane patiṭṭhāti. Patiṭṭhātunti
tika-s0201t:1811_6: vā saccapaṭivedhena lokuttarāya patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhātuṃ. Yebhuyyena hi upanissayasampannā
tika-s0201t:1812_0: Parisuddhanti rāgādīnaṃ accantameva pahānadīpanato nirupakkilesatāya sabbaso visuddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1812_1: Saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti pothujjanikasaddhāvasena saddahati. Viññujātikānañhi dhammasampattigahaṇapubbikā
tika-s0201t:1812_3: vutte gharasāmikagharasāminivasena dvinnaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ viññāyati. Yassa pana purisassa
tika-s0201t:1812_4: anekā pajāpatiyo honti, tattha kiṃ vattabbaṃ? Ekāyapi tāya vāso sambādhoti dassanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1812_5: “dve”ti vuttaṃ. Rāgādinā sakiñcanaṭṭhena, khettavatthuādinā sapalibodhaṭṭhena. Rāgarajādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1812_6: āgamanapathatāpi uppajjanaṭṭhānatā evāti dvepi vaṇṇanā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1812_8: ṭhānabhāvena gharāvāsapabbajjānaṃ sambādhabbhokāsataṃ dassetvā idāni kusalappavattiyā
