tika-s0201t:2346_2: padehi. Mayhaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhissasīti mama ārakkhako bhavissasi. Lakuṇḍakataranti
tika-s0201t:2347_0: Phusitumpi samatthaṃ kiñci na passati, pageva ñāṇavibhavanti adhippāyo. Nipphattinti
tika-s0201t:2347_1: nipphajjanaṃ, phalanti attho. Tañhi kāraṇavasena gantabbato adhigantabbato gatīti
tika-s0201t:2347_2: vuccati. Ānubhāvanti pabhāvaṃ. So hi jotanaṭṭhena virocanaṭṭhena jutīti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:2347_3: Mahatā ānubhāvena paresaṃ abhibhavanato mahesoti akkhāyatīti mahesakkho. Tayidaṃ
tika-s0201t:2347_4: abhibhavanaṃ kittisampattiyā parivārasampattiyā cāti āha “mahāyaso mahāparivāro”ti.
tika-s0201t:2348_0: Pariharantīti sineruṃ dakkhiṇato katvā parivattanti. Disāti bhummatthe etaṃ paccattavacananti
tika-s0201t:2348_1: āha “disāsu virocamānā”ti. Attano jutiyā dibbamānāya vā. Tehīti candimasūriyehi.
tika-s0201t:2348_2: Tattakena pamāṇenāti yattake candimasūriyehi obhāsiyamāno lokadhātusaṅkhāto eko loko,
tika-s0201t:2348_3: tattakena pamāṇena. Idaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ buddhānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ
tika-s0201t:2348_4: padhānaṃ, tasmā yebhuyyena etthupapannā devatā aññesu cakkavāḷesu devatā abhibhuyya
tika-s0201t:2348_5: vattanti. Tathā hi brahmā sahampati dasasahassabrahmaparivāro bhagavato santikaṃ
tika-s0201t:2348_6: upagañchi. Tenāha “ettha cakkavāḷasahasse tuyhaṃ vaso vattatī”ti. Idāni “ettha te
tika-s0201t:2348_7: vattate vaso”ti vuttaṃ vase vattanaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “paroparañca jānāsī”tiādi
tika-s0201t:2348_8: vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ vuttaṃ ettha-saddaṃ ānetvā attho veditabboti dassento
tika-s0201t:2348_10: ca anuḷāre ca. Ayaṃ iddho ayaṃ pakatimanussoti iminā “sarūpato evassa sattānaṃ paroparajānanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2348_11: na samudāgamato”ti dasseti. Yaṃ pana vakkhati “sattānaṃ āgatiṃ gatinti, taṃ kāmaloke
tika-s0201t:2348_12: sattānaṃ ādānanikkhepajānanamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na kammavipākajānanaṃ. Yadi hi
tika-s0201t:2348_13: samudāgamato jāneyya, attanopi jāneyya, na cassa taṃ atthīti, tathā āha “itthambhāvoti
tika-s0201t:2348_14: idaṃ cakkavāḷa”ntiādi. Rāgayogato rāgo etassa atthīti vā rāgo, virajjanasīlo virāgī,
tika-s0201t:2348_15: taṃ rāgavirāginaṃ. Sahassibrahmā nāma tvaṃ cūḷaniyā eva lokadhātuyā jānanato. Tayāti
tika-s0201t:2348_16: nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ. Catuhatthāyāti anekahatthena sāṇipākārena kātabbapaṭappamāṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:2348_17: dīghato catuhatthāya, vitthārato dvihatthāya pilotikāya kātuṃ vāyamanto viya gopphake
tika-s0201t:2348_18: udake nimujjitukāmo viya ca pamāṇaṃ ajānanto vihaññatīti niggaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:2349_0: 504. Taṃ kāyanti tadeva nikāyaṃ. Jānitabbaṭṭhānaṃ patvāpīti anaññasādhāraṇā mayhaṃ
tika-s0201t:2349_1: sīlādayo guṇavisesā tāva tiṭṭhantu, īdisaṃ lokiyaṃ parittakaṃ jānitabbaṭṭhānampi
tika-s0201t:2349_2: patvā. Ayaṃ imesaṃ atisayena nīcoti nīceyyo, tassa bhāvo nīceyyanti āha “tayā nīcatarabhāvo
tika-s0201t:2350_0: Heṭṭhūpapattikoti uparūparito cavitvā heṭṭhā laddhūpapattiko. Evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:2350_1: vitthārato dassetuṃ “anuppanne buddhuppāde”ti āha. Heṭṭhūpapattikaṃ katvāti heṭṭhūpapattikaṃ
tika-s0201t:2350_2: patthanaṃ katvā. Yathā kenaci bahūsu ānantariyesu katesu yaṃ tattha garutaraṃ balavaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2350_3: tadeva paṭisandhiṃ deti, itarāni pana tassa anubalappadāyakāni honti, na paṭisandhidāyakāni,
tika-s0201t:2350_4: evaṃ catūsu rūpajjhānesu bhāvitesu yaṃ tattha garutaraṃ chandapaṇidhiadhimokkhādivasena
tika-s0201t:2350_5: sābhisaṅkhārañca, tadeva ca paṭisandhiṃ deti, itarāni pana aladdhokāsatāya tassa
tika-s0201t:2350_6: anubalappadāyakāni honti, na paṭisandhidāyakāni, tannibbattitajjhāneneva āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti
tika-s0201t:2350_7: hotīti āha “tatiyajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā”ti. Tatthāti subhakiṇhabrahmaloke. Puna
tika-s0201t:2350_8: tatthāti ābhassarabrahmaloke. Paṭhamakāleti tasmiṃ bhave paṭhamasmiṃ kāle. Ubhayanti
tika-s0201t:2350_9: atītaṃ attano nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha nibbattiyā hetubhūtaṃ attano katakammanti ubhayaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2350_10: Pamussitvā kālassa ciratarabhāvato. Vītināmeti paṭipajjantīti ca tadā tassā kiriyāya
tika-s0201t:2351_0: Apāyesīti pāyesi. Pipāsiteti tasite. Ghammanīti ghammakāle. Sampareteti ghammapariḷāhena
tika-s0201t:2351_1: pipāsāya abhibhūte. Nti pānīyadānaṃ. Vatasīlavattanti samādānavasena vatabhūtaṃ cārittasīlabhāvena
tika-s0201t:2351_2: samāciṇṇattā sīlavattaṃ. Suttappabuddhova anussarāmīti supitvā pabuddhamatto viya
tika-s0201t:2351_3: supinaṃ tava pubbanivutthaṃ mama pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena anussarāmi, sabbaññutaññāṇena
tika-s0201t:2352: Karamareti vilumpitvā ānīte. Kammasajjanti yuddhasajjaṃ, āvudhādāyininti attho.
tika-s0201t:2353: Eṇīkūlasminti eṇīmigabāhullena “eṇīkūla”nti saṅkhaṃ gate gaṅgāya tīrappadese. Gayhaka nīyamānanti gayhavasena karamarabhāvena corehi attano ṭhānaṃ nīyamānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2354: Āvāhavivāhavasena mittasanthavaṃ katvā. “Evaṃ amhesu kīḷantesu gaṅgeyyako nāgo kupito”ti mayi saññampi na karontīti. Susukāranti susūti pavattaṃ bheravanāganissāsaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2355: Gahītanāvanti viheṭhetukāmatāya gatinivāraṇavasena gahitaṃ niggahitaṃ nāvaṃ. Luddenāti kurūrena. Manussakappāti nāvāgatānaṃ manussānaṃ viheṭhetukāmatāya.
tika-s0201t:2356: Baddhacaroti paṭibaddhacariyo. Tenāha “antevāsiko”ti. Taṃ nissāyevāti raññā upaṭṭhiyamānopi rājānaṃ pahāya taṃ kappaṃ antevāsiṃ nissāyeva.
tika-s0201t:2357: Sambuddhimantaṃ vatinaṃ amaññīti ayaṃ sammadeva buddhimā vatasampannoti amaññi sambhāvesi ca.
tika-s0201t:2359_0: Addhāti ekaṃsena. Mametamāyunti mayhaṃ etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ tattha tattha bhave pavattaṃ
tika-s0201t:2359_1: āyuṃ. Na kevalaṃ mama āyumeva, atha kho aññampi sabbaññeyyaṃ jānāsi, na tuyhaṃ aviditaṃ
tika-s0201t:2359_2: nāma atthi. Tathā hi buddho sammāsambuddho tuvaṃ. No ce kathamayamattho ñāto? Tathā
tika-s0201t:2359_3: hi sammāsambuddhattā eva te ayaṃ jalito jotamāno ānubhāvo obhāsayaṃ sabbampi brahmalokaṃ
tika-s0201t:2359_4: obhāsento dibbamāno tiṭṭhatīti satthu asamasamataṃ pavedesi.
tika-s0201t:2360_0: Pathavattenāti pathavīattena. Tenāha “pathavīsabhāvenā”ti. Ettha ca yasmā – “sabbasaṅkhārasamathoti”ādinā
tika-s0201t:2360_1: sādhāraṇato, “yattha neva pathavī”ti asādhāraṇato ca pathaviyā asabhāvena nibbānassa
tika-s0201t:2360_2: gahetabbatā atthi, taṃ nivattetvā pathaviyā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ gahetuṃ “pathaviyā
tika-s0201t:2360_3: pathavattenā”ti vuttaṃ. Nāpahosinti na pāpuṇiṃ. Idha pathaviyā pāpuṇanaṃ nāma “etaṃ
tika-s0201t:2361_0: Vāditāyāti vādasīlatāya. Sabbanti akkharaṃ niddisitvāti “sabbaṃ kho ahaṃ brahme”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:2361_1: bhagavatā vuttaṃ sabba-saddaṃ – “sace kho te mārisa sabbassa sabbattena ananubhūta”nti
tika-s0201t:2361_2: paccanubhāsanavasena niddisitvā. Akkhare dosaṃ gaṇhantoti bhagavatā sakkāyasabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:2361_3: sandhāya sabba-sadde gahite sabbasabbavasena tadatthaparivattanena sabba-saddavacanīyatāsāmaññena
tika-s0201t:2361_4: ca dosaṃ gaṇhanto. Tenāha “satthā panā”tiādi. Tattha yadi sabbaṃ ananubhūtaṃ “natthi
tika-s0201t:2361_5: sabba”nti loke anavasesaṃ pucchati. Sace sabbassa sabbattena anavasesasabhāvena ananubhūtaṃ
tika-s0201t:2361_6: appattaṃ, taṃ gaganakusumaṃ viya kiñci na siyā. Athassa ananubhūtaṃ atthīti assa
tika-s0201t:2361_7: sabbattena ananubhūtaṃ yadi atthi, “sabba”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ micchā, sabbaṃ nāma taṃ
tika-s0201t:2361_8: na hotīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “mā heva te rittakamevā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2362_0: Ahaṃ sabbañca vakkhāmi, ananubhūtañca vakkhāmīti ahaṃ “sabba”nti ca vakkhāmi, “ananubhūta”nti
tika-s0201t:2362_1: ca vakkhāmi, ettha ko dosoti adhippāyo. Kāraṇaṃ āharantoti sabbassa sabbattena ananubhūtassa
tika-s0201t:2362_2: atthibhāve kāraṇaṃ niddisanto. Vijānitabbanti maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇehi visesato
tika-s0201t:2362_3: sabbasaṅkhatavisiṭṭhatāya jānitabbaṃ. Anidassananti idaṃ nibbānassa sanidassanaduke
tika-s0201t:2362_5: anidassanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbasaṅkhatavidhuratāya vā natthi etassa nidassananti
tika-s0201t:2362_6: anidassanaṃ. Natthi etassa antoti anantaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “tayida”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:2363_0: Bhūtānīti paccayasambhūtāni. Asambhūtanti paccayehi asambhūtaṃ, nibbānanti attho.
tika-s0201t:2363_1: Apabhassarabhāvahetūnaṃ sabbaso abhāvā sabbato pabhāti sabbatopabhaṃ. Tenāha “nibbānato
tika-s0201t:2363_2: hī”tiādi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “tamo tattha na vijjatī”ti. pabhūtamevāti pakaṭṭhabhāvena
tika-s0201t:2363_3: ukkaṭṭhabhāvena vijjamānameva. Arūpībhāvena adesikattā sabbato pabhavati vijjatīti
tika-s0201t:2363_4: sabbatopabhaṃ. Tenāha “puratthimadisādīsū”tiādi. Pavisanti etthāti pavisaṃ, tadeva
tika-s0201t:2363_5: sa-kārassa bha-kāraṃ, vi-kārassa ca lopaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “pabha”nti. Tenāha “titthassa
tika-s0201t:2363_6: nāma”nti. Vādaṃ patiṭṭhapesīti evaṃ mayā sabbañca vuttaṃ, ananubhūtañca vuttaṃ, tattha
tika-s0201t:2363_7: yaṃ tayā adhippāyaṃ ajānantena sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya dosaggahaṇaṃ, taṃ micchāti brahmānaṃ
tika-s0201t:2364_0: Gahitagahitanti “idaṃ nicca”ntiādinā gahitagahitaṃ gāhaṃ. Tattha tattha dosadassanamukhena
tika-s0201t:2364_1: niggaṇhantena satthārā vissajjāpito kiñci gahetabbaṃ attano paṭisaraṇaṃ adisvā parājayaṃ
tika-s0201t:2364_2: paṭicchādetuṃ laḷitakaṃ kātukāmo vādaṃ pahāya iddhiyā pāṭihāriyalīḷaṃ dassetukāmo.
tika-s0201t:2364_3: Yadi sakkosi mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ, na pana sakkhissasīti adhippāyo. Mūlapaṭisandhiṃ
tika-s0201t:2364_4: gantukāmoti attano pākatikena attabhāvena ṭhātukāmo. So hi paṭisandhikāle nibbattasadisatāya
tika-s0201t:2364_5: mūlapaṭisandhīti vutto. Aññesanti heṭṭhā aññakāyikānaṃ brahmūnaṃ. Na adāsi abhisaṅkhatakāyenevāyaṃ
tika-s0201t:2364_6: tiṭṭhatu, na pākatikarūpenāti cittaṃ uppādesi. Tena so abhisaṅkhatakāyaṃ apanetuṃ
tika-s0201t:2364_7: avisahanto attabhāvapaṭicchādakaṃ andhakāraṃ nimminituṃ ārabhi. Satthā taṃ tamaṃ
tika-s0201t:2365_0: Bhavevāhanti bhave eva ahaṃ. Ayañca eva-saddo aṭṭhānapayuttoti dassento āha “ahaṃ
tika-s0201t:2365_1: bhave bhayaṃ disvāyevā”ti, sabbasmiṃ bhave jātiādibhayaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā yāthāvato disvā.
tika-s0201t:2365_2: Sattabhavanti sattasaṅkhātaṃ bhavaṃ. Kammabhavapaccaye hi upapattibhave sattasamaññā.
tika-s0201t:2365_3: Vibhavanti vimuttiṃ. Pariyesamānampi upāyassa anadhigatattā bhaveyeva disvā. Bhavañca
tika-s0201t:2365_4: vibhavesinaṃ vibhavaṃ nibbutiṃ esamānānaṃ sattānaṃ bhavaṃ, bhavesu uppattiñca disvāti
tika-s0201t:2365_5: evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Na abhivadinti “aho vata sukha”nti evaṃ abhivadāpanākārābhāvato
tika-s0201t:2365_6: na abhinivisiṃ, lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ. Gāhattho eva vā abhivāda-saddoti āha “nābhivadi”nti,
tika-s0201t:2365_7: “na gavesi”nti. Bhavaggahaṇenettha dukkhasaccaṃ, nandīgahaṇena samudayasaccaṃ, vibhavaggahaṇena
tika-s0201t:2365_8: nirodhasaccaṃ, nandiñca na upādiyinti iminā maggasaccaṃ pakāsitanti āha “iti cattāri
tika-s0201t:2365_9: saccāni pakāsento”ti. Tadidaṃ catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ gāthāya vibhāvanadassanaṃ. Satthā
tika-s0201t:2365_10: pana tesaṃ brahmūnaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ saccāni vitthārato pakāsento vipassanaṃ pāpetvā
tika-s0201t:2365_11: arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi. Te ca brahmāno keci sotāpattiphale, keci sakadāgāmiphale,
tika-s0201t:2365_12: keci anāgāmiphale, keci arahatte ca patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “saccāni pakāsento
tika-s0201t:2365_13: satthā dhammaṃ desesī”tiādi. Acchariyajātāti sañjātacchariyā. Samūlaṃ bhavanti taṇhāvijjāhi samūlaṃ bhavaṃ.
tika-s0201t:2366_0: 505. Mama vasaṃ ativattitānīti sabbaso kāmadhātusamatikkamanapaṭipadāya mayhaṃ visayaṃ
tika-s0201t:2366_1: atikkamitāni. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ tesaṃ ariyabhūmisamokkamanaṃ jānātīti? Nayaggāhato –
tika-s0201t:2366_2: “samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ desento saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ, nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsento veneyyajanaṃ
tika-s0201t:2366_3: nibbānaṃ diṭṭhameva karoti, tassa desanā avañjhā amoghā indena vissaṭṭhavajirasadisā,
tika-s0201t:2366_4: tassa ca āṇāya ṭhitā saṃsāre na dissantevā”ti nayaggāhena anumānena jānāti. Sace
tika-s0201t:2366_5: tvaṃ evaṃ anubuddhoti yathā tvaṃ paresaṃ saccābhisambodhaṃ vadati, evaṃ tvaṃ attano
tika-s0201t:2366_6: anurūpato sayambhuñāṇena buddho dhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito. Taṃ dhammaṃ mā upanayasīti
tika-s0201t:2366_7: tayā paṭividdhadhammaṃ mā sāvakapaṭivedhaṃ pāpesi. Idanti idaṃ anantaraṃ vuttaṃ brahmaloke
tika-s0201t:2366_8: patiṭṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya māro vadati, te dassento “anuppanne hī”tiādimāha. Apāyapatiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:2366_9: pana ājīvakanigaṇṭhādipabbajjaṃ upagate titthakare, ye keci vā pabbajitvā micchāpaṭipanne
tika-s0201t:2366_10: jane sandhāya vadati. Anuppanneti asañjāte, appatteti attho. Anullapanatāyāti yathā
tika-s0201t:2366_11: māro upari kiñci uttaraṃ lapituṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ tathā uttarabhāsanena. Nimantanavacanenāti
tika-s0201t:2366_12: viññāpanavacanena. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ nimantanaṃ, brahmuno vā nimantanaṃ ettha atthīti
tika-s0201t:2366_13: brahmanimantanikaṃ, suttaṃ. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0201t:2369_0: 506. Koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭhoti āsayo vaccaguttaṭṭhānatāya koṭṭhaṃ, tassa abbhantarañhettha
tika-s0201t:2369_1: koṭṭhaṃ. Anurūpo hutvā paviṭṭho anupaviṭṭho. Sukhumañhi tadanucchavikaṃ attabhāvaṃ
tika-s0201t:2369_2: māpetvā ayaṃ tattha paviṭṭho. Garugaro viyāti garukagaruko viya. U-kārassa hi o-kāraṃ
tika-s0201t:2369_3: katvā ayaṃ niddeso, ativiya garuko maññeti attho. Garugaru viya icceva vā pāṭho.
tika-s0201t:2369_4: Māsabhattaṃ māso uttarapadalopena, māsabhattena ācitaṃ pūritaṃ māsācitaṃ maññe. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:2369_5: “māsabhattaṃ bhuttassa kucchi viyā”ti. Uttarapadalopena vinā atthaṃ dassetuṃ “māsapūritapasibbako
tika-s0201t:2369_6: viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tintamāso viyāti tintamāso pasibbako viya. Kiṃ nu kho etaṃ mama kucchiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:2369_7: pubbaṃ bhārikattaṃ, kiṃ nu kho kathaṃ nu kho jātanti adhippāyo? Upāyenāti pathena
tika-s0201t:2369_8: ñāyena. Byatirekato panassa anupāyaṃ dassetuṃ “sace panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Attānameva
tika-s0201t:2369_9: vā sandhāya “mā tathāgataṃ vihesesī”ti āha. Yathā hi ariyasaṅgho “tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2369_10: saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotū”tiādīsu tathāgatoti vuccati, evaṃ tappariyāpannā
tika-s0201t:2369_11: ariyapuggalā, yathā ca purimakā dutiyaaggasāvakā kappānaṃ satasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ
tika-s0201t:2369_12: asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā āgatā, ayampi mahāthero tathā āgatoti tathāgatoti.
tika-s0201t:2370_0: 507. Rukkhadevatā nāma cātumahārājikesu nihīno kāyo, tasmā nesaṃ manussagandho paricitattā
tika-s0201t:2370_1: nātijegucchoti āha “ākāsaṭṭhadevatāna”nti. Ābādhaṃ karotīti dukkhaṃ janeti. Nāgarikoti
tika-s0201t:2370_2: sukumāro. Paricokkhoti sabbaso sucirūpo. Ñātikoṭinti ñātibhāgaṃ. Anādimati hi saṃsāre
tika-s0201t:2370_3: ñātibhāgarahito nāma satto kassacipi natthīti adhippāyo. Idanti “so me tvaṃ bhāgineyyo
tika-s0201t:2370_4: hosī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ. Paveṇivasenāti tadā mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo hutvā idāni māraṭṭhāne
tika-s0201t:2370_5: ṭhitoti imissā paveṇiyā vasena vuttaṃ. Aññassa vā vesamaṃ dhuro vidhuro. Tenāha “aññehi
tika-s0201t:2370_6: saddhiṃ asadiso”ti. Appadukkhenāti sukheneva. Panthānaṃ avanti gacchantīti pathāvino.
tika-s0201t:2370_7: Ettakenāti ettāvatā citakasannisayena. Udakaleṇanti udakanissandanaleṇaṃ. Samāpattitoti
tika-s0201t:2371_0: 508. Dasahi akkosavatthūhīti dasahipi akkosavatthūhi, tato kiñci ahāpentā. Paribhāsathāti
tika-s0201t:2371_1: garahatha. Ghaṭṭethāti anūnāhi kathāhi imesu ovijjhatha. Dukkhāpethāti citte dukkhaṃ
tika-s0201t:2371_2: janetha. Etesanti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tumhākaṃ akkosanādīhi bhikkhūnaṃ kilesuppattiyā.
tika-s0201t:2371_3: Tenettha dūsī māro otāraṃ labhati nāmāti adhippāyo. Upaṭṭhātabbaṃ ibhaṃ arahantīti
tika-s0201t:2371_4: ibbhā, hatthibhaṇḍakā, hīnajīvikatāya hete ibbhā viyāti ibbhā, te pana sadutiyakavasena
tika-s0201t:2371_5: “gahapatikā”ti vuttā. Kaṇhāti kaṇhābhijātikā. Pādato jātattā pādānaṃ apaccā. Ālasiyajātāti
tika-s0201t:2372_0: Manussānaṃ akusalaṃ na bhaveyya tesaṃ tādisāya abhisandhiyā abhāvato. Āvesakassa
tika-s0201t:2372_1: ānubhāvena āviṭṭhassa cittasantati viparivattatīti vuttovāyamattho. Visabhāgavatthunti
tika-s0201t:2372_2: bhikkhūnaṃ santike itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhunīnaṃ santike purisarūpanti īdisaṃ, aññaṃ vā
tika-s0201t:2372_3: pabbajitānaṃ asāruppaṃ visabhāgavatthuṃ. Vippaṭisārārammaṇanti passantānaṃ vippaṭisārassa
tika-s0201t:2373_1: “sace māro manussānaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena. Yadi mārova
tika-s0201t:2373_2: tathā kareyya, manussānaṃ kusalaṃ na bhaveyya, mārasseva bhaveyya, sarīre pana anadhimuccitvā
tika-s0201t:2373_3: tādisaṃ pasādanīyaṃ pasādavatthuṃ dassesi. Tenāha “yathā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:2374_0: 511. Asubhasaññāparicitenāti sakalaṃ kāyaṃ asubhanti pavattāya saññāya sahagatajjhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:2374_1: asubhasaññā, tena paricitena paribhāvitena. Cetasā cittena. Bahulanti abhiṇhaṃ. Viharatoti
tika-s0201t:2374_2: viharantassa, asubhasamāpattibahulassāti attho. Patilīyatīti saṅkucati tattha paṭikūlatāya
tika-s0201t:2374_3: saṇṭhitattā. Patikuṭatīti apasakkati. Pativattatīti nivattati. Tato eva na sampasāriyati.
tika-s0201t:2375_0: Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññāti tīsupi bhavesu aruccanavasena pavattā vipassanābhāvanā.
tika-s0201t:2375_2: ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādibhedesu ca loke cittavicittesu. Rāgasantāni vūpasantarāgāni. Dosamohasantānīti
tika-s0201t:2375_3: etthāpi eseva nayo. Imesaṃ evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇaṃ sabbesaṃ sappāyabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:2376_0: 512. Sakkharaṃ gahetvāti sakkharāsīsena tattakaṃ bhinnapāsāṇamuṭṭhinti āha “antomuṭṭhiyaṃ
tika-s0201t:2376_1: tiṭṭhanapamāṇaṃ pāsāṇa”nti. Muṭṭhipariyāpannanti attho. Ayañhi pāsāṇassa heṭṭhimakoṭi.
tika-s0201t:2376_2: Hatthināgoti mahāhatthī. Mahantapariyāyo nāga-saddoti keci. Ahināgādito vā visesanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:2376_3: hatthināgoti vuttaṃ. Sakalasarīreneva nivattitvā apalokesīti vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ
tika-s0201t:2376_4: “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na vāyanti ettha vā-saddo avadhāraṇatthoti āha “neva pamāṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:2376_5: aññāsī”ti. Sahāpalokanāyāti ca vacanatoti iminā vacanena imaṃ vacanamattaṃ gahetvāti
tika-s0201t:2376_6: adhippāyo. Uḷāreti uḷāraguṇe. Bhagavantañhi ṭhapetvā natthi tadā sadevake loke tādiso guṇavisesayuttoti.
tika-s0201t:2377_0: Visuṃ visuṃ paccattavedaniyo ayasūlena saddhiṃ bhūtāni cha phassāyatanāni etassāti
tika-s0201t:2377_1: cha phassāyatanaṃ, dukkhaṃ. Taṃ ettha atthīti cha phassāyataniko, nirayo. Tenāha
tika-s0201t:2377_2: “chasu phassā…pe… paccayo”ti. Samāhanatīti samāhato, anekasatabhedo saṅkusamāhato
tika-s0201t:2377_3: ettha atthīti saṅkusamāhato, nirayo. Visesapaccayatāya vedanāya ṭhitoti vedaniyo,
tika-s0201t:2377_4: kāraṇākārakena vinā paccattaṃ sayameva vedaniyoti paccattavedaniyo. Ayasūlena saddhiṃ
tika-s0201t:2377_5: ayasūlanti pādapadesato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ abhihananavasena āgatena paṇṇāsāya janehi
tika-s0201t:2377_6: gahitena ayasūlena saha sīsapadesato paṭṭhāya āgataṃ. Ayasūlabhāvasāmaññena cetaṃ
tika-s0201t:2377_7: ekavacanaṃ, satamattāni patitāni sūlāni. Iminā te ṭhānena cintetvāti nissitavohārena
tika-s0201t:2377_8: nissayaṃ vadati. Evaṃ vuttanti “tadā jāneyyāsi vassasahassaṃ me niraye paccamānassā”ti
tika-s0201t:2377_9: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Vuṭṭhānimanti vuṭṭhāne bhavaṃ, antimanti attho. Tenāha “vipākavuṭṭhānavedana”nti,
tika-s0201t:2377_10: vipākassa pariyosānaṃ vedananti attho. Dukkhatarā hoti padīpassa vijjhāyanakkhaṇe mahantabhāvo viya.
tika-s0201t:2378_1: Ayato apagato nirayo, so devadūtasuttena dīpetabbo. Atthavaṇṇanā panassa parato sayameva
tika-s0201t:2378_2: āgamissati. Imaṃ pana atītavatthuṃ āharitvā attano ñāṇānubhāvadīpanamukhena māraṃ
tika-s0201t:2378_3: santajjento mahāthero “yo etamabhijānātī”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho – yo mahābhiñño
tika-s0201t:2378_4: etaṃ kammaṃ kammaphalañca hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya abhimukhaṃ katvā paccakkhato
tika-s0201t:2378_5: jānāti. Sabbaso bhinnakilesatāya bhikkhu sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako, tādisaṃ uḷāraguṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:2378_6: āsajja ghaṭṭayitvā ekantakāḷakehi pāpadhammehi samannāgatattā kaṇha māra āyatiṃ mahādukkhaṃ vindissasi.
tika-s0201t:2379_0: Udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvāti tattha nibbattanakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammaphalena mahāsamuddaudakameva
tika-s0201t:2379_1: adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā. Tathā hi tāni kappaṭṭhitikāni honti. Tenāha “kappaṭṭhāyino”ti.
tika-s0201t:2379_2: Tesanti vimānānaṃ. Etaṃ yathāvuttavimānavatthuṃ tāsaṃ accharānaṃ sampattiṃ, tassa
tika-s0201t:2379_3: ca kāraṇaṃ attapaccakkhaṃ katvā jānāti. Pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayīti pubbārāme visākhāya
tika-s0201t:2379_4: mahāupāsikāya kāritaṃ sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍitamahāpāsādaṃ attano pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi.
tika-s0201t:2379_5: Tenāha “idaṃ pāsādakampanasuttena dīpetabba”nti. Idanti “yo vejayanta”nti imissā
tika-s0201t:2380_0: Tassa brahmagaṇassa tathācintanasamanantarameva tasmiṃ brahmaloke sudhammaṃ brahmasabhaṃ
tika-s0201t:2380_1: gantvā. Tepīti mahāmoggallānādayo. Paccekaṃ disāsūti mahāmoggallānatthero puratthimadisāyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2380_3: uttaradisāyanti evaṃ cattāro therā brahmaparisamatthake majjhe nisinnassa bhagavato
tika-s0201t:2380_4: samantato catuddisā nisīdiṃsu. Gāthā vuttāti “yo brahmaṃ paripucchatī”ti gāthā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:2380_5: Aññatarabrahmasuttenāti – “tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ
tika-s0201t:2380_6: diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā mahāvagge āgatena aññatarabrahmasuttena.
tika-s0201t:2381_0: Jhānavimokkhena phusīti jhānavimokkhasannissayena abhiññāñāṇena phassayi. Vananti
tika-s0201t:2381_1: jambudīpaṃ aphassayīti sambandho. Jambudīpo hi vanabahulatāya idha “vana”nti vutto.
tika-s0201t:2381_2: Tenāha “jambusaṇḍassa issaro”ti. Pubbavidehānaṃ dīpanti pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ dīpaṃ,
tika-s0201t:2381_3: pubbavidehadīpanti attho. Bhūmisayā narā nāma aparagoyānakā uttarakurukā ca. Yasmā
tika-s0201t:2381_4: te gehapariggahābhāvato bhūmiyaṃyeva sayanti, na pāsādādīsu. Paṭilabhīti uppādesi.
tika-s0201t:2381_5: Etaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsīti esā yathā pubbe dūsimārassa, evaṃ tuyhaṃ āsā dīgharattaṃ anatthāvahā,
tika-s0201t:2381_6: tasmā edisaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsīti mārassa ovādaṃ adāsi. Sesaṃ sabbattha suviññeyyameva.
